for myself i ordered the gold digga breakfast poutine which is made up of poached eggs herb potatoes saint cyrille curds berkshire roast pork black truffles and brown butter hollandaise to the staffs credit i asked for my eggs soft and they confirmed that they would be runny what i was not expecting once the meal arrived was firstly the smaller portion size and secondly that the mix of the egg yolks whites hollandaise sauce oils and cheese would leave the bottom half of the bowl a symphonic mess of a soggy herb potatoe soup this was contrasted with the overcooked berkshire roast pork which more closely resembled last nights overcooked leftover steak cubed and refried for the nextday patrons the seasoning was present but immediately overwhelmed by the soggy potatoe soup to be rendered pointless and the truffles were simply absent all together the dish is worthy of a spot on gordan ramsays kitchen nightmares and were it not for having spent time in the army eating whatever we were told to eat im sure i would have rejected this out of hand

regardless the location was clean and the staff were great maybe well return in the future but i simply cannot recommend these breakfast poutines which appear to be constructed without care or attention to detail

1 star for the breakfast poutine mess 1 star because the cooks knew how to cook the ham and eggs served to my partner along with the good staff and atmosphere

Address: 10310 45 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T6H 5K3 Canada
Review: loved this place amazing food great service our server jeremy was great we felt his love for his job we were so impressed by the food that we ordered two desserts for two of us we typically order one and share the best sticky toffee pudding i have ever had

Address: 10310 45 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T6H 5K3 Canada
Review:
overall good experience the food was tasty and very well balanced we were able to substitute for vegetarian friendly options and also had the option of subbing marinara for alfredo sauce shout out to emily our server who was really pleasant and was able to make recommendations from the menu they didnt disappoint excellent customer service
i asked for extra seasoning on my salmon but it really wasnt needed as it was quite tasty as is
portion size was perfect

nb free dessert if youre celebrating a birthday

Address: 10310 45 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T6H 5K3 Canada
Review: lovely atmosphere the service was topnotch the food was divine i had to order the gnocchi poutine out of curiosity and was super glad i did highly recommend the mushroom risotto steak as well it was cooked to perfection the prices were reasonable as well all in all we will definitely be back many more times

Address: 10310 45 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T6H 5K3 Canada
Review: it was great experience overall enjoyed the food they do have a few vegterian options too i ordered caramelle and half vegterian pizza

Address: 10310 45 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T6H 5K3 Canada
Review: pretty good food their pasta was excellent so was the fried breaded risotto ball they had a special on lambshank wellington and that was excellent as well great service and nice decor free parking very good drink menu

Address: 10060 Jasper Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1V9 Canada
Review: very good indian food very welcoming and great service very delicious and good price its located at lower floor of the building

Address: 10060 Jasper Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1V9 Canada
Review: this is located inside the scotia place food court down one level inside the building the food was good the portions were large i thought the butter chicken was slightly bland but it could have been due to the other items i ate the salad was good and so was the naan definitely worth the 999 plus tax for 3 items will eat here again next time im in edmonton

Address: 10060 Jasper Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1V9 Canada
Review:
the best indian fast food in downtown edmonton located at scotia place bldg
my newest favourite is chicken biryani and
my all time favourite is their lamb curry and chickpeas with basmati rice
the combo meal is reasonably priced
quick service and friendly staff

Address: 10060 Jasper Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1V9 Canada
Review: their momo is great i have tried few other items and all of them were delicious an amazing place to eat highly recommended

Address: 10060 Jasper Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1V9 Canada
Review: only open during the week at lunch not many places downtown you can get a good meal for under 10 this is one of them

Address: 8232 Gateway Boulevard NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4B2 Canada
Review: we did a delivery order from here from a recommendation from a friend im glad we listened the pizzas were fantastic  fresh flavourful and delicious the garlic bites were good which turned into great with the spicy marinara sauce

Address: 8232 Gateway Boulevard NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4B2 Canada
Review:
great pizza and a retro industrial dining environment

community has some great new yorkstyle pizza perhaps one of the better new yorkstyle pizzas in town this pizza has a great rossa sauce complemented by the crisp flavourful crust pizza tastes best when eaten folded and warm the only downside of this pizza was the grease however this is likely due to all the pepperoni on the pizza and i will say it is less greasy than other pizzas of this type in the area

the atmosphere of this restaurant is very relaxing and left me craving a craft beer which they offer a wide selection of

pizza is a solid 45 which is quite good

Address: 8232 Gateway Boulevard NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4B2 Canada
Review: great pizza and nice service my drink got knocked over they replaced it free of charge food service was slow the night we were there but this sounded like it was the exception and not the norm the atmosphere and food you get definitely made up for it though great place to have a large group

Address: 8232 Gateway Boulevard NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4B2 Canada
Review: tried dine in once and now followed up with takeaway phenomenal creative pizzas good crust and toppings friendly service order was ready when promised just be aware that given the neighborhood that there is limited places to park to pick up

Address: 8232 Gateway Boulevard NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4B2 Canada
Review:
oh my goodness the new york style pizza was lovely but the garlic bites are divine like i may never have eaten a bite more perfect in my life the service was great too  very patient despite my questions and they were great about my nut shellfish allergy

absolutely a must try if youre in the area we were told the next act was the restaurant to beat dont get me wrong their burger was good but id say that community beats them cleanly

Address: 10146 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1A7 Canada
Review:
the place itself looked so nice and clean it has a great vibe to the interior for the food im giving it a 4 star as there was a bit of an off smell to the pork on the ramen i ordered which was gold kome ramen but the broth was good and the size was big for 1375 2 of my friends ordered deluxe ramen and yea they were huge we all did take out on our ramens
we also had starters which was the sweet potato fries i highly recommend this one it was crunchy on the outside but soft on the inside and tasted great with the mild spicy sauce we had chicken karaage as well there was 7 smallish sized pieces for around 10 it was pretty tasty but a bit pricey for the size and amount
now on to the service i would give it a 4 because we ordered at 400pm and got our food at 445 so it was quite a long wait for 5 ramens i gotta say they were busy preparing online orders though so maybe thats why it took long to get our food
all in all i would come back to this place super yummy starters and huge bowls for ramen

Address: 10146 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1A7 Canada
Review: great japanese restaurant ramen tasted great broth was on point and noodles not mushy friendly service yakitori tasted amazing lots of stuff to choose on menu decent and clean interior would come back when in area highly recommend cheers

Address: 10146 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1A7 Canada
Review: i got the vegetarian options last night veg gold kome miso ramen agedashi tofu mushroom skewer miso egg and kimchi my most favourite dish was the mushroom skewer and it is also very inexpensive the flavours are so great followed by the ramen and sides the agedashi tofu was a bit bland for my liking however it was light and enjoyable nevertheless i really liked the service and the ambiance and will definitely be a returning customer

Address: 10146 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1A7 Canada
Review:
service is great took a little while but it didnt disappoint so it was worth busy on lunch and im sure dinner service will be as well one of the best in edmonton wont be disappointed

an updated review misoya ramen is a fantastic restaurant with great ramen dishes a pleasant atmosphere and excellent service

its always a good sign when a restaurant has standout dishes and in this case misoya ramens silver shiro ramen is particularly noteworthy additionally having a clean restaurant with nice decor can contribute to an enjoyable dining experience

perhaps one of the most important aspects of any dining experience is the service and misoya ramen excels in this area friendly servers make the experience great and you can take your coworker or your wife for for a lunch date as the place is gorgeous it makes a big difference in the overall experience of dining at a restaurant

tldr overall misoya ramen is a great option for anyone looking for delicious ramen in a pleasant atmosphere with excellent service its probably close to authentic as i cant say since ive never been to japan but im sure the flavors are spot on comparable

Address: 10146 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1A7 Canada
Review: this place turned out to be a great surprise edmonton doesnt have many places for good ramen so i never thought of giving this place a try i was pleasantly surprised by how good it was most ramen places only give you 2 pieces of cha siu and call it a day my bowl has 3 and they were all thick cut the tonkatsu ramen has good flavor it is probably on the pricier side for ramen but i would say it is well worth the small premium

Address: 10065 - 100th Street Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6 Canada
Review: what an amazing experience the food is like nothing ive ever tasted in my life absolutely amazing michelle was our server she was kind friendly and helpful i ordered the avocado toast with a green smoothie and an egg on top and side of bacon our server also gave us some hollandaise sauce to taste which was unreal it just tasted fresh and buttery thank you harvest room for this experience

Address: 10065 - 100th Street Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6 Canada
Review:
i recently had the pleasure of dining at the harvest room restaurant and i can confidently say it exceeded all expectations from the moment i stepped inside the magical ambiance transported me to another world the restaurants enchanting decor and panoramic views overlooking the river valley made me feel like i was in a different country it was a visual feast for the eyes setting the stage for an extraordinary dining experience

now lets talk about the food never before have i encountered such flavor and tenderness in beef every bite was a revelation showcasing the culinary expertise and dedication to quality the beef was beyond compare and the buttermilk mashed potatoes were like a stroke of culinary magic the creamy fluffy texture and rich buttery flavor were a perfect complement to the exquisite beef it was a combination that danced harmoniously on my palate leaving me in awe of the incredible flavors

the attention to detail and the use of highquality ingredients were evident in every aspect of the meal the presentation was impeccable and the flavors were perfectly balanced the talented chefs at the harvest room truly know how to create a memorable culinary experience

adding to the overall allure the attentive and friendly staff provided exceptional service throughout the evening they were knowledgeable accommodating and ensured that every need was met enhancing the overall enjoyment of the dining experience

in conclusion the harvest room is a shining  gem that offers an extraordinary blend of sensational cuisine and a mesmerizing ambiance whether youre looking for a romantic dinner a celebration or simply a memorable night out this restaurant delivers on all fronts prepare to be captivated by the enchanting atmosphere aweinspiring views and culinary masterpieces that will leave you with a lasting impression its a dining experience that should not be missed

thank you for making my moms birthday dinner such an amazing experience

Address: 10065 - 100th Street Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6 Canada
Review:
i was lucky enough to have dinner and breakfast here during a staycation  both were incredible the restaurant was cozy and romantic with a unique selection of cocktails and menu options

we sat on the outdoor patio for brunch and it had an incredible view of the city the servers were so friendly and attentive even as the patio filled up during our visit after we ate we were able to walk around the gardens and enjoy the gorgeous tropical flowersplants breathtaking views and historical charm

thank you to the staff at the harvest room  you made our stay so special

Address: 10065 - 100th Street Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6 Canada
Review:
absolutely fabulous easily the best lunch we have had on our visit to edmonton

our service michelle was professional polite and suggested the perfect dishes

the tomato coconut soup was out of this world as were the grilled cauliflower

ill be back

Address: 10065 - 100th Street Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6 Canada
Review: this gives you the parislike ambiance when you are eating your breakfast i recommend the croissants and their cold cuts the view is so nice and staff are so friendly as well great to start your mornings

Address: 10117 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0T4 Canada
Review: i really enjoyed this meal it was the first time checking it out  was pleasantly surprised by how well executed everything was the concepts  flavours were very simple but the elegance in the simplicity it was sells this place the service was great the vibe was cozy european chic  the food was classic i almost felt like i was eating on the set of sound of music haha overall very enjoyable experience will definitely be coming back for a lunch to try some of their cold plates next time

Address: 10117 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0T4 Canada
Review:
nice and cozy restaurant with some good central european food we ordered the escargot steak tartare and goulash to start the escargot was baked in a dish with garlic and oil and served with some toasted bread the texture was a little soft but the flavour was good the goulash was served with some bread dumplings and a lot of tender braised beef it could have used a little more salt but the meat was quite soft and easy to eat the steak tartare was really good we ordered a large portion and it came with enough to easily share between 4 people the toast was incredibly crispy and had a nice subtle nutty flavour to it the steak itself was soft and paired very nicely with the bread i would definitely recommend the steak tartare

for our mains we each ordered a schnitzel i had the cordon bleu schnitzel which came out piping hot with a side of potato salad the schnitzel was super thin and had a lot of melted cheese oozing out of it when i cut into it the schnitzel was fried perfectly and came out as a nice even golden brown and also came out pretty light with very little oil sticking to the breading overall a pretty good schnitzel 810

for dessert i had an apple strudel with whipped cream and vanilla ice cream the strudel came out hot and flaky the strudel itself was not too sweet and was really good when paired with the   light and airy whipped cream you cant go wrong with ice cream on the side either

i would definitely come back for sure

Address: 10117 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0T4 Canada
Review:
great food the schnitzel was delicious as was the salad and potatoes however the service was a bit disappointing considering the restaurants reputation

my server didnt check on me at all during my meal or offer to refill my water and seemed more interested in chatting with one of their regular customers considering that the restaurant was mostly empty and i paid almost 30 for an entree this was kind of surprising

Address: 10117 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0T4 Canada
Review: came in right as the kitchen was closing but managed to get a really good meal the server was super nice and the food was delicious will definitely come back and try more when its not about to close

Address: 10117 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0T4 Canada
Review: with a strong recommendation by a friend we visited bistro praha  the place was packed with a long wait time  we decided to do a takeout  the service was friendly and very accommodating  the order was ready in 15 minutes despite how busy their kitchen was  the food was perfectly prepared and very delicious  we will definitely visit bistro praha soon but certainly with a reservation in advance

Address: 11127 107th Avenue Edmonton, AB T5H 0X9 Canada
Review: the staff was very friendly the food was excellent nachos were layered and piled high tacos were juicy and so flavourful cocktails were delicious relaxed atmosphere

Address: 11127 107th Avenue Edmonton, AB T5H 0X9 Canada
Review: love this place the food is always amazing no matter which location you go to we were there with a group of 14 people and they were very patient with splitting the bill and all of us ordering and they kept all of our orders straight which was impressive the food also came out ridiculously fast which was fantastic even the atmosphere was great we of course were a fairly loud and excited group as this was a pre wedding bridal party celebration and it was fun being a small space with different people who were also super positive and interacting with our group through our dinner in a positive way

Address: 11127 107th Avenue Edmonton, AB T5H 0X9 Canada
Review: went in for a quick meal and was not disappointed at all and warrants more visits in the future the staff were just lovely my friend and i tried the beef torta with the chicken tortilla soup some horchatas and churros to go i really liked the salsa station im a fan of anything spicy so when they had some very spicy roasted habanero and some guacamole i already knew it was going to be good the beef in the torta was perfectly marinated and seasoned and the price per portion for the torta and the soup was good worth it for sure as you get portions that are large in my opinion i have a rule to always get tortilla soup if its on a mexican restaurants menu and this was no exception dont skip on the soup it was really good the horchatas were good as well i was hoping the churros would be good but it was just ok definitely needs the caramel sauce as it doesnt stand on its own i found parking on the street but be mindful that this might be a challenge if its busy overall i would recommend this place for anyone looking for some good mexican food

Address: 11127 107th Avenue Edmonton, AB T5H 0X9 Canada
Review: affordable and delicious food casual vibes friendly staff a great place to grab a quick meal cant beat it a word of warning their salsa is actually spicy their medium salsa is a white people hot or extra hot

Address: 11127 107th Avenue Edmonton, AB T5H 0X9 Canada
Review: delicious mexican food at decent prices the enchiladas were amazing our party also had barbacoa chicken and steak tacos  all were a hit the horchata is one of the reasons we keep coming back nobody spent more than 20 for their meal here and we all left full get there early in the day if you want any of the home made desserts they can sell out quickly sometimes

Address: 10718 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: fun late mothers day lunch nice and efficient service for our large group food was excellent but a bit pricey parking can be a challenge but definitely worth going to

Address: 10718 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: fantastic heartwarming soups to help get you through those rough days ive also never seen a soup place so amazing at packing their soups for delivery great experience all around

Address: 10718 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: great place and food is delicious menu doesnt have pictures so sometimes hard to pick but everything is nice clean place too

Address: 10718 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: service is slow and food is not very good this place is not authentic at all bbh only had well done beef in it and was made with thin vermicelli

Address: 10718 101 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review:
moldy disgusting tomato without any apologies or ask we already ate some the server just took away the dish and serving a new one later on without asking
one star gives to pho honestly pho taste very good and pretty fast food speed

Address: 7 Saint Anne Street St. Albert, AB T8N 2X4 Canada
Review: one of my favorite places to go to for any occasion good food thats always made fresh with the right amount of flavors to satisfy everyone the servers go above and beyond to make sure everything is at your liking the best part of the visit was the dessert  its a must try with family or friends

Address: 7 Saint Anne Street St. Albert, AB T8N 2X4 Canada
Review: amazing authentic food   we also had frog legs and were delicious

Address: 7 Saint Anne Street St. Albert, AB T8N 2X4 Canada
Review:
we have been to the cajun house a few times and thus i was surprised i have not done a review of this restaurant

my son had the chicken  sausage gumbo which was nice and hot temperaturewise and reasonable spicy i tried it and we both enjoyed it

for the main meal my son had the filet mignon yaya which is described as broiled twin medallions of beef tenderloin which is served on a red current port demiglace sauce my son said it was ok  but also above average quality it is probably just not the type of steak we are used to having for supper

i had the breaded veal panne which was veal escalopes served with pasta tossed with basil cream sauce to me the sauce needed to be a bit more of it since the pasta soaked up most of it the veal had little taste and when i asked my son it surprised him since he thought it tasted like chicken not veal it was nice but not a lot of taste

all in all it was a good meal  the gumbo was the best part of the meal the service was great she was attentive and answered all our questions we found it cold we mentioned it to her and she was able to increase the heat to make it palatable yes we would go back

Address: 7 Saint Anne Street St. Albert, AB T8N 2X4 Canada
Review:
my first visit to this restaurant
mid week lunch break
i ordered the chicken poboy  with spinach peppered pecan salad
the sandwich was delicious and the salad also was very tasty
the service was excellent very friendly server and prompt service
a wise choice to share a dessert we chose banana indulgencegenerous serving a large portion with enough sweetness for 2 people
thanks cajun house  see you next time im in st albert

Address: 7 Saint Anne Street St. Albert, AB T8N 2X4 Canada
Review: the food was delicious friendly waiter the gombo is to die for the food was also fast and fresh the only thing id say that needs improvement is their sliced bread that came with the smoked salmon appetizer  it didnt taste fresh but overall nice ambiance and wonderful service ill visit again

Address: 10740 101 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: absolutely the best vegetarian food i have eaten everything was fresh and flavourful to the point where i forgot i was eating vegetarian food  we ordered a good selection of asian dishes and none of them were a disappointment the dessert we had was vegan and was absolutely amazing  staff was very attentive and the restaurant itself is clean modern and had a very nice vibe  clearly a lot of pride from the ownership group will be back again for the ultimate test  my father in law who absolutely despises vegetables

Address: 10740 101 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: this place offers a serene ambiance and serves some of the best food ive ever had its a musttry for new vegans but i highly recommend it to nonvegetarians as well their cold coffee is simply classic

Address: 10740 101 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: my absolute favourite restaurant in edmonton its family style portions and you must get rice on the side with your dishes the iced lychee and pineapple drinks are so refreshing and sweet for the summer and the place is clean and bright you wouldnt even know its vegan food

Address: 10740 101 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review:
padmanadi is a legendary vegan restaurant in edmonton it was one of the first to represent the vegan lifestyle through food so creatively and tastefully

upon a recent visit not much has changed the same family pictures adorn the walls the giant buddha still sits where he always has and the food is pretty much of the same standard

the thought i share is that vegetarian and vegan food has moved forward in creativity rapidly over the last decade  one visit to vancouver on the west coast will demonstrate vegetarian food of wild and passionate creativity i feel padmanadi has a lot of room for growth there

our service was outstanding  and the space is still effective i just wish the food was a little more progressive given how far vegan food has come in its methods of delivery

overall its still a good visit

4 x

Address: 10740 101 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2S3 Canada
Review: i ate here yesterday and got the curry chicken  the green bean bowl and rice the food was mostly good the atmosphere was great as well the service was overall decent they dont offer alcohol the food is a little over priced in my opinion but overall ok

Address: 10606 - 97 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2L6 Canada
Review:
what an absolute gem

a few friends  i went in for the first time  ordered a pound of bbq pork around 1112 and a half pound of pig ear

wow

the bbq pork was so juicy so flavourful and had the right amount of lil crispy bits on the end it came with a bag of sauce that we dumped over all  i wish i ate this with rice so we could soak up even more flavourful from those savoury juices

this is one of the best things ive ever eaten in edmonton incredible

for pig ear it was my first time they ask you if you want the meat chopped up say yes absolutely just makes it easier to start eating right away very tasty pig ear

we wanted to order squid but by 1pm it was sold out which means you know its tasty

anywho go support this small local business because their food is incredible

heads up cash only
and yes its worth making a trip to the bank to make this happen

Address: 10606 - 97 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2L6 Canada
Review: love this little familyowned shop they are very sweet and kind best chinese bbq duck in the city amongst a variety of other meats such as crispy roasted pork hainan chicken soy chicken sausage and bbq pork they also have marinated squid and the freshest wonton noodles forewarning call ahead to reserve if you cant swing by in the morningthey sell out of duck pretty fast

Address: 10606 - 97 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2L6 Canada
Review: if you want good classic chinese bbq meats this is the go to ordered 1lb of roast pork and 1lb of bbq pork i always ask for half fathalf meat that way higher chance of it not being too fatty or dry

Address: 10606 - 97 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2L6 Canada
Review: order bbq pork this week it was bad im so shock usually never got food bad from here but the prok is dry ans not really tasty i have to use some sauce because its really hard to swallow i feel sad it was my favorite bbq store was

Address: 10606 - 97 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 2L6 Canada
Review: best chinese food in edmonton i love their bbq pork and sausage its not very convenient for me to go so i buy a lot and freeze some every time i go recommended to some friends theyll love this place

Address: 8224 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4E6 Canada
Review:
the atmosphere at this local spot is lively with dim lighting that adds to its charm the drink selection is commendable offering a variety of choices to suit different palates

the food however is a mixed bag the korean fried tofu sandwich and nachos were enjoyable but the inconsistency in the quality of the fries was noticeable varying from burnt to just okay across visits the kitchen also seemed to struggle with accommodating food modifications for dietary restrictions which could be a concern for those with specific dietary needs

the service was fairly standard neither exceptionally good nor bad the restaurant was busy during the visit indicating its popularity among locals

the presentation of the food was nothing out of the ordinary but the pricing was reasonable for the quantity and quality of food served

while the food and service could use some improvement the lively atmosphere and good drink selection make this place worth a visit however those with specific dietary restrictions might want to consider other options

Address: 8224 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4E6 Canada
Review: had a nice dinner out at the next act enjoyed the critic bacon cheeseburger it had a bit of kick a creeping spiciness that was really good fries were good the beer was nice and cold there was a really good variety of beer choices service was excellent

Address: 8224 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4E6 Canada
Review:
the next act is a lively pub offering many different assortments of food my friends and i went over for their sunday brunch and were not disappointed with spot on food reasonable pricing and a homey atmosphere that also offers patio seating this place is a must try
my partner and i ordered the traditional eggs benedict and chicken bacon brie sandwich the eggs benedict had a creamy and tangy hollandaise sauce however the eggs were little over this may be because we were not offered a choice on how we wanted our eggs but the amazing tater tots offset this minor imperfection the choice of tater tots over the more traditional hashbrowns really makes this place standout compared to other brunch spots the chicken bacon brie sandwich was amazing the chicken breast was juicy the bread didnt go soggy and the garlic aioli added a nice creaminess to harmonize the sandwich perfectly
the service is what you would expect from a lively pub our server was accommodating pleasant and very patient as our friends slowly poured in he did go on break during our meal so we had to wait longer than usual for the bill but his overall service was good
overall the next act is a place i would recommend to my friends to try at least once the homey atmosphere great food and kind service are the perfect recipe for a good experience

Address: 8224 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4E6 Canada
Review: pretty good i ate there for lunch with a couple of friends and the food was absolutely delicious the service was a bit slow likely due to it being peak lunch time hours but the food made it worth the wait the chicken bacon brie sandwich was so tasty and i liked how it came with a side of fries every sandwich and burger comes with fries my picture does not do it justice i wasnt the biggest fan of the seating arrangement as it felt quite cramped especially with the mix of high and low tables but because of the food i will definitely be returning

Address: 8224 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T6E 4E6 Canada
Review: it looks like a very popular place it was packed but in a good way it had a very relaxed vibe we went for a late night supper i got the vegan mac n cheese which was very delicious it tasted like homemade cooking i added the jalape√±os and diced tomatoes which made it very spicy

Address: 15215 111 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T5M 2R1 Canada
Review: down to earth comfy and homey restaurant all of the schnitzel that we tried was delicious definitely enjoyed the great quality and generous portions definitely try the croquette

Address: 15215 111 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T5M 2R1 Canada
Review:
awesome amazing food the schnitzel is awesome has a classy mom and pop feel with great staff and great decoration great german¬† beer as well try it out you will fall in love

the odd restaurant that sell schnitzel is nothing compare to the quality schnitzel here so fresh portions are good too

call ahead if you can helps them keep it fresh

you can tell they care about the detail and quality the wife and myself have come numerous times and the food is always perfect

a true gem in edmonton try it out you will enjoy

Address: 15215 111 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T5M 2R1 Canada
Review:
a very nice german restaurant real good german food sausage and schnitzel are really good nice staff good german beer
a perfect place for a good dinner

Address: 15215 111 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T5M 2R1 Canada
Review: damn near perfect simple european soul food done extremely well some guests might like it but i wish the music were a little louder for a fun atmosphere i felt a bit worried not to bother other guests by talking too much or laughing too loud but i loved it

Address: 15215 111 Ave NW Edmonton, AB T5M 2R1 Canada
Review: we went for schnitzel and werent disappointed  they have sooooo many choices i choose plain with lemon so i could taste the true flavor of the schnitzel it was fantastic everyone else had a different topping and each equally enjoyed theirs they have a moderate beer selection which was cold crisp and went down quite quickly the only disappointment was in the dessert selection we were looking for some german sweets but there are none on the menu this was the only thing missing so if planning a visit and youre looking for dessert simply plan another stop after this one but dont miss the schnitzel

Address: 10133 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0L2 Canada
Review: i always love getting the dim sum here any visit to the passport office i always run across the street to new tan tan for the best dim sum in the city i also love their waitress shes so nice

Address: 10133 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0L2 Canada
Review:
first time here we ordered 5 items and tea for a total of 39 bucks which included a well deserved 20 tip
so fresh so much and so good
our new favorite dim sum breakfast place
park on the street with city of ed for 3 bucks for 2 hrs because impark is 6 bucks per hour
cheers

Address: 10133 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0L2 Canada
Review: standards have fallen  i used to love dimsum here but last experience was not good  most items were lacking flavor  pork in the dumplings were chewyfatty bits  although not busy service was still slow

Address: 10133 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0L2 Canada
Review: had the best steamed pork bun of my entire life here the spring rolls and dumplings were also excellent

Address: 10133 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0L2 Canada
Review: i was here the other day i enjoyed the dim sum the lady was very nice to me and my women i been here a couple times already and i will come back

Address: 7904B - 104 Street Edmonton, AB T6J 4C8 Canada
Review: seoul fried chicken has to be the tastiest most flavourful fried chicken places ive ever been to they definitely dont disappoint i ordered for pickup and the service was quick and ready as soon as i got there i recommend the cilantro lime 5 piece set with mac and cheese pesto and a side of their home cut fries and corn fritters highly recommend eating here

Address: 7904B - 104 Street Edmonton, AB T6J 4C8 Canada
Review: had the big seoul came with 5 pieces of soy garlic chicken thick cut fries kale salad and a pop money to food wise its one of the best value meals in the city soy garlic chicken was crispytasty and the soy garlic sauce they use is my favourite in the city dunking fries in left over sauce is delicious my one complaint is all the other sidesside salads at sfc are just alright i have tried most of the sides and most of them are fine but skippable

Address: 7904B - 104 Street Edmonton, AB T6J 4C8 Canada
Review: first time trying seoul fried chicken they had an interesting set up where you order on one end and pick up at the end of a hallway the food was worth the money will have to give it a try again in the future not a huge fan of the pesto macaroni salad i think thats what it was it was a bit too green for my liking

Address: 7904B - 104 Street Edmonton, AB T6J 4C8 Canada
Review: order from skip the dishes and must say excellent chicken for a very good price chicken tastes fresh not old or reheated breading is crunchy light and not too heavy or oily and my goodness the hand cut fries are to die for they have generous portions absolutely delicious and a great price  what more could you ask for

Address: 7904B - 104 Street Edmonton, AB T6J 4C8 Canada
Review: literally the best chicken i have ever had my personal favorite is the garlic soy but i have enjoyed every flavor i have tried  go early though because they make everything fresh they tend to run out of menu items as the night goes on especially on weekends

Address: 10145 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0Z9 Canada
Review: nice location downtown grabbed a lil seoul meal with a sfc bbq chicken and a caesar salad and i have to say for the price its phenomenally better than pop eyes or kfc and with the atmosphere of the setting dining in you actually feel like youre in a restaurant and not a fast food place will definitely have to go back and try some other flavors of chicken and their fries seeing other customers eating them made me regret not getting fries aha

Address: 10145 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0Z9 Canada
Review:
seoul fried chicken comes to downtown edmonton  the same quality chicken is deliveredcrispy delicious korean fried chicken in various traditional and new sauces

the restaurant is extremely spacious and hip  the service is very friendly and helpful

the food is extremely generous and comes in a quasi pizza box  you sometimes get an extra piece more than what you asked and its loaded with french fries

4 x

Address: 10145 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0Z9 Canada
Review:
first time visiting this location and it was on the recommendation of a work colleague who resides downtown

i cant say enough positive things about the cilantro lime chicken to say its delicious is an understatement

the service i found to be a little lax especially when i asked about whether the business could accommodate a party of 20 i felt rushed and will have to make another visit for a true comparison

if youre looking for great food which i think is great value this is a place i would recommend

Address: 10145 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0Z9 Canada
Review:
i didnt like the chicken at all i used to love seoul fried chicken at the old strathcona location when they first opened although even theyve gone downhill now but the chicken at this downtown location tastes very different the sauce is not good and the chicken was soggy and not at all crispy i wouldnt go back

the restaurant itself is very cute though i like the murals and the painted pillars

Address: 10145 104 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5J 0Z9 Canada
Review: nice place though i got takeout quick friendly service i read a comment saying the 5 piece chicken only price is a steal and it sure is what a deal 5 large pieces  sauce for under 10 chicken was great too ill definitely order again

Address: 10704 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L9 Canada
Review: the pork bone soup is a must try its packed with flavour and spiciness that is so good the deep fried chicken is a hit for our kids as well as the vegetable pancake the spicy rice cake is also good and the rest of the bibimbaps thumbs up parking was accessible and they have high chairs for kids

Address: 10704 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L9 Canada
Review: i like to eat korean noodles but because i like to eat so much so i feel that the noodles are not enough to eat this time i felt that there was too much oil in the pancake so the taste was mediocre not as good as last time and there was super little seafood in it i lost a lipstick in the store im really upset

Address: 10704 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L9 Canada
Review: i had a spicy tofu stew  damn really yummy  side dishes are yummy  great service  clean washroom  here is more likely fine dining restaurant with decent price by the quality  if you have never tried korean foods  i recommend you to come to check here

Address: 10704 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L9 Canada
Review:
really delicious and authentic korean food we ordered and shared a couple of dishes and left feeling full and satisfied  the pork bone soup hit the spot and the pork was tender the spicy korean rice cake was super spicy holy cow but that was expected and we finished it all the soy garlic korean fried chicken was packed with flavour crispness and perfection

we also received free small side dishes on the side which is the norm for korean restaurants

Address: 10704 97 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L9 Canada
Review:
customer wifi no
washrooms yes
power outlets no
pet friendly no
parking street

fooddrinks food was really good lots of bold flavors most of the dishes we got were spicy but not overly burn your mouth off side dishes were not too impressive noodles were really good thou

service service at the press of a button use the button

atmosphere very quaint and clean very simple and clear space

Address: 8103 127 Avenue NW Suite 9 Edmonton, AB T5C 1R9 Canada
Review:
while i post this review i am enjoying the sauer leaf with bacon cabbage rolls for supper and am in heaven this is the flavour i remember from when i was a kid in regina heading over to mosaic and visiting the ukrainian pavillions

yo babas location is easy to access north just off the yellowhead at 82nd street  the strip mall behind the mcdonalds on the corner

heading in for a quick pickup was easy there is a cooler with items ready for pickup and you can order off the menu as well love supporting local and supporting ukrainian

Address: 8103 127 Avenue NW Suite 9 Edmonton, AB T5C 1R9 Canada
Review: absolutely delicious ukrainian food  best cabbage rolls in the city either sweet leaf or sauer leaf be sure to try the baked pyrizhky pan fried with cream  mouth watering

Address: 8103 127 Avenue NW Suite 9 Edmonton, AB T5C 1R9 Canada
Review:
first i want to send as much holiday cheer towards john semeniuk who seems to need it bad days happen and it sounds like he had a terrible one to have said so many horrible and inappropriate comments towards people i hope he is able to find some kindness going forward 

next our entire experience with yo baba was amazing the staff were friendly and answered our questions cheerily the only downside was that they had run out of borscht while we were there everything else is amazing and its just like grandma used to make we will definitely be making a tradition out of this thank you

Address: 8103 127 Avenue NW Suite 9 Edmonton, AB T5C 1R9 Canada
Review: omg best cabbage rolls ive ever tried the dill perogies also bomb thanx kim im addicted now

Address: 8103 127 Avenue NW Suite 9 Edmonton, AB T5C 1R9 Canada
Review: 1st time ordering  was really worried because it was for christmas dinner so i was worried on how it was gonna tasteit was delicious   highly recommend the portion sizes are  good but trust me whatever your going to be double it 2 of my family members hate  cabbage rolls they literally ate half of the pan  thank you so much for making our christmas a very yummy one

Address: 14456 - 118 Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5L 2M5 Canada
Review:
this place is fabulous foods are delicious this is the second time we tried this restaurant recommended definitely

the sesame dessert is very yummy with lots of fillings

love the steamed shiu lao bao here

spicy dumplings are very delicious as well

would definitely recommended to my friends

Address: 14456 - 118 Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5L 2M5 Canada
Review: something more unique in the west end we love xlb soup dumplings and my toddler sips the soup with the dumpling like a champ fast service for the weekend

Address: 14456 - 118 Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5L 2M5 Canada
Review:
a hidden gem on the west side known for their soup dumplings and other steamed dumplings homemade and fresh made everyday absolutely delicious and comforting

excellent service and friendly staff will definitely a repeat when were in town again

Address: 14456 - 118 Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5L 2M5 Canada
Review: very good soup dumplings xiao long bao and dan dan noodles i also recommend trying the crispy radish and ham pastry the beef buns are juicy and soft if you go in a big group just try different types of foods most of them are tasty i havent found a 2nd place that sell delicious soup dumplings in edmonton so this is where i go if you ask for soup dumplings

Address: 14456 - 118 Avenue NW Edmonton, AB T5L 2M5 Canada
Review:
the restaurant is beautiful clean and the service was excellent the food is delicious well priced and comes in big portions we got the dinner for 2 and were very satisfied
highly recommend coming here for some terrific chinese food

Address: 10220 103 Street Suite 109 Edmonton, AB T5J 0Y8 Canada
Review:
i finally made my way over to check out bodega tapas  wine bar by sabor it was one of the best experiences ive ever had

the food were excellent the wine was divine and the service exceptional and friendly

ahi tuna salad  the tuna was fresh and delicious the cucumber and green salad was delicious with a twist of curry in the sauce

tomatoes bruschetta  served with a crunchy baguette and a delicious tomato salad dont miss out

i have to say the octopus is a delicious dish that is perfectly prepared and is accompanied by a delicious olive tapenade it melts in your mouth like butter

even though we were so full the lobster risotto was the perfect end to a great meal

the wine menu was unique and there was a 50 discount on wednesdays so we enjoyed excellent spanish wines dry rose  verdejo

the kitchen will always substitute vegetables and foodsensitiveallergy options whenever possible make sure you try the artichokes

definitely one of my favorites

Address: 10220 103 Street Suite 109 Edmonton, AB T5J 0Y8 Canada
Review: was visiting here when i was up in edmonton for work trip it was a hit and a miss some were amazing  scallops cesar salad and calamari some were complete miss  meat balls were sooo salty we had to send them back flourless chocolate cake gf were soo dry yes its gf but ive had rich moist gf cakes before when we asked the server what flour was used she just guessed her answer and didnt even bother finding out the exact answer either

Address: 10220 103 Street Suite 109 Edmonton, AB T5J 0Y8 Canada
Review: the service was excellent very friendly and helped explain things the menu is big with lots of tasty items to try i had the lobster risotto and my friend the seafood paella both were delicious and large servings

Address: 10220 103 Street Suite 109 Edmonton, AB T5J 0Y8 Canada
Review: incredible food and great cocktails great service too will definitely be coming back

Address: 10220 103 Street Suite 109 Edmonton, AB T5J 0Y8 Canada
Review: never coming back to this restaurant found a huge lettuce bug in our dish crawling around check your food before you eat it all the restaurant did was take the plate away did not even offer to comp anything worst experience ever immediately lost my appetite and couldnt finish with the rest of dinner didnt even bother taking the left overs if i could rate this zero stars i would

Address: 7609 115 Street  NW Edmonton, AB T6G 0M2 Canada
Review: had a great lunch today at belgravia hub we shared the flatbread and corn fritters so good  they even had homemade ketchup and homemade jam vijay and anna were lovely and offer amazing service  we cant wait to go back

Address: 7609 115 Street  NW Edmonton, AB T6G 0M2 Canada
Review: wonderful place simple menu the burger and fries were good the chicken salad was okay but the croutons things on the salad were great the service was welcoming and helpful while allowing plenty of space for a talk among the table the atmosphere was just lovely  parking was available easily will go again and try other menu items

Address: 7609 115 Street  NW Edmonton, AB T6G 0M2 Canada
Review: i stopped in on a whim while waiting for rush hour traffic to subside and was pleasantly surprised the restaurant was about 12 full already the wait staff took my order quickly but the best part was how how my food was its so nice when the food is brought to your table still piping hot it was delicious with a cold beer in a hot day parking could prove challenging as there is a popular cafe next door as well the owner seems to take great pride in his establishment walking around and checking to see if the patrons food was alright

Address: 7609 115 Street  NW Edmonton, AB T6G 0M2 Canada
Review:
belgravia hub located in the heart of belgravia is a charming restaurant that has plenty to offer to food enthusiasts and those who appreciate local and authentic establishments what sets belgravia hub apart is their versatile menu that caters to all tastes ranging from savory beef and chicken dishes to flavorful seasoned salmon and veggie burgers

the exceptional service at belgravia hub is also something i value greatly recently i made a reservation to celebrate my birthday with a group of friends over dinner despite being the last ones to leave the restaurant which was already 10 minutes past closing time we felt warmly welcomed throughout our stay we indulged in a wide selection of dishes beverages desserts and coffee while the food was good it was the overall experience that truly stood out to us

i will definitely come back and highly recommend this place

Address: 7609 115 Street  NW Edmonton, AB T6G 0M2 Canada
Review: the food here is always tasty and the staff is friendly and welcoming today however i was very disappointed in my lunch the dressing on my salad was delicious lemondill but for something advertised as a summer shrimp salad it should have more than 6 small shrimp on it and for 18 it should definitely have more than 6 small shrimp on it

Address: 10345 106 Street NW Suite 108 Edmonton, AB T5J 1H8 Canada
Review: love this great place downtown for authentic turkish cuisine we especially like the pita bread with dipspread choices as an appetizerand we think they should sell them as a togo product the meatball dish is delicious and whenever we get back to edmonton we try to fit a visit here into our dinner rotation

Address: 10345 106 Street NW Suite 108 Edmonton, AB T5J 1H8 Canada
Review:
amazing food selection perfect ambiance very beautifully decorated restaurant
very friendly staff and great service
the food tasted amazing
nice overall dining experience will definitely be back

Address: 10345 106 Street NW Suite 108 Edmonton, AB T5J 1H8 Canada
Review: the food was great the service was good too but i wished they gave water more frequently or gave a jar of it had to remind waiter to refill water after asking a few times already it is sort of loud in the restaurant that i couldnt hear the person in front of me well either other than that the food is delicious

Address: 10345 106 Street NW Suite 108 Edmonton, AB T5J 1H8 Canada
Review: amazing tasty and delicious food service was a little slow but overall i would come back beautiful decor and ambiance

Address: 10345 106 Street NW Suite 108 Edmonton, AB T5J 1H8 Canada
Review:
wow i was so impressed with the food and service
i highly recommend this restaurant  never having turkish food before was surprising that i would enjoy everything that our party is 12 had the sharing platter meal is the way to go
the wine was  collossal literally
go and see for yourself  thanks for the amazing taste sensation
pamela from the clarins birthday party yesterday

Address: 10660 98 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2N7 Canada
Review: tau bay serves only pho they dont even offer spring rolls as a side  their menu is focused on producing quality pho and thats it and thats exactly what they do i first went here 10 years ago with some friends of mine and ive been back every now and then to enjoy their pho on my last trip i tried their lemon coke which is basically a can of coke served with a glass that has ice and lemon juice in it just add the coke yourself and its pretty tasty i will say their pho is delicious however the last time i was there the amount of meat i got was not much i do wish they offered vietnamese spring rolls they are super delicious also they didnt have any chili oil for free think i had to pay extra for it that and the low amount of meat stopped it from being 5 stars

Address: 10660 98 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2N7 Canada
Review: good pho cash or e transfer only i loved the pho but bigger portions would have been nice

Address: 10660 98 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2N7 Canada
Review:
tau bay is a one of a kind place where they specialize in soups and they are phenomenal ive had plenty of really good pho around edmonton but tau bay is on another level that nobody else can compare to ive been a long time customer since they used to be on 107ave and 113st and their pho hits just right every single time since ive first discovered them if theres a list of must try places in western canada tau bay better be on it
im not sure how to describe how delicious their pho is i find each bowl to be perfectly balanced with meat noodles and their umami rich broth you are free to add hoisin bean sprouts hot sauce and a squeeze of lime if thats your preference but i like to enjoy it as is with one thai chili for a bit of heat the broth alone is heavenly please note that its soup only with beverages and some desserts they take only cash or email transfers

Address: 10660 98 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2N7 Canada
Review: the vietnamese pho is the most authentic i have ever had in canada its so tasty and not expensive fried rice is also my favourites

Address: 10660 98 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2N7 Canada
Review:
soup is good  but if you are spicy person i do not recommend here
i asked for chili pepper but they only give you 1

it was same many years ago and i visited again after few years hoping they would change

chili pepper cost so little dont understand why they dont give it to customers

and btw they take cash only

Address: 10760 82 Avenue Edmonton, AB T6E 2A8 Canada
Review:
tasty messy food love all the options to get plantain

if you like cheese their cheese sticks were so dense and wonderful especially with the special green sauce they serve with it the dry pork bite things were everything you want dry ribs to be meaty salty tearapartable

be ready and hungry though as i think everything in the menu is very filling

Address: 10760 82 Avenue Edmonton, AB T6E 2A8 Canada
Review: the atmosphere service and flavours are spot on you forget youre in edmonton and feel transported to venezuela  definitely will be back and highly recommend for vegetarian and meat eater folks oh and abuelitas quesillo is a must

Address: 10760 82 Avenue Edmonton, AB T6E 2A8 Canada
Review:
45
7th november 2022

i was a tourist in edmonton and this was a place that came on the recommenddation list so i had to try it

i came here and the host suggested i go for the rice bowl with beef and the sugarcane lemonade

the food was so tasty and so was the lemonade
i would definitely recommend this place and would hopefully come back in the future to try more

Address: 10760 82 Avenue Edmonton, AB T6E 2A8 Canada
Review: their brunch is 1010 delicious i thought perhaps it wouldnt be traditional enough more mainstream but i was wrong absolutely delicious venezuelan style breakfastbrunch offerings that include arepas i ordered the traditional which i would highly recommend amazing place to try if youre looking for a new brunch spot

Address: 10760 82 Avenue Edmonton, AB T6E 2A8 Canada
Review:
holy smokes talk about big flavour from a small restaurant we walked in and asked for the server to choose our lunch and drinks for us and she picked perfectly try the passion fruit juice and the cheese sticks

this is an excellent restaurant

Address: 10721 124 Street Edmonton, AB T5M 0H2 Canada
Review: decided to check this place out as we wanted to try something new food was really good and our server was fabulous i highly recommend the lasagna and the penne with ground turkey sausage in a mushroom sauce forgot the name and not on the menu  we will definitely be back again to try more of their pastas

Address: 10721 124 Street Edmonton, AB T5M 0H2 Canada
Review: cozy little restaurant amazing service  our server was so personable and made us feel right at home she offered suggestions and the food was amazing we had the ravioli and the penne alla vodka with prawns for the main appetizers we had cozze pomodoro and bruschetta

Address: 10721 124 Street Edmonton, AB T5M 0H2 Canada
Review: i have to apologize that my pictures dont do any justice the food here was beyond my expectations very well seasoned good sized portions and service was excellent it was my first time there thanks to some friends highly recommend this place if youre craving pasta were coming back with big appetites again soon

Address: 10721 124 Street Edmonton, AB T5M 0H2 Canada
Review: my friend anthony and i went to dine in at nuevo bistro and the food appetizer and entr√©e was delicious the service was pleasant and our server was so lovely i will definitely go there again whenever im craving italian food

Address: 10721 124 Street Edmonton, AB T5M 0H2 Canada
Review: my wife and i had a kid free evening last weekend and decided to explore the 124st area came across this small italian bistro no regrets our meals were delicious the staff was unbelievable well be back

Address: 10111 Bellamy Hill NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1N7 Canada
Review: we had a wonderful dinner at la ronde for our wedding anniversary our waiter colin gave us extremely good service he was friendly professional and attentive the entire time the food was excellent and we were happy with the quality and taste the view of downtown edmonton and the river valley was also fantastic this is the second time we have been to la ronde and both times we had a really nice experience i would recommend trying out this restaurant to anyone looking for a lovely place to celebrate a special occasion or just to have a good fine dining experience

Address: 10111 Bellamy Hill NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1N7 Canada
Review:
beautifully appointed restaurant with a lovely view good food and exceptional service i was in town exhibiting at kdays and decided to take a break from talking to hundreds of people at the convention and have a quiet solo meal at a nice restaurant

la ronde was exactly what i needed

the food was decent but not incredible my bison steak was a little overcooked i asked for medium rare and it was not even pink inside and the creme brulee was not set properly so it kind of had the consistency of scrambled eggsi did love the veggies and the flavor of the steak and really appreciated that the mocktails were all 5ea as it should be

the service honestly more than made up for any shortcomings with the food dean my server was so nice and above and beyond charming and helpful he really made me feel taken care of and gave me some great travel advice

the revolving aspect was also pretty interesting a little vertigoinducing at first but it was easy to adjust to and then it was just lovely to have views served to me throughout the course of the meal definitely would recommend this place

Address: 10111 Bellamy Hill NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1N7 Canada
Review:
we arrived at 530 for a wonderful experience that lasted nearly two hours we started by having cocktails and between the three of us had two appetizers the brisket in cheese sauce and the crab cakes we also ordered one wild mushroom soup the appetizers all arrived quite fast and were very good next time i would skip the crab cakes but would definitely order the brisket and mushroom soup again

the entrees we ordered are all pictured here  we had the prime rib ny steak and the seafood stew they arrived the same time as the fresh peppercorn offering

we finished our meal with a cappuccino and mango cheesecake our server was pleasant timely  and professional with a dash of perfectly tasteful humor what a treat

Address: 10111 Bellamy Hill NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1N7 Canada
Review: this was one of the greatest dining experiences ive ever had in town for a tattoo convention staying at the hotel wanted an easy dinner this turned into an entire event lasting two hours the food was delicious the view was spectacular but dean our wonderful waiter made the entire night thank you for your lovely conversation and being so welcoming and engaging despite getting busy your kindness is so appreciated

Address: 10111 Bellamy Hill NW Edmonton, AB T5J 1N7 Canada
Review:
great food great views and overall a fantastic experience had the mushroom soup and it was the perfect amount of creaminess and savory flavor the bison steak was also top notch

finally the views of the city are phenomenal my fianc√© and i timed the rotation and it goes all the way around in about 70 minutes will be coming back next time were in edmonton

Address: 9940 106 Street NW Suite 100 Edmonton, AB T5K 2N2 Canada
Review:
in the heart of edmonton this place offers a stylish and sophisticated setting with a great ambiance which is perfect  for any kind of occasion romantic business or casual

the menu features a variety of dishes that showcase fresh seasonal ingredients the presentation is simple and elegant and the flavors are bold and memorable you must try the scallops grilled octopus entrec√¥te and everything else in the menu 

the atmosphere is sophisticated and inviting with a mix of modern and traditional elements the service is attentive super friendly and knowledgeable with a focus on making each guest feel welcome and well taken care of

Address: 9940 106 Street NW Suite 100 Edmonton, AB T5K 2N2 Canada
Review: oh my gosh everything about this place was perfect such an amazing balance of class and elegance with comfort and relaxation you dont need to wear a suit or dress but if you want to youre not out of place the staff is genuinely friendly and knowledgeable they explain the menu so well you have a hard time picking what to eat the featured gin sour was refreshing and borderline dangerous with how quickly it can go down from apps to mains everything was amazing you can tell the food is prepared with love and the flavours are incredible we would highly recommend the marc to anyone and everyone

Address: 9940 106 Street NW Suite 100 Edmonton, AB T5K 2N2 Canada
Review:
our first time in downtown edmonton we decided to start exploring the downtown area to start out the day at this location
we reserved in advance and was greeted with very friendly ladies who quickly accommodated us in a big bright window seat
the seats are comfortable and the service was quick
the portions of our order was very generous and our palate was greeted with light smooth crisp fresh warm delicious flavors that filled us up
the drinking water served was refreshing and clean tasting
this was a really nice start of our day

Address: 9940 106 Street NW Suite 100 Edmonton, AB T5K 2N2 Canada
Review: staff was very accommodating food was good but not as good as expected considering the hype presentation was very good though price was ok but a little over priced definitely needed more seasoning

Address: 9940 106 Street NW Suite 100 Edmonton, AB T5K 2N2 Canada
Review:
honestly this was an amazing lunch and the atmosphere was perfect i would really recommend this place for business family and any type of occasion

from the moment you walk in you are greatly greeted and looked after their menu is so good i just wished i had more stomach to fit it all in

make sure to book a reservation kids friendly great food and fair prices make sure you check out their wine menu as well and some of their functions

hope you visit and let me know what you think keep on eating and have fun

chicosreviews

Address: 10347 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5J 1Y7 Canada
Review: i like it the menu is just long enough with many intriguing options to choose from the service was on point and we got a seat in the back area which was cozy but it was quite dark needs a little more light its especially an issue when trying to read the menu not fun having to pull your phone out to use the flashlight the food was tasty but we did have a couple of plates where the kitchen was heavy handed with the salt and im a person that really likes salt they did fix it and we overall enjoyed our meal

Address: 10347 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5J 1Y7 Canada
Review:
great great hospitalitymore cocktail options would make this place 5 stars for me they have like 6 cocktails on the menuwe tried 4 and all were goodperfectly balanced using fresh fruits and good choice of spirits
their food was a show stealerbalanced on flavors although we just had 2 options for vegetarians except salads
place has great potentialwe would definitely recommend this place and return if they add more vegitarian dishes for us to try
great to see such places in edmonton

Address: 10347 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5J 1Y7 Canada
Review: i will come back here again and again and again and im bringing friends my first visit to bar bricco was for my mums 60th birthday and it was such a wonderful experience for us the food is incredible the wine is excellent the service is terrific it is quite dark which isnt the best but it gives the place a certain ambiance the raviolo al uovo is the absolute most delicious thing on the menu the agnolotti is so perfectly cooked caparzo wine is hard to find in alberta skip the truffle butter crostini

Address: 10347 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5J 1Y7 Canada
Review:
i have mixed feelings about bar bricco after dining there last night i had decided to celebrate my birthday with my boyfriend there because i enjoyed the food the last two times i came

the quality of the food was excellent  the same as i had remembered it  and our dishes arrived very quickly if you are a pasta butter and cheese lover i would highly suggest ordering the fonduta agnolotti and the egg yolk raviolo

the service was okay our server asked if we had any questions about the menu and refilled our water without being asked however she did not seem warm or personable

the atmosphere was uncomfortable for me honestly i felt like i was eating in the dark  i even had to use the flashlight from my phone to read the menu my boyfriends voice was drowned out by the music and by the laughter of the 4 girls sitting next to us by the time we finished our meal my ears were ringing i had zero desire to stay and enjoy my cocktail we were in and out of the restaurant within an hour

Address: 10347 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5J 1Y7 Canada
Review: one of my favourite spots in edmonton i have tried most dishes on the menu at this point and they never disappoint

Address: 10571 97 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L4 Canada
Review: my familys favourite chinese restaurant in edmonton we are from calgary and often visit our family up here every time we come we always come to sai woo for delicious chinese food their calamari fried fish and garlic shrimp are unmatched never overcooked and perfectly crispy on the outside the batter is nice and light and every bite is always delightful definitely come here for some solid chinese food

Address: 10571 97 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L4 Canada
Review: my last visit was 20 over years ago when my kids were still babies hubby and i decided to pay a visit recently and we just kept going back   if you are looking for hearty  authentic chinese  cantonese style food  this is definitely the place to be the service is really good our server anna is very friendly and helpful  the deep fried calamari is the best in town in my opinion  fried to perfection the fish maw soup has so much fish maw in it  its not only tasty  its great for the price deep fried fish is the bomb  its crispy on the outside and the fish is not overcooked  its fresh and tasty i would highly recommend this gem in chinatown their food really hits home

Address: 10571 97 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L4 Canada
Review: after going out for dinner at two new restaurants and being disappointed with the meal at both i just had to go to my favorite chinese restaurant that i have been going to since i was a kid i believe this may be the oldest running chinese restaurant in edmonton  please correct me if im wrong you can always count on this restaurant to be consistent with the quality of their food always fresh and they are so fast in serving each dish staff is friendly even when its really busy the deep fried calamari has got to be the most iconic dish that everyone orders the batter is so light and crispy everything tastes good here we order the dinner for six so we can have leftovers the restaurant is old and could use some new upgrades but i take comfort in the atmosphere that still remains the same along with their amazing food that ive enjoyed with my family as a kid and now my own family gets to enjoy their food thanks sai woo staff for the wonderful meal and service

Address: 10571 97 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L4 Canada
Review: my family has been coming here for many years and the staff even knows us danny alex and anna are all great danny even recommended some amazing dishes that we havent tried before great quality dishes and always delicious they are also good with substitutions and allergies my cousin cant have gluten so they were willing to make a noodle dish without soy sauce just for her overall amazing restaurant and tasty food my familys favourite chinese restaurant in edmonton

Address: 10571 97 St NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2L4 Canada
Review: the food was amazing   very busy friday  evening  we will definitely go back

Address: 10516 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5K 1X4 Canada
Review:
food was good but that took longer than necessary it was game night for the oilers but the bar wasnt that busy waited more than an hour for a couple of burgers and a couple of wings

other than that our server was super nice and apologetic kept checking up on us and the manager at the time was good too

Address: 10516 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5K 1X4 Canada
Review:
my first visit and its absolutely perfect fun and unassuming atmosphere good music good vibes staff is accommodating and friendly and the food to die for i had the crab cakes and chicken skewers bacon wrapped i might add and oh my god

if you havent been here just do it

Address: 10516 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5K 1X4 Canada
Review: nice place with mountainous theme got a patio area in the back but due to the rain the make shift tarp for protection wasnt working to well as water was falling through staff was accommodating didnt eat anything at the time but the jasper cocktail was delicious

Address: 10516 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5K 1X4 Canada
Review: amazing first time at rocky mountain ice house originally went to cask  barrel and the waitress recommended to go  here for the larger menu our server was absolutely the best they have the best crab cakes ive ever had not overcooked not burnt or greasy and perfect portion for the price i also had the pork belly with the smashed potatoes holy smokes were they delicious my date had the southern fried chicken and the mac and cheese the only thing i recommend is the mac and cheese needs to be cheesier so nice to have a slice of watermelon on the side the watermelon caesar salad is also really really good definitely coming back

Address: 10516 Jasper Avenue Edmonton, AB T5K 1X4 Canada
Review: have been there twice now dinner was average the first time second time we came on a sunday afternoon ordered 2 beers after waiting a few minutes waited 10 minutes before the server asked if wed like a refill of our water we were still waiting for the beers we ordered 10 minutes earlier the place wasnt exactly busy dont waste your time

Address: 10212 96 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2G7 Canada
Review: awesome experience at double greeting as always the food and atmosphere is always top notch you can find many hk inspired classic dishes here the diner style booths are wide and comfortable the newly renovated washroom is clean and well laid out they appear to be slightly understaffed but not the extent that it would impact the overall experience i would recommend ordering quickly once you arrive as it is quite busy around the lunch hour

Address: 10212 96 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2G7 Canada
Review:
not sure what to say about this food is ok with that size and price wait is super long for food and take out
will i go back ill not
i ordered take out after dine in and waited for 40 mins for only 1 appetizer and 1 fried rice
the fried flat noodles stick together and it taste so so
service is slow as they clean tables instead of getting my order when i arrive
so i waited for 10 mins for server

is it authentic yes
is it like hk restaurant yes but is really those not up to par and those that you will not go back if u are in asia if its in asia it will be a 210 but for here in edmonton i guess you cant ask for more here but ill still choose not to go back

Address: 10212 96 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2G7 Canada
Review: this is some of the best authentic asian food in the edmonton downtown area  like the location a little hard to get into but some of the best food you can find in the area  again this is authentic chinese food so if you are looking for the north american western experience this may not be for you  for anyone else there is a huge selection of food for you to order from and they will make the some menu items spicy to taste for those who are like the food a little more bold

Address: 10212 96 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2G7 Canada
Review: i have been going to double greeting for as long as i can remember the food quality has always been great the prices have always been reasonable and the portion sizes are amazing the dishes i aways order one or all of the following ginger beef shrimp  pork dumplings noodle soup and silver noodle chow fan when going here make sure to bring cash they do not accept debit or credit there is a cash machine but expect to pay a service fee

Address: 10212 96 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5H 2G7 Canada
Review: a real place to eat nonwesternized chinese dishes not only was the portiontoprice ratio superb but it was tasty too but more than anything the beverages were the best case in point the sago teas definitely going back again

Address: 11834 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB T5G 3J5 Canada
Review: tried it last night with my 5 year old son the waitress was great and recommended chicken strips and fries for my son which she said was around 8 they were made from scratch and cooked to perfection like perfectly moist their french fries were seasoned impeccably i had a beef dip the roast beef could have been higher quality but the bun it was served on was fresh and delicious the gravy that came with it was pretty good too thanks for the amazing service and really good food

Address: 11834 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB T5G 3J5 Canada
Review: ordered 8oz sirloin medium rare and it came well done veggies looked  great but were terribly undercooked partners chicken cordon blu tasted like sausage veggies were undercooked as well cooked another steak and nuked the veggies chef cut into new steak to verify it was prepared right breakfast earlier that day was great so we went back for supper waitresses were super and they did knock 15 off the supper bill

Address: 11834 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB T5G 3J5 Canada
Review: served an overcooked green steak with rubbery soggy vegetables a freezer burned bun and mushroom soup that came with a day or two old skin on the surface needless to say we didnt eat any of it gross

Address: 11834 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB T5G 3J5 Canada
Review: food was very delicious vegetables were seasoned well we got the chicken cordon bleu and sirloin super good super nice to us as we were the only other people in there would definitely be coming back

Address: 11834 Kingsway Avenue Edmonton, AB T5G 3J5 Canada
Review: very good service staff was great and accommodating tried cheese burger and fries very good taste recommend this nice restaurant to anyone

Address: 9650 142 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5N 4B2 Canada
Review:
staff very warm and friendly we forgot our left overs and had to back track to get it our server remembers and walked me back to the door

service it was a full house  and even so service was friendly and quick

establishment location is a bit small  felt a bit cozy or squished there is a large parking lot outside

food amazing generous portions great flavour we had left overs

Address: 9650 142 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5N 4B2 Canada
Review: we had a great time romantic italian restaurant our server tanya was super knowledgeable about the menu and was incredibly attentive staff are awesome they subbed out a cream sauce for marinara for my dairy allergy and the aperol spritzes were amazing

Address: 9650 142 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5N 4B2 Canada
Review: small restaurant that packed lots of good flavor great appetizers pastas entres and dessert ordered the pescatore and it was delicious however the mussels were a bit sandy service was excellent relatively tight seating and full service reservation recommended

Address: 9650 142 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5N 4B2 Canada
Review: firsttime visiting edmonton and so glad we found this place based on positive google reviews we showed up 3 minutes before they close but they were so kind to offer us to dine in we had a delicious seafood pasta and the service was top notch highly recommended

Address: 9650 142 Street NW Edmonton, AB T5N 4B2 Canada
Review:
first time going here service and food was great i didnt catch our servers name but he was very friendly you can tell the patrons love to come here because the servers all treat them like friends

pasta was delicious with large portions and complimentary warm buns and butter before your meal they also dont cheap out when you order a glass of wine it was a very healthy pour which was enjoyed

Address: 10933 - 120 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 3R3 Canada
Review:
first time dining at gravy and it was an amazing experience

atmosphere was really cool with all the drawings and graffiti on the walls tables and chairs

service was amazing the employee whom i forgot his name but he was very welcoming and friendly we also got our food served fresh and quick too

last but not least the food is delicious i ordered the mushroom burger and it was just a heavenly combination from the toasted buttery bun to the crispy onions juicy patty and perfect balance of gravy mayo cheese and mayo

poutine was also perfect from the crispy fries cheese curds and gravy on top

i highly recommend going here as it will be an experience you wont want to miss

Address: 10933 - 120 Street Edmonton, AB T5H 3R3 Canada
Review:
