Address: 1034 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C1 Canada
Review:
good atmosphere and pleasant wait staff unfortunately we ordered draft beer and it wasnt cold wings were great but ordered the seafood soup and our bowls werent even half full and it lacked seafood 15bowl when it was mentioned we were told that that is a common complaint from other patrons
nothing was done to correct it probably wouldnt return
overall it was ok

Address: 1034 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C1 Canada
Review: we love coming here never disappoints very large restaurant with lots of seating the food is always great and the portions weve always been happy with personal favourites are the lamb burger and the goat cheese cranberry and pecan salad i cant have goat cheese and they substitute it for feta no problem

Address: 1034 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C1 Canada
Review: the steak was delicious garlic mash was unreal and the service was excellent kiddo and mama loved the place and the food it was homey and comfortable easy to get to on the way through if youre passing by definitely recommend it

Address: 1034 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C1 Canada
Review: i ordered pan fried haddock with capers it came with a nice medley of vegetables and probably the best mashed potatoes ive had in a while   the veggies werent the usual frozen carrot and pea medley which was a pleasant surprise as well  full marks for the food but couldnt give full credit as i found the price a bit steep

Address: 1012 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B Canada
Review:
no1 is amazing every time the food is delicious and fresh lots of flavour and always a great portion the tom yum soup is excellent always get it with fatty brisket and noodles my partner loves the curry noodles the apps are incredible as well hand made spring rolls and wontons and the sauces the pair with them are so good not your typical sweet and sour fair i would recommend this place to any one who loves a warm rich meal little spice and a good size plate the staff is so friendly and at this point now our orders and are so good to us
great for supper or lunch

Address: 1012 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B Canada
Review:
i cant believe i havent eaten here before food was delicious and authentic nice portions only less one star bc staff took ages to bring or refill water forgot to bring tea pot and extra cups had to wait 15
mins to flag someone down to ask for extra tea cup so maybe they were new but always good to make sure to follow up with customers mid meal not just come back at the end

Address: 1012 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B Canada
Review: we had 2 main dishes and spring rolls delivered the dinner was quite expensive67 plus tip the dishes were good size with quite fresh ingredients but completely tasteless would not order again from them

Address: 1012 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B Canada
Review:
blatant discrimination from the boss woman from stepping into the restaurant to ordering to having the food brought to my table i was met with nothing more than a stern face and annoyed attitude the small amount of eye contact i got were annoyed stares meanwhile im sitting at the table observing how she acts with other guests the two tables next to me oh btw just happens to be white and shes smiling totally different tone of voice softer full eye contact completely different demeanor note i was not hostile or anything to her at any point in time

the food is overpriced and the taste is nothing compared to what i could get in ontario but not horrible the place seemed clean

Address: 1012 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B Canada
Review: good food was surprised but happy to find this place while we stayed nearby definitely wont blow your socks off but really enjoyed the pho

Address: 304 Union Street Fredericton, NB E3A 3L9 Canada
Review:
this is a fantastic little spot its in a house in town so theres only 7 tables i think always make a reservation

the food is awesome
my swiss friend who is in love with schnitzel said it was definitely somewhere hes going again lol

they ran out of weiss beer which was kind of sad but otherwise everything was excellent and service was good

the j√§ger schnitzel is amazing just putting that out there

Address: 304 Union Street Fredericton, NB E3A 3L9 Canada
Review: authenticly german   german music playing nice homey atmosphere  waiter checking on us more then once topping up water without being asked   very attentive   food was delicious and generous portion sizes

Address: 304 Union Street Fredericton, NB E3A 3L9 Canada
Review: a magical place with a great vibe the bathroom is harry potter themed the food is delicious and prepared with love highly recommended

Address: 304 Union Street Fredericton, NB E3A 3L9 Canada
Review: just had my first visit it was a wonderful experience we were treated like good friends  the service and food was excellent relaxed atmosphere unhurried dining thank you for a lovely evening

Address: 304 Union Street Fredericton, NB E3A 3L9 Canada
Review: the schnitzel parlour is your chance to experience great quality food and its delicious this restaurant is one of a kind my family loves coming back to this restaurant time and time again

Address: 182 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: my fiance introduced me to the red lantern the food is so good the staff are amazing the owner is an absolute sweetheart i cant say enough how much i love going here with my family

Address: 182 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: long wait to orderlonger wait for foodwe caught on that people that were there when we came in were also waitingand the few plates that went past usto the wrong tabledidnt look greatthis place is a dinosaurlet it die we left40 minutes  for nothing

Address: 182 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: local hole in the wall great hangover breakfast had 5 star steak breakfast melt in your mouth beef quick service cheap beer

Address: 182 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: the pub has a cool atmosphere hence 2 stars but omg the food was disgusting it was really bad especially the meat i just ate a baked potato with sour cream as the turkey sandwich was too revolting my partner had a steak and it tasted awful

Address: 182 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: had a bacon cheese burger platter it was top notch  home made pattie great fries and coleslaw gravey was suspect but i didnt come for gravey will be back

Address: 86-88 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C2 Canada
Review: nan

Address: 86-88 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C2 Canada
Review: nan

Address: 86-88 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C2 Canada
Review: nan

Address: 536 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B9 Canada
Review: tons of options to pick from and their sushi tastes really good was a bit confused which one to order but everything i tried turned out to be good the service was also good the girl was friendly and prompt i think this is the best place in fredericton to try some japanese cuisine would definitely repeat

Address: 536 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B9 Canada
Review: this restaurant has service and food one step over the best one i previously had now it os the best

Address: 536 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B9 Canada
Review: one of the most unique experiences ive ever had eating in frederictonand not in a good way we had heard good things about this place that it was a fancier option for sushi in fredericton and the price did reflect that but what we received was not up to par and frankly odd and in some cases down right gross i would steer clear of this spot try jays or tamatachino one try to feed you whipped cream sushi

Address: 536 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B9 Canada
Review: came for a quick bite and thats what we got great food

Address: 536 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B9 Canada
Review: i recently dined at naru restaurant and was blown away by the delicious food and excellent service from the moment i walked in i felt welcomed by the friendly staff and immediately impressed by the clean and modern decor the menu had a wide variety of options and i ended up trying the sushi and it was some of the best ive ever had the portion sizes were good and the prices were  reasonable i would highly recommend naru to anyone looking for a topnotch dining experience i cant wait to go back and try more dishes on the menu

Address: 99 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1G1 Canada
Review: i absolutely love this restaurant i always get my food as take out but the inside always looks very clean warm and welcoming as well my usual choice is the shawarma combo platter which comes with both chicken and beef shawarma salad and rice garlic sauce and hummus as well as a pita bread the cost is around the 20 mark after tax and is of very good value some add on highlights for me are the pickled turnips and home made garlic sauce to really add a pop of flavor ive never once been disappointed by the food here and would absolutely recommend it to anyone ive lived in fredericton for 15 years

Address: 99 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1G1 Canada
Review: my favourite place in fredericton for shawarma their staffs are very nice too

Address: 99 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1G1 Canada
Review: great place would go again whenever i visit fredericton again

Address: 99 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1G1 Canada
Review: delicious food the garlic sauce is fantastic cant wait to come back and try more

Address: 99 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1G1 Canada
Review: i have order fattoush but what i got it is a lettuce salad  i order falafel  they juat put frozen falafel wrap in a pita customer service bad the person who got my order the way drive me like this is the one an only lebanese restaurant in this planet if you want you can eat if not get out i dont recommend this place i have been to lebanon i tried most of the foods i was glad when i saw this restaurant and stop suddenly to have some lebanese taste again but this is not the place for that

Address: 440 Kimble Drive Fredericton, NB E3B 0K5 Canada
Review: very large portions and huge chicken balls i mean huge like baseballs  they were tasty and had lots of chicken in them pick up was on time and friendly food was hot and good overall slightly disappointed with general tso chicken a bit to much oyster sauce would order again

Address: 440 Kimble Drive Fredericton, NB E3B 0K5 Canada
Review:
i recently ordered vegetarian food from oriental pearl and i must say it was an exceptional experience the restaurant offers a wide range of vegetarian dishes that are packed with incredible flavors the ordering process was convenient and the delivery was prompt ensuring that the food arrived fresh and piping hot at my doorstep

the quality of the vegetarian food was outstanding each dish was meticulously prepared with attention to detail resulting in flavors that were both authentic and delightful the menu boasted a diverse selection of vegetarian options catering to different tastes and preferences

i highly recommend trying their signature vegetarian dishes such as the paneer tikka masala and the vegetable biryani the paneer tikka masala was a perfect blend of succulent paneer and a rich creamy sauce that was bursting with flavors the vegetable biryani had fragrant perfectly cooked rice with an exquisite mix of vegetables and aromatic spices making it a true vegetarian delight

the food was thoughtfully packaged ensuring that it arrived in excellent condition the portions were generous and the prices were reasonable considering the quality of the food and the excellent service

overall oriental pearl stands out for its exceptional vegetarian dining experience even when ordered for home delivery the remarkable quality of the food coupled with their warm hospitality make it a true gem for vegetarian food lovers im eagerly looking forward to ordering from oriental pearl again and exploring more of their delectable vegetarian menu highly recommended for all vegetarian food enthusiasts

Address: 440 Kimble Drive Fredericton, NB E3B 0K5 Canada
Review:
hello house of curry
thank you for the food  great hospitality
it was sooooo delicious  
all of your food 100 on 100
i must say
what a packing
what an quantity
what an quality
what a look like
what a gravy
what a test
what a naan
what a paneer
what a bance of sweet sour and spices
last but not on the list  it was so  clean and neat restaurant and added that best services
afteeeeerrrrt so long time i ate yummy  delicious food like india
now we became ur regular customer for sure

Address: 440 Kimble Drive Fredericton, NB E3B 0K5 Canada
Review: used to really like place years ago when i lived nearby  didnt realize it had changed ownership unfortunately  easily the worst chinese food ive had in my life huge waste of 16 dollars

Address: 440 Kimble Drive Fredericton, NB E3B 0K5 Canada
Review:
size is generous for the price we cant order too much because both of us are full
they also offered chocolates on top of fortune cookies this is a nice touch
there are not much chinese restaurants around fredericton and this is definitely a must try

Address: 335 Woodstock Road Fredericton, NB E3B 2J2 Canada
Review:
tldr avoid this place at all costs

it took us 15 minutes to get water drink orders wouldnt come for 20 minutes overall appetizers and two drinks took 2 hours absolutely shocking service drinks were overpriced an 8oz single caesar was 11 we ordered nachos and the red pepper dip at the same time but finished the nachos before the dip arrived the nachos were well garnished but soggy we didnt get a second sour cream as initially ordered we mentioned it to the waitress and she confirmed but it never came the red pepper and spinach dip comes in a two oz bowl i was under the impression the dip was a side at first the kettle chips were fried in old oil and were soggy

after ordering appetizers our menus were taken and we were never offered mains

it is a great place to watch the sun but the cheap poolside restaurant vibe is counter to the elegance of the delta its a completely contrasted experience with the stmr which we love

Address: 335 Woodstock Road Fredericton, NB E3B 2J2 Canada
Review:
beautiful spot overlooking the river on a perfect august night
we enjoyed the clams so fresh with gluten free cheese toast  thank you
the clam chowder was one of the best weve ever had
our server was attentive and pleasant it was a busy place and we can understand why

Address: 335 Woodstock Road Fredericton, NB E3B 2J2 Canada
Review: this is one of my favourite spots in the city for a lunch date  not only do you get to enjoy the sunshine and a great view of the river  you also get delicious poolside drinks like the strawberry mango daiquiri i thoroughly enjoyed  and a similar and equally delicious menu to that of stmr36  their nachos tho people their na chos  you can never go wrong with this spot  an amazing team in an amazing hotel serving up amazing fb goodness

Address: 335 Woodstock Road Fredericton, NB E3B 2J2 Canada
Review:
very slow service  it wasnt busy at all
update  removed 1 star from 2 because there is no option for 0  2nd visit again my judgement
however about 1015 tables available they decline to sit us for couples of drinks  nachos because we had no reservations what i gather is this do not drop by unless you have a reservation
funny i was able to get a table from stmr36 first they welcome my business  they accomodate me as i sat  watch the crowd at dip 78 tables were still empty as i was leaving after having my  quick meal  a drink  unable to capture full pic on the other side due to umbrellas were in the way

Address: 335 Woodstock Road Fredericton, NB E3B 2J2 Canada
Review: best place to get that down south feeling in new brunswick beautiful outside pool with a dj great drinks and food and right on the saint john river

Address: 1111 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3Z2 Canada
Review: hadnt had greek since moving to new brunswick in 2021 was thrilled to find yassous elias is super friendly and took great care of us the mixed meat platter on our first visit was awesome the wraps on our second were daunting but delicious and the prices cant be beat well be back often

Address: 1111 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3Z2 Canada
Review:
we had takeout and it was delicious as always the staff are super friendly they get to know their customers and try to give the best food and experience possible their friendliness and willingness to give us what we want is a big part of why we keep going back
thank you we will continue to go there

Address: 1111 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3Z2 Canada
Review: great staff every one of them were super friendly from the moment i walked in to the moment i walked out very easy to talk to and makes you feel as if you were part of the staff my chicken souvlaki wrap was delicious would recommend 100

Address: 1111 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3Z2 Canada
Review: food was amazing so kind and welcoming i cant wait to try more of whats on the menu as my daughter said it 1010 would eat here again absolutely

Address: 1111 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3Z2 Canada
Review: food is really good with good portion they have their own salad dressing they sell at the counter first we thought expensive it is delicious and worth the price glad we tried it

Address: 10 trinity drive Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review:
they offer many different kinds of asian cuisine chinesecantonesesingapore japanese thai so i was worried about the authenticity of the taste at first but for the most part they were quite good the portion size was good as well

the place is very cute with beautiful round lights hanging off a very tall ceiling

Address: 10 trinity drive Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review:
my husband and i visited thai manao restaurant on a monday for lunch around 230 pm and we were seated right away

food we ordered ramen sweet and sour pork stir  bibimap with pork belly everything was flavourful and portion sizes are generous we also got a tao chicken rice as a take away

service our server was young and served quick

ambiance with slow music and just enough light on the background the restaurant has a calm atmosphere the rest rooms are clean

Address: 10 trinity drive Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review:
friendly staff
pepper beef was good
serving size for one person

Address: 10 trinity drive Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review:
an amazing place to try authentic chinese  asian dishes

it looks toa family business that makes you get a good family wise connection to the owners they would simply offer you what the do best and fine tune it for your dietary request as possible

things get done fresh and hot

Address: 10 trinity drive Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review: server seemed like she didnt know much offered beer brands she didnt have  was confused by most questions brought me red wine instead of white asked for extra spice in my ramen got none had to basically go in the kitchen to flag her spice or no spice was so bland basically just chicken broth then a ton of chillis when i asked for spice with a over cooked egg and pork that was 80 percent fat she forgot our chicken balls and didnt get any napkins didnt cone to check if our food was ok when we said it was not good at the ebd she didnt offer anything  wont be hoing back

Address: 1230 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C2 Canada
Review:
it is bit expensive when you compared to other sports bar

we liked wings with thai chilli and hot sauce
butter chicken mac and cheese was good  not great 
lemonade and unicorn lemonade could have been better

we have been to these restaurant couple of time around 93010  both the times they were understaffed

Address: 1230 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C2 Canada
Review: one of the best restaurants in fredericton the waiters are always very nice and ready to help the food is always amazing the portions are good and the dessert is great

Address: 1230 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C2 Canada
Review:
emma and chevy deserve all the praise we went there for a dinner and ordered some pizzas and asked for no bacon because i cant eat bacon somehow cooks made a mistake and made 2 pizzas with bacon when the order arrived i reminded her that i asked for no bacon and she was extremely sorry and took back the pizzas and got us new ones in a matter of minutes the atmosphere and service was very nice so one little error like this can be neglected
cut to the end when emma brought the bill she told us that her manger chevy took 3 pizzas off the bill which we didnt even ask for this is what you call good customer service and making sure that they leave with a happy face definitely recommend and will come back for sure

Address: 1230 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C2 Canada
Review:
very nice open atmosphere yet private booths available  our server was a very nice young lady with a ready smile and a great attitude  portions huge and oh my the food was awesome
dont pass it up

Address: 1230 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3C2 Canada
Review: good food slow service a lot of waiting even when done waited over 15 mins for our bill

Address: 91 York Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3N4 Canada
Review:
they passed the pizza testi tried a no thrills onetopping pepperoni pizza to check their baseline and it was delicious
handmade hefty toppings and they dont spare on the cheese excellent pizza

the only lousy review is by someone who ordered what was lying around the kitchen instead of getting a real pizza the pic she posted even looks kinda good
get an actual pizza and taste for yourself

Address: 91 York Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3N4 Canada
Review: hands down the best pizza in freddy beach in my opinion reminds me of old fashioned montreal sloppy style pizza expect generous and copious amounts of toppings and a crust thats always worth finishing

Address: 91 York Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3N4 Canada
Review:
i asked what kind of slices they had they said meat or works little did i know they were already pre cooked and stored in the fridge ready to be preheated i was very disappointed and was hoping for a fresh slice they did say they are half cooked

very thick cheese wasnt the biggest fan bacon was sliced not balls  but the slices were big and the pizza sauce was alright

Address: 91 York Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3N4 Canada
Review: a real pizzeria generous toppings great crust and good value youd have to buy 2 large pizzas from a chain to be as full as one large from luna highly recommend

Address: 91 York Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3N4 Canada
Review:
amazing pizza

dont get me wrong the place looks like a total dive but the quality of the food is out of this world

the staff are nice and the place was clean and thats saying something since its next to a bunch of night clubs and bars

lots of great special pizzas for any dietary need unless your lactose intolerant like me but the upset tummy i got was well worth it for this pizza

Address: 469 Rue King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: my husband and i visited a few weeks ago and were pleasantly surprised by this charming little cafe we tried the stuffed grape leaves appetizer and absolutely loved it we loved their salad dressing so much that we bought two jars to bring home their baklava was also fresh and delicious and the lady who served us was very friendly and helpful we will definitely go back to try out more menu items

Address: 469 Rue King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: cozy cafe in fredericton offering amazing vegan menu ambience was beautiful and food was so comforting very kind people running this place sharing some photos from the visit would definitely recommend support local

Address: 469 Rue King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review:
what a gem of a restaurant i should have come here sooner

ive been living nearby for over two years now and have never gone in because of two main reasons 1 there are many restaurants in the area im still making the rounds 2 like many meat eaters vegan isnt my goto its not that i dont like it its like jazz i never hate it when its around but ill never go to it on my own not going here was a mistake

its very well designed and the staff are supremely friendly but the food is of course the gem here i never would have guessed the food here could pack such incredible and diverse flavours into their dishes from the vegan burger to the walnut stew and the baklava everything had us clamoring for more

Address: 469 Rue King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review:
pretty incredible  food was excellent and traditional from my perspective of eating at authentic middle eastern restaurants  the vegan twists to the dishes were excellent  tons of flavour and i suspect meat eaters would do well here too with the shawarma

update my family has come here 3 years in a row as we road trip through atlantic canada it is never a disappointment and seems to get better  below is the shawarma wrap  the rice and green beans and the tofu plate  super delicious  as always  this family run business includes very warm and inviting service pleasant people

Address: 469 Rue King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: stopped by for dinner and were so glad we did what a meal  so nice to have a fully vegan menu  desserts and all highly recommend stopping in if youre in fredericton

Address: 418 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B6 Canada
Review: the escape room we did was the best escape room weve ever done it was so fun and the food was super delicious but man did the place ever stink the entire place smelt bad plus the washrooms even the fake one in the escape room smelt like they had sewage backup the bathroom toilet was leaking everywhere also theres no ac so it was so hot we had to leave this also made the smell even worse also the music was so loud you cant hear anything fix the atmosphere and the place would be great

Address: 418 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B6 Canada
Review: we go here frequently and love it each time great food super friendly and knowledgeable staff a fantastic selection of board games  not to mention the game nights they do to really build community if i could give them 6 stars i would

Address: 418 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B6 Canada
Review: we played the escape room with our son and daughter in law and had a blast especially since we failed and the bomb exploded   it was our sons treat for us so i dont know what it cost

Address: 418 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B6 Canada
Review:
absolutely amazing place board games escape rooms friendly staff and great food this is definitely a place to visit at least once if youre stopping in fredericton

if youve never tried mead before i cant recommend trying the sampler enough pay the 150 extra for all of them although their own custom drink scuttlebutt is definitely the best flavour so if you want to just try one definitely give that a go

Address: 418 Queen Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1B6 Canada
Review: fun little spot in fredericton reasonably priced and staff is friendly the virtual escape rooms are a lot of fun

Address: 23 Ashton Court Fredericton, NB E3C 0H8 Canada
Review: i had the banana split on gluten free waffles and it was so good some glutenfree food can be disappointing but there its great and they have options for glutenfree bread waffles and home fries i also had the belgian caffe mocha i would come back just for that alone as it was the best coffee ive had but everything was really good and great service the staff is very friendly we will definitely be back again

Address: 23 Ashton Court Fredericton, NB E3C 0H8 Canada
Review:
i loved the atmosphere it felt like a bb in europe we ordered chocolate and waffle and crepe it was delicious my favourite was the strawberry waffles and my americano was divine
the waffles are soft let them know if you want them crispy

Address: 23 Ashton Court Fredericton, NB E3C 0H8 Canada
Review:
first i was greeted by the friendliest staff they have a quick service set up so i was able to order within 5 minutes of arriving and my drinks were at my table less than 5 minutes later i ordered a mexicano and it looked and tasted amazing

our food was hot and delicious we got strawberry waffles belgian breakfast and a traditional breakfast the portions were great

highly recommend this restaurant

Address: 23 Ashton Court Fredericton, NB E3C 0H8 Canada
Review:
i have gone to this restaurant for over 6 years i visited about a year ago and i couldnt drink my coffee as it tasted like maxwell house i figured it must have been an off day at the restaurant as i expect high end coffee from a restaurant known for belgian waffles delicious and beautiful food the last time i visited i asked prior ordering what coffee they brew and i was advised maxwell house the cheapest coffee i can find in the stores very disappointed to say no to coffee with my breakfast
the service was not what it has been known for needing to order and pay for your meal prior to the service being rendered am i at a fast food restaurant now i like to be seated take my time while seated to order the food at my own pace without a lineup waiting at the door i always give a second chance but after being served the cheapest coffee having to order and pay like a fast food restaurant and the food being okay i unfortunately will not return if the coffee can become delicious again and the service can be rendered at the table only then may i consider returning

Address: 23 Ashton Court Fredericton, NB E3C 0H8 Canada
Review: it seems to me that this place is pass its glory days i have read good reviews but our experience was mediocre they only offer half service which is not ideal i have asked for fresh orange juice and california benny i got a small glass of the tropicana juice not freshly squeezed for 65 so that was a bit of a disappointment my poached egg was slightly overcooked and hollandaise sauce was not exactly to my taste but some people might find it ok

Address: 7 Brookmount Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2J4 Canada
Review: home made food healthy and delicious very nice staff good nice try bennedy

Address: 7 Brookmount Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2J4 Canada
Review: weve been coming here for years and have loved the sunshine diner for a long time lately things havent been going well when weve been there the last time we were there it took almost 60 minutes for our food to be delivered to our table after ordering that was after waiting at our table to order for over 15 minutes when we did get our food only two of the three of us got our food and the third person at our table had to wait another ten minutes to get their food when the food was delivered it was not the plate we ordered our sever was very apologetic but then it took even more time for the rest of our tables food to arrive our food was below expectation as well our sausages were burned obviously had been rush cooked in an attempt to catch up and the home fries with onions were substantially burned too and had been cooked way too high these plates should not have left the kitchen under any reasonable watch but we are it and didnt complain simply because we had waited this long we were missing toast and our eggs were way too dry the thing was is the restaurant wasnt busy when we were there it was 1030am on a midweek day and there were plenty of empty tables although they did have dirty dishes sitting on them for a long time i think some attention needs to be given to how the ordering and cooking processes go and some effort needs to be made to make the dining experience a lot faster and better for patrons oh and on top of everything else some of the staff were having a pretty heated argument in front of customers we will be back im sure we just hope things can improve

Address: 7 Brookmount Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2J4 Canada
Review:
if i could give more stars i would
the food is always homecooked with love the staff are always more than amazing they are so hard working and happy ive been coming here through all different stages of my life and the sunshine diner makes my heart feel like sunshine thank you today for the wonderful cold plates i put in for take out thank you for making my day today as i sat there waiting for my order the smiles the laughter the love i could feel it all i thank you for being you you make the world a better place by being in it
if you havent been please go see for yourself

Address: 7 Brookmount Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2J4 Canada
Review: this clean and busy diner is busy with locals but there were still seats  available at 930 on a week day the special was ample portion to feed anyone service was quick and food was hot and tasty we like the vibes here big group or small they do it all

Address: 7 Brookmount Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2J4 Canada
Review:
friendly staff and a quintessential diner experience

ive been here a few times and its always the same everything they make is comfort whether its with family or just dining alone their all day breakfast is great i keep saying ill get other things on the menu and have once or twice but their breakfasts are great

this time around i had the really big breakfast everything is what you would expect from an old school diner style restaurant nothing fancy but all comfort and nostalgia couple that with all you can drink selfserve coffee and tea and you can spend quite some time in here its also often busy so dont expect to rush in and out its the perfect lazy weekend morning kind of spot

Address: 1187 Smythe Fredericton, NB E3B 3H4 Canada
Review:
they had a lot of empty tables when i went around 200 pm still waited for close to 10 minutes to get seated god knows why food was good enjoyed it and was tasty seafood chowder had less seafood and more lettuce but the waitress was kind enough to top it up with some shrimps and scallops so no complaints they had good varieties on the menu so probably would repeat



repeated service was really good and so were all the items ordered the place was crowded and had to wait for 15 minutes before we could go in  these guys should seriously think about setting up some space for their customers to wait rather than making them stand in queue in cold winter

Address: 1187 Smythe Fredericton, NB E3B 3H4 Canada
Review: i ordered for a hot chicken and a pineapple  mango smoothie although i didnt know all the items in the food and i asked the lady to explain the difference to me and another sandwich that was on the menu but the food i got wasnt appealing to the eye and the server who attended to us who i believe goes by the name diane was quite dismissive  in a hurry i also didnt get my smoothie which was meant to go along with my food i had to remind her after she brought the bill i barely ate the food because it didnt look good i am completely disappointed with the service i got it was definitely a sub par

Address: 1187 Smythe Fredericton, NB E3B 3H4 Canada
Review:
excellent food and service
very delicious and fast service
i would recommend any of their skillets and also waffles which were super fluffy

Address: 1187 Smythe Fredericton, NB E3B 3H4 Canada
Review: came in for a quick breakfast service was amazing great staff very pleasant food was served very quickly very good

Address: 1187 Smythe Fredericton, NB E3B 3H4 Canada
Review: good staff yummy food great service the restaurants ambience is very dark which i dont like which is why i love the outdoor seating they have on the upper floor

Address: 154 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: whenever im in the area i stop in for the best ethopian food ever  always amazing service and tasty food wish we had this in moncton   first experience was in the northside market so happy to see you with your own location thanks for a great food experience

Address: 154 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review:
so happy to have this place on the northside used to go to the market often but delighted that theres now a dedicated building

the food is amazing with fresh ingredients and you can taste that its cooked with passion and love i really like the ordering style where you can get 3 different dishes so you can try a little bit of everything

the portions are generous and the prices are way way worth it i always tip extra because i feel like its worth so much more it makes me happy to support someone local and so passionate about what they do

see you soon and thank you so much hana

Address: 154 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review:
by far my favorite food in the city bursting with flavor and everything tastes amazing also extremely healthy and cheap
and hannah is sweet

ps you should advertise on university campuses eg flyers etc because i wouldve eaten here almost daily throughout my degree but i didnt know it existed because google restricts my search results  and presumably those of other students  to restaurants on the southside unless i manually adjust the map

Address: 154 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review:
so happy that we finally got to try this restaurant it definitely lives up to the positive reviews
we had a great experience the staff were friendly and efficient the food was fantastic and reasonably priced
my favorite definitely was the split peas and the lentils
will for sure be visiting this establishment again

Address: 154 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C8 Canada
Review: good home cooking in a nice sit down restaurant food is ready to go buffet style good portions and flavor and freshness owner is very kind

Address: 459 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review:
my first visit there and tried gimpab for the first time and loved it ill order take outs next time and watch my favourite
kdrama with it

Address: 459 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: my boyfriend and i love coming here we always get the tteobokki and kimchi fried rice the portions are great and the food is even better the staff are also super nice would def recommend if you wanna try korean food

Address: 459 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review:
overall a good place for some korean food

the we had the beef bibimbap and a spicy salmon roll

the beef bibimbap was spot on even proportions of beef veggies and a nice sunny side egg on top i added the spicy red sauce on top to make it nearly perfect the meal was filling and tasty

other nice touches were the wide metal bowl

the sushi roll though was less than stellar not bad by any means but not good especially considering the price

the location is a bit expensive as well considering the roll size and lack of korean side dishes

the restaurant itself is well kept and decor i found was pleasant location is good as well being located downtown

Address: 459 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: wow brings back such fond memories of my years in asia as soon as i took the first bite of my bibimbap with jeyuk a spicy pork it instantly took me back i also had their kimchi jigae which is a kimchi soup they even had the purple black rice that is well known in korean dishes delicious authentic korean food the portion was so large that ill be able to have some for lunch tomorrow too the food had just a bit of spice to it which added a nice kick such colourful and flavourful food and friendly staff they currently only do delivery and pickup through skip the dishes

Address: 459 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E5 Canada
Review: service was quick and food was delicious

Address: 529 Dundonald Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1X5 Canada
Review: hi my first greco donair order tonight it was delicious yum guy who took my order by phone was polite and kind delivery gentlemen was as equally kind delivery was fast nice that first experience is a positive one i will order again

Address: 529 Dundonald Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1X5 Canada
Review:
ordered takeout pizza for small party

it was more convenient to order online and pick up when you are ready

the parking is easy

Address: 529 Dundonald Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1X5 Canada
Review: i dont want to give this business a bad review but it is needed from my latest experience within the business i truly love the pizza but i am not a fan of rude employees and delivery drivers who bad mouth customers this is my latest experience if your delivery drivers are going to vent about the frustrations of their job dont allow them to do it rudely in front of paying customers all i wanted was a pizza be more professional and perhaps someday i shall return have a great existence

Address: 529 Dundonald Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1X5 Canada
Review: seriously this is probably one of the best grecos in the province if not in all of the maritimes the food is always hot and tasty the toppings are always plentiful and well distributed and the owners support the local car show and its ongoing efforts to raise money for the hospital

Address: 529 Dundonald Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1X5 Canada
Review: nice place and good customer service

Address: Northside Market 311 Saint Marys Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S4 Canada
Review:
kelsey is one of the best servers ever that ive encountered with she was very nice patient polite and helpful taking order her suggestions were very point on
and talking about the place it was a very delightfull experience to say the least the pizzas tasted authentic and flavourful the dipping sauce and cheesy bread was a cherry on the cake love the place and will definitely come back again for one of the best food in fredericton definitely recommend everyone to try it

Address: Northside Market 311 Saint Marys Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S4 Canada
Review:
hands down the best food experience we have had in a long time everything was amazing

also the texas chipotle burger needs to be entered in a burger competition unreal

Address: Northside Market 311 Saint Marys Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S4 Canada
Review: i have always been pleased with pizza delights food until this fathers day we ordered a party size pizza and garlic cheese fingers for takeout which cost 60 odd  since i had never had an issue with their food i did not open the boxes to check prior to getting home when we opened the box we were all unpleasantly surprised to see an over cooked partially burnt pizza my husband who says he has never had a bad pizza could only eat one piece i will certainly think twice before ordering from pizza delight again very disappointed

Address: Northside Market 311 Saint Marys Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S4 Canada
Review: pizza delight st marys street fredericton only about 4 tables occupied and waited 25 minutes when we finally left because nobody cared to even take our order absolutely garbage service 6pm thursday july 6 2023 guy with long hair was supposed to be our waiter when confronted said he was busy helping colleagues  do not recommend wasting your time here

Address: Northside Market 311 Saint Marys Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S4 Canada
Review: it was very good i had a pizza and nacho combo husband had the donair sub we both enjoys our meal

Address: 277 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: amazing food tom yam soup is perfect basil rice stir fry with chicken is super tasty perfectly seasoned and fresh love the imperial spring rolls staff were super nice will be back

Address: 277 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: i have been enjoying thai spice for close to ten years now everything i have ordered has been delicious but the pad thai is my personal favourite containing a savoury sauce and perfectly crunchy vegetables i always ask for mine made extra spicy using chili oil owners are very friendly and now know my standard order i refuse to order pad thai at any other restaurant because the thai spice version is simply unbeatable

Address: 277 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: the tom yam soup is literally the best soup ive ever had from any restaurant so much flavour

Address: 277 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: tasty and quite authentic so happy to have found this traditional thai joint run by a friendly thai couple cant go wrong with the pad thai or the tom yum soup loaded with tamarind flavour

Address: 277 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: nice little family restaurant reasonably priced and the food tasted great not a huge menu but the food was very authentic makes me miss khao san road bangkok

Address: 1381 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3C 1A2 Canada
Review: as always this place is delicious it may be located in a food court but definitely fresh and absolutely hot each meal is made to order right in front of the customer i had the chicken pad thai no surprises about what you are getting classic to go container or open tray to eat in the food court if you like asian cuisine youll  be making the right choice ordering here thanks

Address: 1381 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3C 1A2 Canada
Review: not a bad spot for a chain restaurant the price is of course great and the flavours are good the staff is nice and the food cooked fresh right on the spot a nice addition to the food court

Address: 1381 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3C 1A2 Canada
Review: had the fish pad thai absolutely delicious if you are in to see a movie or just shopping definitely worth a stop

Address: 1381 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3C 1A2 Canada
Review: really nice place in the whole food court to grab a bite the entire staff is so friendly and helpful the food tasted so fresh and delicious it was also a  big serving size when compared to other food chains in terms of quantity and price clean place and quick service too

Address: 1381 Regent Street Fredericton, NB E3C 1A2 Canada
Review: can never go wrong with their thaistyle veg fried rice with extra rice and veg sauce

Address: 22 Trinity Avenue Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review: absolutely loved my experience here i had an incredible experience thanks to the amazing manager bianca she went above and beyond to ensure that my st burger was absolutely amazing the staff were incredibly friendly and i was impressed by the spotless cleanliness of the bathrooms the icing on the cake was the cold and refreshing fruitopia as it seems theres a shortage everywhere else st hubert express sets the bar high with their exceptional service and attention to detail kudos to bianca and the entire team for creating such a wonderful dining experience

Address: 22 Trinity Avenue Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review: absolutely disgusting restaurant so many tables full of garbage most not all of the employees were rude and disrespectful food was overpriced the benches ground and tables were all dirty i will never be returning to this absolutely awful establishment

Address: 22 Trinity Avenue Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review:
very disappointed of that location i have uploaded a picture so everyone can see how bad the food quality you get at this location

first we ordered 2 sthubert poutine when we got home there was no cheese in both poutines so we added some square pieces at home second the chicken was so dry that even the watered down gravy that wasnt gravy just tasteless brown sauce they give you couldnt soften the batter lastly the fries felt so old that even the microwave could make them softer

i do not recommend this location to anyone and its a shame for the prestigious st hubert brand unfortunately

Address: 22 Trinity Avenue Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review: excellent food the indian style chicken was absolutely delicious great service very friendly staff staff checked on us multiple times to ensure that we were satisfied with our meal you dont get that often at fast food restaurants

Address: 22 Trinity Avenue Fredericton, NB E3C 0B8 Canada
Review: hands down the best cateringdelivery service i have ever received if youre looking for lunch for a conference or staff party look no further these folks have it handled whether its the wonderful attitude from the lady on the phone taking your order or the kind smile from the restaurant manager himself delivering it to you they go above and beyond to top it all off the meals are always delicious and never anything wrong or missing they get it right  will definitely be ordering for lunch again and will definitely let anyone else i know looking for catering to head this way

Address: 230 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C9 Canada
Review: pizza chain usually pretty good have a tendency to burn the last couple pies we got there the meat lovers is always good and the service is always friendly wings are good the breadsticks with cheese and marinara are probably the best item and a welcome break from garlic fingers

Address: 230 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C9 Canada
Review: fast and friendly every time i would have given it a 3 for the pizza itself but my delivery took only roughly 5 extra minutes and i received a sorry email with free breadsticks an unexpected but pleasant surprise for something that didnt even bother me in the first place great service gave it the extra star its always great for those times when you just dont want to cook obviously not the healthiest option or the best pizza in town but its there when you need it and consistent i suggest when ordering using the app as you will be able to earn points for even greater deals

Address: 230 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C9 Canada
Review: our forever favorite pizzanothing beats pizza hut for me and my family love their app and the buy 5 pizzas and get the 6th free deal and their bogo offer on doing customer satisfaction survey  this particular branch has great and timely service

Address: 230 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C9 Canada
Review: i got home and realized they put the dip on the pizza again this has happened a few times but this is the first time i went back and asked to exchange this pizza the guy did exchange it but gave me attitude about it first

Address: 230 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1C9 Canada
Review: i really used to like their 5 5 5 deal until they made you buy a 30 large pizza for your first one so i decided to check out their new melts didnt get to try one  pretty much trying to charge you 899 for two slices of pizza box is huge melts are tiny to describe a melt its a slice of pizza with toppings with a piece of pizza crust placed on top then fried i knowi know  things are expensive  but some things ill just walk away from melts are one of them i think i may have done it for 699  599 for sure

Address: 1180 Smythe Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3H5 Canada
Review: the friday night special is not intended for vampires garlic bits or people not into greasy white sauce that pushes the toppings off the dough still the service was prompt and the cheese bread good i think they can redeem themselves ill have to try a night other than friday

Address: 1180 Smythe Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3H5 Canada
Review: ordered the meat lovers melt and 5 boneless chicken bites and a pepsi the meat lovers melt is extremely delicious and packed full of meats and cheese and lets not forget to mention the parmesan cheese coating on the outer crust very filling and great value as well would recommend and will be back for sure

Address: 1180 Smythe Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3H5 Canada
Review: breadsticks overcooked and dry pizza almost overcooked and dry i have had better quality of food there we will order there again one more time and if no better we will not be back

Address: 1180 Smythe Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3H5 Canada
Review:
i do miss the dinein experience however i also do understand why it has remained takeout due to covid

this location has great friendly staff and always welcoming and they make the best pizza well almost im told i make the best homemade pizza

Address: 1180 Smythe Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3H5 Canada
Review:
it is the worst pizza place even after contact them in there website they said 3 to 5 days to contact my and still nobody contact and now it a month i got three pizzas two of them wrong
update
thanks they give me 14 as credited store but their food test is worse now not like year ago it was better

Address: 349 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E4 Canada
Review: worst subway i have ever been to i have never been treated so poorly in any restaurant my significant other and i were tourists passing by the beautiful town of fredricton thus had many bags with us the subway worker at the time immediately and without provocation assumed we were homeless and was acting hostile as if we were attempting to loiter and or steal if you as much as bring a single bag to this establishment they will treat you with very little to no respect likely even hostility even after we had paid and eaten our food and cleaned up after ourselves the worker was staring us down with judgment as we exited there are many amazing locally owned and ran restaurants in fredericton but never go to this one definitely not worth even considering

Address: 349 King Street Fredericton, NB E3B 1E4 Canada

Address: 185 Gabriel Drive Fredericton, NB E3A 5R8 Canada
Review: hi im storm barlow it is march 22 2023 the food it ok but i found 2 hairs in it and the cutlery is dirty and i didnt even use them cuz of it

Address: 185 Gabriel Drive Fredericton, NB E3A 5R8 Canada
Review: had the fish and chips and the fish was delicious and it was a nice big portion would be nice to have a slice of lemon on the plate to go with the fish but i supposed i couldve asked fries were not really crisp and couldve used a pinch of salt but the portion was also plentiful very friendly staff and fast service dining room was very clean

Address: 185 Gabriel Drive Fredericton, NB E3A 5R8 Canada
Review:
all food was cooked from frozen nothing is homemade and you can taste it

plates we had
 spinach dip overcooked cheese was dark brown on top decent flavour
 loaded potatoe skins grainy dry flavourless
 fish and chips fish was well battered and good fries had good texture but were not seasoned at all
 burger sauce was good patties were overcooked and not seasoned at all
 pie and ice cream not homemade and no ice cream despite the title
 all the dips or sauces come in individual plastic servings

service it took us 15 minutes to get water we were offered lemons they were forgotten the waitress then noticed said shed grab some and didnt appetizers took 20 minutes to arrive then entrees only 5 minutes later pacing was poor and led to food stacking at the table in a half full restaurant we had to ask for additional mayo for the fries three times we had to place our dessert order twice

to say this place is disappointing is an understatement bottom of my list for eats in fredericton

Address: 185 Gabriel Drive Fredericton, NB E3A 5R8 Canada
Review:
this time they served me burnt toast burnt bacon didnt come back to check on me for refills numerous trips same result
my order has been sent back wrong in multiple occasions even after mentioning it to staff
ive had to reorder meals ive already ordered
going to stop recommending this spot from now on

Address: 185 Gabriel Drive Fredericton, NB E3A 5R8 Canada
Review: quick service hot food great prices friendly staff comfortable seating

Address: 235 Main Street Main Street Plaza Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: ordered a mama burger with cheese combo and onion rings and the burger was excellent  perfect condiments and that onion slice and pickles really hit the spot they have the best onion rings in the city but they could reduce the salt throwing and still have a quality taste and their root beer should be sold in stores

Address: 235 Main Street Main Street Plaza Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review:
today i had a terrible day i was exhausted from long hours at work starving and found out that i cant even come close to affording my medication i was feeling really low when i came to this aw the worker at the counter i wish i caught her name but i remember that she was wearing a medical alert bracelet was absolutely wonderful she was polite patient and showed exemplary service i hope this message makes it to her because she really turned my day around thank you for your positivity

additionally the food was delicious and came quickly the prices are very reasonable the space is incredibly clean even the bathroom and this location has a great layout as well

Address: 235 Main Street Main Street Plaza Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review: the food is precooked who knows how long it sits there when we went through the drivethru it took no time for the person in there looked as though there was only one person working  to hand us our food he clearly didnt cook it in the 30 seconds it took for us to drive to the window  my son and i got food poisoning

Address: 235 Main Street Main Street Plaza Fredericton, NB E3A 1E1 Canada
Review:
worst ever aw
i was there and waited in the line chinese looking cashier just went inside without serving us and she was behind cleaning an equipment how rude to avoid a comoletely unknown person who is standing to do business and no one took our order untill i ask them to take our order finally i ordered got my burger as in the picture so low in quality not a pleasent presentation these kids who are working know nothing about customer service food serving the worst ever aw restaurant i have been in these three years of my time here in canada i am not recommending this to anyone
further restaurant is not tidy at all

Address: 1189 Prospect St Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review: this location is absolutely massive and beautiful for being as large and as busy as it is it was surprisingly clean the counter staff was super friendly helping me pick out donuts and they made my coffee nice and quick only complaint was the state of their sidewalks which were completely incased in snow and ice making them impossible to use but that of course is a seasonal issue

Address: 1189 Prospect St Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review:
inside was slow to slower lots of new people not strategically placed at register not a good call for rush hour this added to the 90 of open mouth breathers lined up within two to three feet of each other less than 10 wearing masks and none on employees  yes on the high stars because i got in before the long antimaskers line and new isnt a bad thing it reflects poor management

the food  well the pictures tell all although missing some icing that i wasnt going to lick off the paper for the donut was decent the wrap  ewww the sauce the breakfast wrap would do well without any sauce let alone the glob in the centertook that bite and sorry team im not suffering for you and spit it out the tea was hot dont put between your legs people i found the apple cinnamon quite unique and tasty with a tad of sugar

oh myy  the inside line is wrapping into the dining area thats some addiction when the line is uber long inside

Address: 1189 Prospect St Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review:

Address: 1189 Prospect St Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review: i had my usual coffee in a friendly atmosphere i have always felt home in tim hortons  good food and good beverages  here never failed to make me feel good

Address: 1189 Prospect St Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review: this tim hortons is always out of something i have never gone through a mcdonalds or aw or wendys or any other fast food place and have them tell me they are out of eggs or bacon or something within the sandwich im ordering if its 7am breakfast how can you not have eggs anyways all tim hortons are disappointments across canada including this one

Address: 1165 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review: best kfc chicken in fredericton had a family birthday celebration placed a pickup order and everything was perfect sidney  supervisor made sure or meal was on time and made to perfection thanks for your outstanding service

Address: 1165 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review: not happy with the  service i got yesterday the  girl on charge  was not willing  to help  with what i was asking it use to be a good place to go and use to go there alot but after  yesterday  i will think twice customer  service  should  be the most important  thing for a business no customers  no money  very disappointed  since this was  my favorite  kfc location  in fredericton

Address: 1165 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 3B9 Canada
Review:
the last 3 times we have gone to this location for supper around 7  they have been out of chicken i get it being an hour until close but i worked fast food for a decade and would get in so much trouble if we turned away customers because we did not want to cook more food 5 minutes before close not that i agreed but the point is more than 30 minutes before it closes i should be able to get food
so very done with trying to get some at this point  very much am not impressed

Address: 283 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E3 Canada
Review: my worst dinner i ever had the staff is not friendly and the foods is not good as the money you paid never come again

Address: 283 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E3 Canada
Review: spent 40 dollars on a triple bucket that includes 6 pieces of chicken 4 tenders and popcorn chicken and a large popcorn chicken and 4 dipping sauces they forgot my bucket of large popcorn chicken which i had to inform them of also the 6 piece bucket of chicken only had wings and drums in it the chicken also looked like someone mangled it before putting in the box the dipping sauce i requested was wrong the quality of their product and the service at this location are extremely poor and i will no longer be given them my business zero stars

Address: 283 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 1E3 Canada
Review: ordered a spicy big crunch no lettuce waited 35 minutes to get a spicy big crunch covered in brown lettuce specifically asked for no lettuce twice when  ordering once before leaving luckily they replaced the sandwich with a lettuce free one once i asked if it indeed had none told me to keep the other thanks i guess

Address: 243 St Mary's Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S5 Canada
Review:
kelsey is one of the best servers ever that ive encountered with she was very nice patient polite and helpful taking order her suggestions were very point on
and talking about the place it was a very delightfull experience to say the least the pizzas tasted authentic and flavourful the dipping sauce and cheesy bread was a cherry on the cake love the place and will definitely come back again for one of the best food in fredericton definitely recommend everyone to try it

Address: 243 St Mary's Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S5 Canada
Review:
hands down the best food experience we have had in a long time everything was amazing

also the texas chipotle burger needs to be entered in a burger competition unreal

Address: 243 St Mary's Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S5 Canada
Review: i have always been pleased with pizza delights food until this fathers day we ordered a party size pizza and garlic cheese fingers for takeout which cost 60 odd  since i had never had an issue with their food i did not open the boxes to check prior to getting home when we opened the box we were all unpleasantly surprised to see an over cooked partially burnt pizza my husband who says he has never had a bad pizza could only eat one piece i will certainly think twice before ordering from pizza delight again very disappointed

Address: 243 St Mary's Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S5 Canada
Review: pizza delight st marys street fredericton only about 4 tables occupied and waited 25 minutes when we finally left because nobody cared to even take our order absolutely garbage service 6pm thursday july 6 2023 guy with long hair was supposed to be our waiter when confronted said he was busy helping colleagues  do not recommend wasting your time here

Address: 243 St Mary's Street Fredericton, NB E3A 2S5 Canada
Review: it was very good i had a pizza and nacho combo husband had the donair sub we both enjoys our meal

Address: 989 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2T7 Canada
Review:
the food was burnt and the waitress was nasty the 3rd photo is the first plate of nachos the 2nd photo is the redo and the crust on that pizza was non existence the nachos smelled so bad it mad you gag i can not believe any restaurant would serve this food go to a different pizza delight personally i think the board of health should thoroughly inspect the kitchen
the waitress was a bch from the moment  we walked in the doors our family wont go back

Address: 989 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2T7 Canada
Review: went for a date with the woman before our bab was born and i wasnt impressed with the service by any means the server hardly seemed very interested that we were there and didnt even check on us until it was time to collect the bill the food was good as always part of the restaurant experience is receiving good service upon arrival until you leave and this visit was a disappointment hopefully the next will be an improvement

Address: 989 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2T7 Canada
Review:
this is my second time here  lunch special
6 pizza and chicken nachos absolutely delicious our server was one of the nicest people ever  very friendly and very accommodating 100 x better then either location in miramichi thats for sure

Address: 989 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2T7 Canada
Review: absolutely the worst pizza i have ever had in 40 years just moved to fredericton and thought we would try it out the sauce was a ketchupbbq sauce watery mixture and the toppings had absolutely no flavor whatsoever the meat looked  tasted like it was from one of those subs you get in a variety store and put in the microwave we ate part of one and threw the second one in the garbage i cant believe people put up with this and actually eat their pizza i had to give it a star just to post otherwise i would have given it a 11 thats negative eleven

Address: 989 Prospect Street Fredericton, NB E3B 2T7 Canada
Review: service and food was good but the dining area was too hot to sit they must have their ac working properly

Address: 102 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 9N6 Canada
Review: we ordered 3 medium pizzas over the phone for pickup one was gluten free crust the pizzas were well made with lots of toppings and tasted really good the pizza sauce was different but really yummy the gluten free pizza crust wasnt half bad either we will definitely get pizza here again when were visiting fredericton

Address: 102 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 9N6 Canada
Review: the crew put effort into remembering names favourite orders etc food is exactly as i request and i always do special orders clean kitchen area and great food

Address: 102 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 9N6 Canada
Review: i order 2 donairs one wrap and burger and both came squested flat i called the store back and theyre saying they shipped it normal and wouldnt replace them

Address: 102 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 9N6 Canada
Review:
no sense to preorder online if you have to wait 30 min after you arrive

do you know the first greco pizza restaurant opened in 1977 in moncton new brunswick as greco donairand pizza in 1981 the franchise rights were sold to grinners food systems ltd of truro nova scotia1

many greco locations in rural areas are known as greco express outlets they are typically associated with a motel convenience store or other existing establishment in some locations the greco franchise is associated with a captain submarine franchise another of grinners properties

Address: 102 Main Street Fredericton, NB E3A 9N6 Canada
Review:
called to get a medium cheese pizza with flavored crust from this location i called at 330 and they had it done in ten minutes the guy was super nice and talked to me a bit before he gave me the pizza honestly super impressed with greco it also tasted great

talked to greco customer service about an awful experience i had at captain sub on sunset drive they sent me multiple emails apologizing and even sent me a gift card the pizza was great and their customer service at the local and chain level are both immaculate greco really seemed to be stepping up their game

Address: 1713 Woodstock Rd Fredericton, NB E3C 1L4 Canada
Review: terrible experience at this location today spent 20 minutes in the drive through with 3 people ahead of usthe first vehicle had a drink and sandwich the next two had drinks only as did we i can be patient when things are busy or staffing is short but the two at the window could not have demonstrated a poorer work ethic to the young fellow who told me it had only been 20 secondsyouve got a lot to learn about customer service

Address: 1713 Woodstock Rd Fredericton, NB E3C 1L4 Canada
Review: wanted to order a chicken wrap but they didnt have chicken then tried to order chipotle steak wrap and they didnt have rice then ordered a roast beef craveable and they made me pay an extra 70 cents for the bagel without telling me because they were out of the regular bread i asked why they charged extra and it was because the bagel cost more but i wanted the regular bread didnt want to switch foods because im sure it wasnt available the cravable was also poorly made an excess of sauce was flowing out of the bagel hole and the beef was loosely coming out of the sides would give 0 stars if i could will go to hanwell or prospect tims instead

Address: 1713 Woodstock Rd Fredericton, NB E3C 1L4 Canada
Review:
this is the worst th i have ever visited
empty and no service for several minutes employees chatting to each other ignoring us
watery coffee wasted my money

Address: 1713 Woodstock Rd Fredericton, NB E3C 1L4 Canada
Review:
i wish i could give 10 stars
one car ahead of me and i waited for 10 minutes at the window to be told they dont have bread or chicken or anything on the menu 
horrible experience
i do not recomend stoping there at all

Address: 1713 Woodstock Rd Fredericton, NB E3C 1L4 Canada
Review:
they didnt have buns or wedges didnt have the tim bit flavors requested
really a waste of time especially when the line is always so long

Address: 1475 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3Z2 Canada
Review: service was amazing our server was friendly and attentive gave great recommendations which we happily followed we ordered the lobster roll shrimp pasta fish cake and a salad all were made well and tasted delicious the portions were great  didnt leave you wanting but you didnt feel overwhelmingly full dessert was decadent without it being too sweet overall a really great time here

Address: 1475 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3Z2 Canada
Review: probably the best overall restaurant experience ive had in a long time the food was incredibly delicious the pistachio crusted salmon was a hit im not a big huge salmon lover but this dish just made me fall in love with salmon from the succulent taste and moist flavour of the salmon to the crusty pistachio the emotion and love put into this dish was truly amazing my wife had the lobster pasta if you could only see the emotion she had after the first bite you could say that her food adventure journey into finishing this dish was just the beginning we ended our dinner with dessert and that too blew our minds i cant even get into the amazing dinner service we had joshua made us feel at home and made sure everything was perfect almost felt like he was family thats how amazing this restaurant is the vibe the people the food was truly incredible my wife and i cant wait to come back truly an amazing experience i would recommend this restaurant from here to the moon and back cheers

Address: 1475 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3Z2 Canada
Review: amazing food and really nice atmosphere as well as top level service all the food has its own distinguished flavor but the most impressive is the rice with scallops the rice is soft and kind of milky and the scallops are strong if it is less salty then it will be the best main dish i have ever

Address: 1475 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3Z2 Canada
Review: we stopped by during our royal caribbean cruise vacation this place did not let us down the food is spectacular and well seasoned the portions are amazing and the quality and taste deserve a 5 star rating we had mussels for the appetizer for the main course we had the lobster pasta and the lobster roll and for the dessert we had the butterscotch cake we recommend them all great atmosphere too it was a great day to sit outside

Address: 1475 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3Z2 Canada
Review:
the food was amazing it was the best beef short rib ive had the dessert scallops and pasta we had were good too
the drinks we well made and the table service were good the location was great and right at the water
my only criticism was that the bathroom looked like a tornado blew through it there was no paper towel in the dispenser the facial tissue was soaked and the floorcounter was soaked too i made a mention of it when i used the washroom earlier in the meal but it was not addressed for the whole meal i expected more at the restaurant of this caliber

Address: 217 Waverly Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2C3 Canada
Review: restaurant was very busy on a monday night crystal provided great service this is a very well run place food was quickly served and it was excellent amazingly large menu which allowed every member of the party to order something different every table was filled when we arrived at 7pm and for good reason this restaurant draws you in and then gives plenty of reasons to return again  and again

Address: 217 Waverly Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2C3 Canada
Review: we have been here a few times now and the friendly service and amazing food is what keeps us coming back for more to continue with our supporting locally owned businesses   tonites experience was by far one of our better experiences    our order was taken in a timely manner  our drinks and food were brought out promptly and the food was amazing as always  our waitress kathleen was super and was always coming back to check on us and make sure that every bite was delightful    we even made sure to save room for dessert because if you have not yet tried it their deep fried ice cream and their brownie ice cream dessert were amazing     we will definitely be back for more again soon

Address: 217 Waverly Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2C3 Canada
Review: had a good time with family and friends food was great except for welldone steak it wasnt consistent one was delicious  juicy and another was burnt a bit my kid liked the cheese burger beef gravy  collard salad was amazing

Address: 217 Waverly Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2C3 Canada
Review: it was as a great place we discovered during our visit the service was great and the food even better highly recommended its a busy restaurant even during the middle of the week call or reserve before you go

Address: 217 Waverly Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2C3 Canada
Review:
you must bring your id over 19 
i registered already but waiting outside 20min there are busy  crowed peoples
but food is good  donot recommended where is a quiet place this one
noisy and waiting time

Address: 2053 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: amazing experience food is absolutely a must try  we had the half charcuterie board the trout the gnocchi and the sticky toffee cake the cocktails are amazing and so unique i would really recommend for any kind of occasions

Address: 2053 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: we had the pleasure of having cora as our server she was awesome and adorable the food and atmosphere was warm and lively a bit on the loud and festive side but very lively in the best ways

Address: 2053 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review:
incredible experience
we had expected a lot from edna as several of our friends had mentioned it for our trip to halifax without a doubt this place delivered we were seated along the windows at the front of the restaurant allowing us to watch the foot traffic on the lively street the restaurant is long and has a wonderful wood and brass arch anchoring the room and housing the seated bar
we started with tuna poke and fried oysters both were fantastic we shared the scallops and striped bass for mains both completely amazing dishes the scallops had squash of all kinds prepared in a several different ways bringing some savoury to the dish was cubed fried ham bits the bass was the special and came together nicely with bok choy creamed kale and baby red potatoes it was mouthwatering just incredible
the portion size was sensible and we had little room for dessert we managed to wrap our lips around a sticky toffee cake served with black sesame ice cream unreal
our server was extremely mindful and friendly with great suggestions from the menu and things to do around town our experience was made complete by the outstanding service
you must eat here if you are in halifax

Address: 2053 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: this was honestly the best dining experience ive had in years we came in for lunch and the food was incredible all around the service was friendly knowledgeable and accommodating to my friends gluten intolerance not to mention this restaurant is gorgeous beautiful atmosphere we were there during the day but i bet its really romantic at night cant wait to come back

Address: 2053 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: this meal is absolutely the one to beat when it comes to our down east travels  we dont think it can be topped we came in for an early dinner after a recommendation from a friend and we were not disappointed the staff were all lovely and extremely attentive service was fast and we had food at the table very quickly which is appreciated when travelling with a little one we enjoyed the steak tartare and crispy brussels sprouts to start  loved them both especially the vinegar in the brussels our little one enjoyed the trout which was juicy and topped with a lovely parsley salad the dish that stole the show and our hearts was the steak  wow it was served with fingerlings mushrooms and a pea pur√©e absolutely delicious we will be dreaming about this until our next visit thank you for a lovely and memorable evening

Address: 22 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1G9 Canada
Review: what a great brunch i have my daughter the choice between three of the top ten brunch places in the city she picked the canteen on portland and everyone was happy the bennys were amazing get the lobster its worth it the french toast was the best ever not too sweet just right everything was excellent the food was complimented by the service which was just right the atmosphere was ok not great but we did like the art we had a great experience and will be back

Address: 22 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1G9 Canada
Review: service was lovely options for gluten free server was lovely about requests to our order lunch special had lovely flavours and was truly well crafted lovely tea in a pot fabulous coffee  atmosphere was a bit noisy up until after 1 pm but regardless we will come back soon

Address: 22 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1G9 Canada
