Review: our visit here was lovely beautiful inside but a little cramped so we opted for the patio which was lovely and quiet the chicken parm was amazing the alfredo was good and the chicken was moist i recommend getting the garlic bread with it too i did get the blueberry sour and it was way too sour was basically just pure lemon juice but everything else was amazing

Address: 250 Baker Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 6L4 Canada
Review: ordered the maple curry chicken had 3 pieces of red pepper for the veggies with alittle red onionand absolutely no flavour so disappointed

Address: 67 King‚Äôs Wharf Place Suite 102 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 0C6 Canada
Review:
my beautiful wife picked this location and we were all glad she did the food was excellent i can personally recommend the lobster fettuccine

our server was quite attentive and courteous

the menu really is quite extensive so its probably a good thing to plan on returning

absolutely recommend dining here

check out all of my honest google reviews my photos have over 12000000 views

Address: 67 King‚Äôs Wharf Place Suite 102 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 0C6 Canada
Review: great experience went here for a late saturday lunch found a cozy spot inside next to the water in their indoor bar seating had few drinksthat ocean cocktail was excellent the fish and chips were nice with very less oil i tried their candied bacon burger which was a pleasant surprise we also had the maple curry chicken penne pasta which was decent all in all a good experience will probably come here on a cooler day again to try eating at their patio as the view seemed even better

Address: 67 King‚Äôs Wharf Place Suite 102 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 0C6 Canada
Review:
an excellent lunch had by all

from the start i knew i chose well excellent and attentive service from morgan went a long way to making our afternoon stop enjoyable

and then theres the menu so many things sound so good  took me a while to decide but choosing the pulled pork wontons for an appetizer was the right move yum everything we had was terrific well worth the ferry ride from halifax if i lived nearby i could easily see myself eating my way through the entire menu

highly recommended

Address: 67 King‚Äôs Wharf Place Suite 102 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 0C6 Canada
Review: the signature haddock dish was absolutely perfect would highly recommend the server was very attentive and gave great recommendations hence the haddock they accommodated and made a gluten free version of the haddock for my grandmother who is celiac lots of tasty cocktails and beer as well

Address: 67 King‚Äôs Wharf Place Suite 102 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 0C6 Canada
Review: chicken curry vindaloo was amazing im never disappointed with the food when i come here the atmosphere on the water is delightful the service was a little slow this time but other than that it was a great dining experience

Address: 50 Gary Martin Drive Bedford, NS B4B 1H3 Canada
Review: very cute spot good food fast service and the staff seemed friendly but the waitress was really busy and didnt check in often  we were here for lunch so there was no wait ive been here on thursday nights where there was a 45 minute wait but its worth it if you need to wait a bit

Address: 50 Gary Martin Drive Bedford, NS B4B 1H3 Canada
Review:
absolutely wonderful place to go there is a welcoming atmosphere fromthe moment you walk inmusic is not over bearing staff is friendly and knows the menu well great selection of local draught
i had bought the potatoe skins eggs benedict the signature millstone burger and a poutine as a side
i kid you not when i say by far the best meal ive had in a long time
the food was amazing and everything was fresh

i also had an awesome server daniel was amazing and was very friendly he executed his job amazingly and he made sure we had everything we needed all whithout being overbearing many servers can learn from him i could not be happier
i will be coming back and i will recomend all my friends to go

Address: 50 Gary Martin Drive Bedford, NS B4B 1H3 Canada
Review: great spot in bedford little busy around dinner time so call ahead and make a reso service was super quick and the food was fantastic

Address: 50 Gary Martin Drive Bedford, NS B4B 1H3 Canada
Review: we ordered the signature haddock and salad with scallops the signature haddock was out of this world delicious we added a side of vegetables to it but the dish alone was wonderful could have eaten two just for the flavour alone the scallops were perfectly cooked and great texture and flavour highly recommend

Address: 50 Gary Martin Drive Bedford, NS B4B 1H3 Canada
Review: nice restaurant around town thats open till 11pm milestone burger and milestone signature haddock was amazing would recommend

Address: 978 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review:
location is good lots of free parking layout is ok decoration require reinstate the tables and seats need to be redone some chairs are not comfortable colors are dark if you offer breakfast then you should make the atmosphere brighter also the there is a fridge in the middle of the dining area need to be relocated
service is within expectations the with waitress well known of the  menu and able to explain the ingredients
waiting time for the order my experience is within expectations as a matter of fact i received my order today very fast
cleanliness i noticed the place cleanliness is within expectations
test the food taste was delicious and rich i really felt full i have only one issue with the breakfast menu i dont eat bacon and most of the options has bacon
prices really the price was extremely acceptable 
conclusion i liked my experience and i see if you tried it you should have a good experience

Address: 978 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: great customer service from owners and employees made us feel welcomed and comfortable great  great burgers highly recommend if your a carnivore

Address: 978 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: have been here about five times over the last few years mostly when invited along with a friends family  theres a comfort in the simple mom  pop feel to this place which is nothing fancy but gives a content feeling  four booths by the window four or five other tables with total seating capacity for probably 3540 total  friendly service from staff and owners  reasonable prices  i enjoyed the breakfast wrap on my most recent visit lettuce tomato bacon egg and i think cheddar with side of home fries and hollandaise as a bonus  good size well prepared satisfying  the dishes id tried before  are too long ago to remember the details but i do recall that they were safe filling no complaints  there are greek options available that i am looking forward to trying in the future  kid friendly  accessible with lots of free parking in the plaza

Address: 978 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review:
the outlaw burger  one word  awesome
stopped here for a quick take out lunch  after a online recommendation i thought why not  ordered the outlaw burger on a fresh brioche bun with dry fried onions and bacon with a bbq sauce on it  came with fresh cut fries and coleslaw which was great the coleslaw was terrible however had to throw it out  the coleslaw recipe needs a re evaluation would definitely try this place again

Address: 978 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: ate here for the first time today and was so happy i came the service was so good and the food was amazing might be my new favourite and regular breakfast place

Address: 347 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3R 1V5 Canada
Review: the best chinese food around large portions fantastic taste budget friendly prices we recommend it to all our friends and family have been ordering here for over ten years and the service has always been great and consistent one of our favourite local spots to eat at

Address: 347 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3R 1V5 Canada
Review: waitress didnt listen to our order and served us whatever she wanted my daughter waited a hour for her poutine when asked where her poutine was the server said oh i forgot we have no fries

Address: 347 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3R 1V5 Canada
Review: this is another local chinese store that no longer opens at 1130 am and sells lunch specials they now open at 300 pm and have drastically increased their prices and the amount of food you get is less than before so i dont go there anymore and dont recommend it

Address: 347 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3R 1V5 Canada
Review:
great food and even better service always a pleasure with julie

my family and i got a few dishes authentic to chinese cuisine including chinese broccoli with beef fish maw soup steamed fish with ginger onion and soy sauce and always black bean fried rice noodles

Address: 347 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3R 1V5 Canada
Review: authentic chinese food at a decent price the szechuan spicy eggplant is our favorite dish  this place is like a second home to us

Address: 5136 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 1L4 Canada
Review:
great bar that reminds me of a local pub back in montreal its a little loud but then again its a pub with music and people are having fun

the food is decent although my burger was a little dry and the dublin pasties as well was dry drinks had been good so nothing to complain about that the live singer was nice to hear 

the portions are just enough for me and my partner enjoyed her meal as well prices are dencent

Address: 5136 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 1L4 Canada
Review:
excellent place to visit in halifax we went on a sunday afternoon and the atmosphere was very cool live music delicious food and very good customer service
we ordered a fish appetizer a seafood pasta and a fish and chips everything was delicious
the prices are pretty good for the area and they have different beers and local ciders to try

Address: 5136 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 1L4 Canada
Review: great food the mussels were delicious huge kids meals attentive friendly service great drinks caesars were on point

Address: 5136 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 1L4 Canada
Review:
great ambience with live music performancesplenty of seating space and reliable friendly service the vegetarian burger was unfortunately not as good as my friend had hoped although i can definitely recommend their footballs club sandwich dipping it in the hot sauce definitely made it notsocrispyto be expected but the taste was fantastic the cocktail was great albeit very slightly on the expensive side
can recommend if youre looking for a nicerelaxing time with good food

Address: 5136 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 1L4 Canada
Review: food tasted homemade and delicious beer was cold and the live music cant be beat also thursday night bottle of red wine big friggin red for 25   cost you 20 at nslc  excellent deal

Address: 6311 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 1A4 Canada
Review: highly recommended best soup ive had in a while their gomtang was so good that i forgot to take a picture of it had a clean taste everthing we ordered were good well definitely come there to eat again when were back in halifax

Address: 6311 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 1A4 Canada
Review: i have heard such great things about busan korean bbq on quinpool     we didnt get bbq this time but went with some lunch specials and a few addons to try    service was quick pleasant and efficient  the price was very reasonable   the food was the show stopper   the spicy pork bone ramen had great flavour with bouncy firm noodles   just the right amount of spice  the tteokbokki was sweet and spicy   the sauce was a used for dipping gyoza and kimchi pancake   the pancake is a must try if you go   absolutely delicious    todays lunch made 3 new regular customers

Address: 6311 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 1A4 Canada
Review: korean bbq is hard to measure as the range of foods stretches so far price wise the combos were reasonable maybe a little more than i would expect but the individual dishes were on the cheaper side the service was quick and kind and the grills on the tables managed the smoke well so it felt very comfortable the side dishes served with the combos felt on the smaller side and i wish there had been more option for vegetables to grill overall would recommend but expect a to leave stuffed

Address: 6311 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 1A4 Canada
Review:
weve been here twice and had great food both times here we had the bulgogi beef lunch and fried chicken the beef doesnt skimp on flavour and is loaded with vegetables served on rice the boneless fried chicken bites were tossed in a sweet chili sauce and served with tteokbokki they come with a variety of side dishes like kimchi and potato which you can refill for free

staff were very professional and friendly very affordable toowe had lunch for two  a pear juice drink for under 25 pay for cash for a discount

Address: 6311 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 1A4 Canada
Review: if you think of korean food then you have to start at busan always smiling staff and quick service lot of options to choose from including a gluten free options the food is packed with flavors and served with many side dishes reasonably priced food in great quantity

Address: 1990 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1P2 Canada
Review: we went in after making a reservation on st patricks day given it was a busierthanusual day the service was a bit slowunderstandable the portion sizes were fine with the taste being above average the fried chicken burger was fine although i wish it had one piece of fried chicken instead of few tiny ones as it would be easier to handle the pasta and the black bean burger were a success and can be recommended for vegetarian folks weirdly their fries were soft and not crunchy the taste was fine though so not an issue highly recommend their black forest cake the taste of beep brulee wasnt something one of our friends expected but the staff was generous enough to replace her order for no extra charge this was almost at their closing timeappreciate this for sure their service is good and ill be sure to visit again someday to try rest of their menu

Address: 1990 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1P2 Canada
Review: really good food good and friendly service update banana split black forest cake nachos

Address: 1990 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1P2 Canada
Review: when we booked our vacation here we were very excited to see that they had some dairyfree options as my wife has a dairy allergy unfortunately between the booking and our trip it looks like the vast majority of them were removed from the menu usually we can get by asking them not to use cheese or butter but apparently both their hamburger buns and their multigrain toast contain milk for some reason we also informed the server of her allergy ahead of time and were still served butter on toast  had my wife not double checked before eating she would have been seriously ill will eat elsewhere for the rest of our trip as they clearly do not take allergens seriously here

Address: 1990 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1P2 Canada
Review: this isnt your ordinary hotel restaurant its actually fire the fish and chips were perfection reasonably priced and a huge portion staff were super friendly and sweet would definitely come here to enjoy some seafood while staying in halifax without the tourist tax like at the waterfront

Address: 1990 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1P2 Canada
Review: the restaurant itself is very nice the service was top notch and the food while the menu wasnt as big as i remembered they had great food fish and chips was amazing also as always good local beer

Address: 9 Countryview Dr Dartmouth, NS B3B 0G4 Canada
Review: we chose moxies because of the location in dartmouth crossing close to where we were shopping past experience great parking the restaurant has a classy dark vibe with modern features the booth was comfortable for plus size people and we had lots of privacy the restaurant was loud though not full just lots of dishes clanging and dishes dropped on one occasion our server was brand new she did a great job polite friendly knew the menu well checked in with us frequently but not too much and helped me look for missing keys the water was good for halifax im not sure if its filtered our meals were quite good but definitely higher in price for quantity the food presentation was very nice taste was delicious and the meals sat just right with us no stuffed bellies i ordered the cashew chicken lettuce wraps from the appetizer menu and they were a meal on there own my daughter ordered the mango chicken from the main dinner menu and found it small for the price the summer menu offers lots of flavors and we were glad we ordered the cashew dip as an appetizer or we would have still felt hungry overall a very positive experience and i will go again

Address: 9 Countryview Dr Dartmouth, NS B3B 0G4 Canada
Review: movies never disappoints our waitress himaly could not have been better when 2 items were not available she made several suggestions on other items or how substitutions could be made with the items that were sold out her drink recommendation was bang on our table was comfortable atmosphere was good i will definitely dine at moxies again

Address: 9 Countryview Dr Dartmouth, NS B3B 0G4 Canada
Review: the food portions are generous and the taste is very good they have very good customer service i find the prices a bit high in some dishes

Address: 9 Countryview Dr Dartmouth, NS B3B 0G4 Canada
Review: pleased  first time visit  was craving nachos with chicken it was tasty and do much that i couldnt eat half  no disappointment whatsoever i will be returning

Address: 9 Countryview Dr Dartmouth, NS B3B 0G4 Canada
Review: great venue service was amazing and  food was good would visit again

Address: 50 Tacoma Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 3E6 Canada
Review: kind and helpful staff food was wonderful great arabic music and videos had tabbouleh grape leaves souvlaki and station 1 platter baclava too greatly enjoyed the meal and overall experience

Address: 50 Tacoma Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 3E6 Canada
Review:
i dont give bad reviews often but im not thrilled about my first time getting take out here

when i arrived the restaurant was pretty empty except for one customer

i ordered a chicken souvlaki plate which on the website says that its supposed to be 1199tax for 1 skewer they charged me 1449tax the chicken skewers were barely edible since they had been mostly charred see photo and were extremely dry the fatoush salad was lackluster and the pickled turnips were also dry af my friend remarked that the pita bread looked like it had been picked up from the streets of aqraba hummus was also pretty bland in flavour  it needed more garlic for sure

staff member serving me seemed quite unhappy to be working that day as well not sure if that is a oneoff

either way despite the high ratings this place has on google maps im disappointed to say i would not recommend this establishment

Address: 50 Tacoma Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 3E6 Canada
Review: this is my new favourite shawarma place the station 1 shawarma syrian shawarma is absolutely delicious and the plates here are big i never leave hungry thats for sure staff is super friendly and kind enough to teach me how to say muhammara which is delicious btw my favourite plate is the falafel plate with lentil rice fattoush salad and muhammara their falafel is so good its really hard to go anywhere else that i still think have good falafel and i dont mind driving a little further down the road to enjoy the excellent food at station 1

Address: 50 Tacoma Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 3E6 Canada
Review: watched the staff make fresh falafel something you dont find everywhere really fresh and delicious

Address: 50 Tacoma Drive Dartmouth, NS B2W 3E6 Canada
Review:
i dont know how anyone can give the food and service at station 1 less then 5 stars i really enjoy lebanese cuisine and have made a point to try as many places in hrm as i could back when i was on the road everyday for work that being said i have had recommendations from my middle eastern colleagues on other places in hrm to try which i have and they were good as well but cant hold a flame to station 1 we live in lower sackville and when ever we get the urge for good shawarma we always end up at station 1 and have never been disappointed in fact we used to go there before they moved to tacoma and started to get known their previous location did not get as much traffic because they were tucked at the end of a small strip mall on the corner of forest hills parkway and main street now with their improved location people are starting to notice and try them so they can get busy at times but it is worth the wait if you arrive and there is a line up

the portions are always more than fair for the price you pay comparing to other competitors the service has always been great their hummus is made from scratch and not that prepackaged grocery grade wanna be hummus the owners care about their customers and you will often find them behind the counter working to ensure a good consistent quality of food is produced they make their food with love and it shows in the flavour

if you have not tried station 1 yet you need to take a trip to tacoma plaza in dartmouth and so yourself a favour you will thank me later i have said this before to everyone i know who enjoys lebanese food and i will continue to say it that this is the best you will find in halifax hands down keep up the great work guys as always i will be back 

i confess as many times as i have eaten there i have not even thought about taking pictures all i think about is eating and enjoying their food but i will update the next time we go

update so i have been back a few more times since and still forgot to get pictures but this time my daughter reminded me 

still 5 stars as expected i would give them a higher rating if i could we also have their grape leaves and cheese rolls a try in addition to our usual chicken shawarma and they were both amazing as expected

Restaurant_name: The Barrington Steakhouse and Oyster Bar
Address: 1662 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 2A2 Canada
Review:
it took me a while to get around to this but the experience was so memorable that i couldnt let it pass we visited halifax about a month ago  may 2023 in spite of our terrible dining experience ive heard others defend the place even one of our 3person dinner party that evening a local resident was surprised and said its usually quite good i guess we got them on the wrong night then the weeknight bcrew the service  food were equally abysmal the hostess was unfriendly the waiter was a wise guy who thought he was funny i wish he had been and possibly 12 of the dishes we had between the 3 of us rose to the level of average not the steaks thats just not acceptable at their price point we were 3 and spent about 500600 i dont quite recall exactly only the wine was good

now i could drone on about the details far more than youd care to read but a picture is worth 1000 words i will take a moment though to advise you against ordering the wedge salad unless you think a wedge salad is bibb lettuce a boiled egg and some kind of dressing i couldnt identify if you do then definitely order the wedge salad the wise guy waiter was certain it was correct it was at that moment i realized things were not going to get better and i should enjoy the wine how this steakhouse classic could go so off the rails at a posh place like barringtons i can only guess in hindsight i should have taken a picture but wait i did promise you a picture check out whatever it was that arrived when we ordered another steakhouse classic creme brulee the over blackened top was hiding a blue surprise i have no idea what it was but it was disgusting i think what bothered me the most was that they didnt think there was anything wrong they were completely unaware of their incompetence the last time i had an experience even close to this bad was in the height of covid when you were lucky to even find a place open

Restaurant_name: The Barrington Steakhouse and Oyster Bar
Address: 1662 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 2A2 Canada
Review:
the restaurant is beautifully decorated and had a great upscale vibe that sets the tone for a great dining experience the oysters were fresh and served with a variety of sauces that perfectly complemented the oysters also the dessert is a yes

i found the service was lacking a bit we were waiting for some time to get a server stopping by to set up the table with utensils and to take the order

overall the quality of the food and the beautiful atmosphere makes this restaurant a must try

Restaurant_name: The Barrington Steakhouse and Oyster Bar
Address: 1662 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 2A2 Canada
Review: delicious steak the atmosphere is great for a nice date or celebration very quiet and elegant we got the ribeye and tenderloin steak with the double stuffed potatoes as a side

Restaurant_name: The Barrington Steakhouse and Oyster Bar
Address: 1662 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 2A2 Canada
Review: a one of a kind experience service is spectacular and the food is divine

Restaurant_name: The Barrington Steakhouse and Oyster Bar
Address: 1662 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 2A2 Canada
Review: wonderful canada day celebrations with beloved family food and surrounging were excellent   menu was quite extensive superb quality

Address: 5883 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3H 4S4 Canada
Review: it was my first time very good food and really good service nice to eat alone or with friends

Address: 5883 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3H 4S4 Canada
Review: lovely experience from service to food i was a bit skeptical as to being rushed due to the hours of operation but i needed not to worry every item ordered was superb compliments to the chef i perhaps missed my servers name but she was great my only reason for taking a star was due to the noise level because of how small the space is within the restaurant

Address: 5883 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3H 4S4 Canada
Review: everything was delicious we really struggled with what to order because it all seemed great so our waitress gave recommendations and we trusted herand are so glad we did aside from the tasty food everyone there was so kind and its super cute inside highly recommend

Address: 5883 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3H 4S4 Canada
Review: great food and ever better service we also love the gelato  its on the pricier side but we felt its worth it

Address: 5883 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3H 4S4 Canada
Review: had an amazing meal here the staff was friendly and attentive started off with the mussels and had the featured fish of the day  seared halibut and scallop on a shrimp risotto the fish was perfectly cooked the skin was crispy but the meat was still nice and juicy finished off with the chocolate espresso torte everything was delicious but the fish definitely was my favourite one of the best resturants ive tried in halifax would definitely come again

Address: 1358 Birmingham Street Halifax, NS B3J 2J2 Canada
Review:
we went to halifax 3 weeks ago and were craving korean food after having eaten seafood the first two days we chose this place since it had good reviews but quite frankly it was not well deserved based off the experience we had
service was lacking the lady at the cash didnt event greet us food was also served in a take out container even if youre dining in water is also self serve
they didnt have the item i wanted so we only ended up ordering the bulgogi rice bowl the dumplings were good rice was a bit hard but since the dish was so oily it soften it up the onion to beef ratio was about 8020 it also didnt really taste like a regular bulgogi dish and ive been to many korean restaurants def was a bit disappointed

Address: 1358 Birmingham Street Halifax, NS B3J 2J2 Canada
Review: one of the best korean fried chicken around town we a family of 3 order the allflavours chicken box and it lasts us for 2 meals it doesnt come with rice but you can always make your own rice or order some of theirs great flavours our favourite flavours are the korean chilli and honey garlic ones but the box comes with 2 other options as well  the original and an onionvinegary option

Address: 1358 Birmingham Street Halifax, NS B3J 2J2 Canada
Review: the food is exceptional  fast service friendly staff  you have to try it we will be ordering again and again

Address: 1358 Birmingham Street Halifax, NS B3J 2J2 Canada
Review: pretty delicious and very fast they seem to be a popular place and actually had to turn away customers while i was there because the kitchen was so busy if youre looking for a friendly place to get takeout food this is a great clean and yummy spot

Address: 1358 Birmingham Street Halifax, NS B3J 2J2 Canada
Review: ordered the ultimate box so much good chicken fresh and hot though i wish the salad and pickles were bigger as its kind of a meal for 4 and the sides are kind of small along side it all each flavor is so good its kind of hard to choose which is best fantastic chicken wish they were closer to home

Address: 14 Highfield Park Dr Dartmouth, NS B3A 4S8 Canada
Review: we just had dinner as a family at parkside and gosh what a great time we had the food was delicious  everything from the tater tots to the pulled pork and strawberry lemonade the highlight for me was the smoked wings with jack daniels sauce we had as an appetizer best wings ive eaten hands down my husband loved his ribs and the portions were huge  we have enough left for lunch tomorrow thank you as well to our waitress  unfortunately i did not catch her name  for being so kind funny and attentive if we come back to halifax well eat there again for sure

Address: 14 Highfield Park Dr Dartmouth, NS B3A 4S8 Canada
Review:
today march 24 2023 we tried the dutton burger as part of burger bash it was a very good burger topped with brisket and hickory sticks that rounded this off really well  another great meal

how can i say this the food was so good and attractive that we were halfway before i thought of taking a picture we love mic mac bar and grill but this restaurant gives that one good run for its money it was amazing that people on a friday night were not lined up here not only was the food great the service was also great very friendly and helpful i think this restaurant deserves much more attention certainly coming back

Address: 14 Highfield Park Dr Dartmouth, NS B3A 4S8 Canada
Review: a coworker wanted me to go  i had never been there before and went with low expectations  i am happy to admit that i was wrong  i ordered the soup  sandwich rubin sandwich with some type of beef soup  both were absolutely delicious  one of the best rubins i have ever had  the soup was a hot  sour flavour and had big hunks of beef  i really enjoyed both  the service was fast and the price reasonable  i highly recommend this place for lunch

Address: 14 Highfield Park Dr Dartmouth, NS B3A 4S8 Canada
Review: foods are tasty nice place great service and price is right been here many times would recommend to anyone

Address: 14 Highfield Park Dr Dartmouth, NS B3A 4S8 Canada
Review: very good atmosphere and served tasty food and beer

Address: 200 Government Wharf Rd Building 6 Halifax, NS B3G 1M7 Canada
Review: lovely place to grab a bite of great and hearty comfort food with some excellent scenery to go around staff were excellent provided prompt and friendly service food was served hot and well portioned if youre in eastern passage and need some solid fuel it is an easy recommendation

Address: 200 Government Wharf Rd Building 6 Halifax, NS B3G 1M7 Canada
Review:
we really enjoyed the fun and comfortable atmosphere after a walk along pristine snowy shoreline great plaxe to stop and fill your belly the kiddos had a wonderful time playing a game while they waited to occupy young minds there were rubber ducks placed everywhere on a bit of a treasure hunt for the kids the seemed to really enjoy the sleuthing
server was amazing food was great will be back

Address: 200 Government Wharf Rd Building 6 Halifax, NS B3G 1M7 Canada
Review:
i found this to be a laid back casual place to eat with a nice atmosphere and fun decor we stopped in after hearing a friend talk about it we stopped in for lunch a bit after they opened so there was no wait there was a sign outside that warns you of a wait during busy times not sure why people complain about that not too sure what they expect if a restaurant is busy
the food was good i had the mediterranean salad with shrimp and found it to be a nice size and enjoyed it two others tried their different macaroni they said it was okay but nothing special my husband had the chowder and poutine which he was happy with i tried a bite of the chowder and it was really good almost wished i had a bowl myself waitress was nice and attentive overall it was a nice lunch

Address: 200 Government Wharf Rd Building 6 Halifax, NS B3G 1M7 Canada
Review: staying in the eastern passage and stopped in for a casual dinner they had great decor and our server did his best but we were disappointed in the food before we sat down we were warned of a 45 minute wait for food appreciated the heads up we wanted mussels but they were out so we ordered bacon wrapped scallops  they were 18 and seriously overcooked and super disappointing my husband ordered the lobster roll which was soo tiny and i got the lobster mac and cheese not sure what kind of meat they had in there but it was not lobster it was our first dinner in the city and i wish we had chosen elsewhere

Address: 200 Government Wharf Rd Building 6 Halifax, NS B3G 1M7 Canada
Review: the food was delicious we had a lovely evening on the patio and our server was very friendly the restaurant was pretty busy but the food still came out quickly well definitely be back

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: i went 902 on the second day after opening because they had a special 50 off shawarma and fried chicken i went for the shawarma but i arrived late and the only available item on their menu was fried chicken they told us upon arrival that itll take 45 minutes and we decided to wait it took longer than that but they apologized and it was only the second day so understandable the chicken came with garlic sauce and fries it was fresh and hot but not juicy i never like fried chicken so my review could be biased i didnt enjoy the atmosphere so ill probably be doing takeout in the future i like the downtown 902s atmosphere better

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review:
i visited 902 restaurant earlier today and unfortunately had an extremely disappointing experience my party and i ordered meals worth around 250 and we were left with a bad taste in our mouths both figuratively and literally

first of all the ambiance was terrible it was unpleasant to look at we didnt feel comfortable or relaxed in the environment which is a key part of any dining experience there was no heating in peak winters and we were provided with a small portable heater which didnt help

the quality of the food was equally terrible it was apparent that some of the dishes were frozen and then reheated leading to a loss of flavor and texture the meat especially the beef was extremely dry and shrunk the outside was burnt while the inside was hard and rubbery the mandi rice dish was also a major disappointment not tasting or looking like real mandi rice

there were a few positives however the garlic and spicy sauce were decent but not enough to save the meal the broasted chicken looked healthy and crispy but it was unfortunately the only dish that met any standards the french fries chicken and fish all seemed to have been cooked in the same oil resulting in a strong fishy smell this was not good for members of our group who dont like the smell of fish as it interfered with the enjoyment of their meal

overall i regret visiting this restaurant and would not go there again i will be attaching photos of the dishes we received and i will leave it up to the readers to judge the quality for themselves

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: we had organized our ladies event at 902 restaurant in bedford location recently and i have to say i was impressed with all the arrangements and service provided the food was deliciously amazing and everything was so smooth in organizing such a big event of around 50 ladies with no hiccups at all it was only possible because of the restaurant manager naela al kurdi and jason they are true professionals and know how to satisfy the customer needs we would like to organize more events in the future because of these two amazing people everyone had a wonderful time thank you naela and jason truly appreciate your superb management

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review:
food was delicious but i felt the rice needs to be cooked more more than enough portions of food in my order which was roasted lamb shank and nice presentation service was really good
it is in the bedford highway there are different mediterranean restaurants around and this one is a worth try

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review:
overall great food

we ordered a tandoori wrap as well as lentil soup and another main everything was well cooked and portions were pretty generous the tandoori wrap was really the star though the meat was absolutely perfectly cooked well spiced with a bit of crispiness from the grilling our second main was delicious as well the hummus was the perfect texture and the salad was flavorful

service was good

the decor is nice and the seating is pretty unique with regular tables as well as lounge style areas

parking was kind of annoying as there isnt much

the only main downside is there was a bit of a strong smell of smoke at least in the lounge area where we were sitting

Address: 535 Portland Street Unit 100 Dartmouth, NS L6H 6Z9 Canada
Review: i cant get over how quick the service was we misread the menu thinking we could order regular lunch on the weekend and my daughter was nervous to try something new she tasted my food and loved it the waitress was super quick to add to our order and bring out some food her really over the top experience the santa fe benedic was so delicious the crepes looked amazing

Address: 535 Portland Street Unit 100 Dartmouth, NS L6H 6Z9 Canada
Review: my partner and i love pur  simple the food is great as is the service weve been to both the halifax and dartmouth locations and this location is definitely at the top were weekend regulars and that will likely remain my favorite is the gourmet pictured with this post

Address: 535 Portland Street Unit 100 Dartmouth, NS L6H 6Z9 Canada
Review: husband and i ate here on the monday right after the new years weekend arrived around 915am and expected a wait with school being out and most people being offon vacation but were seated right away definitely just beat the rush i had the chocolate macchiato to drink and my husband a white cranberry juice both were good i really enjoyed the macchiato  husband had the don chorizo eggs benedict chorizo was really good and so were the potatoes piping hot flavored well and crispy to the bite he also opted for the spicy hollandaise sauce i had the french toast crisp it was really good reading the menu im always worried about the mint but its really only a sprig that is easily removed topped with a healthy dollop of whipped cream and lots of fresh raspberries and blueberries hope to be back again soon with our toddler

Address: 535 Portland Street Unit 100 Dartmouth, NS L6H 6Z9 Canada
Review: i use to visit here often but the quality of the food has gone downhill my eggs benedict were over cooked and the portions are relatively small the kids meals are expensive for what you get and the quality is meh the pancakes were soggy undercooked and just full of food colouring id like to see fresh fruit or whipped cream added to this dish for kids and maybe a smaller portion

Address: 535 Portland Street Unit 100 Dartmouth, NS L6H 6Z9 Canada
Review: i eat here regularly and will continue to be a regular the food is great and so are the serving sizes my partner and i always request ashley as she is simply the best server the conversation we have with her and the service she provides is what makes us come back we live in the city and drive over to the dartmouth location just to see her as without her our experience is simply not the same

Restaurant_name: The Press Gang Restaurant & Oyster Bar
Address: 5218 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 0B1 Canada
Review:
my wife and i decided to pop in here for dinner a bit late 1030 on a friday our first server was amazing she had to leave for some type of appointment quite late which was disappointing

we started with calamari and beef bacon and blue both appetizers were cooked and seasoned to perfection

for mains we had the seafood risotto and the halibut both meals were cooked beautifully but unfortunately lacked almost any seasoning our guess is that a more junior cook had taken over the cooking and was tentative about using salt and pepper we asked and they brought us two grinders which helped tremendously

we would have liked to enjoy a dessert and some he finish of our meal but our new server came with the billwithout an offer of even a coffee when we asked about dessert she said i can see if i can find a cook to come back and do something for you

we passed on the offer disappointing way to end a wonderful time so the tale of two servers one great and one that didnt really care

we are still giving the place a 4star review but its because of our first server and the quality of the food even with the lack of any seasoning on the mains

Restaurant_name: The Press Gang Restaurant & Oyster Bar
Address: 5218 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 0B1 Canada
Review:
the press gang has been one of our favourite restaurants for almost 2 decades  its always a go to choice for a special occasion andor to stop by for a cocktail  some oysters
we were recently there for my birthday and they did not disappoint  service  food were amazing

we always tend to choose the drill rather than ordering selections from the menu this is where the chef designs a 4course dining experience for two  no two drills are ever the same  its a great choice if you want to be surprised and try something new  we recommend doing the wine parings as well
each course is delivered with an excellent explanation from the server or executive chef detailing what you will experience

this dining experience was our best one yet  below are pictures of our dining experience from february 24

Restaurant_name: The Press Gang Restaurant & Oyster Bar
Address: 5218 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 0B1 Canada
Review: ordered the drill it was great i love not knowing what im in for i also love four course meals everything was amazing if i am being hyper chef critical each plate seemed like it was trying very hard to be amazing it came off as a bit busy maybe more than a bit when you have all the amazing ingredients you can use them all but do you need to there were no less than seven amazing flavors in the desert  the beef tenderloin wdemiglace was truly great 487

Restaurant_name: The Press Gang Restaurant & Oyster Bar
Address: 5218 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 0B1 Canada
Review:
visited here for the fresh oysters which were really good we stayed for some cocktails which were also excellent although a little pricey
our server was very knowledgeable explaining where the oysters were from and then explaining every item on our charcuterie board
the service was fantastic and i would definitely go back when in halifax

Restaurant_name: The Press Gang Restaurant & Oyster Bar
Address: 5218 Prince Street Halifax, NS B3J 0B1 Canada
Review:
absolutely loved everything about this place the location was in mid downtown core so it was easy to find they had live music which was a great touch to my dinner the fresh oysters was to die for i would fly all the way back from toronto just to try these oysters again

would definitely recommend and would definitely go back

Address: 1589 Dresden Row Halifax, NS B3J 2K4 Canada
Review: this restaurant doesnt gave importance for decorations but the food their food was amazing and delicious we ordered braised pork shoulder it was so good and melted in my mouth braised beef brisket was also tender both dishes were not easily and need longer time to cook anyhow it is worth for waiting we definitely will be back soon for exploring more menu

Address: 1589 Dresden Row Halifax, NS B3J 2K4 Canada
Review: the food was authentic and flavourful but a bit oily for my liking despite that we visited twice during our trip to halifax and enjoyed the dishes that we tried there were far more meat focused dishes than mixed or vegetarian options but it wasnt too difficult to customize or make requests service was very friendly as well

Address: 1589 Dresden Row Halifax, NS B3J 2K4 Canada
Review: highly recommend everything i ordered was tasty crunchy chicken curried lamb shredded pork with bean curd noodles with bean paste and cucumber cucumber salad all very much on point great for a group vegetarian options available

Address: 1589 Dresden Row Halifax, NS B3J 2K4 Canada
Review: authentic north eastern chinese food a big menu with various dish options and even daily lunch specials available we have been here many times and they are very consistent with the taste of their dish we got the zesty eggplant which is cooked in a lot of oil but is so worth it with plain white rice we also ordered the squid tentacle stir fry which also comes in fried fish version and the coating they have on the squid tentacles is very unique and is so addicting to eat along with the vegetables highly recommended if you want to try some north eastern chinese food that is made by chinese chefs who are familiar with the cuisine

Address: 1589 Dresden Row Halifax, NS B3J 2K4 Canada
Review: the mapu tofu was one of the best i ever had the yeung chow fried rice and the sizzling beef steak were also delicious too bad i was not staying for long in halifax i could have ordered all their menu

Address: 15 Spectacle Lake Drive Dartmouth, NS B3B 1X7 Canada
Review: had this place twice during our stay really good food had little bit of everything there the wings were so delicious the buffalo chicken sandwich was good as well the poutine was average but also good had there garlic fingers the garlic fingers were good but the wings are to die for one of the best place for wings i when too great size great sauce  they also put on a great breakfast in the morning for guests lots to choose from really enjoyed eating here everyone was nice

Address: 15 Spectacle Lake Drive Dartmouth, NS B3B 1X7 Canada
Review:
i have eaten at trendz three times now our middle visit was not the best but there was a sports event on and the restaurant was crazy so i am not adding that to my star review
tonight we had a wonderfully friendly waitress who was bubbly and excellent a friend and i had the pulled pork boa it was amazing soft and juicy highly recommend trying them next time you are at trendz

Address: 15 Spectacle Lake Drive Dartmouth, NS B3B 1X7 Canada
Review: service was very attentive and friendly started with the mussels which were lightly seasoned and sitting in a beerbased broth with nice pieces of focaccia fish tacos were quite nice the buffalo chicken sandwich had a lot going on there was bacon lettuce and cherry tomato on it as well the vinegar was a little strong in places but was good overall

Address: 15 Spectacle Lake Drive Dartmouth, NS B3B 1X7 Canada
Review: im reviewing this based on a takeaway order we travel with a dog so dont have the opportunity to dine in anyplace  if you are looking at takeaway back to your hotel id suggest finding another restaurant we had two orders of the mac n cheese and a caesar salad each mac n cheese was maybe a cup and a half of elbow macaroni in a rather ordinary cheese sauce the caesar salad was a bunch of kale with a side of dressing and some kind of fried parmesan chip on top no croutons no shredded parmesan how they can call it a caesar salad is beyond me this three dishes totalled almost 50 even with a 15 discount and were completely not worth it we were very disappointed with what we got for that kind of money very little value or enjoyment at all now if you dine in that might be a completely different story i cannot vouch for that but for takeaway look elsewhere

Address: 15 Spectacle Lake Drive Dartmouth, NS B3B 1X7 Canada
Review: went to the trendz cafe a few time during our stay at the best western super calm restaurant friendly waitress menu with a lot of different options   loved the little pulled pork bao buns

Address: 1579 Grafton Street Halifax, NS B3J 2C3 Canada
Review:
stopped in with work friends while visiting halifax
great spot to relax eat some good food and try some drinks
great atmosphere  music is not too loud easy to carry on a conversation  staff was very friendly and helpful when selecting meal options
we have some dip mac and cheese pizza and grill cheese  all were great

Address: 1579 Grafton Street Halifax, NS B3J 2C3 Canada
Review: forgot to take all my food pictures here the burgers were great there were many options when it came to mac and cheeses i got a mac and cheese with pulled pork on top and the selection of beers was good learned that sours are very popular in halifax and i am also a big fan

Address: 1579 Grafton Street Halifax, NS B3J 2C3 Canada
Review: stopped by the stubborn goat after a long day of driving and doing vacation things  conveniently located next door to where we were staying  while it was extremely busy they found us a nice ground level table by the door  good temps on a warm july evening and atmosphere  as busy as they were the wait staff was great at taking time to explain items on their menu and helping with beer choices  food was great and prices reasonable  recommended

Address: 1579 Grafton Street Halifax, NS B3J 2C3 Canada
Review: i love the atmosphere in this spot the food is very good the staff are all very friendly it gets very busy in there so you may wait a bit for your food and drinks but its worth it if you like a good cesar try their flight  delicious

Address: 1579 Grafton Street Halifax, NS B3J 2C3 Canada
Review: this place is awesome we were out on a girls weekend and hit up many restaurants and pubs but when we got to the stubborn goat for brunch we were so happy great food and service but the best part was their flight of caesars yummy very unique and very tasty

Address: 250 St Margarets Bay Road Halifax, NS B3N 1J4 Canada
Review: lakeside is attached to where we are staying the complimentary breakfast rotates it menu daily so you always have fresh options in the morning plus it was a gorgeous lakeside view while you are eating we had dinner there and the server joe was super nice we sat outside on the patio in the evening when it was a little cooler they had a fireplace going and he noticed i seemed cold and brought a blanket out for me really good food as well

Address: 250 St Margarets Bay Road Halifax, NS B3N 1J4 Canada
Review: stayed at the hotel   our server was joe  he was so friendly and nice  super excellent service  he recommended the lemon dream dessert and it did not disappoint  the food was fabulous the restaurant atmosphere was so relaxing and everyone was so polite  i would highly recommend this place to anyone

Address: 250 St Margarets Bay Road Halifax, NS B3N 1J4 Canada
Review: hostess wouldnt seat us outside or near a window because reservations which never came then sat a couple without reservations in the spot she wouldnt seat us along with the undercooked chicken i got the first time i went here screw this place if you are staying at the hotel by all means its great but as a local i dont have to travel very far to do better food was actually good credit where it is due

Address: 250 St Margarets Bay Road Halifax, NS B3N 1J4 Canada
Review: amazing drinks at the bar brandon was a great bartender with awesome drink recommendations and awesomely prompt service definitely worth trying brandons whiskey sour best version my boyfriend has ever had come here 1010

Address: 250 St Margarets Bay Road Halifax, NS B3N 1J4 Canada
Review: had a great overall experience here the staff were great our waiter was very helpful  nice our food came out to us really fast  it was delicious i had the maple curry chicken penne  it was awesome definitely recommend giving that a try thanks for the great experience

Address: 2157 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: very welcoming atmosphere they asked us to sit well they prepared the sandwiches and gave us water while we waited even though we were getting the food to go definitely recommend

Address: 2157 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: went here in september and grabbed a late lunch the afternoon the queen passed away didnt know what to expect since we were the only ones there  but the chef whipped up a spectacular dish of duck leg confit green beans potatoes and some justforaged yellowfoot chanterelle mushrooms got some helpful tips on mushroom hunting in nova scotia that i put to good use a few days later on a camping trip cant recommend highly enough

Address: 2157 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: this is the place i get my meats and cheeses from so fresh so good staff if knowledgeable and they always have an amazing selection

Address: 2157 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: we love this place my wife will frequently call in and they put together the most incredible assortment of charcuterie every time there is always something different and exciting its a fantastic food experience

Address: 2157 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B3 Canada
Review: beautiful selection of cheeses  cured meats knowledgeable friendly staff i love picking out special treats here to share with my family  friends everything is delicious

Address: 151 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: decided to order some late night pizza as we were staying in the hotel that is in the same parking and it was a 1minute walking distance the pizza was delicious i would definitely order it again and do want to go dine in as the food looks amazing the only thing that i did not like was that i got charged 3 more for a topping onions and there was none on my pizza and i love onions on pizza the girl working was super friendly and we had a great laugh as there was a big group of girls staying at the hotel and she thought that she gave away their pizza to another group  but when she looked there was another one ready the pizza was slightly pricey than what i am used to pay but this would not stop me from ordering again

Address: 151 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: this spot is a little on the pricey side but once you taste the food its totally worth it the service is always fantastic and quick

Address: 151 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: ive eaten here 3 times and the first time it was great second time my pasta was really dry and i took it as leftovers basically just to be polite this time my wife wanted to give it another try so we ordered take out and well im typing this across from 80  of some of the most inedible food i have ever suffered not sure what the take away of my review is exactly  dont order take out from them this place is ok sometimes you decide

Address: 151 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review:
lovely place to go food was awesome i got the chicken alfredo and it was homemade sauce and it was so good
the food came within 30 minutes i asked for a straw and the waiter forgot thats okay though we all forget things sometimes but i did find they looked a little sad there overall i had a good time and the food was worth it

Address: 151 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review:
location is good easy to find lots of free parking in commercial and shopping industry you can shop and take a nice bite there
decorations and layout i found the place is cozy and romantic lots of photos and the ceiling really cool
cleanliness is plausible
service the service is excellent they treated us with a smile and respect
waiting time for the food was within expectations
food we had different plate all was as follows
the plates were staffed well
rich
and delicious 
prices i can say nothing it might be  for a dollar but if i want tocompare the prices with the value of food and the service then i can say it is within expectations
conclusion myself and my family liked our experience and we will go back sometime soon

Address: 644 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2W 6C4 Canada
Review:
we had never heard of this all you can eat restaraunt before
we happened to be in the area and googled japanese cuisine we were not disappointed moderate amount of parking spaces for a strip mall corner side store front with plenty of seating inside 
can easily accomidate large groups or appropriate for small intimate meals
the host sat us at a window booth around 230 lunch price and menu ended 215 so for over 30 a person supper menu was offered a bite pricy for all you can eat but justifiable price if you dont tip want quick service and considering covid recoup for businesstourist slump but because of price it wouldnt be a regular spot for us
how to order from our table a tablet was handed to us to select the images to send our own order digitally to the kitchen items were separated into categories and when clicked upon the photo you can see a brief description of some of the items click quantities then send the order to the kitchen as many times as you like the establishment was medium well maintained no obveous structual wear a tear with wood chop sticks and serving dishes in good shape bathrooms were suitable but could use some touch up old finger prints on the tablet standard canadian accomidated sushi and thai food quick and friendly service with servers brining one or a few items to all tables throughout your meal
requests you click allergies first on the tablet nice

Address: 644 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2W 6C4 Canada
Review:
let me just say that this restaurant went above and beyond there was always waitresses on the floor for any service question the sushi and sauces were spectacular and the ordering interface was straightforward and extensive

the have the rule any wasted food may incur a extra charge and i am ashamed to say i was defeated by this restaurant and could not finish one order of sushi however they allowed us to take our left overs home as we didnt order massive amount of food

great restaurant and will be back

Address: 644 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2W 6C4 Canada
Review:
based on my 2 visits in the last 2 months service has been amazing and food has always been hot and taste great

i love ordering food on a tablet so there is less order mistakes and less person to person interaction for introverts like me the tablet also includes icons to show what is vegetarian or spicy as well

went both times with my vegetarian girlfriend and found the menu has many wonderful vegetarian options that everyone can enjoy no problems at anytime and i find the price for all you can eat is very fair for what you can get dessert is included in the price drinks are extra

highly recommend and will be going to eat here at least once a month

Address: 644 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2W 6C4 Canada
Review:
an amazing all you can eat sushi place you get three rounds of ordering sushi for you and others at your table the california and dragon rolls are amazing 

the service is great they send the food out fairly quick and constant depending on how much you order per round

the dessert is limited but good and quite tasty ice cream deep fried banana and a mango pudding and one or two more goodies

pricy but the quality is awesome  for two people its around 80

Address: 644 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2W 6C4 Canada
Review: i love it nice clean place and efficient service i usually order can pop as i find the fountain is usually flat but no complaints absolutely delightful

Address: 227 Bedford HIghway Halifax, NS B3M 2J9 Canada
Review: honestly the workers were super duper friendly but thats about it the food was horrible to say the least i had very high expectations considering the high prices and the multiple certificates and trophy pics the chef had displayed its easily the worst chinese food ive ever tasted the shanghai noodles were bland i couldnt believe it felt like i was chewing nothing im not exaggerating the fried rice was somehow even worse for 26 you would think it would taste somewhat decent but tbh at that point id rather munch on a plain bowl of plain white rice my last straw was the shrimp honestly how does one mess up shrimp it literally has to be the simplest thing to cook but barely had any flavour i will not be trying this place again tbh youre better off grabbing cheap chinese mall food good customer service though

Address: 227 Bedford HIghway Halifax, NS B3M 2J9 Canada
Review:
authentic food service was good and welcoming the chief chatted with us for a while i loved the food is not as sweet as other places in ns price is higher than other chinese restaurants for sure but we can tell the difference
not a spacious restaurant would be nice if there are more space and tables

Address: 227 Bedford HIghway Halifax, NS B3M 2J9 Canada
Review: fresh fresh fresh  i could not believe how fresh the food is at this restaurant  it was my daughters first time trying chinese and when the waitress learned this she brought out eggrolls on the house for her to try the most amazing egg rolls i have ever had so sweet and welcoming of her i highly recommend this place if you are looking for authentic fresh chinese food

Address: 227 Bedford HIghway Halifax, NS B3M 2J9 Canada
Review: best place to have peking duck within ns my boyfriend isnt a soup person but he loves the duck soup bamboo boots in the duck stir fry make the flavour so fresh love love it customer service is also amazing there was another family with two little kids waitress was very patient to the kids

Address: 227 Bedford HIghway Halifax, NS B3M 2J9 Canada
Review:
just tried for the first time im not a foodie but i found that the orients food was very fresh and felt good on my belly hard to explain but compared to other chinese food it just felt premium the owner ivan came by to check in on us very nice guy

highly recommend if you want to try more traditional chinese food with what would seem like quality ingredients

Address: 5232 Blowers Street Halifax, NS B3J 1J7 Canada
Review: really impressed with the quality and quantity of food all the dishes we ordered had authentic indian taste quantity was also good but there were only 2 ladies taking orders and serving it was clearly overwhelming for them otherwise everything was excellent

Address: 5232 Blowers Street Halifax, NS B3J 1J7 Canada
Review: i was worried as we were 1st to arrive and well the bathroom is gross since all the urine stains must have been from earlier in the day or from the day before i am a little concerned it that is going to reflect on the food restaurant itself looks clean and service was fast and very nice the food looked smelled and tasted amazing i just did butter chicken but it was so creamy and good i will be back

Address: 5232 Blowers Street Halifax, NS B3J 1J7 Canada
Review:
we were in downtown halifax and looking for a place to eat when we decided to check this place out as you could smell the aroma of tasty indian food as you got near the restaurant 

it is a fairly small restaurant and seemed very popular as it was packed but after a wait we were able to get a table the menu was fairly large so it was hard for me to choose what to have a good problem i eventually opted for the lamb shank biryani with chilly garlic naan i thought the food tasted excellent and it was extremely filling i could barely finish the meal despite finding it to be delicious the price was very reasonable for what you got

the staff were very helpful in helping us out as one of us had a food allergy so they took particular care in helping him find a dish that he could eat safely

being in downtown halifax it has the usual issues of trying to get parking close to it but that is not a reflection of the restaurant more of the whole area they also have delivery options as i noticed a number being picked up while we were there

Address: 5232 Blowers Street Halifax, NS B3J 1J7 Canada
Review: super delicious food we had lamb biriyani tandoori chicken naan bread and a dessert i forgot the name big portion fair price i have to mention the owner and stuff are super friendly definitely will go back highly recommended

Address: 5232 Blowers Street Halifax, NS B3J 1J7 Canada
Review: excellent food and located at an excellent place at the heart of halifax you might not find much parking space around however the food is delicious and the portions are massive we had a takeaway order the chicken biryani is bone in loaded with 3 leg pieces two plates of chicken biryani is enough for 3 people the chicken lababdar was mind blowing i would recommend this to everyone

Address: 2076 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B4 Canada
Review: pretty decent spot with interesting food options seating is rather limited  even with a reservation we were seated at the bar which was kind of uncomfortable service was adequate the charcuterie board was tasty but also pretty large despite being included in the sorta hungry part of the menu so bring a very empty stomach if you want it

Address: 2076 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B4 Canada
Review:
we stopped in here a few weeks ago for a mid day drinks and some apps their cocktail menu was fun to look at and i ended up going with the pandan one which was delicious foodwise we ordered oysters and one of each of the baos though were not vegetarian the mushroom baos are a must try so incredibly flavourful and melt in your mouth we couldve ordered another ten of them

lots of seating options and they were pretty full when we arrived so would recommend making reservations

Address: 2076 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B4 Canada
Review:
always thought this place was lovely for cocktails and snacks however the let us decide for you option was 5 stars we loved every bite and discovered new favs

our favorites in order of most favorite
1 seared scallops with cannellini beans
2 rhubarb upside down cake
3 tuna and turnips
4 fresh oysters with house made strawberry mignonette and hot sauces
5 the prettiest potato salad on earth

ps all the cocktails we had were perfection i loved the nonino fresco incredibly refreshing and my partner enjoyed the campensino old fashioned

Address: 2076 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B4 Canada
Review:
absolutely wonderful experience endtoend from field guide this was our second time visiting field guide for dinner and it was just as good as the first if not better

we chose bar seats right in front of the open tiny kitchen and enjoyed chatting with the cooks during service everyone  the bartender the hosts and the cooks were personable fun and attentive

the drinks were inventive and well balanced exactly what id expect from an eclectic bar on queen west in toronto but much closer to home food came out at a reasonable pace which considering the size of the kitchen three cooks in something smaller than apartment kitchens ive had before a single 30 induction range is impressive id say we made a mistake doing 6 of the larger plates between two people but we managed to down it all everything was well balanced and approachable with a huge focus put on texture  incredibly well thought out from that standpoint

we left completely satisfied and look forward to our next opportunity to visit if more places took after field guide when it comes to hospitality and care the world would be a better place

props

Address: 2076 Gottingen Street Halifax, NS B3K 3B4 Canada
Review:
all around amazing im quite particular about my food and drinks and this place did a fantastic job of creating a summer fresh delicious and creative menu with great service i had minor critiques but overall was in love and would return and recommend to anyone

food we started with the bread and mussels best mussels weve ever had as they were cooked perfectly and fresh and the broth was heaven the bread pairing was perfect to soak up all the buttery broth goodness next was the shrimp bao the bread was fluffy and light and shrimp was at chilled room temperature perfect for a summer day a good flavour of celery in case you dislike that but id still suggest you try it finally we had the zucchini and beef tartare zucchini didnt wow though still fresh and summer minty vibes beef tartarehands down best weve ever had the asian fusion incorporated was perfect closed it out with a strawberry  cream which albeit simpler was well done

drinks go for them all very creative and they can walk you through tasting notes perfectly milk punch method not actually milk recommend strawberry basil negroni strongly recommend not traditional negroni alcohol forward eucalyptus sour subtle calm and collected recommend corn star be adventurous as the chipotle is super subtle worth the risk recommend vesper again not alcohol forward recommend

atmosphere cozy and charming yet the accents are vibrant and energizing indoor volume is medium and great for a family cocktail date or a i want a nice drinkbite any day of the week

Address: 1673 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Z9 Canada
Review: so good we went for happy hour and its an absolute steal if this place was in paris ny la etc it would be absolutely packed from 4 to 5 excellent platters and oysters 10 cocktails and a cool but unpretentious vibe well definitely be back

Address: 1673 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Z9 Canada
Review: had a fabulous experience here went for dinner and drinks with my brother and his wife and the staff were truly fantastic i hope they all get the recognition they deserve because they made the whole experience worthwhile whether youre seated at a table or posted at the bar the fun and elegant atmosphere helped set the scene for some delicious nibbles from the wide ranging menu the mushroom risotto with saffron  manchego is heavenly and has to be tried booking is essential during busy times

Address: 1673 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Z9 Canada
Review: a colleague recommended this place wow am i glad i visited it was a difficult choice and im so glad i went with the croquetas they were crispy on the outside and soft and warm on the inside the i had the pork belly and scallops great food and presentation great staff with interactions with a few of them

Address: 1673 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Z9 Canada
Review:
highway man was good but i think its a little overrated if you ask me

the drinks are priced higher than most restaurants in the area but they are delicious you can tell that a mixologist made the drinks instead of a regular bartender

dont expect to leave here full the sharing platter dont come with much food

as a group of six we spent almost 600 dollars on drinks and food and still had to go elsewhere for dinner

Address: 1673 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Z9 Canada
Review:
was a decent experience as i was from out of town i found it was a little difficult to get the waitress attention once we had our drinks as we are being ignored

the drinks had been pretty good and the atmosphere itself was nice its pretty dark  you dont need a reservation if you go during the week but i suspect youd need one of you go friday night or weekend evenings

Address: 172 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A 1M6 Canada
Review: the food and service is great as a family type restaurant  but i was not informed about them charging extra 4 for paying with credit card

Address: 172 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A 1M6 Canada
Review: i will always be a 1 fan of pho hoang minh restaurant while living in dartmouth it was a go to for us when i worked just nearby and now that i dont live near the city at all every time im driving by and know theyre open i will always stop for the famous 15 meal ive shared my love for pho hoang minh restaurant with everyone and will always recommend it the perfect flavors of the 15 are a staple my husband and family members also really enjoy the chinese combination meals everything is amazing

Address: 172 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A 1M6 Canada
Review:
they do both vietnamese and chinese food but i would only go there for the vietnamese dishes ive had the pho and noodle bowl both are as good as any ive had in asia

its a no frills place so dont expect any ambiance but the price reflects that its good food at a reasonable price and theres not many of those kinds of places left these days

Address: 172 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A 1M6 Canada
Review: fast service large portions and a big menu we ordered the beef pho and the pork and vermicelli dish and both came out within 5 minutes the bbq pork that came was the vermicelli was delicious and had a smokey flavour and the beef strips in the pho had a bit of red to it when it came out but cooked well in the broth one thing i didnt enjoy was having a view of the kitchen while eating and watching the chef cut up the raw meat while eating otherwise good vietnamese restaurant in a convenient location with lots of parking

Address: 172 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A 1M6 Canada
Review:
very good food i really enjoy seeing the boss cut up the meat from the restaurant through to the kitchen at least this way i know it did not come out of a bucket of saline slimey solution like some of the other restaurants this is very fresh honest food

a very good family business very nice

Address: 79 Alderney Drive Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N7 Canada
Review:
i recently had the pleasure of trying pizza at the stone pizza shop and i must say it was unique but average rating as per taste the stone pizza also known as a brick oven pizza is prepared using a traditional method of baking pizza on a stone surface inside a wood fired oven heres my detailed review

crust the crust of the stone pizza was not baked properly we would love to eat well baked crust

toppings there are multiple options of toppings and you can change your toppings with the other available toppings just in case of you dont like any toppings like we replaced the top oh my veggies pizza from olives  jalape√±o and mushrooms pine apples

presentation the stone pizza was visually appealing the pizza came out of the oven with a beautiful golden crust and the toppings were artfully arranged the aroma wafting from the pizza was irresistible making the presentation even more enticing

classics pep and cheese  i didnt like the taste of it although presentation wise it was tempting

Address: 79 Alderney Drive Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N7 Canada
Review:
tried this place as the reviews seemed good unfortunately will be the first and last time i will order from this place

the pepperoni pizza was a 010 the cheese seemed curdled  not even melted

dough was not fully cooked through  raw under toppings

im sorry to leave this review but i am extremely dissapointed

Address: 79 Alderney Drive Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N7 Canada
Review: im a little torn this was my first time having stone pizza ordered a personal size hawaiian pizza and one of the oreo dessert pizzas  my hawaiian pizza was delicious  but my oreo dessert pizza looks and tastes as if the crust was barely cookedwhich is really unfortunate

Address: 79 Alderney Drive Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N7 Canada
Review: ordered a donair pizza and was so disappointed when i placed the order was told it would be ready in 10 minutes which was not typical of when i ordered from stone in the past as they are my go to for pizza take out it was evident that this pizza had been prepared much earlier and was reheated the outer edge crust was very crisp and the donair meat was dry called to let them know and received an apology that it was not up to my standards however it was more important to note not up to their standards the person i spoke with was very curt until i said i was not looking for a refund but making them aware i was disappointed this makes me rethink my pizza choice moving forward

Address: 79 Alderney Drive Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N7 Canada
Review: tried this place today for dinner and had delivered have to say the half and half was perfect the whole way through great taste and perfect portion of your looking for a lunch or dinner option will def order again super fast and great quality keep up the great food

Address: 480 Parkland Drive Halifax, NS B3S 1P9 Canada
Review:
i dont often give five stars across the board but tako sushi is worthy ive eaten a lot of sushi in japan and korea and the sushi here is on par

large menu so it wasnt easy to make a decision i finally chose the assorted maki number 6 under sushi combo what a delight the ingredients were fresh and the flavours were spoton the miso soup was lovely too rich flavours

the staff was friendly and although busy the service was quick the prep area reminded me of a restaurant you would find in japan

my only suggestion is better chopsticks please ive been eating with chopsticks for 20plus years and the wooden ones wrapped in paper are truly awful

thank you for a great dining experience i will be back

Address: 480 Parkland Drive Halifax, NS B3S 1P9 Canada
Review:
it was our first trip to halifax and the first japanese restaurant we visited¬† tako sushi  ramen is a friendly place
we got a green dragon  ninja roll and 2 types of ramen seafood  hokkaido it was awesome¬† hokkaido ramen recommend for all who are fans of spicy food seafood ramen scallops¬† shrimps¬† calamari  just 
the dish was so big we were unable to finish it 
the sushi was delicious and super fresh
i highly recommend trying this place out

Address: 480 Parkland Drive Halifax, NS B3S 1P9 Canada
Review: what a wonderful little spot the service was excellent and the sushi was even better everything we had was prepared with care very tasty and so fresh tasting presentation was top notch couldnt have asked for better

Address: 480 Parkland Drive Halifax, NS B3S 1P9 Canada
Review: this was my favourite restaurant in halifax the food is always amazing the chef and cooks are very talented unfortunately in recent months the service has been absolutely abysmal seated with no menus takes 30 minutes to get water food arrives before drinks and cutlery really hoping this changes so we can continue enjoying this awesome restaurant

Address: 480 Parkland Drive Halifax, NS B3S 1P9 Canada
Review: ive had a lot of sushi around halifax this is by far the best quality and most delicious sushi ive had so far the sapori role and umi role was incredible its not a fancy place but if youre looking for some delicious sushi to take out and dine in def a must go

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: we chose a type of soup that half normal and half medium spicy  not recommend as lots of chilly oil with garlic and still too much spicy a kind of buffet hot pot as we can select the rest topping by the kind of meatseafoodballtofuvegetablesnoodlessauces herbs and  even the starter food the bigger group we are the better deal we get as we can enjoy different foods with reasonable price

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review:
updated review
