reduced star down to 1 since this restaurant has no parking spot and provide no info for facilitate customer like me to park and i got 115 ticket from their building on top of my 15 tip to their foods and service extremely bad experience will never come to pay any cent to this business



i would give 3 stars for hotpot since i still cannot find the right dipping sauce we had tried peanut sauce but it was too bland however because of their pan fried dumpling was so good there a plenty of ground pork inside and it is only 10 so i have to add 1 more star for them it seem that their a la carte menu will be much better to try it looks so good by observing from the other dining table

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: delightful experience always wanted to try hot pot and this place did not disappoint me good service delicious food i will come back for sure

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: great place to get hot pot in halifax although the hot pot is not all you can eat the price would be around the same for two people but might be lower overall for more people easy paper ordering system where you check boxes based on what you want 3099 for basic broth and two meats waitress was very attentive with the broth as well as refilling the waters

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: my first time having hot pot super yummy and staff were really helpful for how and what to order everything came out very quickly and was delicious

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: we chose a type of soup that half normal and half medium spicy  not recommend as lots of chilly oil with garlic and still too much spicy a kind of buffet hot pot as we can select the rest topping by the kind of meatseafoodballtofuvegetablesnoodlessauces herbs and  even the starter food the bigger group we are the better deal we get as we can enjoy different foods with reasonable price

Review: we chose a type of soup that half normal and half medium spicy  not recommend as lots of chilly oil with garlic and still too much spicy a kind of buffet hot pot as we can select the rest topping by the kind of meatseafoodballtofuvegetablesnoodlessauces herbs and  even the starter food the bigger group we are the better deal we get as we can enjoy different foods with reasonable price

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review:
updated review
reduced star down to 1 since this restaurant has no parking spot and provide no info for facilitate customer like me to park and i got 115 ticket from their building on top of my 15 tip to their foods and service extremely bad experience will never come to pay any cent to this business



i would give 3 stars for hotpot since i still cannot find the right dipping sauce we had tried peanut sauce but it was too bland however because of their pan fried dumpling was so good there a plenty of ground pork inside and it is only 10 so i have to add 1 more star for them it seem that their a la carte menu will be much better to try it looks so good by observing from the other dining table

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: delightful experience always wanted to try hot pot and this place did not disappoint me good service delicious food i will come back for sure

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: great place to get hot pot in halifax although the hot pot is not all you can eat the price would be around the same for two people but might be lower overall for more people easy paper ordering system where you check boxes based on what you want 3099 for basic broth and two meats waitress was very attentive with the broth as well as refilling the waters

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: great place to get hot pot in halifax although the hot pot is not all you can eat the price would be around the same for two people but might be lower overall for more people easy paper ordering system where you check boxes based on what you want 3099 for basic broth and two meats waitress was very attentive with the broth as well as refilling the waters

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: my first time having hot pot super yummy and staff were really helpful for how and what to order everything came out very quickly and was delicious

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: really nice french bistro inspired restaurant the service is perfect the food is nice many gluten free options the prices are really fair totally worth it

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review:
a halifax classic a gem in the halifax restaurant scene for many years the newer restaurants may be fashionable but le bistro has maintained their place as a go to spot in halifax

the mussels were great really need a spoon for the delicious sauce the coquille and seafood crepes are very good  and the seafood was very fresh i forgot how good the lemon parfait pie is  next time i will get the large portion

our server reflected the professionalism of the hands on owner liz we really enjoyed our evening dinner

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: great brunch spot and good value fantastic service and you can tell the resto has its regulars because it has a very welcoming vibe

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: enjoyed brunch with my husband and we loved the food specially the dessert

Address: 1333 S Park Street Halifax, NS B3J 2K9 Canada
Review: on a visit to halifax for a conference coincidentally ended up here three times  twice for lunch and once for dinner the food was great the service was awesome too we had a great time would highly recommend if you are in the area dont let the oddness of it being at the bottom of an apartment building put you off its worth the trip to lizs

Address: 179 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A Canada
Review:
honestly have nothing good to say the number of decent reviews is astonishing i dont like to hate on businesses especially on local ones but i also want to help others make informed decisions on where theyre going to spend their money and what theyre going to eat

i ordered takeout by phone someone answered the phone hurriedly said they would put me on hold and then proceeded to just leave me on the line without actually putting me on hold so i could hear everyone talking in the kitchen but had no idea when i would actually be helped finally i was served by someone and she was nice enough but then as soon as i was done going through the order she abruptly said bye without asking me my name for the pickup or giving me an estimation for when it would be ready she didnt actually hang up so i was once again just left sitting on the other end of the line but no one was there to listen to my questions

finally got our food and while the portion sizes were enormous the food itself was just horribly bland it looked like it had sauce on it but somehow there was literally no flavour basically eating super greasy food without any good taste experience to make up for it also i ordered the eggplant off of the vegetable section of the menu assuming it was vegetarian and it was full of beef i get that this was partially my fault for not double checking but putting a meat dish under the vegetable section and not indicating anywhere that there is meat in it is just horrible business protocol

on the whole this experience was bad enough for me to never return

Address: 179 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A Canada
Review:
super impressed with the size pf the serving 

honey garlic ribs are great egg rolls ate awesome beef broccoli is also a must try the wanton is also superb i dont personally like the chicken balls though i think thats what its called but overall it was super great experience to eat here we ended up taking out a huge portion of our meals if you are not a big eater a serving can be good for sharing

Address: 179 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A Canada
Review: so my boyfriend and i called trying to place an order for delivery at 830 pm were home with a new baby exhausted  and dont want to cook because we are tired the restaurant closes at 9pm now ive worked in food service and the last time i checked you have to serve the customer until closing if i call a pizza place at 950 and they close at 10pm they still deliver anywho the lady who answered the phone refused to serve us and said we stop taking orders at 830 maam  do you want to make money  we can order on doordash and get our food delivered with you guys but your delivery driver doesnt want to work passed 830 or your cooks dont want to cook whatever the case may be fix it because youre going to lose money like that

Address: 179 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A Canada
Review: food is average  one star rating is because upon request of pkg of soy sauce for my rice i was told they have none and havent had since covid  tell mewhat chinese food restaurant has no soy sauce  unbelievable  had i known before having ordered and paid for my combo plate i would have gone elsewhere  if you are getting takeout and want soy sauceavoid this place  ridiculous

Address: 179 Wyse Road Dartmouth, NS B3A Canada
Review:
if your looking for tasty chinese food in hrm dont waste any time just come here
chicken su guy was amazing
big portions
cherry sauce on the chicken balls chow main awesome beef veg was crazy tasty
egg rolls perfect

Address: 1580 Argyle Street Halifax, NS B3J 1H5 Canada
Review: went there seeing excellent reviews of food doesnt live upto hype wanted to try mediterranean nachos but they completely revised the menu as such tried normal nachos chicken wings and another chicken dish wings were smelly and below average and cant complain about nachos serving is large for a single person overall average nothing to be hyped about

Address: 1580 Argyle Street Halifax, NS B3J 1H5 Canada
Review: good place for half priced nachos and pub snacks from 46 the nachos 950 were layered well with peppers artichoke pieces and pickled onion and had a good ratio of cheese to chip and amount of dip sour cream refried beans fresh salsa 3 chicken sliders 8 were tasty but not very filling sat outside on the patio and could hear music from the pint across the street

Address: 1580 Argyle Street Halifax, NS B3J 1H5 Canada
Review: loved the nachos here and our server was very busy we could tell by all the new tables coming in but she was very attentive to us great overall experience well be back for sure

Address: 1580 Argyle Street Halifax, NS B3J 1H5 Canada
Review:
with the name gastropub we were expecting higher quality food
the beer was fine but the fish n chips was more on the store bought  freezer side shocking since when we asked the server he said it was a popular dish
also the fries felt like they were refried stale almost nice looking place and ambiance for drinks not sure we would go back for the food

Address: 1580 Argyle Street Halifax, NS B3J 1H5 Canada
Review: we wandered around downtown halifax until we were hungry and came across this adorable bar right in time for happy hour this seems to be a favourite among the locals because they said in a few hours theyd be full with reservations the cocktails were fantastic and i would definitely come back with friends for dinner and drinks a great place for a date too

Address: 100 Ilsley Avenue Dartmouth, NS B3B 1L3 Canada
Review: their food is always delicious  if you are looking for a good tasty and fast thai food at lunch i would highly recommend  best to arrive at 1130 to avoid a friday waitalthough the wait is usually not long

Address: 100 Ilsley Avenue Dartmouth, NS B3B 1L3 Canada
Review: this is an authentic thai food im so glad to found this place this  thai noodles soup is the killer this is exactly why im here for the staffs and cooks are really awesome

Address: 100 Ilsley Avenue Dartmouth, NS B3B 1L3 Canada
Review: some of the best pad thai in hrm anytime im up in this side of the city i always make an effort to stop by cha baa thai the store is always clean and tidy the staff are always friendly quick and prompt the food is always incredible cant say enough good things love this spot

Address: 100 Ilsley Avenue Dartmouth, NS B3B 1L3 Canada
Review:
the best massaman curry and black pepper beef ive had always excellent and prompt with service polite and professional  takeaway is usually about 15 minutes so if youre ordering for lunch in burnside call ahead and they have it ready at the counter still piping hot
the food is excellent no matter what you get its hard to try something new on the menu because everything is so good that you want one of everything

definitely recommend

Address: 100 Ilsley Avenue Dartmouth, NS B3B 1L3 Canada
Review: we dined in for lunch and enjoyed delicious thai food cooked up fresh  friendly fast service and reasonable prices whats not to love  well definitely be back

Address: 1546 Queen St Halifax, NS B3J 2H8 Canada
Review: good thai food with pleasant ambience the drinks were bit below average but no complaints from the food pad thai was the standout followed by the red curry and cashew chicken the quantity is quite good and can be shared by two peoplewith rice or sides

Address: 1546 Queen St Halifax, NS B3J 2H8 Canada
Review: the restaurant was nice the staff was friendly the cashew chicken was delicious but unfortunately the spring rolls were not fresh they were sour fried noodles taste sweet and sour but it will be a little greasy not recommended to try thai coffee tastes a little more weepy and creamy

Address: 1546 Queen St Halifax, NS B3J 2H8 Canada
Review:
great spot for a delicious and authentic thai meal

the restaurants pad thai is a delightful mix of stirfried rice noodles vegetables peanuts and beef the pad thai is served in generous portions perfect for both lunch or dinner

wonton soup was surprisingly relexing strongly recommend as well

Address: 1546 Queen St Halifax, NS B3J 2H8 Canada
Review:
very nice experience i ordered the red curry chicken the curry was full of flavor and the portion was perfect

they even gave me extra chicken because i didnt want the egg roll that comes with it since im gluten free

will definitely be going back

Address: 1546 Queen St Halifax, NS B3J 2H8 Canada
Review: wow probably the best thai food ive ever hadhavent had much but this was exceptional the flavors of my green curry chicken lunch special and coconut soup were out of this world the thai iced coffee was strong and sweet and my friends thai iced tea was such a sweet and unique flavor if you are in downtown halifax or around the other location in dartmouth you gotta go here for some of the best thai food in halifax

Address: 8 Oland Crescent Halifax, NS B3S 1C6 Canada
Review:
i absolutely classify dhaba express as a hidden gem of halifax i have only ever gone for the weekend buffet and it has been stellar each and every time on my most recent visit i fell in love with the samosa chat and the punjabi chicken

i highly highly recommend

Address: 8 Oland Crescent Halifax, NS B3S 1C6 Canada
Review:
we were drawn here by the aromas as we passed on our way to cbsa nearby we had a lovely lunch which was very tasty we chose what was on special recommended by the waitress  the staff were friendly welcoming and efficient
very good curry

Address: 8 Oland Crescent Halifax, NS B3S 1C6 Canada
Review:
amazing food always saturday buffet is worth trying everything is super tasty

update
came back for the buffet again pleasantly surprised with the menu always new items to try

Address: 8 Oland Crescent Halifax, NS B3S 1C6 Canada
Review: food is tasty but butter chicken had a sweet and sour taste did not like that thandoori chicken curry is also very delicious butter naan is super big one is enough to fill your stomach authentic indian taste

Address: 8 Oland Crescent Halifax, NS B3S 1C6 Canada
Review: the worst indian meal we have ever had and we have eaten at many excellent indian restaurants  this is definitely one of them  where do we start  the nan is unlike any we have ever eaten it is more like a flat bread  the curry had loads of grease and hardly any chicken  the rice is not like regular saffron rice which is much finer  the pics speak for themselves  it was expensive for substandard food and we wont be returning

Address: 81 Peakview Way Unit 100 Bedford, NS B3M 0G2 Canada
Review:
topnotch

we went to blue elephant for lunch and its one of the best thai food in town

i have been to almost all the thai places in town and by far the best experience in terms of food ambience and hospitality  blue elephant

if you struggle to choose as all options excite you sally will jump in to help she is the nicest to the core and one person who does everything  taking orders delivering the food billing and cleaning uff  hats off to you

since we went on a weekday their inventory for drinks where missing a few to try cocktails but its understandable

overall  if you like thai you must try blue elephant at least once before you stick with your regular thai place

good luck blue elephant crew we will return soon with a big crowd of friends and families

Address: 81 Peakview Way Unit 100 Bedford, NS B3M 0G2 Canada
Review: we ordered shrimp pad thai and spring rolls for take out the food service and atmosphere were average to us it would have been nice to have some fresh green onion and bean sprouts in the pad thai

Address: 81 Peakview Way Unit 100 Bedford, NS B3M 0G2 Canada
Review:
loved the decor the ambience and the vibe did not like the phone constantly ringing and no one answering the phonevery distracting and annoying  we had the spring rolls good and wings good nothing special for appetizers  our main was the pad thai which was delicious one if the best we had waitress was very apologetic for the long wait and mix up with the spring rolls was a good experience and will probably be back to give it another chance

back again and had the cashew chicken and ginger beefthe chicken will be my goto order soooooo good

Address: 81 Peakview Way Unit 100 Bedford, NS B3M 0G2 Canada
Review:
my wife and i had an amazing experience here we shared the fresh spring rolls which were excellent and the dipping sauce was delicious
we also had the pad thai and the red curry which was also amazing
everything was so fresh the portion sizes were great the staff was extremely friendly
we will definitely be coming back here despite it being out of our way
my only regret was not taking photos of the food as we devoured everything because it was so good

Address: 81 Peakview Way Unit 100 Bedford, NS B3M 0G2 Canada
Review:
good portions and taste will definitely come back

4 months have gone by sat and ate in once food was still really good service was a little slow server seemed to be busy trying to keep up

delivery was tonight and whilst theres a 10 charge for the service youre going to be paying that on uber or skip with all their fees the food got to me an hour from when i placed my order exactly when the lady on the phone said it would everything was piping hot and just as good as every other experience wish i gave a little bit more of a tip to the driver but i didnt want to leave a big tip and find my food cold afterwards will definitely be ordering again

ginger beef is a 1010

Address: 1014 Barrington St Halifax, NS B3H 2P9 Canada
Review: staff are friendly limited street parking pulled pork and pork ribs were great but the brisket didnt really have a smokey flavour that i would expect sweet potato chips cornbread and beans were good

Address: 1014 Barrington St Halifax, NS B3H 2P9 Canada
Review: omg this bbq was soooo good would highly recommend to anyone who likes bbq i got the chicken sandwich meal we ate there which i thought was even better they have different sauces at the table

Address: 1014 Barrington St Halifax, NS B3H 2P9 Canada
Review:
food wasnt very good pulled pork was only thing that had flavor everything else was bland or just average

the worst was the brisket absolutely bone dry and no flavor whatsoever possible the worst ive ever had

staff was very friendly however

Address: 1014 Barrington St Halifax, NS B3H 2P9 Canada
Review:
we got the 3meat combo double order of ribs and sausage they had run out of brisket and chicken ribs were great sausage was good sauces were delicious especially the gravy tasty cornbread and coleslaw
they forgot several components of our order which we checked before we left they were apologetic but just fyi to check your takeout bag before you leave

Address: 1014 Barrington St Halifax, NS B3H 2P9 Canada
Review: small space they have two tables i believe but not really a sit and eat kind of place had the pull pork sandwich with dirty rice the dirty rice was bland and the pull pork could have used more of the bbq sauce there are better bbq options out there they also need a better system for pick up everyone was waiting in the same line if you were placing an order or just picking up

Address: 1261 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y2 Canada
Review:
an absolutely incredible experience 
we ordered the everything combo for 3 people pork bone hot pot for 2 people and eel rice bowl we love everything so much the portions were enormous with very reasonable price even though its located conveniently right in downtown halifax
it could be a bit tricky finding parking spots so you may expect some walking uphill to get there

Address: 1261 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y2 Canada
Review: great korean food restaurant been there few times with family and friends the price and quantity are balanced service is reasonable and not generally delayed would go back at some point

Address: 1261 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y2 Canada
Review:
as a connoisseur of korean cuisine i must say that the korean bbq restaurant located in the center of downtown halifax is a standout establishment that truly excels in every aspect

first and foremost the service was impeccable the staff were not only attentive and efficient but also welcoming and hospitable creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for diners

in terms of atmosphere the restaurant is tastefully decorated with traditional korean elements giving it a sense of authenticity and cultural immersion the energy of the restaurant was lively and dynamic making for a truly enjoyable dining experience

now onto the food the selection of meats offered at the bbq was diverse and of the highest quality expertly prepared and cooked to perfection the accompanying banchan or side dishes were also a delight offering a plethora of flavors and textures that enhanced the overall meal

in conclusion it is with the utmost conviction that i highly recommend this korean bbq restaurant to anyone seeking a truly exceptional dining experience the combination of excellent service authentic atmosphere and delicious food make it a musttry for anyone in the halifax area

Address: 1261 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y2 Canada
Review: korean bbq was a hit delicious meat and servers were fast to replenish the one downside we found was that the hot pot we found lacking overwhelmed with pork bones and barely any soup and most places have deeper pans for the soup service was excellent just the hot pot was lacking

Address: 1261 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y2 Canada
Review:
the service was kind and efficient the meal was hot and savoury  and the price was truly good value for the quality of food

we tried the bulgogi the spicy chicken and the kimchi soup and the word delicious was tossed around the table many times

i highly recommend this restaurant for authentic korean dishes

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: attended this restaurant after a friends recommendation delicious pho but its very important to know that when they write spicy on the menu they really mean it ordered the spiciest pho on the menu and was only able to eat a quarter of the bowl before my mouth was too swollen most painful meal ever but such a delicious flavour the space is a bit crowded though the service is excellent cant wait to go again and order a less spicy dish to fully enjoy the experience

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: i am a frequent i love pho customer mainly for their pho and bun bo hue i highly recommended both they taste very good with decent portion the restaurant itself is small but cozy and the waiter is always helpful and friendly

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: great place to eat traditional vietnamese food you can tell that the pho is made fresh using fresh ingredients very tasty soup the sandwich brought me back memories its like as if you were in any vendor in hanoi delicious highly recommended

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: we came here twice in july and our first experience with the restaurant was pretty good pho was good and the service was also nice we stopped by again on wednesday july 19th and it was quite rainy out but we asked if we could sit at the patio the server said something but we didnt get it clear so it was our fault for not confirming his answer and headed out to the patio around 5 minutes later he peeked his head out not coming out and telling us properly peeked his head out and told us i said no patio im quoting him now because it was so impressive how he talked to customers quite disappointing because we like the food there and our other server was really nice we left after that and did not get food

Address: 746 Bedford Highway Halifax, NS B3M 2L9 Canada
Review: delicious pho spring rolls are very crispy always my pho go to place d

Address: 1824 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 1W4 Canada
Review: we enjoyed going to this restaurant on a recent holiday in halifax i had scallops which were good  not that big though  we also ordered the salmon and the calamari the calamari was great  the salmon was a little overcooked but tasty we each had a drink from the bar which we found to be very reasonably priced the atmosphere was casual and the service was friendly i would go back

Address: 1824 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 1W4 Canada
Review:
wow i fell in love with this place
i ordered the lobster dinner and it was super delicious it cam with clam chowder which was rich and creamy it also came with a side and i choose mash potato which was amazing the other side dish we ordered calamari was also delicious the dessert was also very filling delicious as well
i will definitely come back to bluenose ii whenif i ever travel back to halifax

Address: 1824 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 1W4 Canada
Review: so happy we went here during my recent vacation to halifax we had the seafood chowder and the 2 piece fish and chips the food was excellent and served hot and fast very friendly staff great atmosphere we will definitely return

Address: 1824 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 1W4 Canada
Review:
i recently visited bluenose ii in halifax with my wife for a delightful lunchtime experience this charming restaurant exceeded our expectations with its delectable seafood cozy ambiance and attentive service

first and foremost the food at bluenose ii is a true delight for seafood lovers we indulged in an array of mouthwatering dishes from succulent lobster rolls to perfectly seared scallops each bite was bursting with freshness and flavors of the sea making for an exceptional dining experience

the restaurants interior exudes a comfortable and inviting atmosphere the maritimethemed decor and beautiful seafaring artwork created a unique and enchanting ambiance we particularly enjoyed sitting by the window which offered a pleasant view of the bustling street outside it was the perfect spot to unwind and soak in the relaxed vibes

the service at bluenose ii was commendable the staff members were friendly attentive and knowledgeable about the menu they were prompt in taking our orders and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal their warm and accommodating nature added to the overall positive experience

in conclusion our visit to bluenose ii was a delightful journey into maritime cuisine the delectable seafood comfortable surroundings and attentive service made for a memorable dining experience whether youre a seafood enthusiast or simply seeking a relaxed and enjoyable meal bluenose ii in halifax is a fantastic choice

Address: 1824 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 1W4 Canada
Review:
the food was good very quick tasty and fairly priced
service was meeting the bare minimum the service was quick but the server never topped up our waters or even chatted with us it was definitely efficient but it felt like a get in and get out kind of dining experience then to have the lowest preset option for tipping to be 18 was shocking considering all that
the restaurant was almost full when i went so it was loud and difficult to have a conversation i felt rushed to eat and leave since it was so busy

Address: 149 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: best sushi on the east coast amazing service atmosphere  fresh sushi that is always perfect dine in or take out gonna miss this place so much after living here for 7 years we will be back when we come  visit the maritimes

Address: 149 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: visited from toronto and first time trying restaurant they had a good variety of selections  i chose the dinner special with soup and salad which were both very good  the sushi plate had california roll spicy tuna assorted sushi and sashimi  the platter was good but sashimi was cut a bit too thick  i have eaten a lot of sushi and sushi nami was just okay

Address: 149 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: had our lunch they open 12nn every sunday we came early around 11 am they charge extra 15 service fee if you exceed 5 person we are 6 but its considerable because they got nice and good service nd food

Address: 149 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: canada day lunch awesome sushi delicious desserts and overall a wonderful experience

Address: 149 Hector Gate Dartmouth, NS B3B 0E5 Canada
Review: not  the greatest   but if you dont know good sushi then you may think its a good place   plus you shouldnt have to worry about  bones

Address: 1458 Queen Street Suite 102 Halifax, NS B3J 2H7 Canada
Review: the food is always delicious and comes out fast i love getting a bunch of appetizers and having small dishes and its a great place for that

Address: 1458 Queen Street Suite 102 Halifax, NS B3J 2H7 Canada
Review:
this is a pretty decent sushi restaurant middling food but not terrible they have a wide variety of options if you want to explore some new flavors

the interior design and atmosphere is probably the best part about this place  a wide sushi bar takes up the middle of the space and the entire restaurant is slightly sunken into the building which makes it feel a little quieter despite being right downtown

they have a pretty nice variety of beverages including an interesting ramune flavored drink which i would recommend if its still available

Address: 1458 Queen Street Suite 102 Halifax, NS B3J 2H7 Canada
Review: went to get sushi downtown for a lunch date with a friend i ordered the maki lunch providing me with a delicious plate full of rolls the atmosphere in the restaurant is very nice with kind servers to bring you your food the miso soup was excellent and the spicy salmon rolls were very yummy however the house salad was not very good and some of the rolls had an uneven proportion of elements making each bite slightly unbalanced overall a good place to go for a reasonably priced sushi lunch deal

Address: 1458 Queen Street Suite 102 Halifax, NS B3J 2H7 Canada
Review: great fresh sushi the quality of the food makes up for any other shortcomings i was there on a holiday weekend canada day and it was clear they were not prepared to be that busy the staff was struggling to keep up but once i finally got my food it was amazing would definitely recommend to anyone

Address: 1458 Queen Street Suite 102 Halifax, NS B3J 2H7 Canada
Review:
the sashimi is a must big chunks of meltinyourmouth salmon tuna  escolar this cantoneseowned place has been a halifax classic and i was happy to know theyre still open this newer location has great decor and is very spacious waitress was very polite

rolls were somewhat of a letdown on the day we went but tasted good they are a bit loose sparse and some classics like the dragon roll while not bad here didnt taste as good as some other restaurants

Address: 547 Portland Street Unit 1 & 2 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 4B1 Canada
Review: everything was great trish was an excellent server the only thing i would recommend is not to sit in the booths they are attached  to each other and every time you moved or the other table moved it felt like a kid was sitting behind you kicking your seat

Address: 547 Portland Street Unit 1 & 2 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 4B1 Canada
Review: ordered wings tonight for takeout when i got home and opened them up this is what it looks like very disappointing well over cooked

Address: 547 Portland Street Unit 1 & 2 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 4B1 Canada
Review: the portion was disgusting 8 wings and a little bit of fries ok too if that the wings didnt even taste good worst spot for wings in novascotia so far

Address: 547 Portland Street Unit 1 & 2 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 4B1 Canada
Review: asked the server about all you can eat after 2 rounds of questions find out out the end all you can eat ended 2 days ago they just didnt take down the signs didnt even bother ordering took 25 minutes to ask what wed like to order this is not the first time ive had a bad experience here zero stars if i could

Address: 547 Portland Street Unit 1 & 2 Dartmouth, NS B2Y 4B1 Canada
Review:
i have come here for years ive usually enjoyed it it has definitely changed since the old manager left over a year ago i sat on the patio and there was a gentleman vaping clearly against the regulations governing eatinglicensed establishments staff even sat with him while he was vaping
then to top it all off the patio is littered with broken glass which shocked me especially when the patio is suppose to be dog friendly
to top it all off the food was lukewarm

Address: 55 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H1 Canada
Review: the staff are nice but the portion is disappointing  stuffing is very little and the plate is for some reason so small that it is hard to avoid the food falling out of it one scoop of ice cream was not really a complete one scoop it is different from the pic i see in the past post if the quantity was more generous they would be for sure more populara coffee was a it small for the price toofor lunch one crepe may not satisfy you  may need a cup of soup to go with it also it is completely self service so why tips are asked

Address: 55 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H1 Canada
Review: we ordered the mushroom crepe which was definitely worth 5 stars additionally i also got the baseline and although i would have appreciated more baconbanana filling inside i definitely enjoyed the cook on the bacon the staff was friendly and overall a good spot

Address: 55 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H1 Canada
Review:
best crepes in ns 1

what an amazing vibe and delicious crepes 
the food was exceptional the crepes were prefetch thin and the variety of choices

must try the pierogi crepes its unbelievable

Address: 55 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H1 Canada
Review:
what a nice spot to stop in for quick brunch the staff were incredibly lovely and the shop was clean i personally wish there were more sweet crepe options with fruit that didnt involve chocolate or cheesecake but cant do everything when reading the savoury menu some of the options seem unusually but theyre on there for a reason

this building is wheelchair accessible but it may be a little harder to navigate with mobility issues once inside specifically if you come at a busy time the washroom might be especially hard to reach in a wheelchair

i wish there was a little bit of art or something on the walls but overall so lovely

Address: 55 Portland Street Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H1 Canada
Review:
spectacular in every way

we had a lovely interactions with fellow customers before we even got inside the atmosphere was friendly and wholesome inside they even changed the music as different demographics of people came in

we had a la marais and they honoured an online only coupon to give us a lemon sugar cr√™pe for free both were delicious and prepared perfectly

the staff was friendly  engaging and made us feel comfortable and at home

prices here are excellent i havent felt like i paid a reasonable price for a meal out in years

a wonderful place i highly recommend

Address: 2540 Agricola Street Halifax, NS B3K 4C5 Canada
Review:
agricola street brasserie did everything right  the  design and atmosphere is outstanding   the service was exceptional  i wish i could recall my servers name but he did a terrific job

i went for brunch  menu was the right size  the options made it tough to choose   i had a cappuccino which was great  brasserie breakfast and duck confit hash were chosen  cinnamon roll and danish pastry were addones    food was a 1010

i am looking forward to heading back for dinner soon

Address: 2540 Agricola Street Halifax, NS B3K 4C5 Canada
Review:
great dining experience
the kitchen is uniquely visible the staff are amazing and the atmosphere was great dim lighting  cool winebottle glasses its a little pricey but the food is worth it yum

Address: 2540 Agricola Street Halifax, NS B3K 4C5 Canada
Review: we ate here as a group and were seated above the kitchen in a cozy space that was large enough for our 15 or so people we had a choice of appetizers main course and dessert i enjoyed my calamari it was cooked perfectly and was definitely sharable in size i couldnt eat more than half of it as i wanted to enjoy my main  the herbed chicken the herbed chicken was a mixture and not the usual breast meat by itself the accompanying veg and sauce tasted great for dessert they hit it out of the park with cheesecake i enjoyed my meal but would have loved it if id read the menu in better light the green bean caesar looked amazing and everyone who had it cleaned their plates however the filet mignon were undercooked but still had great taste the bread pudding was yummy as well

Address: 2540 Agricola Street Halifax, NS B3K 4C5 Canada
Review: my partner took me to agricola street brasserie for my birthday yesterday we had the tasting menu with wine pairings and sat by the kitchen bar it was the best culinary experience ive ever had in halifax the service was amazing the dishes were beautiful and delicious and the wine pairings were phenomenal i would definitely go back any time

Address: 2540 Agricola Street Halifax, NS B3K 4C5 Canada
Review:
1010  one of the gems of halifax the brussels caesar salad is next level  the atmosphere is so chill

will absolutely be coming back

Address: 5650 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 1H1 Canada
Review: delicious pasta with fresh seafood generous portions with reasonable prices and friendly service would highly recommend the lobster risotto and seafood linguine only complaint is that the tip option on the machine started at 18 for a group of 4 rather than 15

Address: 5650 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 1H1 Canada
Review:
one of the best restaurants weve ever been to  a must visit
the lobster risotto and the scallop linguine is incredible
also our server was amazing he recommended we get the white chocolate cheesecake as its his fav and we were glad we did

Address: 5650 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 1H1 Canada
Review: i have frequented lafracsa dozens and dozens of times since it opened    i go back because the menu has so many great choices the restaurant atmosphere is fun and laid back the food is delicious and the service never disappoints

Address: 5650 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 1H1 Canada
Review:
super romantic little resturant with awesome food the pumpkin ravioli is by far the best ravioli ive ever had
my partner and i went here for our first date and he still talks about the burger he got near 4 years later

Address: 5650 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 1H1 Canada
Review: i really enjoyed the food here im going to be dreaming of the linguine ai fruitti de mare for a really long time the creme br√ªl√©e was delicious as well the sauce for the linguine was so rich

Address: 6169 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 4P6 Canada
Review:
seven spices a syrian restaurant that serves up some delicious food i recently had the pleasure of trying their chicken shawarma and falafel wrap and i have to say that both were absolutely fantastic

the chicken shawarma was tender and juicy with just the right amount of spices to give it a flavorful kick and the falafel wrap was packed with crunchy fresh veggies and a deliciously seasoned falafel patty that was cooked to perfection

overall i highly recommend seven spices to anyone looking for a taste of authentic syrian cuisine the quality of their food is truly topnotch and i cant wait to come back and try some of their other dishes

Address: 6169 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 4P6 Canada
Review: the best shawarma  wrap i ever had it was good size so fresh and delicious  the guy working abdul also offered me complimentary soup  that was good too i would recommend  everyone to try

Address: 6169 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 4P6 Canada
Review:
it was our first time ordering the food from them and we were so surprised the food was so tasty and the portions were big the chicken skewers was so tender and juicy the lamp kebab was so delicious i also love the spice in the rice very tasty
theres only one thing i am curious we ordered chicken kebab plate but it came with 2 lamb kebab and 1 chicken skewer
however we do love their food so much will definitely gonna order it again soon

Address: 6169 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 4P6 Canada
Review: the hostess was really good and friendly the food was not as par as i was expecting we had the chicken kebab and lamb kebab both were alright  quantity will serve a good sized apetite ambiance isnt that great would prefer for take outs there are better lebanese restaurants in town this wouldnt be my first pick

Address: 6169 Quinpool Road Halifax, NS B3L 4P6 Canada
Review: i am vegetarian and ordered veg falafel platter it was too yummy tasty and delicious   i know they have only this veg option but i can visit them just for this one suggestion  if they add more veg option from the middle east i would love to try more veg dishes here the portion is also great

Address: 1335 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y9 Canada
Review: it is a treat to find a restaurant with the authentic chinese northern home food flavours  great price for tasty and plentiful food  a gem in the heart of down town halifax if you want a hearty noodle soup

Address: 1335 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y9 Canada
Review:
in short excellent in long

this restaurant is well located downtown halifax its right across from dalhousie enginnering faculty the parking is as such street parking

the location itself is nice cleanly decorated with good spacing between tables

the menu is straightforward and easy simply 1 page back and forth

we ordered the regular steamed beef and lamb dumpling with some egg rolls to start

the eggs rolls were good crispy but the filling was a bit unfamiliar to me but not bad

the dumplings were simply excellent they had a good amount of filling the shape was also visually nice there was a complete set of condiments soy sauce black vinegar chilli oil salt and pepper

service was excellent quick courteous not sure if its a winter thing but hot water was served too nice touch

prices were very fair the steam dumpling order was many and with eggs rolls it made a great lunch

i look forward to trying many more dumplings

cheers

Address: 1335 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y9 Canada
Review:
i really wanted to give this place 5 stars but the food was ok

visiting halifax from toronto i guess im putting this place up against a lot of other more established dumpling places but for what seems to be one of only a few dumpling places in town its decent

dumplings seemed small though and could barely taste the shrimp pork and shrimp version could have ordered the pork dumplings and not have told the difference

the chicken legrice combo was good  never had this dish before and the pickled potatoes or whatever it was was a nice complement sauce could have been more flavorful

Address: 1335 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y9 Canada
Review:
had an excellent time server was polite and i cant rave enough about the food i had the braised pork and egg noodles and the pork was perfectly tender the broth it came in was very flavorful
i dont know if it is useful quiet in the late afternoon but when we came there was only one other table of people so it was a quiet peaceful atmosphere
would definitely recommend checking this place out

Address: 1335 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y9 Canada
Review: food and service was great a few fruit flies did keep us company which was a little annoying

Address: 1549 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 1S2 Canada
Review: food is decent calamari was lacking seasoning dip was above average apple compote ratio to fritter is to much ahi tuna sandwich was amazing the lobster roll was great as well service was amazing but service is not great enough to overcome slightly above average food

Address: 1549 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 1S2 Canada
Review:
great atmosphere food and service
lobster roll had a generous serving of lobster
the dozen chef selection of oysters was fresh and reasonably priced
chicken sandwich for the non seafood lover in you was very good

Address: 1549 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 1S2 Canada
Review: the food was so good tried the chef selection of oysters scallops and crab fritters if i wasnt so full i would have kept going because it was just so good the patio is absolutely amazing too will definitely return

Address: 1549 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 1S2 Canada
Review:
it has been 20 years since i last ate at the waterfront warehouse   on rainy summer day stopped for lunch and had a lobster roll   the menu was built for tourists with great fare for all ages   the lobster roll actually had some great quality chunks of claw and knuckle lobster meat    the chips were also great

service was quick and polite   just what was needed for a quick lunch

Address: 1549 Lower Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 1S2 Canada
Review: we had an incredible time at the waterfront warehouse we came for a drink in the afternoon and then decided to come back for dinner after seeing how great the menu was when we came back for dinner we got popcorn scallops kimchi arancini 2 oysters then the fishchips and the fried chicken we loved everything we loved that there was an oyster bar and a menu describing them all weve never had them so we got one each to try we will definitely be back

Address: 1871 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3M8 Canada
Review: lovely delicious mexican specialties i only wish id known it sooner its a tidy pleasant breakfastlunch place i also wish it were bigger had a bar and had dinner my new favourite lunch this will require self control not to go all the time

Address: 1871 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3M8 Canada
Review: stopped here on a lunchtime walk while visiting halifax in may i ordered two empanadas  one black bean and one pork  they were way bigger than i anticipated and i could not finish both so tasty friendly staff would like to return to try more menu items

Address: 1871 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3M8 Canada
Review:
i ordered patacon
it had roast beef special sauce and some other stuff it was a venezuelan dish
i loved the way which they take orders you would a qr code at the table and order by scanning it
customer service was awesome

Address: 1871 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3M8 Canada
Review: favourite place for lunch in halifax everything here is amazing and the service is incredible i had the pork arepa and was not disappointed i usually stick with a favourite menu item at restaurants but i am determined to try the entire menu as everything is phenomenal

Address: 1871 Hollis Street Halifax, NS B3J 3M8 Canada
Review: verano is halifaxs top spot for homemade empanadas trust me what sets them apart are two things excellent portions and mouth watering fillings 16 hour braised beef black bean and queso fresco chicken tinga  just to name a few this is a uniquely wonderful mexican and venezuelan restaurant experience that from what i can tell is familyrun dinein or order as the perfect grabgo snack you wont be disappointed the only downside is theyre not open on weekends

Address: 2305 Clifton Street Halifax, NS B3K 4T9 Canada
Review: we went early to take advantage of happy hour and are glad we did it wasnt busy so the server was very attentive we enjoyed delicious buck a shuck oysters from pristine bay and 6 margaritas to start then i had the tuna tartare and fries while my husband had the halibut we were both very happy with our choices hope to go back soon

Address: 2305 Clifton Street Halifax, NS B3K 4T9 Canada
Review: best restaurant in town phenomenal food and atmosphere great prices for the top notch quality of their ingredients even the basics like the ev caesar bring that wow factor the housemade pasta never fails to impress do yourself a favour and try it out

Address: 2305 Clifton Street Halifax, NS B3K 4T9 Canada
Review: such a wonderful happy hour and onwards experience we had wonderful service all night we enjoyed the oysters so much that we ordered a third set happy hour oysters is a bit funny you get 8 oysters for one dollar each for each appetizermain that you order so 8 for 8 oysters with a food purchase there is also a sparkling red and white wine option for 6 during happy hour instead of 9 we had 24 oysters charcuterie plate gnocchi and a burger and it was all really delicious i will definitely be back

Address: 2305 Clifton Street Halifax, NS B3K 4T9 Canada
Review: fantastic experience here came for their happy hour and enjoyed 1 oysters with our order of a charcuterie board limited selection of wine and beer was available for 6 for happy hour the food was delicious and the server was very attentive we asked for extra crackers for the charcuterie board and she provided them promptly would definitely recommend to friends and family

Address: 2305 Clifton Street Halifax, NS B3K 4T9 Canada
Review:
i love this place more and more every time i go back
i often find myself loving a dish at a restaurant and then reordering the same one each time i visit however everything at ev is so delicious that i love switching it up 
except the blueberry cheesecake  thats a staple

love everything about this place cant wait to try brunch

Address: 7156 Chebucto Road Halifax, NS B3L 1N4 Canada
Review: nice restaurant good service food is tasty and reasonable prices if you like diners or looking for a casual familyfriends dinner spot this is a great place to go a little hard to get into narrow small parking area busy road  take quinpool to rotary and turn right into lot that only has about 9 spots good but small wine selection and reasonable prices per bottle food was delicious and fresh desserts were excellent recommend pies and bread pudding yum my parents loved it too picnic tables were added outside for summer time eating fyi

Address: 7156 Chebucto Road Halifax, NS B3L 1N4 Canada
Review:
had a good dinner at the armview i remember as a child going into a restaurant like this with my grandmother and it brought back pleasant memories
i love establishments like the armview where everything seems original to the time period it was first opened these establishments are becoming rare to find
the armview is a terrific restaurant and has amazing atmosphere the staff are super friendly and attentive to their guests the food was good made fresh and served hot

Address: 7156 Chebucto Road Halifax, NS B3L 1N4 Canada
Review: so good sat in the dog friendly park and got take out from them because the park part of the restaurant was not serving yet but the bartender was great and made it easy to order take out got the lobster eggs benedict and the regular eggs benedict as well as the creme brulee french toast it was all amazing highly recommend

Address: 7156 Chebucto Road Halifax, NS B3L 1N4 Canada
Review: we went for breakfast on sunday it was my first time there there was a line of people waiting for tables and the place was very busy we waited 10  15 minutes and got a table the server was nice and the atmosphere was good i didnt like the menu and what we decided to get was ok

Address: 7156 Chebucto Road Halifax, NS B3L 1N4 Canada
Review: menu was on the small side and didnt really have a wide range i brought my grandmother and son in to try it out the onion rings had a too crispy coating that left the roof of my mouth a bit raw my grandmother could not eat them she did like the burger i could not finish my burger as there was a short and curly not belonging to myself or my company thankfully the server graciously refunded the meal the interior has a nice old set feel but suffers from its age and lack of upkeep my son did enjoy his pizza

Address: 59 King St Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H2 Canada
Review: we stopped in last night for the first time for food and drinks and i was pleasantly surprised with how great it was we shared the variety platter which was 1010 we also tried the nachos and fries which were loaded with fresh ingredients and super flavourful the sangria was delicious everything was fairly priced the live music was awesome as well i will definitely be back

Address: 59 King St Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H2 Canada
Review:
this was one of the best breakfast i had in a long time big portions great taste nice presentation and a nice variation on our plates

we were questioning at first when we walked in and saw that no one else was there eating whether or nor we wanted to stay but we gave it a shot and were thankful we did this is going to be a must stop anytime were going to be in dartmouth area

we went a second time and tried lunch instead of brunch and it didnt disappoint

Address: 59 King St Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H2 Canada
Review: went with a friend this morning for brunch this was my first time and i can say wholeheartedly everything was phenomenal i was hyped about chicken waffles and it wasnt short of amazing the chicken was tasty and bacon was crunchy waffles were served with maple syrup the service was wonderful too we were the first ones in and although few more tables came in the server didnt neglect us coffee was too strong for me but its caffeine so thats not really a bad thing lol free mimosa with brunch is also a score i highly recommend this place for a good brunch meal just go

Address: 59 King St Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H2 Canada
Review: visited here for first time last weekend will definitely be back amazing service by meg  she took time to introduce the item on the menu made several recommendations overall super service and great food  drinks were nice and cold too

Address: 59 King St Dartmouth, NS B2Y 1H2 Canada
Review:
talk about a hidden gem who would guess that a bar  grill in downtown dartmouth would have one of the best brunches in the city

the menu isnt huge but the portions and quality make up for it plus they have free mimosas and caesars youre welcome

Address: 1075 Queen Street South End, NS B3H 1M5 Canada
Review: authentic chinese food right in downtown halifax the menu has skewers hot pot noodles and rice dishes lots of options for different tastes we tried the beef noodles and the seafood hot pot special from the off the eaten path halifax asian food festival and they were both very tasty and affordable would definitely come back and try other dishes the only downside was that only one main dish came first and it wasnt until the dish was almost finished that the other dish came

Address: 1075 Queen Street South End, NS B3H 1M5 Canada
Review: omg i never would have found this place if someone hadnt taken me such a tiny hidden away spot and soooo delicious and authentic we shared a shrimp pan full of fresh veggies and crispy shrimp that you ate whole skins and all full of fresh and dried peppers but just the right amount of heat interesting cumin seed flavour as well next time we r trying the pan full of trotters pig feet wear a sweater in the summer as highly air conditioned my only complaint is the seating is uncomfortable no legroom at any of the tables it seems but we keep going back because its so delicious highly recommended cold chicken appetizer

Address: 1075 Queen Street South End, NS B3H 1M5 Canada
Review: fantastic food and the waitress was very polite the owner helped me order something i was happy with and overall it was a great experience i got the beef tendon appetizer which was a bit spicy which was nice

Address: 1075 Queen Street South End, NS B3H 1M5 Canada
Review: i loved this restaurant very muchi ordered spicy chilli fish fillet and lamb skewers  they were fantastic

Address: 1075 Queen Street South End, NS B3H 1M5 Canada
Review: we tried this while visiting halifax for the iwk and we liked it  not exactly what we thought we were getting but it was still good

Address: 3619 Novalea Drive Halifax, NS B3K 3G1 Canada
Review: stumbled into caribbean bliss this morning and was welcomed with the warmest greeting and most fantastic food really low key spot in the north end and totally worth the stop service was so friendly as we learned the story behind the business and the passion going into the food this is what real cooking tastes like the menu is small and yet curated in a way that caters to all tastes the flavours of caribbean cuisine come together with french food and a touch of lebanese background everything is so well done fresh and a delicious balance of sweet with a caribbean kick the sweet and sassy breakfast croissant  was delicious and the benedict was perfect the wedges that come on the side are also amazing just overall a great dining experience doing something a little different in halifax worth the stop will be back to try some of the sweet breakfast options and desserts

Address: 3619 Novalea Drive Halifax, NS B3K 3G1 Canada
Review: truly remarkable what amazing food  i had the jerk chicken and waffles for breakfast and a very attentive informative and charming owner its a little outside of downtown but i really must encourage everybody to visit this restaurant the ambience is amazing and service is out of this world you wont regret it

Address: 3619 Novalea Drive Halifax, NS B3K 3G1 Canada
Review:
it is a small restaurant full of very good vibes the owner is very nice and he pays attention to every detail  the food is prepared with a lot of dedication and the end result is simply delicious
the mango cheese cake is the most superb highly recommended

Address: 3619 Novalea Drive Halifax, NS B3K 3G1 Canada
Review: fine breakfast dining with carribean twists great price and huge portions too that never happens made our trip to halifax memorable you must order the mango drink the breakfast croissant a staple breakfast roti huge great house sauce frites all eaten place clean and peaceful decore is easy on the eyes as is the food very talented and experienced chef who studied french cuisinethank you chef elias was full all day after

Address: 3619 Novalea Drive Halifax, NS B3K 3G1 Canada
Review: the best place to start your day the chef is very kind and funny very yummy breakfast very recommended

Address: 100 Main St Dartmouth, NS B2X 1R5 Canada
Review:
it was a delight full experience 
we went around eve and we got good seating options and had ordered just a little but the servings were so big  keep that in mind one serving can be shared by 3 easily and they have this halal menu wow

Address: 100 Main St Dartmouth, NS B2X 1R5 Canada
Review:
i remember it used to be a good restaurant with a good selection even on lunch time but over the last time so called new panda got worse and worse
i saw again almost empty trays no  longer seafood etc   waiters looking at clients how they struggling to find something to eat and no one cares to refill trays on your request to add food in trays no one doing this

Address: 100 Main St Dartmouth, NS B2X 1R5 Canada
Review:
decent experience all you can eat buffet which are very few in the city if halifax this place offers a wide range of east asian food the food is good no complaints there the service was also very good the staff were smiling very polite and always checking on its customers
ive been there approximately 45 times and my only criticism is that the restaurant has never been renovated it would be nice to have the seating areas updated and cleaned as there were liquid stains on the tables and seats peeling paint on walls and wooden seats etc otherwise you will enjoy the food and service

Address: 100 Main St Dartmouth, NS B2X 1R5 Canada
Review: we are extremely satisfied by the service and attitude of the employees the approach was very polite and respectful towards the customers even though we were late to dine in they were still happy and served us well thank you

Address: 100 Main St Dartmouth, NS B2X 1R5 Canada
Review: we recently held a birthday party here with around 20 people the selection was excellent and the buffet counters were kept clean food was hot and fresh and replenished if any selection was running low communication was also very good the restaurant even called a few days in advance to reaffirm our reservation was still happening service was friendly and polite

Address: 620 Nine Mile Drive Unit 1-9 Bedford, NS B4A 0H4 Canada
Review: i have nothing but absolutely kind words for these people in particular bedford location beautiful atmosphere non rushed services kid friendly and able to accommodate similar but virgin drinks for youre pre teens servers and service is just exceptional and just beautiful humans  im thankful for robyn sorry if i misspelled and her amazing staff  food is great i love the selection and drink selections  i would say in the last week i have been there 3 times  the lunch menu is just so simple and a great treat whether eating alone or with your 7yr old  i love this place nothing but positive interactions every time ive been there

Address: 620 Nine Mile Drive Unit 1-9 Bedford, NS B4A 0H4 Canada
Review:
i have dined at morris east  uteck many times over the years   its one of my favourite spots to go for a great pizza at a reasonable price   good spot for family night or date night  great variety of pizzas with some good appetizers and dessert  my personal favourite is the lumberjack
recently went for dine around and the special was great
looking forward to going back soon

Address: 620 Nine Mile Drive Unit 1-9 Bedford, NS B4A 0H4 Canada
Review:
service was excellent as we had almost all the servers on staff either serving or checking on our welfaresatisfaction we had a party of seven and we were all served at pretty much the same time all persons in our group had commented on the great taste of their orders i had the spicy hawaiian pizza and it was phenomenal and highly recommended not overly spicy but you have to cater to all levels of taste the open kitchen allows the customers to view the operation and cleanliness

definitely we will be returning

Address: 620 Nine Mile Drive Unit 1-9 Bedford, NS B4A 0H4 Canada
Review: went with my daughter looking forward to it as weve been before the menu changed and it was ridiculously expensive 50 plus tip for one appetizer  one pasta  i had only water no wine no desert no coffee  no table bread we shared the pasta so each had one tube of canneloni  walked out hungry and 60 poorer its not fancy enough to charge this much for a romantic dinner yet not reasonable enough to go for a nice bite after shopping sorry morris east youre off the list

Address: 620 Nine Mile Drive Unit 1-9 Bedford, NS B4A 0H4 Canada
Review: we live nearby and frequent morris east for dinner at least every couple of weeks or so it is always incredibly pleasant delicious and quick cody is an outstanding server if youre looking to have a great evening hes your guy my favorite part about the restaurant is that you can tell the owners do not skimp on the quality of ingredients everything is always delicious  please stick around

Address: 984 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: stopped in for early dinner  promptly welcomed  seated  order fried spring rolls pad thai  green curry  everything flavorful spicy  served hot service was low key but efficient highly recommended spot

Address: 984 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: my boyfriend and i tried this place yesterday for the first time as he loves his thai food and i must say the presentation the food and the service was wonderful i usually dont go out for thai but i ordered the sweet and sour chicken and my boyfriend had the red curry chicken and a side of spring rolls food was served piping hot and in a large portion not to mention great prices the spring rolls were some of the best ive had highly recommend this place for good pricing and quality food and service thanks again will definitely be returning in the future

Address: 984 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: i have only ever had deliverypickup from this location so i cant speak to the dining in experience the food is awesome always fresh and super high quality they always have it ready quickly and the pickup is always simple speedy

Address: 984 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review:
came to the restaurant for lunch i ordered fried prawns with tamarind sauce and my friend ordered lunch menu  stir fried spicy chicken the food was ok an average not too good the service was good
the only thing that i dont like is the messy sauce on the edge of the plate how long it takes to wipe it before you serve it to the customer

Address: 984 Cole Harbour Road Dartmouth, NS B2V 1E7 Canada
Review: great little restaurant  michael our server couldnt have been more attentive  the cashew chicken is superb as is the chicken satay with peanut sauce i wish they would bring bring back the thai teai so miss it

Address: 27 Dellridge Lane Unit 105 Bedford, NS B4A 0H1 Canada
Review: great place to hang live music was terrific 1st time golf simulator was a great experience drinks were on point the blue hawaiian is a fruity drinkers too choice

Address: 27 Dellridge Lane Unit 105 Bedford, NS B4A 0H1 Canada
Review: im doing a 3 but its really more of a 35 we were first timers doing a private golf room  the room itself was generous and well set up with lots of room to play and sit  a pleasant couch and chair as well  the food  we had some sharables and beer  was all perfectly standard for a modern pub  the golf experience however needs help  the simulator software being used is lacking  we play virtual golf weekly using the e6 software and patrons system is poor in comparison  especially given that patrons is more expensive  the projection is week the projection screen is torn up and saggy the computer had a broken screen the tee box does not allow you to effectively place your own tee in the ground the white placement nub is not helpful service was very good these small things could be taken care of pretty easily  and i would strongly recommend they switch to e6 as the golf experience is much much better

Address: 27 Dellridge Lane Unit 105 Bedford, NS B4A 0H1 Canada
Review:
great visit to patrons for lunch this is part indoor golf driving range and part restaurant  overall the service was very good friendly and attentive  food quality was also good fresh and tasty the atmosphere is good although you will hear the wack of a golf ball as folks practice their drive looking around i did notice a dead poinsettia on the floor in the corner of the restaurant assuming it was leftover from christmas

one thing we all were surprised to find out and you should consider is they do not serve any coffee there this is the first restaurant ive visited that serves almost everything except coffee note to management put coffee on menu

all in all if you are a golfer or not patrons is worth a visit to gather with friends for a few drinks or a bite to eat  the driving range also looks fun

Address: 27 Dellridge Lane Unit 105 Bedford, NS B4A 0H1 Canada
Review: update watch the bill after getting home and having a chance to review we were double charged for an item  star removed    been a place ive passed my times over the years but never have gone  tried it out and ready liked it just wished it was a 12 priced sharables  food was great we ordered way too much relaxed atmosphere and might have to try the golf sometime

Address: 27 Dellridge Lane Unit 105 Bedford, NS B4A 0H1 Canada
Review:
we loved the experience indoor golf singing and dancing with lovies twas such a great visit to patrons for dinner we so loved the service so friendly attentive and helpful
 oh the food fresh and tasty unwind
just all fun on my 101122
so lovely for intimate gatherings

Address: 247 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3P 1L6 Canada
Review: really enjoyed our lunch here after kayaking on the lake nearby  reasonably priced and good food

Address: 247 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3P 1L6 Canada
Review: i have never had wings as delicious as the maple chili wings here  you could smell the maple good balance of sweet with little kick of spice perfect wife had the pulled chicken club wrap with the beet salad she almost wanted more great service nice rustic atmosphere

Address: 247 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3P 1L6 Canada
Review:
seemed to have went downhill i went five years ago and remember really enjoying the food i went yesterday and it was a different story the truffle fries tasted like they were baked in an oven no flavour and soggy my friends smoked meat sandwich had way too much mustard my chicken pot pie was almost tasteless ones you can get in the frozen food aisle taste way better

on the positive my drink was nice and the waiter was fantastic even though she just started working there and the caesar salad was good

Address: 247 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3P 1L6 Canada
Review:
i can not say enough great things about this place  the environment was great the service was wonderful and the food was fantastic  i went with 4 of my girlfriends and we all got something different  every dish was delicious hot and fresh what

we loved it and will definitely be back

Address: 247 Herring Cove Road Halifax, NS B3P 1L6 Canada
Review:
my husband myself and two friends went here for dinner a couple of weeks ago i do not recall the servers name but she came and took our order i and my friend asked for the captain on duty mocktail to drink our drinks arrived and i had about 3 sips and started to feel off now for context i had gastric bypass surgery a few years back and so alcohol is a big no no and it doesnt sit well with me almost reacts similar to an allergy so i felt as if i was going to pass out i get up to go to the washroom and almost fall asleep in the bathroom as i come back to the dining area i see my husband and friends all paying for theirs and my order i see the receipt says that my drink was 12 so i was confused as mocktails are 5 so i go gran a drink menu and point it out to my husband that its supposed to be 5 we bring this up to the server and she said she didnt know there was a difference she ended up serving us captain on vacation which has rum in it she also didnt ask for id because when we ordered it was mocktails i know she was mortified when she realized what she had done and she said the manager gave us 15 each back to compensate for what had happened but the problem is this shouldnt have happened and what she did was dangerous i hope she learned her lesson and wont be doing that again i am now nervous to order mocktails again with out double checking with the server first

beyond that the food was awesome and we loved the vibe

Address: 1284 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y5 Canada
Review: loved it i live nearby so ive walked by this place probably over 100 times now i went for the first time tonight and it lived up to every expectation i had its so cute inside twinkly lights a little diffuser candles it was so nice it was clean and the service was friendly and fast i loved my vermicelli bowl and the veggie spring rolls were fantastic im so excited i live so close just disappointed it took me so long to get here

Address: 1284 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y5 Canada
Review: delicious food and excellent service so happy i gave this place a try the veggie spring rolls are so good definitely coming back

Address: 1284 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y5 Canada
Review: we came in for bahn mi on a hot day and it was one of the best sandwiches ive ever had perfectly cooked meat top tier bread the flavours are harmonious and theyll add hot sauce if you ask nice quiet location with plenty of room to sit and a simple clean decor scheme very polite and attentive staff ill absolutely be back id recommend it to anyone

Address: 1284 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y5 Canada
Review:
610 pho 610 spring rolls came fried for some reason
very small soup broth is not tasty noodles are off

Address: 1284 Barrington Street Halifax, NS B3J 1Y5 Canada
Review: a great place with a friendly waiter a place to taste a delicious national dish i recommend tasting vermicelli with shrimp and chicken and drinking vietnamese coffee

Address: 5640 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 3M7 Canada
Review: we had hot pot chicken and beef bulgogi the food was delicious and service was impeccable given the previous reviews my expectations for this place were high and it did not fall short we will be back thank you

Address: 5640 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 3M7 Canada
Review: pretty good lunch specials hard to find if you dont know where youre going but service was friendly and food was fresh i ordered the tonkatsu ramen and truly i found it a bit underwhelming in terms of flavour but i enjoyed it nonetheless not a bad option if youre in the area

Address: 5640 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 3M7 Canada
Review: a good friend of mine and i had lunch here and it was absolutely delightful i hadnt had sushi since before the pandemic and this was a real treat and the dishes were absolutely delicious and adorable waitress brought our dishes to us and they made sure that we had all of the sides too  if you wish to try japanese cuisine theres no better place in halifax that i would personally recommend to a great friend

Address: 5640 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 3M7 Canada
Review: fresh sashimi with a fresh ambiance if youre a sushiraw fish fan then is a great place to go the tonkotsu ramen was absolutely delicious i highly recommend

Address: 5640 Spring Garden Road Halifax, NS B3J 3M7 Canada
Review:
wasnt decided to try more sushi places in town but today a great colleague of mine recommended this place and i found it a nice place to satisfy my sushi hunger despite im not a gobbler but vulnerable to seafood and sake
overall well priced menu delicious dishes nice servers and naughty cooks who make fun out of customers in their native language 
will come again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reasonably priced japanese food in downtown halifax

edit
im back again and still the same good place thanks to ryu

update
many thanks to chihiro and yuki for their great service
the eel portion was fantastic

Address: 54 Locks Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2W7 Canada
Review: visited halifax from toronto where there is an abundance of vegetarian and vegan restaurants however this is by far the best vegetarian burger ive ever had the raspberry lemonade float was also delicious they were also serving a vegan cake for their 10th birthday and im not really sure how they made the butter cream but it was amazing

Address: 54 Locks Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2W7 Canada
Review: amazing its always awesome to find hidden gems like lemon dogs i ordered lunch for my workplace and we loved it i was informed that everything on the menu was vegetarian and to be honest i couldnt believe it i got a peach plum sparkling lemonade too and it was so good even the meat eaters loved it we will definitely be back i cant wait to see what the weekly specials are

Address: 54 Locks Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2W7 Canada
Review: great imposible burgers with smart flavour combos we booked ahead and the order still took some time lovely outdoor spot by a river and walking trails outdoor music isnt our choice but still worth the experience

Address: 54 Locks Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2W7 Canada
Review: disappointed with this place they ran out of the kind of tacos i wanted to order and then when they did arrive they were disappointingly small i know the hype about this place is great but i wasnt overly impressed service took forever we had to wait almost 15 minutes for the drinks to arrive alone and then another 15 for the food its just tacos folks how long does it take i wont be back its the only food place in shubie park though so that is a bonus beautiful park

Address: 54 Locks Road Dartmouth, NS B2X 2W7 Canada
Review:
6 stars for krista jordan and their team
you need to come herenice music great vibe so friendly and great food and drinks

Address: 5184 Morris St Halifax, NS B3J 1B3 Canada
Review: when in halifax direct your uber ride to 5184 morris for a culinary treat that is out of this region its simply the best fine dining anywhere the service is impeccable the portions are civilized the wait staff is professional the ambiance is perfect and the prices more than reasonable if its a memorable dinner youre after then this is the proper place

Address: 5184 Morris St Halifax, NS B3J 1B3 Canada
Review:
place was perfectly balanced between a wonderful dining experience and amazing food i can explain to you how much the scallops are to die for this place is a must try

the mains were amazing and lamb 3 ways is a must try this is best fine dining experience in halifax

Address: 5184 Morris St Halifax, NS B3J 1B3 Canada
Review: absolutely delicious place great food superb service very private space perfect for a group dinner of about 1520 people as if dining at home not bothered by other people in the restaurant

Address: 5184 Morris St Halifax, NS B3J 1B3 Canada
Review: the staff at stories went all out to make our first anniversary an amazing night the food and service was remarkable the atmosphere was incredible thank you for everything

Address: 5184 Morris St Halifax, NS B3J 1B3 Canada
Review: amazing dining experience we stayed at the halliburton and therefore reserved for dinner  appetizers the scallops unreal delicious perfect best ive ever had 53 yrs charcuterie plate was good  main course duck was a goodsized portion potatoesveggie sides were succulent beef striploin was tender and full of flavor scalloped potatoes were excellent  great service friendlypolite staff  lived up to its reputation  thank you

Address: 1919 Upper Water Street Halifax, NS B3J 3J5 Canada
Review: lovely restaurant is located inside the hotel with a beautiful atmosphere great staff the manager she was amazing  super friendly made my drinks on point along with the other bartender carly not to mention the waitresswaiters hannah  christian gave absolutely amazing service with the fooddrinks i will definitely be back next time in town highly recommended
