Review: i went once in the past with my family we really enjoyed the food but the service was pretty lacking we decided to come back today we had to wait 15 minutes to even get a table when there were like 3 tables taken and even then we had to ask to get seated we waited at least 30 minutes for someone to take our order until we asked someone they said a moment and did not come back for another 10 minutes so we just left if you have the patience of a saint and dont mind waiting an eternity to eat then the food is great but they have to fix their customer service for sure it would lowkey be less time consuming to go to the super market and cook the food yourself

Address: 575 Boulevard Saint-Martin O Laval, QC H7M 1Y9 Canada
Review: pretty tasty food tried the chicken with cashew nuts fried rice and the salt and pepper shrimps they were very good the hot and sour soup could have used a little seasoning but everything else was very tasty would definitely recommend if youre in the laval area

Address: 575 Boulevard Saint-Martin O Laval, QC H7M 1Y9 Canada
Review: really great i had their yang chow fried rice general tao salt and pepper squid all were really good portions are gigantic service was quick and courteous this is my go to chinese restaurant

Address: 575 Boulevard Saint-Martin O Laval, QC H7M 1Y9 Canada
Review: hard to review good place for a family to eat at low price and soft taste for my part i preferred to have my plate with more taste but in the same time i may not chose thr speciality to retry one day

Address: 3424 Boulevard Cartier O Laval, QC H7V 1K2 Canada
Review: after seeing and reading couple of unpleasant comments on their website i decided to try it out myself actually i believe all those comments were not fair to them specially with about rudeness of the wait staff all i have seen and have to say wait staff was kind pleasant  respectful and top of the action in regards to food i had a butter chicken which was delicious fresh and had a good taste of the flavor rice and their non was fresh hot vegetable dish that i had was quite tasty as well our server was  harsh special thanks to him in regards to explaining the menu and recommendations that he made he was quite knowledgeable and having complete understanding of the menu i cant really remember the waiters name she was kind and walking around with water jar going table to table for refilling glasses overall we had an exceptional service and authentic indian cuisine i am not really very close to them otherwise i would have become their regular customer but definitely i will go back and try some other delicious foods ps  to the owner or manager please disregards all the previous negative comments about your wait staff they all work very hard and they represent your business stop investigating all the fake comments about them i seen it and witnessed that they are very welcoming and kind

Address: 3424 Boulevard Cartier O Laval, QC H7V 1K2 Canada
Review: this is our goto for indian with the monopoly in laval theres no need to head to jean talon anymore their butter chicken is absolutely spot on naan is fantastic preferred the korma dish elsewhere but still a really solid spot for comfort food bring your own wine  friendly service  even when theyre super busy

Address: 3424 Boulevard Cartier O Laval, QC H7V 1K2 Canada
Review: wow thats a place i would definitly go back to food is so good and the service is nice you have a lot of choices  naan bread is huge  i went for a takeout and i forgot a small bag of food the guy actually called me back you dont see that in many places the place is also beautiful

Address: 3424 Boulevard Cartier O Laval, QC H7V 1K2 Canada
Review: excellent indian cuisine family run business home made dishes and affordable prices a hidden gem try the butter chicken

Address: 3424 Boulevard Cartier O Laval, QC H7V 1K2 Canada
Review: delicious foodvery good portion sizes the samosas were the best ive ever had staff is very friendly and helpful we were a group of 8 on a very busy day but everything was delicious

Address: 1661 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review:
cool place the interior is not bad its a full menu place where you can fined an amazing international menue with alcohol 
the best part was the food  delicious  we really loved our plates
the service was not bas could be uplifted with a bit more of smiles
prices were logical compared to a similar place
i will definitely visit it again to try more delicious food
cheers

Address: 1661 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review:

food is fresh  delicious my favorite are the potatoes good size portions and reasonably priced

service is great and quick definitely one of my favorite places to have brunch at

Address: 1661 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: i had a great breakfast the food was served fast the portions were a good size and the staff was nice  i would definitely come again

Address: 1661 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: this restaurant is amazing and the service is impeccable my friend and i went to brunch to celebrate our birthdays and our waiter was so warm and accommodating the food is delicious whether youre eating breakfast or lunch and those potatoes  definitely recommend i will be going back

Address: 1661 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: i just had lunch at kitchen 73 laval and i was disappointed with the food and the managers service i took the table dh√¥te which included dessert and coffee the appetizer and main course took a long time to arrive so i asked for the dessert and coffee to go instead the manager comes to hand me the bag with the dessert and added that we shouldnt take it to go nor can we take the coffee to go since theyre need to be consumed in the restaurant i tell her that the main course was late and im out of time so thats why asked for them to go she adds  do you want to have your coffee now in the restaurant obviously shes didnt get it she could have just explained that theyre to be taken in the dining room and that shell make an exception if thats such a big deal for them at least you gain a customer but this time you lost a returning one

Address: 1031 Boulevard des Laurentides Laval, QC H7G 2V8 Canada
Review:
this restaurant was recently recommended to us here we were for the first time service was excellent after waiting only about five minutes to get in they even have a shelter to wait in outside if its bad weather
once in we were served quickly menus is simple and straight forward place under a glass table top
started with a glass of sangria for both of us and an appetizer of caesar salad which was enough for both of us tasty and fresh
we ordered their specialty which was the fish and chips single piece which came with a quarter of lemon tartar sauce and a side of cole slaw needless to say plenty of home made fries no frozen food here
definitely good value for your money here

Address: 1031 Boulevard des Laurentides Laval, QC H7G 2V8 Canada
Review:
were on a mission to find the best fish and chip place around town for context we are bench marking against the fish shack in lunenburg ns which i consider a 1010  so far this does not disappoint with a strong 85 to 9 out of 10 the portions are large but not greasy take the double you wont regret it since it was our first time my partner took two and i took one yes i stole 12 of his second  and absolutely will be taking the double next time
the fries are standard size home made and crispy the cole slaw on point  tartar sauce was sweeter than expected still very good not knocking it and really enjoyed the dill sauce not as sweet and very dilly
we did not try the deserts maybe next time
note the place doesnt look like much but dont be put off by the location or aesthetics the food is an epicureans dream
service was really good also we were greeted and sat right away namely because we went for lunch on a saturday they dont take reservations so if youre going during peak hours there will most likely be a long wait totally worth it

fyi not much choice on the menu which imho is a good thing didnt see any veg options aside from soup and salad but thats not why were going there

Address: 1031 Boulevard des Laurentides Laval, QC H7G 2V8 Canada
Review: great place i really loved the fish and chips the portions are very generous service was quick and polite really great place highly recommended

Address: 1031 Boulevard des Laurentides Laval, QC H7G 2V8 Canada
Review: a friend recommended this restaurant to me saying that they made the best fish  chips in laval my friend was right had the cream of cawliflower soup fish n chip platter fresh cut homemade french fries  and ended my meal with an upsidown strawberry  cake hats  off to the entire staff  the restaurant is extremely clean and inviting thank you i will definitely be back soon

Address: 1031 Boulevard des Laurentides Laval, QC H7G 2V8 Canada
Review: food was delicious portions were generous service was amazing we went there for my motherinlaws birthday and out of 8 adults everybody loved their food

Address: 3131 Boulevard de la C√¥te-Vertu Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1Y6 Canada
Review:

the waitress was extremely nice personally i thought the service was great i would definitely come back

Address: 3131 Boulevard de la C√¥te-Vertu Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1Y6 Canada
Review:

Address: 3131 Boulevard de la C√¥te-Vertu Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1Y6 Canada

Address: 3131 Boulevard de la C√¥te-Vertu Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1Y6 Canada

Address: 3131 Boulevard de la C√¥te-Vertu Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1Y6 Canada

Address: 9443 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1S5 Canada
Review: absolutely love coming here when ever friends come from out of town they want to come here first great service amazing food and they are so nice and welcoming always get good laught such a great addition to the neighborhood

Address: 9443 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1S5 Canada

Address: 9443 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1S5 Canada

Address: 9443 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1S5 Canada
Review: dominique has brought to life a longcherished dream he is a wonderful host and this is most definitely a great addition to the neighbourhood  a must visit

Address: 20 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2W 1G6 Canada
Review: the atmosphere and the vibe of this place is awesome the staff were friendly attentive and their recommendations were top notch the waitress said they are known for their dumplings and she was not wrong really good place for drinks and aperitifs

Address: 20 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2W 1G6 Canada
Review:

Address: 20 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2W 1G6 Canada
Review: bar suzanne is such a find  fabulous gastropub food available most of the day and happy patrons gathering laughing talking communing we loved the open balcony and tables in the bar where we could perch and watch the enlivening street life below while the best music wooed us into a state of joy  bar suzanne should be kept a secret so it can retain its fresh innocence but its a secret worth shouting from the rooftops go there eat dumplings libate and youll be writing the next rave review

Address: 20 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2W 1G6 Canada
Review: love this place the cocktails and food are very delicious and there prices are very reasonable if you like something casual for a date or with friends this is the perfect place staffs are very friendly and of course there cocktails are on point too will definitely come back

Address: 20 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2W 1G6 Canada
Review: cozy atmosphere ambient light great choice of soundtracks the place offers a large selection of wines which was a nice surprise not overcrowded the asian fusion fries with french vinaigrette and seaweed are a truly delicious snack on a winter night the only downside are probably the prices which are a bit high in my opinion

Address: 8870 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1R6 Canada
Review:
venue is kid friendly  lots of entertainment from staff  generous on the food  can be loud at times

only downside because of the location parking can be a challenge

venue does not accept credit card

Address: 8870 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1R6 Canada
Review:
went for a night out with my girlfriend to check out what it was all about this place was even better than what we imagined the food the people the atmosphere is all amazing a little more on the pricier side though youre going for the experience of dining at a tavern filled with rustic decorations captivating servers and charismatic bards

i dont want to say too much so you can experience it on your own though it was our first time going were definitely coming back

merci chopin

Address: 8870 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1R6 Canada
Review: absolutely an amazing place with the best atmosphere and really great food too hats off to gaspard who was our host that evening also the troubadours were really nice too

Address: 8870 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1R6 Canada
Review: amazing staff ambiance was impeccable a knight was walking by regularly to talk to us roleplaying the barb was incredible took request song it is an ambiance dinner we were last service so they asked for the attention of the room and told a story about a dragon we then all share the blood of the dragon and it waste worth it i think im becoming a dragon would recommend in a heartbeat for anyone who wants to have a medieval ambiance feast

Address: 8870 Rue Lajeunesse Montreal, QC H2M 1R6 Canada
Review: we had a great evening of boisterous entertainment and hearty fare at the red dragon inn the decor and staff really helped the medieval theme transporting you back to a simpler time tasty and filling food all washed down with good ale bor√©ale not the place for a quiet romantic evening but one to be thoroughly enjoyed with good company as you bang the tables and raise your tankard to the troubadour who regales you with tales and song

Address: 124 Rue Fleury Ouest Montreal, QC H3L 1T4 Canada
Review: the food is decent quality but theres no variety nor something special the place lacks of atmosphere

Address: 124 Rue Fleury Ouest Montreal, QC H3L 1T4 Canada
Review: as you step your foot into the restaurant you are welcomed by the magnificent  setting it may be a small restaurant but it is cozy and we got a lot of helpfrom the caring staff with recomendations and good descriptions of the plates the cheff was also on point great di ing experience

Address: 124 Rue Fleury Ouest Montreal, QC H3L 1T4 Canada
Review: excellent peruvian restaurant with with 2 other couples and we all like it will be back

Address: 124 Rue Fleury Ouest Montreal, QC H3L 1T4 Canada
Review: one of the best restaurant in mtl hands down ceviche de thone is out of this world the service was steady and excellent cant wait for the new menu on next month

Address: 124 Rue Fleury Ouest Montreal, QC H3L 1T4 Canada
Review: fantastic place great food great wine that place should be packed on a saturday night yet it was as if we were uncovering some precious secret

Address: 9735 Boulevard de l'Acadie Montreal, QC H4N 2W2 Canada
Review: the best place for a real 100 lebanese brunch the food is really good if you want to taste everything i advise you to go in a group the portions are huge and made to be shared the only negative point is that the wait is long and it is not possible to make a reservation there is not much space and the restaurant is too popular for its size but its worth it i highly recommend it the service is fast the portions are generous and the price is reasonable

Address: 9735 Boulevard de l'Acadie Montreal, QC H4N 2W2 Canada
Review:
the traditional lebanese breakfast place in montreal the food was great it really feels and tastes like youre in lebanon unfortunately the service is not that great they missing the smile  and if they do smile it doesnt feel genuine
this is a highly recommended place if you are in montreal and starving for a lebanese breakfast
bonne app√©tit

Address: 9735 Boulevard de l'Acadie Montreal, QC H4N 2W2 Canada
Review:
we came here for sunday brunch

theres no reservations and the place is very small they give you a number and you wait until they call you we waited for about 30 mins and we were seated

the place is very small that the tables are all so close to each other you can clearly hear other ppls conservation its very loud and theres also alot of families with kids

if you are looking to go somewhere quit to eat brunch this is not the place to go

when you seat down they give you tea the tea wasnt to my liking at all
they dont offer glasses of water so we got bottle of water

they also give you complimentary plate of olives turnip cucumber and tomatoes

we ordered the spicy cheese and zahtaar sage that was very good i think it was my favorite it was very big and came on a board

we also got the professor lebneh the tahini foul and the meat egg they were okay nothing especially the tahini foul was lemony i felt like there was just too much lemon in there

will i go back i dont know this is not a place you would go every week its a once a few months vibes

Address: 9735 Boulevard de l'Acadie Montreal, QC H4N 2W2 Canada
Review:
the best lebanesesyrian  authentic breakfast or brunch you can ever have in montreal the taste takes me back to lebanon service is amazing friendly stuff and so kind  
i love the idea of the  small corner organised for kids with some toys and books lovely place will come back again

Address: 9735 Boulevard de l'Acadie Montreal, QC H4N 2W2 Canada
Review: the food there is really tasty the best syrianlebanese breakfast in town we were group of 5 the place was crowded so we had to wait about half an hour to get in the service was okay the food came really fast very nice atmosphere definitely going back again i recommend you to try syrian fatteh  plus you will be served a cup of tea once you sit down and its refill

Address: 1238 rue Mackay Montreal, QC H3G 2H4 Canada
Review:
amazing food great portions excellent service and very friendly staff
i ordered the tabouleh salad whoch came in a good portion suitable fir 2 people it was very fresh and tasty as for the hot starter i tried the pastrey plate and it was delicious for the main i got the shish tawook chicken id say it was one of the best shish tawooks ive ever had in my life the chicken was very juicy and tender and it was well marinated for the dessert the knafe is a must have i tried it with their black mint tea and it was delicious overall this place is a must try highly recommended

Address: 1238 rue Mackay Montreal, QC H3G 2H4 Canada
Review: i loved this place first of all im lebanese so you can imagine how much i love lebanese cuisine its just the best right that said i can honestly say how authentic the taste of their menu items is we ordered the dips the  garlic potatoes some cheese rolls fattouch and knefe is a must at the end yumm service is great make sure you reserve because its almost always full

Address: 1238 rue Mackay Montreal, QC H3G 2H4 Canada
Review:
i love lebanese cuisine and this place was really good
the staff were really nice polite and friendly
the food was good too
we got moussaka and i loved it that was really delicious
we also got shish taouk and shish taouk chili and it was good too
overal liked the place and the food

Address: 1238 rue Mackay Montreal, QC H3G 2H4 Canada
Review: excellent authentic lebanese food a little on the pricier side but justified by being one of the top ive had in montreal to date the place is small but its part of its charm the service was a1 with great attention to detail id cant even recommend a dish as everything i tried was cooked to perfection you should definitely reserve in advance if you want to dine in

Address: 1238 rue Mackay Montreal, QC H3G 2H4 Canada
Review: cute place with good food we got the degustation trempette and the shish taouk the hummus and baba ghannouj were our favourite while the muhammara wasnt the best the chicken in the shish taouk was nice and flavourful

Address: 861 Boulevard Decarie Saint-Laurent, QC H4L 3L7 Canada
Review: i highly recommend this place for special occasions they are consistent in their preparation and the rolls always taste amazing the way the rice is prepared is a key part of what makes sushi so delicious and kyoto does it perfectly with just the right amount of vinegarsugar combine that with their great fish and high quality ripe avocados  a real special treat

Address: 861 Boulevard Decarie Saint-Laurent, QC H4L 3L7 Canada
Review: great place love the delicious  delicate dragon eyes as well as the crab leg tempura the wasabi i love it so fresh and just right

Address: 861 Boulevard Decarie Saint-Laurent, QC H4L 3L7 Canada
Review: the best place in montreal the sushi was delicious and fresh a great service given by the young gentleman i highly recommend this restaurant

Address: 861 Boulevard Decarie Saint-Laurent, QC H4L 3L7 Canada
Review: kyoto is a cozy and inviting family run japanese restaurant that offers outstanding quality sushi with fresh and highquality ingredients the menu is extensive and very authentic food i recommend trying the crab tempura kyoto and to order the kyoto special for a taste of japan the atmosphere is warm and inviting and the staff provide attentive and friendly service its a mustvisit for sushi lovers

Address: 861 Boulevard Decarie Saint-Laurent, QC H4L 3L7 Canada
Review: had a lovely meal its a bit far from my neighbourhood but would go again though theres no photo we also had a korroke too and it was great

Address: 3035 Boul Le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: i celebrated my birthday there and it was a wonderful experience  if you like steak this place is very suitable for you  i had a piece of prime rib and it was cooked to perfection  the atmosphere is nice and the service is very good

Address: 3035 Boul Le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: the food has always been good every time i came and the servers are very friendly and professional its well located with easy access to the highway and carrefour laval mall

Address: 3035 Boul Le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review:
absolutely amazing the keg steakhouse in laval never disappoints

its the perfect spot for a night out with friends or a special occasion with loved ones the team at crown movers has been celebrating there for years and its always a hit the atmosphere is warm and inviting and the steaks are always done to perfection

the service is topnotch with friendly and knowledgeable staff that make you feel right at home most importantly for us protein lovers the medium rare is always done right

Address: 3035 Boul Le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: we went last week for my husbands birthday terrific experience food was delicious and they provided a slide of an amazing cake the six of us enjoyed highly recommend

Address: 3035 Boul Le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: monday night at the keg six of us decided to pop in for a bite plenty of people to make it feel right we had the nachos calamari burgers shrimp ribs steak and a slice of cake everything was on point cooked well and very tastybut the calamari was small tough and tasteless the service was polite and attentive

Address: 1206 Avenue Union Montreal, QC H3B 3A7 Canada
Review: extremely popular joint it was hard to get a reservation on a thursday nightloud vibrant and zestful crowd great wait staff portions are small tapas style we ordered tacos and they were one of the best tacos we have ever had including in mexico i recommend it 100

Address: 1206 Avenue Union Montreal, QC H3B 3A7 Canada
Review: 455 al pastor tacos decent fried chicken tacos not bad ribs tasty a tad pricy small amount churros good mezcal enjoyed neat served with orange slices dipped in sweet salty spices overall good food though on the expensive side for what you are getting taco presentation on the messy side

Address: 1206 Avenue Union Montreal, QC H3B 3A7 Canada
Review: delicious tacos and ceviche great qualityprice and very fast and friendly service  a bit loud though during lunch rush hour so not the best place to chat still highly recommend

Address: 1206 Avenue Union Montreal, QC H3B 3A7 Canada
Review: fast and good service  delicious food and compostable takeout containers what more could you ask for the pozole verde soup and the cauliflower general tao with tamarind agave coriander and garlic sour cream were delicious  as were the truffle mushroom cheese quesadillas i took to go id come back to try the cauliflower taco

Address: 1206 Avenue Union Montreal, QC H3B 3A7 Canada
Review: somehow i took no pictures of the tacos which were the best part okay the drinks were also great and the bartender was incredibly friendly and helpful it was a kind of eclectic mixing of foods but everything tasted good except maybe the cevicheit wasnt bad but it wasnt what i expected as ceviche it was kind of like guacamole with some fish in it

Address: 2373 Boulevard Marcel-Laurin Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1K4 Canada
Review: fabulous lebanese restaurant with an aged but still elegant setting meant more for groups willing to share plates vs individual orders more variety in the appetizers than the √©ntrees definitely a pricier restaurant for the portions but the quality is high particularly with their meats service was a little slow even though it was not busy

Address: 2373 Boulevard Marcel-Laurin Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1K4 Canada
Review: i went here with my lebanese girlfriend and she absolutely loved it so did i everything everything was good i dont remember all the names of the plates but definitely try chef choice of grillades and that raw kibeh entree is typical lebanese dish very good abit expensice but 100 worth it family owned and been open for decades

Address: 2373 Boulevard Marcel-Laurin Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1K4 Canada
Review: one of the oldest middle eastern restaurants in montreal the place is traditionally old but the food and service are amazing and the place as a whole is familyoriented the grilled fillet mignon is fabulous

Address: 2373 Boulevard Marcel-Laurin Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1K4 Canada
Review:
great libanon ambiance
cozy
710 for the food
rice not famous
meat needs more passion and seasoning

great with family

Address: 2373 Boulevard Marcel-Laurin Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 1K4 Canada
Review:
a well known lebanese restaurant that i had the pleasure to try for the first time
we had a meeting first  they organized that we can meet in a private room with water and coffee service after the meeting we went out of the room we had our table already prepared food and service are excellent  the best was the falafel plate a place to recommend

Address: 1695 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: love this restaurant the staff is amazing and so is the food nice portions and a beautiful atmosphere they have a private upstairs area that seat 3055 ppl i always feel like im with family when i eat here the best in montreal  laval surrounding area a must

Address: 1695 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review:
this was my first time here and i came with a big group for a birthday so that could affect my experience but if i had to describe it it wasnt good but wasnt bad either

the food was okay we had nachos and calamari that we shared for appetizers and for my main meal i had the filet mignon with peppercorn sauce accompanied with salmon tartare mashed potatoes and vegetables
the nachos were good
the calamari was good but everyone that had some felt sick by the end of the night
the filet mignon was ok not a lot of flavor and even with the peppercorn sauce it was still ok
the salmon tartare was good and fresh maybe a little more seasoning but overall id have it again
the mashed potatoes were a little bland to my taste but was good with the peppercorn sauce

for the service they had multiple big groups that night so it could effect this but for our group we were over 20 and had only one server they never came to check for water or that everyone had only at the end did we get more after asking we had drinks the drinks were good in the beginning as well but they never came back to ask if we wanted more i never had a set of utensils and had to grab from another table this could be a mix up with a big group the server was nice and handled multiple groups hence why i cant blame her but they could have added more servers she had two big groups in all that so of course some things will be missing

overall the experience was ok i dont know if id go back
ive attached some photos of my meal and drinks we had

Address: 1695 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: really good place to eat food is amazing and service is great perfect place for a big group or big family dinner

Address: 1695 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review: great food and great atmosphere but the service is amazing one of the best ive seen in 40  years when madison says that service is a priority they really seem to mean it and it is reflected in the attitude of every employee in the restaurant special praises for our server giovanni his service blew me away from his initial greeting to the moment we left his service was well above 5 stars simply put if i ran a restaurant i would have offered him a management position right on the spot thank you for a great experience

Address: 1695 Boulevard de l'Avenir Laval, QC H7S 2N5 Canada
Review:
i was going for my usual sureshot meal when a family looked at me and said why chicken vlad you should try something else today like the filet mignon for example

i was like okay why not as long as i see no blood on my plate  so the waiter came through and it was time to order

despite all the sarcasm on the table she managed to understand my picky request she even went as far as saying that her grandmother loves it just like that too lol

long story short i really enjoyed my meal big shoutout to the waiters who made our stay a fabulous one tonight

Address: 30 Boulevard Cur√©-labelle Laval, QC H7L 3B5 Canada
Review:
nice setup with a good outdoor layout it was a bit chilly so we went inside inside has more a barsupper club vibe music was nice but at certain times super loud will definitely try to sit outside next time
food
we ordered two appetizers the cheese platter and gnocchi both were good good size and nice presentation
for the main we ordered the ravioli with lobster and mushrooms really good a bit on the salty side but loved it

dessert
we just had the churros as the creme br√ªl√©e had whiskey in it and thought it could be sour

Address: 30 Boulevard Cur√©-labelle Laval, QC H7L 3B5 Canada
Review: this place was absolutely awesome the oysters were so fresh and massive we ordered multiple different plates and everything was good the waitress was very friendly and our drinks were always kept full i am removing a star because there were a lot of young staff standing by the kitchen hugging and touching each other and it was so unprofessional to have that right by our table all night

Address: 30 Boulevard Cur√©-labelle Laval, QC H7L 3B5 Canada
Review:
sunday it seems like oyster 1

Address: 30 Boulevard Cur√©-labelle Laval, QC H7L 3B5 Canada
Review: the service we got was borderline unnaceptable having been there more than a dozen times over the last few years july 2023 we jad the gnocchis which were utterly dissapointing cocktails were watery first time dissapointed at le boating  will be back and hope that it was a nad night amd new staff in the kitchen and at the bar

Address: 30 Boulevard Cur√©-labelle Laval, QC H7L 3B5 Canada
Review:
overal 35 definitely not what it used to be they need to have more bars in this place youre gonna wait over 5 mins sounds like nothing until youre actually waiting just to get a drink

and the drinks arent consistent theyre stronger towards the end of the night probably their way of getting people out faster

Address: 424 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2L 1A3 Canada
Review:
this is one restaurant we always visit every time we are in montreal the staff are always very friendly and helpful one employee even recognized us although its been four years since we were there last time

their sushi is not the traditional type which is why they call it fusion sushi but their food from sushi maki to sashimi it is always fresh we have never had any bad experiences their prices are a bit higher now for the service we received and the great quality food they prepared it was still worth it in my opinion

Address: 424 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2L 1A3 Canada
Review:
its easy to say that the chef knows what is doing

great quality great technic friendly and qualified staff

order the degustation and enjoy your food

Address: 424 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2L 1A3 Canada
Review: lots of people recommended the christmas tree appetizer so we started with that and loved it the table also ordered the small sashimi plate the nigiri plate and a madonna roll all of the fish was fresh and everything tasted good but i didnt love that our server was not confident in which fish came on the sashimi and nigiri plates when we asked what they were service overall was not great but i did love the atmosphere and playlist

Address: 424 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2L 1A3 Canada
Review: my favourite sushi spot in the city the space is cozy but not cramped with fun decor and music the staff is always super friendly and of course the food is awesome ive tried most things on the menu and have never been disappointed but make sure to get the christmas trees as an appetizer

Address: 424 Avenue Duluth E Montreal, QC H2L 1A3 Canada
Review: musthave whenever were in montreal the food is so fresh the sushi rolls are super unique and delicious and chico remembered my order from a year ago amazing everything food service and super cute hoodies 1010 cant wait to be back

Address: 851 Rue Rachel E Montreal, QC H2J 2H9 Canada
Review: the vibe the place gave us true haute cuisine very exotic dishes super tasty excellent customer service very calm atmosphere we could talk and it was just awesome for a date or a friends catch up love it we will go again

Address: 851 Rue Rachel E Montreal, QC H2J 2H9 Canada
Review:
upscale african restaurant with different traditional cuisine throughout the continent absolutely delicious dinner everything was breathtaking portion sizes were very small  yet expensive i just wished there was more to savor
beautiful atmosphere friendly staff and very quaint highly recommended

Address: 851 Rue Rachel E Montreal, QC H2J 2H9 Canada
Review:
quaint restaurant serving amazing sub saharan african food
service was great
drinks asmara and dawa were amazing
food
4 course tasting menu and artic charfish dish
dessert puff puff with amarulamango ice cream

Address: 851 Rue Rachel E Montreal, QC H2J 2H9 Canada
Review: great food and great service we loved the zucchini starter and the pintade dish we recommend

Address: 851 Rue Rachel E Montreal, QC H2J 2H9 Canada
Review: exquisite service the waitresses were both lovely we ended up on a special anniversary night and the menu was spectacular  wasnt the quickest but that is fine since the food was amazing the salmon appetizer and the salmon entree were cooked to perfection the goat was equally good and i had no idea you could add maple syrup as a sauce to goat this restaurant was one of the highlights to my trip to montreal  the only downside was the salad and the cocktail mombassa wasnt of the same standard as the other food however id still drink that again too cant wait for my next montreal trip to revisit this place

Address: 4185 Rue Drolet Montreal, QC H2W 2L5 Canada
Review: cute spot for ramen the food was a little overpriced but all in all a good experience i loved being able to choose the saltiness level of the dish also the service was great they do not take reservations and theres only a small seating area so i would make sure to go on a weekday or early on a weekend the chicken soup base was delicious and i wish i tried the thicker noodles all in all a great dining experience

Address: 4185 Rue Drolet Montreal, QC H2W 2L5 Canada
Review: 55 for everything the service was really good the server was really pretty and they gave us a complimentary drink due their renovation the broth was well seasoned and creamy the tokontsu was delicious which is the most special dish the sides like the takoyaki were normal and tasted like any other

Address: 4185 Rue Drolet Montreal, QC H2W 2L5 Canada
Review: insane ramen which fully exceeded all expectations i had based on the hype of this place well worth the wait but suggest going for lunch to beat the crowds i havent had ramen this good since a salarymanfilled hole in the wall in kyoto the broth is so incredibly flavoured the noodles are absolute perfection and even the pork in the ramen was marinated with some sort of sweetness the croquettes are to die for we ate them so quickly i totally forgot to take a photo and the karaage was phenomenal with some of the best sauce ive ever seen paired with it photo is one piece less than what arrived as we couldnt help ourselves from tasting the food is absolutely a 10010 and cant wait to go back to try to other menu items note that the ramen side is currently closed for renovations so we ate on the other side the service was a bit all over the place eg got our beers after our first appetiser was out but still recommend this place nonetheless if youre going to eat ramen anywhere in montreal and want a true japanese dish make sure to stop in here

Address: 4185 Rue Drolet Montreal, QC H2W 2L5 Canada
Review: i went a monday evening and it was quite busy as we had to add ourselves to their virtual waiting list the place was very packed as we were going to have to wait over an hour to sit we ended up sitting at the bar area instead the place is a little small and there was not that much room overall  the guy at the bar was very friendly and gave us a good service the ramen was good quality and you can customize it with the order sheet they are generous with the meat portion and their chicken teriyaki was very good they also have many interesting options excluding the ramens  they also give extra dressings on the side for the ramens which was a nice feature as well  their cocktails were good and they have many unique options

Address: 4185 Rue Drolet Montreal, QC H2W 2L5 Canada
Review: the ramen is always good our service was quite slow and the server got our order mixed up but they apologized and gaved us free dessert overall it is a nice restaurant with caring servers

Address: 196 Rue Fleury O Montreal, QC H3L 1T5 Canada
Review: retro looking bistro inclining towards a classic fine restaurant a bit pricey though it is worth visiting once or twice but thats it unfortunately their food is okish i give a rare for me four stars to les cavistes simply the kitchens saucier made a much better job then the chef who grilled my cheapcut steak in fact the sauce was noticeworthy i should admit i cannot say the same for their pasta which lacked the essence of oilyspicyaromatic textural balance if not the sauce whats in pasta the apperatifs tray was aesthetically pleasing yet harbored ridiculously small quantities i simply was not impressed by it during covid19 they let you scan a q_code and the menu miracalously appears on your phone if you will be moved by the action overall i recommend this restaurant for the uninitiated to give it a try

Address: 196 Rue Fleury O Montreal, QC H3L 1T5 Canada
Review: this place is a bit out of the way of you are in montreal for a weekend however it is a great place to hang and worth the detour great place service  food and drinks the menu was diverse and the food tasted amazing it is a fun area to be i  too backeries and coffee shops before dinner and an amazing cocktail bar after

Address: 196 Rue Fleury O Montreal, QC H3L 1T5 Canada
Review: cute corner restaurant with extensive wine list very accommodating with my friends allergies

Address: 196 Rue Fleury O Montreal, QC H3L 1T5 Canada
Review: great ambiance good selection of wines delicious food i had the magret de canard ans the cannolis as dessert strongly recommend

Address: 196 Rue Fleury O Montreal, QC H3L 1T5 Canada
Review: i dont get how this place is rated so highly literally everything we ordered entrec√¥te pieuvre tapas plate was terrible

Address: 3035 Boulevard le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: this place is way to expensive 31  for very disgusting food  i will never go back the egg roll was cold mushy and old the rice was pretty dry and bland the meat was quite hard to chew felt like rubber just avoid going there i had to throw aways the food it was painful to digest just yuk its beyond me how they dont go out of business

Address: 3035 Boulevard le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: food was decent priced  very good cheat meal  enjoyed the hospitality of the staff and the service they gave

Address: 3035 Boulevard le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: i ate there on saturday and since then i had diarrhea and i vomited twice 2 days later i still cant eat anything i had the bang bang chicken and the egg noodles and i regret it i will never go there to eat ever again and i suggest you dont either except if you want to be dead inside

Address: 3035 Boulevard le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: 24 for a meal that taste like it was cooked 2 days ago and warmed up in microwave

Address: 3035 Boulevard le Carrefour Laval, QC H7T 1C8 Canada
Review: delicious melt in your mouth chicken had the general tao and grilled chicken and very generous portion definitely worth 20 for the plate

Address: 69 Rue Saint-Zotique Est Montreal, QC H2S 1K7 Canada
Review: this might be my favorite cafe i have ever been to everything about the food the staff and the outdoor seating was fabulous my partner and i both got gelato chocolate and vanilla this was the best gelato i have ever had we both got slices of pizza both were absolutely fabulous the dough and the flavor were great furthermore i got a cappuccino and the flavor was rich i highly recommend this cafe the good prices were the cherry on top

Address: 69 Rue Saint-Zotique Est Montreal, QC H2S 1K7 Canada
Review: came here for breakfast and everything was  warm and delicious they have a nice outdoors patio to eat breakfast pizza was my favourite loved the egg embedded into the cheese the bombolones were fluffy and coated with sugar a little too much sugar coating in my opinion as the sugar got everywhere on me freddy coffee drink was great  would love to come back and try new things

Address: 69 Rue Saint-Zotique Est Montreal, QC H2S 1K7 Canada
Review:
marinara margherita pepperoni sausage and caciocavallo pizzas

i have to admit i see what all the hype is behind sangennaromtl its been around for years and i finally made it there a great little spot located in the heart of little italy serving up some great pizza and coffee for the neighbourhood

being my first time there and not knowing when i would have the time to go back i naturally got the lot i got every slice and style they had that day and each was delicious i feel id have to say my favorite was the margherita something about a classic style pizza just does it for me the dough is fantastic the crust is crunchy and each bite has a little something on it

when your cooking with love and passion its no surprise your going to turn out a great product

Address: 69 Rue Saint-Zotique Est Montreal, QC H2S 1K7 Canada
Review:
great roman style pizza for sure crust is good and the potato and tropea pizzas are delicious ive had slightly better crust for this kind of pizza elsewhere but its still good

drinks are also very strong so theyre not cheap on the booze limited seating with outdoor stand up style tables

Address: 69 Rue Saint-Zotique Est Montreal, QC H2S 1K7 Canada
Review: the marinara slice is sooo simple and delish 350 pretty big and really great crispy crust soft top juicy tomato sauce

Address: 1265 Rue Bernard O Outremont, QC H2V 1V8 Canada
Review:
a great place for pasta they do have good variety of pasta on the menu they even offered non gluten pasta
the decoration of the restaurant is very cute and cozy its a great place for family friends or a date about 50 places seated
overall the food and cocktails that we ordered were good the cocktails could be a little bit more elaborated
if you are a fanatic of pasta i highly recommend this place

Address: 1265 Rue Bernard O Outremont, QC H2V 1V8 Canada
Review:
food quality is very average
price versus portions is terrible portions are so small menu is way overpriced service is very ordinary
you feel cheated when you have this restaurant because they charge way too much versus what you receive in your plate i would be embarrassed to serve those portions

Address: 1265 Rue Bernard O Outremont, QC H2V 1V8 Canada
Review: looking for a goto spot that never disappoints look no further than le petit italien this restaurant consistently delivers amazing dishes and topnotch service with an attention to detail that truly sets it apart whether youre dining solo or with loved ones youre guaranteed to have a memorable experience our recent visit with family was a total success  everyone left feeling satisfied and happy dont hesitate to make le petit italien your next dining destination

Address: 1265 Rue Bernard O Outremont, QC H2V 1V8 Canada
Review: cute restaurant and really nice atmosphere  i wish i would have taken pasta but if the pasta is anything like the rest of the food we got then i would have been extremely disappointed its really hard to not get a cesar salad right but this cesar salad was extremely bland little to no dressing the focaccia well they call it focaccia but it was a poorly baked piece of bread that had the texture of uncooked bread but the taste of burnt bread im not sure how they did that and the meatballs they were okay the sauce tasted like some sort of canned premade sauce if you dont know authentic italian food then you should be fine

Address: 1265 Rue Bernard O Outremont, QC H2V 1V8 Canada
Review: i got lucky tonight i had the worst experience of my life here tonight and its all thanks to le petite italien  by far the worst in the city wine and service was excellent i must say aside from that we are strongly recommending not eating the food here

Address: 1029 March√© Central Montreal, QC H4N 1J8 Canada
Review: the regular size burrito was more than enough for me the taste and the customer service were good i can pass by one more time to try something different

Address: 1029 March√© Central Montreal, QC H4N 1J8 Canada
Review: i am a huge fan of mexican cuisine and i have to say the burritos at this restaurant are simply out of this world the flavors are so fresh and authentic i cant get enough of them mucho burrito always satisfied my cravings and the burritos are massive the workers are always friendly and welcoming every time i visit the staff goes above and beyond to make sure i have a great experience they are always happy to answer any questions i have and make sure i am completely satisfied with my meal very sweet people

Address: 1029 March√© Central Montreal, QC H4N 1J8 Canada
Review: amazing restaurant very clean food is always fresh and tasty staff are friendly professional and very generous highly recommended if youre in the area

Address: 1029 March√© Central Montreal, QC H4N 1J8 Canada
Review: did not receive my order when i called about it the lady was extremely rude i told her not to worry and i will not come back to their establishment

Address: 1029 March√© Central Montreal, QC H4N 1J8 Canada
Review:
love this place
1 very clean
2 they make the food in front of your eyes
3 they take the time with customers to fulfil their needs
4 im not fun of fats food but this place is very special
