Review: me and my wife experience with memories great and create beautiful memories for our anniversary especially with our host xania she was supper nice and friendly addition to that the food was delicious and like home made meal end of the meal they surprise us with small bottle of champagne with our names on it

Address: 1717 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0P9 Canada
Review: their food was beyond my expectation and their service was exceptional the seafood crepe was so good

Address: 1717 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0P9 Canada
Review:
our recent anniversary celebration at memories dining  bar was absolutely outstanding the staff consistently made us feel remembered from our first visit giving us a warm and welcoming experience the ambiance was enchanting setting the perfect mood for our date night the food was divine with each dish expertly crafted and bursting with flavor the service was topnotch with attentive and knowledgeable staff who made our evening truly perfect we left memories with hearts full of joy and cherished memories its the ideal place for special occasionsthank you memories for an unforgettable experience

unforgettableanniversary outstandingservice

Address: 1821 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X7 Canada
Review:
i ordered the appetizer combo platter the bbq chicken was fantastic the beef was perfect the mixed veggies were fresh and tasty the pork wasnt quite as good as normal but still tasty
i just wish that they delivered to my area open up something in the northwest please

Address: 1821 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X7 Canada
Review:
well i have to give 5 stars to this place
i came here lots of times and i dont need to read menu just order xl beef ball soup bbq duck bubble teagarlic ribs and my favorite spicy saucea little bit sweet by the way ive been to calgary and cant enjoy these delicious food every day so i came here thousands of miles to have a bite of hot noodles a few days ago if i have chance or free time in the future and i will be back

Address: 1821 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X7 Canada
Review: i been going to mai phuong for the longest time it is a hidden gem the food is always great along with the service i almost always stick with the double beef on rice which is absolutley amazing paired with the hot sauce that comes with it but i have had other things like the pho which is also great family run business i havent been here during the lunch buffet or nor have i tried it but im sure its just as great definitely a place i reccomend a

Address: 1821 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X7 Canada
Review: we get takeout here about once a week its our family goto they are friendly and the food is tasty

Address: 1821 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X7 Canada
Review: each and every time i come to this restaurant i am so satisfied its a family run business of hardworking people who make great food we had some family in town last night and we ordered a meal for 7 it was hot ready for us and our family loved it thanks so much mai phuong

Address: 3823 Sherwood Drive Regina, SK S4R 6N1 Canada
Review: this is our second visit this year and its such a treat every time the service is excellent and fast even when they are packed full my family of five ordered two 8 pepperoni pizza chicken souvlaki with fries pork souvlaki with mash potatoes beef dip with fries the souvlakis were so delicious so tender and full of flavor i highly recommend this place cant wait to be back their pizzas are one of the best in the city too

Address: 3823 Sherwood Drive Regina, SK S4R 6N1 Canada
Review: we just discovered this hidden little gem  it doesnt look like much from the outside and is tucked into the corner of the plaza but the inside had great atmosphere fantastic service and even better food serving sizes were huge and their greek fries are to die for everyone in our party left awed

Address: 3823 Sherwood Drive Regina, SK S4R 6N1 Canada
Review:
cant rave enough of this place  honestly speaking i didnt have high hopes at first entering the place and settled my expectations at possible decent to average dining experience not so attractive interior with a touch of retro looks very basic and simple
but they reminded me again of an old saying   dont judge a book by its cover
by far the best meat platter we have had in canada till date they say its a platter for two but can easily satisfy four hungry people
highly recommended

service is very fast it took them hardly 1520 mins from order to table
definitely going back again but with bigger gang
 recommended

Address: 3823 Sherwood Drive Regina, SK S4R 6N1 Canada
Review: got the pork souvlaki with rice greek salad tbone steak with a poutine and a ceaser salad very delicious really recommend the steak poutine and greek salad

Address: 3823 Sherwood Drive Regina, SK S4R 6N1 Canada
Review: the food was really good nice ambience and the waiter was very helpful and made our experience worthwhile i think they should increase the music a bit this sometimes people just want to have fun while eating

Address: 4820 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review:
we had sarah as our server tonight at canadian brewhouse south and her service was very good happy and very fast hats off to the bar tender and the kitchen staff as well drinks were very fast as was the food brewhouse reliably has great wings so i would suggest checking them out on wednesdays for wing night

greg

Address: 4820 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review:
we enjoy eating at canadian brewhouse restaurants i know they arent the classiest of joints but years ago the food was pretty good we wont go back to this location we have ate here 3 times in the last year and the service was lousy every time this last visit i ordered a brisket grilled cheese with fries for 1999 our meals were served with no cutlery or napkins it took a long time to get a server to bring us some probably because the server never served the food just some guy complaining he got called in on his day off welcome to the real world buddy lol
the grilled cheese was two pieces of toasted texas toast with a slice of cheddar so thin it was translucent the meat was warmed but overall had too many cold spots to enjoy it it was wasnt warm enough to melt the cheese how can this be called grilled cheese if it isnt even grilled nor enough cheese to constitute a cheese sandwich the waitress offered to have it remade but honestly how can you screw up a grilled cheese sandwich i declined  she took 4 off the bill instead see the picture

Address: 4820 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review:
we were happy to find the kitchen still serving after 10pm on a sunday when dining choices are a lot more limited the impossible burger version of the spicy hickory bbq sandwich was tasty as were the mini pierogis lots of the menu was higher priced than i expected but thats the same everywhere these days the best thing about our visit was our friendly and attentive server sara she made us feel welcome right away even though were not usually fans of the sports bar atmosphere

wed visit again next time were out late and in the area

Address: 4820 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: sarah was very sweet and helpful when we needed drinks or food she checked on us multiple times to make sure we were all doing okay and had everything we needed following that she was very smiley and happy throughout the entire time that she was serving us i believe that she is an amazing waitress and woman all together as for customer service she is very good at that and accommodating

Address: 4820 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review:
very good experience here sorry will be a long review went on october 28 with friends as it was my birthday month and i had free nachos on the app to redeem
my friends got some appetizers as well and all of them were very good
i was very shocked by the size of the nachos and could barely make a dent in them in the restaurant i ended up taking them home and sharing them with my kids after
our waitress i have since forgotten her name was awesome and she was very attentive and in a great mood and she was just starting her shift it was nice to go to a restaurant and have good vibes all around and have the wait staff be genuinely friendly and happy and they were all dressed up as well in the halloween spirit
we threw the hostess off a bit as my friend was wearing a large brimmed hat for her gothic halloween costume and i was wearing a pumpkin shirt and leggings with pumpkins on them she complimented us on our costumes and my friend looked at her with a straight face and said what costumes this is our everyday wear the hostess had a look of horror on her face until we started laughing and said just kidding and then she laughed as well
5 keep it up cant wait to come back again to enjoy the atmosphere

Address: 1850 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 3Y9 Canada
Review: my dining experience at peking house was exceptional the ambiance was cozy and inviting and the service was friendly and attentive i ordered the yang chow fried rice and seafood hot plate and they were both outstanding and my favorite the rice was perfectly cooked and the seafood hot plate was flavorful and cooked to perfection the presentation of the dishes was beautiful and the portion sizes were generous overall i had a wonderful time and would highly recommend peking house to anyone looking for authentic chinese cuisine and a great dining experience here in regina downtown

Address: 1850 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 3Y9 Canada
Review: this is a restaurant specialising in beijing cuisine that i thoroughly enjoyed when our family came to eat the staff was attentive dedicated and carefully guided about the food they didnt leave us alone especially considering the fact that there were only two of us and one guest table on that monday when it comes to food the food here is outstanding for my family because the dishes we ordered were neither too salty nor too sweet also the fish maw and crab soup yang chou fried rice and bbq duck are all excellent

Address: 1850 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 3Y9 Canada
Review:
we ordered in advance for pickup and were given a time of 45 minutes before the order would be ready  we prefer waiting for good food  however when we arrived they were extremely busy and unfortunately we waited another 45 minutes to an hour after paying for the order for our food to be ready  again we prefer to wait for good food as opposed to having it rushed however if the establishment was that busy letting us know the wait would be longer than normally anticipated would have been better than waiting around the crowded entry and parking lot
the food was definitely great priced a tad high and the extra wait without as much as a word or an apology left us a bit unimpressed

Address: 1850 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 3Y9 Canada
Review: spent 15000 for 7 people only got 2 fortune cookies and enough lemon and sweet and sour sauce for 1 person really  why is your take out food not as good as your in person food i realize that take out is never as good as being there in person but i ordered dinners for 10 people before and it was still good this time i ordered out favourite items off menu for my special guests after raving about your food i was embarrassed and disappointed especially with the shrimp which was in most dishes its hard to let go of what i considered best chinese in regina

Address: 1850 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 3Y9 Canada
Review: food was great the prices are definitely not overprice considering how authentic and scrumptious the food was the staff was so kind and thoughtful the atmosphere was great and the restaurant was just spotless

Address: 2305 Smith Street Regina, SK S4P 2P7 Canada
Review: i absolutely loved the mango shrimp salad my partners waffle was excessively sauced but thats better than undersauced cozy atmosphere was a gorgeous day to be seated outside staff was friendly and helpful

Address: 2305 Smith Street Regina, SK S4P 2P7 Canada
Review: we ate here on the patio in the summer with kids  service was exceptional and the food was really good  the five of us each ordered something different and every dish was excellent they even whipped up some offmenu mocktails for us

Address: 2305 Smith Street Regina, SK S4P 2P7 Canada
Review:
the brunch at fireside bistro is fantastic  they have a great little patio outside or  inside seating in the lounge area or in their regular dining room

they have a variety of breakfast and lunch items to choose from  from waffles loaded with warm strawberries to make your own omelet or choose from 6 different eggs benedict there is something for everyone

i had the oaxacan benedict which was served spicy chorizo  it will leave your tastebuds tingling

Address: 2305 Smith Street Regina, SK S4P 2P7 Canada
Review: food was fantastic the patio is lovely service was good but really slow took a long time to get order taken and over an hour to receive food thank goodness it was worth the wait tandoori chicken salad was amazing

Address: 2305 Smith Street Regina, SK S4P 2P7 Canada
Review:
this place is amazing a hidden gem in the city that deserves to be discovered over and over again

the food presentation alone is worth the trip

please come support this local masterpiece

they honestly have the best pecan pie in all of canada better than any other place ive been since getting to this country a decade ago

Address: 832 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: first time trying afghan cuisine and its way better than i thought the lamb kabob i ordered is tender and juicy and full of spice aroma  my wife ordered the lamb stew and its also very excellent  what a great experience

Address: 832 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: the lamb was fall of the bone delicious it just melted in my mouth absolutely wonderful the chai was very nice and aromatic

Address: 832 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: the staff were so friendly and caring about customers the food quality was good  well marinated kebabs tasty felafel well cooked ricebut food portion is not as much as expected according to the price i got platter deal for 2 and it was really small portionif you order these kebabs and meals separately it would be more reasonable

Address: 832 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review:
enjoyed the lunch buffet
nice restaurant im the only customer today lol
not much variety but its enough
simple but delicious 
233 is acceptable
love the kebab and falafel

Address: 832 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review:
very good and delicious food
excellent customer service

Address: 2234 14th Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0X8 Canada
Review: i ordered the bowl and it was so fresh and delicious it had chick peas veggies and i added greens the dressings came on the side which i love then i can control how much dressing i want theres nothing worse than too much dressing or sauce on food destroying the dish

Address: 2234 14th Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0X8 Canada
Review:
cozy and hipster spot with delicious food its fresh tasty and unique i had the dill egg salad sandwhiche and it felt like a gourmet meal they also have funky coffee and tea drinks so its nice to even stop in for a quick to go item

i was impressed by how many nooks and crannies the space had theres a back room you might even be able to reserve for a shower or party great neighborhood caferestaurant

Address: 2234 14th Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0X8 Canada
Review:
i moved to regina roughly 3 mo ago and have been craving a good cinnamon bun since been to a few different places and hadnt  been able to find that one special cinnamon bun that satisfied my craving until i tried this one see picture for reference
the smooth creamy texture and flavor captivated my heart from the very first bite all the way to the last one

Address: 2234 14th Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0X8 Canada
Review: generally love this place it is on my way to work and one of the only places open earlier in the morning however the last couple of times i have went there i have had to wait longer than usual and the lattes have been awful poorly made too strong coffee grounds in my drink the one i got this morning was undrinkable i expect more when i am paying 7

Address: 2234 14th Avenue Regina, SK S4P 0X8 Canada
Review: love this place best donuts best service it can get quite busy around the lunch rush but otherwise its a nice super chill place to have some good  great coffee if youre a work from home type like myself

Address: 3215 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
Review:
the only bad thing is that they are not open the whole week  they open on wednesdays  until sundays
so nice atmosphere service they offer is exclusive food was done in nothing i think they were waiting for us with our dishes prepared and all 
i had the lobster benedict  and my husband had bistro skillet 
and we also had a cappuccino  it came down to 68dls amazing

Address: 3215 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
Review:
i cant get over how their benedict lobster is soooo good its got a nice kick to it and i normally cant handle spicy food but dang this was soooo good my partner got the shakshuka and she couldnt even finish it all with such large portion even better to have leftovers

our server had started there for only a week and he was super friendly and very quick

the sister restaurant luna is a must have to try the athenian

Address: 3215 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
Review:
i consider myself a brunch fanatic so i feel like ive definitely set some high standards breakfast bistro did not disappoint from the moment you walk through the door the ambience of the restaurant is so inviting you never want to leave of course the food is spectacular always consistently bringing out the best dishes and the best mimosas and daiquiris

but the service here is unlike any other i elected for a dairy heavy meal  even though im lactose intolerant  and 3 servers made sure to check in on me and even brought me some lactose pills all of them were so kind and talkative even though i had brunch by myself

if youre ever in regina youd be remiss not to try breakfast bistro you wont be disappointed

Address: 3215 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
Review: had a lovely lunch i have all the allergies dairy soy gluten egg so eating out can be a challenge my server was very helpful with recommendations i had a delicious ruben on the gluten free bun with the side of yam fries

Address: 3215 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
Review:
an absolute gem of a spot for breakfast in regina a bit on the pricier side expect to pay 20 plus per person but the food was delicious with decent portions

i enjoyed the atmosphere of the breakfast bistro we sat inside and enjoyed the modern decor but there was an outdoor patio that might have been nice to try as well

have a special occasion coming up give this place a try

Address: 1-425 Victoria Avenue E Regina, SK S4N 0N8 Canada
Review: the food was delicious i loved the banana bread french toast it was so unique service was quick and our waitress was so nice definitely worth trying

Address: 1-425 Victoria Avenue E Regina, SK S4N 0N8 Canada
Review: came here twice and i must say the service is amazing the waiterswaitresses are super kind the food is pretty good too and they got a decent sized menu with lots of options definitely one of the best local cafes to come visit

Address: 1-425 Victoria Avenue E Regina, SK S4N 0N8 Canada
Review: we left feeling like they could not decide whether it was a boutique breakfast place or cafe as there were a mixture of both characteristics  good food but overpriced  we spent 40 to share a single breakfast avocado eggs benedict on waffle and two non refillable mugs of coffee  the presentation was excellent like a boutique style restaurant service was more of a coffee shop feel  the tables arent set we had to collect utensils at the front counter which is more of a coffee shop feel we also had go to the counter to pay

Address: 1-425 Victoria Avenue E Regina, SK S4N 0N8 Canada
Review: the best cake i have ever had mooist not to sweet and flavorful beautiful inside and out

Address: 1-425 Victoria Avenue E Regina, SK S4N 0N8 Canada
Review:
ive been in regina for only 2 months and was looking for a good place to go for breakfast but was never satisfieduntil i came here the service is amazing and the food is 1010
if you are looking for good quality and fresh food you absolutely have to go it is definitely a must in regina

Address: 2545 S Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 0M9 Canada
Review: there was too much sauce in the poutine too much mayo and by the way why mayo they could have served it seperately taco salad was ok the drinks were good and fancy the waitress did a good job

Address: 2545 S Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 0M9 Canada
Review:
updated review tried the lobby again for lunch with some friends after 5 months its not better if you cant cook something take it off the menu or if you know its burnt dont send it out this was the case with my salad i ordered the apple walnut salad with salmon and the salmon underneath was completely burnt and hard looked like chicken the service was better but im still not impressed i still stand by my previous review and ill like never refer someone to the lobby

very disappointed in the service we had a group of 8 and had to wait 1020 minutes for the waitress to ask us if we needed more drinks not to mention my brother is still waiting for his refillas we were wrapping up to leave the restaurant was completely empty save us and a single other patron there were absolutely no staff in sight for about 20 minutes we were finally able to wave over one staff member who tried to charge my grandfather for the entire table when we had 4 separate bills most of us were pleased with our drinks and food despite some of it being on the pricey side however this did nothing to outweigh the terrible service

Address: 2545 S Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 0M9 Canada
Review: the food was nice drinks were good so was the service and the atmosphere i had fish tacos poutine and berry fizz

Address: 2545 S Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 0M9 Canada
Review: very limited options for vegetarianspeople who eat halal any fish option has beer batter which we couldnt eat had to order the other options we had remaining and it was just okay wasnt that great customer service was really good though

Address: 2545 S Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 0M9 Canada
Review:
a very cool easygoing place to hang out  its far enough away from downtown that you dont get some of the more unpleasant clientele that hangs out in that area  the owners and the staff are very personable and the food especially the wings pizza and tacos is really good

it also probably has the best patio in the city and we always have a great time here

Address: 5064 4th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 0J6 Canada
Review:
we took a little convincing to stay i wont lie about that but im honestly glad we did we sat in the lounge and the place looks well traveled in people wise and the menus may look a little dated but i feel this brings a very italian character feel to it in some way
the pizza we ordered was the julianas special from the back page of the menu and we were not disappointed when our server said it was a pretty thick layered pizza the flavour was on point for how its described in the menu  fresh ingredients quality crust and you can taste the love in every bite my kind of place
i am incredibly sad we do not have a julianas back home but it will be a pizza i remember

Address: 5064 4th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 0J6 Canada
Review: great pizza  had been hearing great things about this restaurant for years finally got there  very good pizza we loved the crust especially  definitely will return

Address: 5064 4th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 0J6 Canada
Review: i used to be this places biggest advocate and was a long time customer not anymore standards have gone way down they essentially sold me saucy bread this last visit when i got home and opened the box i called to tell them the issue and the manager couldnt be bothered emails have gone unanswered proof is attached

Address: 5064 4th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 0J6 Canada
Review: their hours of operation are a lie their google hours of operation state they are open until 11pm and say updated 1 week ago as of june 1st 2023 everyday but when you call their business their automated phone service states theyre only open until 10 thanks for lying for no apparent reason about your hours thats super helpful to those who plan in advance will go to a business that doesnt lie about their hours in the future  also for those looking the atmosphere of this place was heavily influenced by a 1980s truck stop thanks for nothing julianas

Address: 5064 4th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 0J6 Canada
Review: ordered from juliana last night and it was fantastic got a combo of pizza dry ribs pop and a side salad and it was all delicious order was ready in under 25 mins for pickup i normally dislike extra thick layer of toppings on pizza but this has now made me a convert to a thick pizza it was cooked perfectly and not soggy on the bottom at all will definitely be ordering from them regularly from now on

Address: 3610 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: the experience visiting this restaurant is always wonderful our server was very friendly and patient food was excellent i would definitely recommend their florida special sandwich with the garlic parmesan fries i liked the atmosphere all around with those little candles and the music also the brownie dessert was my favourite part of the meal that night i may have named the items a different than what exactly they are in the menu but thats the closest i could remember them

Address: 3610 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: food was delish place was hip and rocking for a nice dinner setting prices on the high end for the area but you definitely wont be disappointed went to this place several times this week while in town will definitely be back the two pics are the lettuce wrap app and the blackened chicken alfredo the chicken was done perfectly moist and very flavorful side tip is to add cajun thru out the pasta as well thank me later

Address: 3610 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review:
was a last second change of venue  our experience was nice  it was quiet since it was after the lunch rush  the meals were tasty bursting with flavour portions were a little small for the price  but then everywhere seems to be higher in price these days   szechuan beef noodle bowl x3 spicy was just a nice amount of spice for accentuated flavour  if you are one that wants a burning sensation you can always get hotter than what they offer
others had tiki tuna poke bowl burger and fries and chicken quesadilla  the fries and gravy were quite welcoming surprisingly
the service was attentive polite and welcoming

Address: 3610 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: atmosphere is great food is delicious service and staff is attentive would definitely be back to try brunch and happy hour the price is reasonable and good size portion definitely is good date night or girls out night

Address: 3610 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: decent place to eat dinner food quality was good and service was friendly we hit the end of the dinner rush so food was a bit slow but thats to be expected

Address: A-2136 Robinson Street Regina, SK S4T 2P7 Canada
Review:
i had dinner at orange izakaya cafe and it was great the food was tasty especially their rolls its clear their chefs know what theyre doing
the server working there was friendly and helpful which made the whole experience even better the place itself has a cool vibe  very welcoming and clean
prices were decent for the quality and amount of food cant beat it
highly recommend here to anyone looking for a great asian food in regina

Address: A-2136 Robinson Street Regina, SK S4T 2P7 Canada
Review: had a lovely lunch here  the food was very high quality and delicious  we had several sushi items and veg tempura which impressed on all fronts  the tempura batter was perfect  also the chicken teriyaki and miso  shared all and were very pleased  staff are very attentive and friendly

Address: A-2136 Robinson Street Regina, SK S4T 2P7 Canada
Review: i liked the food but the portions are very small myself and a friend were still hungry id happily pay more to be full service was slow which i was surprised by as it wasnt that busy maybe 5 other tables the atmosphere was nice we sat outside the downside was the tree above us it needs pruning i would eat there again but maybe go not as hungry next time

Address: A-2136 Robinson Street Regina, SK S4T 2P7 Canada
Review: my daughter went to the orange izakaya fusion cafe  we loved the food  the service was outstanding  the atmosphere was very authentic and also warm on a cold winters evening

Address: A-2136 Robinson Street Regina, SK S4T 2P7 Canada
Review: such a cool little place we stopped in at the end of a long road trip of junky fast food for something fresh and delicious and this place delivered it started to get really busy after we came in but the service was top notch and the rolls were so tasty nothing bad to say would return anytime

Address: 1950 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X9 Canada
Review: best japanese food in town with nice and cozy atmosphere the dish that particularly stood out to me was the sushi the rice was perfectly seasoned and the topping like fish or their fruity craft was incredibly fresh its just meltinyourmouth tender highly recommend this japanese restaurant to anyone who appreciates exceptional food and a memorable dining experience

Address: 1950 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X9 Canada
Review: food was very good but its definitely on the more pricey side so if youre going out to celebrate definitely come here i found the portion for the ramen to be quite big however the sushi and appetizers were not that much in quantity in relation to what you pay for highly recommend coming for the ramen

Address: 1950 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X9 Canada
Review: spacious restaurant good food fast service the only downside is paid parking at the back but i dont mind because the food is worth it

Address: 1950 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X9 Canada
Review: our waiter was very charismatic and the food was great exactly what i expected for the ramen that was ordered

Address: 1950 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X9 Canada
Review: overall very good taste with fast service ramen tastes good wonder if they have dessert menu

Address: 2062 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: it was so beautiful on the patio the food was super delicious my boyfriend recommended here as i have never been before i am so glad that he did

Address: 2062 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review:
house rub 1750
salt  pepper 1750

chicken wings never again dry tough  chewy

triple b salad 18

salad was good could have used a bit more dressing

hall nachos 23

good  would order this again

staff was nice

Address: 2062 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: great place to meet with friends the food is really good and you get a good portion there are so many options its almost overwhelming the service is really where this place shines our server was so attentive and we were very impressed with her friendly atmosphere and a great place to catch up with people

Address: 2062 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review:
extremely disappointing service for take out been asked to sit one red chair and no one bothered to follow up for good 1520 mins
and when finally approached bar guy grabs food immediately without a sec delay and says sorry about that

if this is suppose to be a top notch joint i would say u will get a lot better service elsewhere

Address: 2062 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: i came in for a quick drink with a friend and was greeted with a somber attitude bartender who asked me if i was hungry had no knowledge of anything drinks were sub par and had no emotions was super disappointed because this was my only night off and was looking forward to my local neighbour hood to fulfill my evening with fun ive worked in the industry for 18 years and currently agave worked my way up to being a gm and im proud that being said i was throughly disappointed with travis tonight and his bartender guest experience thanks but no thanks ever again

Address: 736 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4N 0R3 Canada
Review: not a regular dinner spot as the prices are high great for special occasions but make sure you call ahead for a reservation as they have limited spots parking is limited so if you go with a group it is best to carpool together the food service and experience is great my family of 4 ordered a combination entree each alcoholic drinks for 2 and 2 desserts which equaled to 300 without tips the chef gave us a complimentary sake which was nice i wouldnt recommend the deep fried ice cream and deep fried banana everything else tasted good

Address: 736 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4N 0R3 Canada
Review: definitely on the more pricey side the parking is limited however the food is decent and worth the experience if youre celebrating a special occasion

Address: 736 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4N 0R3 Canada
Review: we enjoyed this place food was good cook was funny flipping his knife and cooking tools up in the air and catching them little fire show as well also brought out the rubber band setup for both my girls so they could use chopsticks wife felt they rushed us out a bit and its going to cost you here so be prepared but wed go back

Address: 736 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4N 0R3 Canada
Review:
its entertaining and the food tastes pretty good the only issue is youll pay quite a bit and youll leave hungry by quite a bit i mean you could eat steak and lobster at the keg have great service and youd be out about the same  though the keg wont juggle fire at your table this place is good for an experience but i cant imagine wanting to repeat it very often

disclaimer  im a large person and eat accordingly if youre small you might not notice the portions are small i review things in case i forget about them later

Address: 736 Victoria Avenue Regina, SK S4N 0R3 Canada
Review: expensive but low quality food you pay 80 dollars for 3 piece of small scallops and shrimps half not fresh lobster 100g steak one chicken leg meat and another 10 for a small bowl of rice to be fired with a egg ye they add a egg to rice then it costs 10 i mean if you are the type of guy who wants to waste money you go ahead oh wait they play acrobatics for you before it start chief throw knife and forks around but i wont give him any quarter if thats a street show even you can do that with 2 hours practice lmao this restaurant had been overrated so hard dont waste your money here

Address: 1101D Kramer Boulevard Regina, SK S4S 5W4 Canada
Review: id say the experience here was good but could be better the wait time for my meal was quite long although they did mention to me that my food would take about 15 minutes to get ready it took longer than that i also requested for rice to be added to my meal as it was only chicken the serving was quite small and appeared a bit soggy the chicken was really good tasted really nice and my colleagues also enjoyed their meal

Address: 1101D Kramer Boulevard Regina, SK S4S 5W4 Canada
Review: if i can give the service 0 stari will i want order to dine in and i ordered 4 dishes they refuse to provide any water unless i buy a bottle from them they said they do not have any cup if you dont even have a cup in a restaurant then just shut it down

Address: 1101D Kramer Boulevard Regina, SK S4S 5W4 Canada
Review: i really enjoy pronto its my new goto place the crispy dynamite roll is my favorite and i am excited to try more when i asked for more soy sauce they gave me an extra 45 packets

Address: 1101D Kramer Boulevard Regina, SK S4S 5W4 Canada
Review:
the food was disgusting bland way overcooked and looked old

the ramen broth was gross noodles were cheap veggies were old the egg was way overdone the pork was overcooked and cut into sad little strips it was like eating tiny strips of leather and the rice was old and dry

ramen is served in a plastic bowl with plastic cutlery and the rice is served in a small paper bowl

this is one of those places you wish you couldnt see the food being prepared in  the kitchen is filthy the decor and lighting in the dining area has years of dust caked on them

with the close proximity to the uni i genuinely feel like theyre preying on students that just dont know any better
there is nothing tasteful genuine or clean about this place

Address: 1101D Kramer Boulevard Regina, SK S4S 5W4 Canada
Review: love this place combo a to go is my regular order sushi is fresh and tasteful i come here at least once a week for the past year or so love and recommend this place

Address: 2005 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4V 3A3 Canada
Review: the food is great the place is huge so huge that its hard too get good service we went back to check if it was better than before it wasnt both times they were covering this huge place with 2 workers too recap good food poor service

Address: 2005 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4V 3A3 Canada
Review: we were there on sat afternoonjuly823 with our family and as we were leaving my nephew had a heart attack outside door ken gm was sooo amazing and helpful and was there ready to do anything we needed it was very appreciated thank you ken next time im in town i will b happy to give you our business again my nephew is recovering and will b fine great place i recommend it to everyone great food and excellent service     mary

Address: 2005 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4V 3A3 Canada
Review:
have enjoyed canadian brewhouse in the past   however we had issues with the cleanliness and food availability when we were there on friday june 30 at 6pm

several items on the menu which were recommended to us by the server were not available  our party and the server only become aware after the order was placed   this implies poor communication with management when items listed as specials several drink specials as well as common items like onion rings were not longer available

also we sat in the patio area at the top of the restaurant and even though we dont expect cleanliness to be a top priority for outdoor seating the quality in this case was terrible   many of the tables and chairs were covered in bird droppings with no attempt made to clean them  we managed to move things around sufficiently to find a clean area for our group but we were surprised there was no attempt made by canadian brewhouse staff to assist

definitely not the standards i expect from this restaurant

Address: 2005 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4V 3A3 Canada
Review: went for the 40 oz steak nite had an issue with my tickets and the woman helping me was so friendly waitress was a lil cold after we had issues finally got it all sorted and our steaks came   they were very flavorful but extremely fatty as is shown in the 2nd pic all in all was well worth the price will definitely go again if they have this night again

Address: 2005 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4V 3A3 Canada
Review:
went in and had a bad experience with the manager on shift the general manger ken poag was quick to reach out and address the matter he sorted things out in a polite manager

good food good servers overall a good place if you are in the area and need good place to sit down give brewhouse a try

Address: 2080 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: our family visited after not being at this restaurant in many years i was unsure what the kids would think but everyone more than loved the food the rolls bowls and pad thai was all so very very good on top of the great food we dealt with two staff members and they were both fantastic everyone said we have to come back when we are back in regina

Address: 2080 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review:
very quick service came in around 1pm on a thursday for lunch sister got the lunch special 4 and i got the beef rice noodlepho combination and sweet and sour spare ribs

large portions broth is really good good very flavourful nice

they have some spaces cordoned off and its bit of a maze there are no parking spaces around it so we parked on angus st

Address: 2080 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: was an order of take out i will say i was quite happy with the service given here this is some of the best take out food of this kind ive ever had price was far less than everywhere else in the city restaurant appeared to be clean when i walked inside to pay staff seemed knowledgeable of the type of food being sold food packaging was perfect for portion size except for the fortune cookies only given 2 fortune cookies for a dinner of 4 i bought  all of that aside id recommend vietthai over any other thai food chain restaurants ive been to this place was awarded the best chinese food year over year in the city for a reason keep up the great work highly recommended the downside was that the inside could use a bit of renovations and  or better styling it was clean for sure however looked slightly dated for the year were in now as well parking is utterly horrible in my opinion some to the rear or the building for free as well as out front for payment

Address: 2080 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review: i highly recommend trying the food combo at viet thai restaurant featuring the mouthwatering pork on skewer grilled chicken and stirfried lemongrass shrimp the flavors are incredible and each dish is cooked to perfection you also have the option to choose between 2 spring rolls or 2 fresh rolls which are equally delicious dont miss out on this amazing combination

Address: 2080 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2T7 Canada
Review:
honestly if i could give a place 6 stars i would i am a huge vietnamese food fanatic and this was hands down one of the best places ive eaten number 39 or 40 is the go to 17 bucks and you get the biggest bowl of all time

and on top if you order the fresh salad rolls they give you 2 massive rolls def recommended

also tin the server man is an absolute beauty so friendly and nice go just for him

Address: 3618 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: i have been coming almost weekly to zamzams since it first opened  at the start the place was an absolute gem  the food was flavourful the prices modest the service quick and the staff extremely personable   i brought all my friends and family here and they too became regular customers telling their friends and family  year after year it has got worse in every area to the point where ive stopped going and so does everyone i know  the food is bland expensive for what you get the platter is just a 25 dollar bowl of rice with hardly any meat service is slow and the new staff clearly dont care about their work or the customer  ive been the only person in and there are five employees working and still it takes forever to make my meal  i wrote this entire review while waiting in line and ive now waited 20 minutes to get a platter made last time im ever coming here  too bad

Address: 3618 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: it looks run down on the outside but inside is bright  clean fantastic fresh middle eastern food with lots of wellmarked gluten free items helpful staff and delicious meal

Address: 3618 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review:
dont miss out on this this one
had the lentil soup grannies special and a wrap all were delicious
was my first time here staff were very helpful in explaining the different options and combos
then made recommendations for the wrap by asking a few simple questions about my likes such as sweet or spicy and was went with their recommendations glad i did
i enjoy my wraps and this place is top notch

Address: 3618 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review:
we were driving  through regina and after a long day of travelling we wanted something tasty healthy and comforting
this was exactly that  more
i totally recommend getting the platter with tandoori chicken and lamb

great service

Address: 3618 Eastgate Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A5 Canada
Review: i really enjoy their lentil soup the flavours are balanced and delicious whenever i come in the staff are always so polite too i recommend zamzam

Address: 890 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: experiencenot good had to wait for an hour before food was served ordered medium rare steak got a welldone one instead see picture lacked flavor too the lady who attended to us apologized for the delay in serving our food which was good but then said initially that the bill will be on the house because of the delay as per the manager only to return and say that it wasnt and a discount will be given instead proper communication needs to be better lobster tasted great though esp the sauce i have to give credit to that i like the ambiance of the place but overall not a very good dinein experience

Address: 890 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: okay i know ordering a steak at a seafood restaurant is a gamble but this just isnt medium well food and drinks were good otherwise the service was just okay we were ready to order before we even had our drink orders taken and then had to ask for additional biscuits when we could finally flag down our waitress

Address: 890 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: saturday night 6pm and we were shown to a booth right away this was all you eat shrimp extravaganza so no waiting was appreciated the booths are a tight fit but clean the wait to order was short and the food came out fast and hot our server serg was friendly and helpful extra helpings were offered and at the table before we had finished our previous setting would go again

Address: 890 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review: its a great place to have fun the food is perfect if they can add more staff everything will be even better

Address: 890 Albert Street Regina, SK S4R 2P5 Canada
Review:
was our first family visit to this place food was amazing
very good service and very friendly people

Address: 2143 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2V1 Canada
Review:
must try this eatery

100 authentic south indian food

what i liked the best about this eatery is that they are entirely focused on food quality rather then spending thousands of dollars on decor as i have noticed in many restaurants in regina and other cities where eateries have decor worth million but food quality not good at all

this eatery have simple but functional dinning area see pictures

we ordered tandoori pomfret madras fish curry and onion dosa food presentation taste and quantity was simply outstanding the best south indian food we have eaten in long time

none of the food was spicy for us each items tasted different and unique onion dosa crunchy from outside and very soft inside all the sauces served with all the dishes were very delicious as well

place was busy with dine in and take outs

met the owner raj he was cooking serving and attending customers always a good sign for family run business

highly recommended

Address: 2143 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2V1 Canada
Review: i would rate it 355 its a lowkey homey restaurant which i liked the portions are generous and reasonably priced the food itself was okay to me  definitely not bad but wouldnt call it one of my top experiences for indian food the hot and sour soup was the spiciest soup ive ever had in my life anywhere  did not expect to find that at a restaurant in regina

Address: 2143 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2V1 Canada
Review:
its first time i am going to review a food of a restaurant
i have never ever done it no matter how bad the food is however this time it went beyond bad and i have had a pathetic experience and it triggered me to write a review
my brother ordered lunch for me and he chose noodles and manchurian
 disgusting food burnt manchurian and the level of spice was to an extent that we could hardly taste the food it was just the spice
really disappointed they should at least not serve burnt food

Address: 2143 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2V1 Canada
Review: best nonveg thalli  i ever had in regina each dish on a plate has its own aroma and taste staff is good knows how to treat customer and make them happy with delicious food

Address: 2143 Albert Street Regina, SK S4P 2V1 Canada
Review:
this is my go to indian restaurant every time i visit my friend in regina great service clean environment clean washroom

the food variety is good for me as i love indian food especially dosa good quantity and delicious

thank you

Address: 4303 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 4R3 Canada
Review:
we got dessert had to wait a the waitress advised she had a big party to tend to and would get back to us ordered tea and my pot of ware was warm so had to ask for another one this time it came hot was not offered any refills though

atm machine was left unlocked and unattended to at 11pm  that was weird

Address: 4303 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 4R3 Canada
Review: boston pizza is a consistent reliable chain restaurant the food preparation is standardized and you can generally depend on getting a decent quality product having arrived at our hotel later in the day we were looking for something close and quick we split a small pizza and had a salad each the garden salad at bps is better than those at most other chains along with a mix of greens there was several veggies added including grated beets the salad has character and doesnt seem like the restaurant is trying to save money by limiting ingredients this location in regina was friendly and quick would go back again

Address: 4303 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 4R3 Canada
Review: pizza is really tasty and there is a good family atmosphere good service overall

Address: 4303 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 4R3 Canada
Review: this place was so much fun server named bella there was great amazing service cold beer and good food

Address: 4303 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 4R3 Canada
Review:
i wish i could give half a star lol but the service at this location was really awful
my family and i had dinner here for my birthday and the server was really rude to us either she was racist or she just found black people annoying but she rolled her eyes every time she had to serve us the worst was when she came to collect the bills and she made it so clear that she did not want to serve us as if that wasnt enough she continued to roll her eyes at us while serving another table next to us

Address: 3136 13th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 1P2 Canada
Review: i tried the salmon salad sandwich on gluten free bread and it was amazing my sister had a vegetarian burger that was flavourful and delicious two thumbs up

Address: 3136 13th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 1P2 Canada
Review:
stopped in for a bite on our way through sask ordered the deli sandwich which was good but extremely small also ordered the side cesar salad which is where things went downhill clearly the lettuce is not washed as every single piece still has lots of visible dirt on it i think washing your produce is the bare minimum of expectations when paying 40 for a lunch for 2 that still leaves you hungry

look elsewhere if hungry in the area

Address: 3136 13th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 1P2 Canada
Review: great tasting coffee and has a variety of savoury dishes the bagel sandwiches and breakfast bowls are my favourite the sandwiches are decent and i know others really like hot lunch offerings they do have a liquor license for that after work drink really eclectic vibe and you can purchase plants local artwork and seasonal produce occasionally sweet treats are a limited selection and they dont have pastries pies or cakes

Address: 3136 13th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 1P2 Canada
Review:
really excellent coffee and if you can get a hold of one of their morning glory muffins they are moist and delicious a perfect breakfast they switch up their specialty drinks and food all t he time so its worth following them on insta  im still thinking about the butterfly pea coconut tea i had last year super refreshing on a hot day and just what i needed

while i was in a shop recently a gentleman came in insisting that he lost his wallet  he clearly didnt and just wanted some food but the owners were super kind and gave him some even though i offered to pay this is a cafe that supports their community and i love that

Address: 3136 13th Avenue Regina, SK S4T 1P2 Canada
Review: being indian from country india i am pure vegetarian no meat and this coffee house i found best for myself to have 95  vegetarian eatery options i ordered iced mocha and mediterranean bowl tasty was amazing and the atmosphere and interior of cafe is very calm relaxing refreshing and homely out and out love it 100

Address: 6843 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 2Z2 Canada
Review: i have been ordering from s r kitchen for many many years my company from ontario tried its food for the first time he said hard to find a chinese food restaurant comparable to your level across the country the bbq pork is the best i have ever tried that says a lot

Address: 6843 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 2Z2 Canada
Review: even with the strains of getting all the new year orders out food was ready at the time promised it was hot and tasty been going here since 1985

Address: 6843 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 2Z2 Canada
Review: party for 20 excellent everyone enjoys it btw really liked the renovation i didnt know you have the new keto option nice

Address: 6843 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 2Z2 Canada
Review:
sadly they have really gone down hill
higher prices and lesser quality food
ordered pork low mien
got dry noodles 2 pieces of broccoli one mushroom a couple pieces of celery and 2 small slices of pork
would not recommend

Address: 6843 Rochdale Boulevard Regina, SK S4X 2Z2 Canada
Review: poor customer service ordered about 90 worth of food when we ordered we put half the order in with one lady and then the phone was passed to another person to finish the order when i picked it up and took it home we were missing a dish we figure because 2 different people were taking our order we called to let them know so i had to drive back to pick it up i want to specify that they forgot to charge and include it in my original order when i went back they charged me for the single dish that they forgot  i feel that since it was their mistake they shouldnt be charging me since my family was sitting at home waiting for me to get back to start eating it took me about 25 minutes there and back so the food waiting for me at home was not as hot anymore we all had to microwave our food there are so many places to choose from and yes this was my go to but customer service is at the top of my priority list so i will not be going back

Address: 2936 13th Ave Regina, SK S4T 1N7 Canada
Review: it was very busy at the restaurant today and the two servers definitely did their best to keep things running smoothly all of our meals were good the beef in the beef dip was a little on the dry side i would come back though

Address: 2936 13th Ave Regina, SK S4T 1N7 Canada
Review: i wanted to like it so bad its an iconic location in regina and i was excited however i am so disappointed it was extremely expensive for less than mediocre food the burger was a decent size but it wasnt special there were basically no fries and the milkshake was just milk nothing about it was a milkshake id rather just go spend 30 at mcdonalds

Address: 2936 13th Ave Regina, SK S4T 1N7 Canada
Review: went here for the 1st time tonight for supper looking for a local mom and pop caf√© this did not disappoint its a nostalgic 50s 60s diner awesome little spot reminds me of happy days diner on tv  friday s special was fish and chips and for dessert which was free by the way made from scratch apple pie so good  the prices are quite reasonable and the beer is ice cold  come support this place it is great its  in the cathedral area in regina definitely recommend

Address: 2936 13th Ave Regina, SK S4T 1N7 Canada
Review: my 1st time here such a great ambiance   they were also busy friendly staff food was great i had the bacon cheese burger

Address: 2936 13th Ave Regina, SK S4T 1N7 Canada
Review: recommended by my sister on a visit to regina and it did not disappoint food was fresh scratch made soup and delicious service by server galya was stellar courteous fast and efficient as for dessert it was a well executed classic carrot cake definitely will return

Address: 2161 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 2A5 Canada
Review: love this place  with a very nice patio lots of choices of vege food also love their special lattes super good service

Address: 2161 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 2A5 Canada
Review: stumbled on this delightful cafe when i was in town for a few hours food was great very nice staff i will be back again our group had the chicken shawarma and the falafel wrap

Address: 2161 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 2A5 Canada
Review:
lovely place
baba ganoush was really special smoky flavor eggplant puree
lentil soup is nice too

Address: 2161 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 2A5 Canada
Review:
coffee is delicious the chicken arabia in focaccia bread is also delicious
the owners are super friendly
will definitely visit again
cozy atmosphere stress relieving music

Address: 2161 Rose Street Regina, SK S4P 2A5 Canada
Review:
food was amazing but there was lack of communication with the kitchen i got there and ordered at 1150 and our food didnt come out until after 1230 especially when youre on your work lunch you dont have time to wait 30 min for a meal
we will definitely come back but i can understand that sometimes things happen beyond the restaurants control

Address: 2606-28th Avenue Regina, SK S4S 6P3 Canada
Review: had a good time at earls south location the seats were spacious the staff are friendly and professional everything was fine but oh lord the biryani was questionable this is where i would say leave this dish to the pros lol because it was not as good the side bread 410 the garlic dip 410 is was too oily i burped all the oil came back rushing my throat the biryani was cold this dish looks good but needs a little rework but otherwise everything else was good

Address: 2606-28th Avenue Regina, SK S4S 6P3 Canada
Review: if you combined precious cozy and delicious you would end up with earls kitchen  bar this place has such a beautiful atmosphere and scrumptious meals this was the last place me and my girlfriend ate before getting engaged so its definitely a fav in my books

Address: 2606-28th Avenue Regina, SK S4S 6P3 Canada
Review: it is perfect at all nothing negative need to mention the staff was very nice the wash room is clean and dry i have nothing to claim here and feeling very comfortable when tip for the staff hope that they have more special day for discount some food

Address: 2606-28th Avenue Regina, SK S4S 6P3 Canada
Review:
the most happening place to be in regina
loved the ambience and the service
also the staff including the manager were very helpful
the food was delicious
highly recommend trying cajun chicken and tacos

Address: 2606-28th Avenue Regina, SK S4S 6P3 Canada
Review: food was great the steak was one of the better steak i had in regina the chicken salad looked good the place was busy in a good way the restrooms were clean the music was a bit t o loud the servers were friendly and check in with me about the food quality but disappeared when it was time to pay the bill

Address: 436 Dewdney Ave Regina, SK S4N 0E9 Canada
Review: it has a lot of variety and the food was good  their full menu as of jan 4 2023

Address: 436 Dewdney Ave Regina, SK S4N 0E9 Canada
Review: we got take out  beef and broccoli was overcooked  broccoli  was saturated with soy sauce the beef was chewy and hardly edible also had barbecue pork dry and flavorless chicken chow maine could still taste the cornstarch or whatever they use on the chicken left it slimy  i do not recommend this restaurant  is epic fail

Address: 436 Dewdney Ave Regina, SK S4N 0E9 Canada
Review: ask for their secret menu its absolutely delicious much more exciting than the stuff at the buffet

Address: 436 Dewdney Ave Regina, SK S4N 0E9 Canada
Review: i think it is the one of my  best  favorite restaurants the service is really very nice  the hall is spacious and bright and feels cool the kitchen feels excellent especially the spicy deep fried fish  the taste is very delicious it was a best experience and should be  try again or recommend

Address: 436 Dewdney Ave Regina, SK S4N 0E9 Canada
Review:
had a buffet dinner with this restaurant good food a lot of selections and it seems they do not add msg to their dishes i personally prefer foods without
msg added

Address: 474 Mcarthy Boulevard Regina, SK S4R 7M2 Canada
Review: just had a great experience here the bartender hailey was amazing she recommended great food and drinks and took the time to make me feel comfortable and excited to come back her positive energy and strong work ethic were very much appreciated more places need employees like her its refreshing to have customer service this strong the food and drinks were excellent i highly recommend cant wait to go back

Address: 474 Mcarthy Boulevard Regina, SK S4R 7M2 Canada
Review: i do not recommend going to this establishment my family and i went to rock creek for a birthday and we were one of the only tables in the building our food took about an hour and 15 minutes to get to the table and once our food got to the table one of the meals was completely wrong so we sent it back and it came back wrong three more times after we were finished our meals the server brought our bills and no discount or apology for the slow service  the meal being wrong three times so i asked for a discount on the bills and she gave us a dollar off each of our bills  seriously a joke

Address: 474 Mcarthy Boulevard Regina, SK S4R 7M2 Canada
Review: my husband and i just left this establishment when we arrived we were the only people in the dining room a very pleasant girl took us to our table gave us water and said our waiter would be there soon we saw more people arrive three other tables while we waited for our server to arrive  later we looked over and saw the other tables being served their drinks have their orders taken while we were still waiting for service  after waiting even longer we decided to leave and went to another establishment filled with about 30 customers all being served so i can only judge the service as low since we never did get drinks or food do better rock creek this used to be a favorite spot but no more we will not be back

Address: 474 Mcarthy Boulevard Regina, SK S4R 7M2 Canada
Review: my friends and i had the absolute pleasure of being served by julia at your restaurant on sunday june 24 through a few kitchen blips julia was charming and humble an absolute treasure she made us laugh she made all the little difficulties just melt away and made our little high school get together class of 1990 one of the best weve ever had kudos to a job so very well done well be back to sit in julias section very soon

Address: 474 Mcarthy Boulevard Regina, SK S4R 7M2 Canada
Review:
its been awhile since ive eaten here its nothing like it used to be i ordered steak with mashed potatoes and gravy first off the steak wasnt medium rare and on top of that the gravy for the mash potatoes was cold

i had a few bites and couldnt do it so i paid and left

also a customer was at the bar ordering beer and everything he asked for was not in stock he got fed up and asked the bar tender  well what do you have 

they seemed understaffed as well

Address: 363 Broad Street Regina, SK S4R 1X2 Canada
Review: the crispy pata whole and the pork ribs sinigang were very delicious they also have good serving if there is a 10 star i would give it to them highly recommended

Address: 363 Broad Street Regina, SK S4R 1X2 Canada
Review:
super nice people patient kind and helpful this was our 1st time ordering philippine food and they took time to explain to let us make our mind and food was ready just on time when they said its gonna be
and food delicious and just how we expected great place to order

Address: 363 Broad Street Regina, SK S4R 1X2 Canada
Review: im from cebu so if youre tastebuds is very picky and the only thing you want is eating savory delicious food from cebu i guarantee you this is the spot and pandesal just got out of the oven so dont forget to ask for the pandesal

Address: 363 Broad Street Regina, SK S4R 1X2 Canada
Review: this was like coming home  friendly staff comfort food interior design of a party room in winnipeg  id go back every time im in regina

Address: 363 Broad Street Regina, SK S4R 1X2 Canada
Review: i ordered the spring rolls and buns for a birthday party they were a great hit thank you

Address: Valley Girls Catering 2500 Victoria Ave Regina, SK S4P 2T5 Canada
Review:
brunch spot alert

first time i tried fresh  sweet was this weekend and it did live to the hype

the staff were kind and courteous and even walked us through the menu when asked

if you want a sweet and fresh meal experience be sure to check it out

Address: Valley Girls Catering 2500 Victoria Ave Regina, SK S4P 2T5 Canada
Review: ordered the 16 ounce cappuccino and was blown away not that bitter very smooth and frothy as it should be the best sandwich is a croissant sandwich and has all the trims on it do try their hashbrownshome fries really flavourful

Address: Valley Girls Catering 2500 Victoria Ave Regina, SK S4P 2T5 Canada
Review: great sweet or savoury options for pairing  the chicken and waffle was a great surprise on how they executed  the bacon peach pancakes were excellent and now i cant make pancakes at home without bacon cooked into them  service is chipper and friendly making the atmosphere great  parking is the only thing to plan for its downtown regina so have change its a pain  love this place

Address: Valley Girls Catering 2500 Victoria Ave Regina, SK S4P 2T5 Canada
Review: talk about fresh  sweet when in reality you get unloved  unflavored i came here bc we usually go for breakfast somewhere else which now thinking about it i regret coming to this place it seems fun and cozy with lots of people but with all the whispers you soon learn that the chef should have stayed a dishwasher bc its a sad lie who told them they have the right to cook breakfast as sad as the eggs to the ham to the potatoes i am devastated this place has such good reviews i mean then again the sweet are good but if you want decent eggs ham or bacon or hash browns with toast do not come here also definitely not worth the money

Address: Valley Girls Catering 2500 Victoria Ave Regina, SK S4P 2T5 Canada
Review: ordered the chicken waffle and it was pretty disappointing probably one of the worst variations on chicken and waffles ive had before the dijon honey sauce is so overwhelming and the chopped chicken is just sad the potatoes taste like theyve been sitting in a warmer for hours on top of that i was given minestrone soup when i ordered potato bacon i like this place though never had a bad item on the menu before until now the soup was good even though it wasnt the one i ordered

Address: 1908 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A4 Canada
Review: absolutely top notch indian food this place is open late and is a great treat we went with butter chicken pekora naan and a chick pea dish that was very good they have some combo dinners on the menu which are apparently only for take out and not for dine in we ordered the same items as one of these combos and it rang in about 25 more that being said i understand there are extra costs associated with dine in customers vs take out i will certainly eat here again

Address: 1908 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A4 Canada
Review: i recently was traveling through regina and stayed overnight at the comfort inn i decided to stroll for dinner at thr nearby indian restaurant dawat the host parul  was cheerful and friendly i ordered a thali and they happily customized it for me the chefs pritam and anmol dished out some amazing quality of food that felt homely and had nice flavors of the spices and herbs in exact proportion that i expected it has been indian fine dine experience in saskatchewan  keep up the good work

Address: 1908 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A4 Canada
Review: they do not even know the difference between red  orange and white gravy vegetables after repeated confirmation for white gravy vegetables they still served us with orange gravy dish also the food was not cooked properly and tasted as if it was old and reheated before serving

Address: 1908 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A4 Canada
Review: i did order from uber eats delivery last night as soon as i pressed the order button i realized wrong item got selected i called them right away to cancel it and they guided me to do it from the uber app i did canceled order within 5 minutes of placing and restaurant still charged me saying they started preparing the order there is no way they can prepare order within 5 minutes really poor experience more than serving good food restaurants interest is earning extra money via wrong ways never going to order anything from you again thanks for the great experience

Address: 1908 Prince of Wales Drive Regina, SK S4Z 1A4 Canada
Review: unprofessional staff improperly cooked food and when i and my friends complained the manager there began yelling part of our food was also improperly prepared instead of offering to exchange those plates for us as should have been their duty the manager started arguing with us

Address: 1840 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X6 Canada
Review: visited this vietnamese restaurant for the 1st time and i was not disappointed at all  we had the dishes  201  205 and it was a huge portion and very tasty and well cooked and very well prepared i would recommend anyone to this restaurant for sure and i will be back no doubt about it when im in regina again  the vietnamese restaurant is well kept and clean and the washrooms were clean too and the price was fair considering the large portions and we had appetizers which i shouldnt have had cuz the main dishes are huge  excellent hospitality by our waitress and she was very attentive to our dining experience and friendly  i will be back for sure

Address: 1840 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X6 Canada
Review: ive been going here for 25 years  yes 25  i think it may have changed hands in that time but the food has always been fantastic  its simply some of the best vietnamese food in regina hands down

Address: 1840 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X6 Canada
Review:
must read

i never ever have complained on a restaurant online but this is a warning

worst food ive ever tried to consume  anyone liking this joint has never had a half decent meal in their life
ordered  famous verm and char pork w spring roll  verm had no sweet sauce on it pork was absolutely disgusting anf id challenge that they are even actually serving real pork  the springs roll  dont even know how to say it bc im not sure what they actually were  some weird stuffing inside a thick wonton wrapper completely undercooked and not crisp at all disgusting
dry ribs  box packed full but absolutely no meat honestly not even 2oz total meat on this 2lb box this is not even a number 2 riblet no half decent place would ever serve this atrocious product
next curry seafood laughable no sear on the scallops prawns were precooked and warmed thru there 4 of each and 2 whole peppers and a whole onion chopped up packing the container the sauce was not curry at all some fatty consume with a hint of basil
the white rice was acceptable
i ordered and they said 15m i walked over in 8mins and it was rrady  i should have left then

unquestionably the worst meal ive ever ordered from anywhere ever

Address: 1840 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X6 Canada
Review: food comes out fast place is dirty needs a really good cleaning our table was sticky so was the floor and does the owner we assume do anything but stand at the till and stare at customerslittle unnerving we thought

Address: 1840 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1X6 Canada
Review: it was the first time that my family tried this restaurant we order beef vegetables wonton soup and chicken the serving of food was excellent and it was tasty the vietnamese guy who served us was friendly and accommodating also their vietnamese iced coffee is so yummy we will come back again for sure

Address: 4651 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: best waiter ever  dillon was nothing short of amazing  what great service  a beautiful person  we will be back and ask for him

Address: 4651 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: a fun and casual place to enjoy a good meal and one of my favourite desserts their sticky toffee pudding is the best in saskatchewan hands down after enjoying the summer platter that consists of sirloin steak garlic prawns with avocado and spiced tenders my buddy and i were ready for the dessert unfortunately this time it was unavailable our waitress whitney was exceptional in every way and she suggested the cheesecake which was delicious she also gave us both a card to give us a free sticky toffee pudding the next time we came back so great service excellent food wonderful waitress and an establishment that realizes that customers are important

Address: 4651 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: mediocre experience overall was excited for the antler ale but the keg wasnt tapped properly do they couldnt serve it so i decided on their other tap beer also had a keg problem burger was fine but my poutine was only on the warm side not hot

Address: 4651 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: my husband and i were looking for a place to become regulars at as we often work long hours we drive by the mr mikes grassland location almost everyday so we decided to give it a try we ordered 2 steak and shrimp dinners for take out the atmosphere and service was ok i ended up by finding someone when i arrived as i waited for several minutes and didnt see one server i have never been more disappointed in a meal especially for a restaurant that has the word steakhouse in its name everything was absolutely doused in a coursely of ground black pepper much like montreal steak spice both steaks were dry tasteless and very very tough we ordered med rare and medium steaks the vegetables were absolutely rock hard with burnt sear marks on them i opted for the caesar salad as a side and was flabbergasted when i opened the container because it was a spring mix lettuce mix no romaine no croutons no parmesan cheese but it did have a side of caesar dressing my husband had fries and gravy for his side the gravy tasted so synthetic it was as if someone opened a box of campbells vegetable soup broth and heated it up and added a cornstarch slurry to it to try and make it pass as gravy the only thing good in both of our meals was the shrimp the rest was horrible  we spent 100 dollars on this meal as it was a special occasion for us i contacted the manager via email and never even got so much as a response from him very disappointed not only are we out 100 dollars but its clear that the manager doesnt care either this place will not become our regular place

Address: 4651 Gordon Road Regina, SK S4W 0B7 Canada
Review: i had the 14oz ribeye steak the price may be high but an incredible meal i prefer this restaurant even over the keg

Address: 1350 23rd Avenue Regina, SK S4S 3S5 Canada
Review: went for celebrating our wedding and they were very kind at all times great food and atmosphere i am a vegetarian so the only option available i was able to find was a pasta and vegetables the desserts were delicious

Address: 1350 23rd Avenue Regina, SK S4S 3S5 Canada
Review: attended a large anniversary function held in a back room that i didnt even know existed was too hot and crowded in that room but the servers were very attentive and quick and the food was delicious

Address: 1350 23rd Avenue Regina, SK S4S 3S5 Canada
Review:
everything was excellent
my very well done steak was only a little well done lol but i like my steak burnt and no one ever gets it right for me 
escargot were soooo yummmyyy will definitely go back

Address: 1350 23rd Avenue Regina, SK S4S 3S5 Canada
Review: used this restaurants drivethru window to pick up a supper order the food was packaged with care and tasted delicious i ordered the greek chicken with garden salad and roasted lemon potatoes and for dessert the chocolate almond torte i didnt have cutlery in the bag i forgot to ask for it fortunately my hotel provided a plate and cutlery upon my arrival to my hotel

Address: 1350 23rd Avenue Regina, SK S4S 3S5 Canada
Review:
unfriendly male server at lunch no happiness no cheerful smiles or thanks for coming in when we said thank you quite a few times during our meal he wouldnt say nothing back maybe a yup but no youre welcome sometimes nothing  no smiles yet pointed out that tips can not be used for gift cards but i can leave cash who said i wanted to leave a tip
food good as always decor classy cool vintage

Address: 2445 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1Y9 Canada
Review:
brunch spot alert

first time i tried fresh  sweet was this weekend and it did live to the hype

the staff were kind and courteous and even walked us through the menu when asked

if you want a sweet and fresh meal experience be sure to check it out

Address: 2445 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1Y9 Canada
Review: ordered the 16 ounce cappuccino and was blown away not that bitter very smooth and frothy as it should be the best sandwich is a croissant sandwich and has all the trims on it do try their hashbrownshome fries really flavourful

Address: 2445 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1Y9 Canada
Review: great sweet or savoury options for pairing  the chicken and waffle was a great surprise on how they executed  the bacon peach pancakes were excellent and now i cant make pancakes at home without bacon cooked into them  service is chipper and friendly making the atmosphere great  parking is the only thing to plan for its downtown regina so have change its a pain  love this place

Address: 2445 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1Y9 Canada
Review: talk about fresh  sweet when in reality you get unloved  unflavored i came here bc we usually go for breakfast somewhere else which now thinking about it i regret coming to this place it seems fun and cozy with lots of people but with all the whispers you soon learn that the chef should have stayed a dishwasher bc its a sad lie who told them they have the right to cook breakfast as sad as the eggs to the ham to the potatoes i am devastated this place has such good reviews i mean then again the sweet are good but if you want decent eggs ham or bacon or hash browns with toast do not come here also definitely not worth the money

Address: 2445 Broad Street Regina, SK S4P 1Y9 Canada
Review: ordered the chicken waffle and it was pretty disappointing probably one of the worst variations on chicken and waffles ive had before the dijon honey sauce is so overwhelming and the chopped chicken is just sad the potatoes taste like theyve been sitting in a warmer for hours on top of that i was given minestrone soup when i ordered potato bacon i like this place though never had a bad item on the menu before until now the soup was good even though it wasnt the one i ordered

Address: 2705 Quance Street E Regina, SK S4V 3B7 Canada
