Address: 172 Main Street S Toronto, ON M4E 2W1 Canada
Review:
it was awesome
the ribs and the chicken were just juicy and insanely good
were pretty big smokehouse connoisseurs and both left there pretty darn happy staff were real charming too

a mustvisit

Address: 172 Main Street S Toronto, ON M4E 2W1 Canada
Review:
i was traveling in toronto and took a train to this side of the down to try this restaurant i ordered their ribs and brisket

ribs were very meaty nearly stlouis style and prepared pretty well i should say that they were cooked for enough time so they were tender yet there was still too much fat that was oozing out so overall they didnt taste very pleasant personally i would like them to be cooked a bit longer to render the fat

the brisket was well trimmed and cooked yet the brisket itself especially the flat muscle was very thin feels like those cheaper ones from walmart and it had a bit weird taste at the first bite i personally didnt enjoy that much and i think its related to the meat quality not cooking skills i also had a couple of slices of point muscle they were okay afterall they were not highpriced though i would be willing to pay a bit more for slightly higher quality of meat

Address: 172 Main Street S Toronto, ON M4E 2W1 Canada
Review: fantastic location for me to meet clients a short walk down main street food was delicious lots of flavour reasonably priced and good portions i will be back with my family

Address: 172 Main Street S Toronto, ON M4E 2W1 Canada
Review: my first time here and i know im definitely coming back the food is delicious and the attention was great very attentive and helpful the only think that i didnt like is the price its kind of overpriced

Address: 1018 St Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6E 1A4 Canada
Review: the only place with cambodian food in the city so glad i came by its takeout only for now but its so worth it food is flavourful and delicious and took me right back to cambodia great service and lovely people will definitely be back for more au kun

Address: 1018 St Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6E 1A4 Canada
Review: i wish i could give it 45 stars the portions were good the service was friendly everything was tasty but only 25 dishes were excellent the decor inside is seriously lacking as well 10 was really good the cold rolls were a good size but were a bit bland compared to other places ive been 12 had lots of veggies and good flavors i didnt love the basil chicken res curry was good too i will go again and found prices to be fair

Address: 1018 St Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6E 1A4 Canada
Review:
really good quality cambodianthai food fair price and great service plenty of options and you can not go wrong the
cambodian soup was rich and was my favorite  id definitely come back

Address: 1018 St Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6E 1A4 Canada
Review: this is a beautiful place on st clair west the ambience was good and staff very friendly the food was beyond awesome and so generous  be careful about the spice level my friend found medium spicy also a lil over the top  definitely going to be a regular patron here for sure

Address: 1018 St Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6E 1A4 Canada
Review: there is a real authenticity and family run atmosphere here the food looks and tastes homemade its not too greasy or salty and my belly is happy  the owner is friendly and personable combo 2 beef and sweet potato for my first time

Address: 636 Saint Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6C 1A9 Canada
Review:
fish and chips is a classic dish that i hold near and dear to my heart the perfect combination of fried fish crispy fries and tangy tartar sauce is hard to resist

sea witch fish and chips boasts a welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff the main staff members were knowledgeable and helpful but i suspect the person who was battering and frying the fish that day may have been new to the job

their menu offers four different types of fish halibut 26 haddock 1750 trout 18 and pickerel 19 although i typically prefer white fish i decided to try the pickerel and i was pleasantly surprised by the wellseasoned fish despite the thick batter the fries were decent but a bit inconsistent in texture

while my experience at sea witch fish and chips was good i believe there is room for improvement i would be willing to give it another try if i were in the area overall i would give sea witch fish and chips a 35 out of 5 rating

Address: 636 Saint Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6C 1A9 Canada
Review:
we first came here because we learned they fry everything in tallow far better for you than seed oils vege canola etc and the taste is better too i do think the first time we visited  right as they opened for dinner  was the best visit the fish wasnt too greasy fries were good since then weve visited a couple more times some visits it felt a bit greasy with differing levels of batter

that being said still enjoy coming here the service is so friendly and love the atmosphere and unpretentious vintage decor

Address: 636 Saint Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6C 1A9 Canada
Review: one of the few excellent fish n chips places left great service in family friendly atmosphere almost forgot generous portions of delicious fish

Address: 636 Saint Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6C 1A9 Canada
Review:
amazing fish  chips saw this spot on ticktok and doordash and decided to dine in person we were extremely hungry and ordered larger meals plus added gravy  coleslaw  portions are generous which is good given the pricing  we could barely finish half a fish and some fries
worth every penny fish is fresh and crisp

Address: 636 Saint Clair Avenue W Toronto, ON M6C 1A9 Canada
Review: quant and cute environment with a gorgeous mural outside their tartar sauce is great and their fish is cooked perfectly if youre going for good friday get a reservation

Address: 4161 4 Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1J5 Canada
Review: great all around experience every staff member we interacted with was friendly and helpful everyone went above and beyond to make sure we were completely satisfied every dish we ordered was delicious and well portioned the food and beer menu was well rounded they were great with the kids too

Address: 4161 4 Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1J5 Canada
Review:
finally had the chance to visit the new location and was really satisfied with both the food and service
cocktails were yum and so was the really thin pizza selection and nachos the inside decor is also to die for and i did not hesitate to take photos at all
our server teanna went out of her way to make my two kids feel special and seen which is rare to find at a restaurant in town 1010 atmosphere will definitely visit again soon

Address: 4161 4 Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1J5 Canada
Review: amazing pizza and poutine service was outstanding bravo to the team

Address: 4161 4 Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1J5 Canada
Review: i was here on the first day of what i believe was a reopening everything was so tasty you can tell it was homemade everyone i interacted with was very kind and i could tell there were a lot of local folks there which is a good sign in a big tourist area the decor is really cool and modern and the cocktail menu was super fun im heading up to alaska for the summer but ill be back on my way back down

Address: 4161 4 Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1J5 Canada
Review: as always the food is amazing our server tianna must have been having a bad day and decided to take it out on us she was very short and rude when asked simple questions like one would dining  out and not friendly at all we got our amazing food not all together but close enough minus one persons meal being told it will be out shortly after all four of the people finished eating and still no garlic fries to be found i told her we didnt need the fries anymore as we are all finished and just the bill i was then handed the interact machine with the total and when i asked for my bill with the items on it before i pay i was given a nasty look she went and printed it and it was thrown on the table in front of me the fries i never received was still on the bill even though she knew we havent received them when i showed her that it was still on the bill it was then snatched out of my hand with another not so pleased look on her face i have never been treated like that in any establishment and it was not the way we wanted our grad celebration to go for our daughter again food was amazing the the lady who sat us started off the evening wonderfully and was so nice just sucks it couldnt continue girls night grad fun ruined by one person

Address: 2112 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B9 Canada
Review:
we love the maple infused bangers and eggs my wife and i asked for well done eggs and potatoes they call them hash browns and they were cooked to perfection sooo tasty

this place was recommended by northern lights resort and they were exactly right this place is amazing

we thought we should arrive before the lunch rush 11 am but there was still a wait of 10 minutes so be prepared to wait but it is worth it

Address: 2112 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B9 Canada
Review: super yummy breakfast we were the first people in when they opened on a sunday morning at 930 and they were completely full by ten i loved my full breakfast and my kids loved the french toast then even split it into two plates for us without us having to ask coffee was yummy as well

Address: 2112 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B9 Canada
Review: i was visiting whitehorse this week for a conference and burnt toast was on the list of recommended places to eat and boy they were right visited one day for a simple yogurt breakfast that was lovely and came back for lunch another day and had the daily special crab melt  would definitely recommend prices are reasonable and the staff are friendly

Address: 2112 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B9 Canada
Review: this place was super fantastic and one of the greatest huevos rancheros amazing i forgot my purse  and didnt notice till hours later i called the restaurant asking about it and they kept it safe i got to the restaurant and nothing was missing and the staff were really excellent highly recommend this place

Address: 2112 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B9 Canada
Review:
had breakfast there yesterday great service and great food

i didnt have any canadian currency and server there lend me a looney she was absolutely amazing she was greeting everyone fixing rocky tables cleaning tables taking orders giving out food in time i dont think she stopped for a second she worked her butt off

Address: 309 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H3 Canada
Review: love the sushi rolls menu items are impressive and reasonable my server was nice and great service comfort seats and free parking outside

Address: 309 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H3 Canada
Review:
appaled at the level of customer service at this restaurant  see photo attached ordered boat b

first bullet point specifies that the order comes with california roll tuna roll or salmon roll  i chose the tuna roll  my order came with both a california roll and tuna roll even though the bulletpoint says or  i noted this to the waiter and said perhaps it was a misunderstanding of the menu and that i could not eat california roll due to dietary restrictions and i had properly specified when giving the order that i wanted tuna roll  the waitress indicated that she could change the order but it would be an extra 1  she indicated that no one else has ever had this problem and that i am the only one  furthermore she indicated that i should have told her about my dietary restriction  granted i should have done so but a tuna roll doesnt go against my dietary restriction so i felt no need to indicate as such  this was merely an error by the establishment in the grammatical structurewording of their menu for boat b

i pointed my concern to the menu and the wording of the menu to my server  i am sympathetic to the fact that it was a misunderstanding and miscommunication between both the server and i however the manner in which the menu miscommunication was dealt with by the server was subpar including the adding of an additional 1  i indicated to the server that ill speak to her boss however no such manager addressed my concerns

Address: 309 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H3 Canada
Review:
i should give this rating a 5 however it wasnt perfect
so on a monday night  nothing special going on in town we decided to return as we have many times befor  well it was packed  line ups on a monday night  go figure 
they did fantastic service was great  food was better and the poor servers were run off their feet 
overall it was a 5 star service  no way you could predict that many on a monday
see you again soon

Address: 309 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H3 Canada
Review: great service food was soso they have a really good selection and everything was reasonably fresh taking into account this isnt toronto or vancouver i got the alaska roll there were 5 pieces in the roll a decent lunch serving for me the rice was a little wet and tasted rather bland there were maybe 7 pieces of salmon roe in the whole roll the chopsticks for takeaway were the flimsier ones that can give you splinters the wasabi was good though

Address: 309 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H3 Canada
Review: delicious dinner with quick and friendly service had the crazy roll which is a deep fried california roll with spicy mayo and some extra fish eggs also had the chicken yaki soba which was really tasty think this will be my new go to place

Address: 209 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B2 Canada
Review:
we had a great experience staff super friendly great vibe and above all food was super delicious the sea food linguine alfredo sauce was perfect
in fact we returned to the restaurant on our way back both times we had a great experience

Address: 209 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B2 Canada
Review:
we wandered into gp on a sunday evening while exploring whitehorse

the atmosphere was relaxed and enjoyable

the staff managed by megan were professional and attentive
the pizza was top notch as was the pasta
megan recommended burnt toast for breakfast prior to our departure we were so pleased with her service that we decided to give it a try

burnt toast was packed and did not disappoint service was great again the following day

thanks to megan and the staff at both restaurants

both meals helped make whitehorse even more memorable

Address: 209 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B2 Canada
Review:
the service at this establishment was nothing short of exceptional and the culinary experience was simply out of this world for  whitehorse the host and our server exuded a delightful blend of charm and professionalism ensuring that our dining experience was nothing short of perfection

we decided to quench our thirst with a local beer for  yukon brewery company  the name of which eludes my memory and a classic moscow mule  the bar tendered nailed the moscow mule and the beer was the second best since we have been in the yukon

in the mood for some delectable pasta we opted for the seafood fettuccine and rustic vegetarian pasta dish both dishes were a symphony of flavors leaving our taste buds dancing with joy my dish  the seafood fettuccine was a true masterpiece with succulent seafood perfectly complementing the velvety pasta as for the vegetarian dish my friend described it as any explosion of flavors we couldnt help but marvel at the expert seasoning and juicy tenderness of the dish

while the pasta dishes were undeniably superb i must admit that i have a knack for recreating pasta dishes at home and i felt i could do better nevertheless the experience was a culinary delight that i would highly recommend to anyone seeking a memorable dining experience in whitehorse we will most certainly be returning for both of these exceptional dishes if we ever come back to this part of the world

Address: 209 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B2 Canada
Review:
i just want to say not good experience tonight 
being here before and it was nice great steak
not tonight 
tonight the scallops ware sooo goood salad excellent
service perfect 
steak not good at all this time
send it back 2 times
manger the worst 
if you ask me i will try again 
no no   just only the way the manger treat us

Address: 209 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B2 Canada
Review:
i would not go anywhere else now that i found this little gem
the atmosphere the soft music the comfortable seating the fantastic food and the wonderfully tentative staff
meagan is the manager and served us on both occasions
we are from ontario and were there on a fishing trip and plan to returni digress
we returned not only for the food but because of meagan she also runs a breakfast restaurant called burnt toastnaturally we ate there too
a wonderful experience 
joe

Address: 203 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review:
this is definitely the best place in whitehorse for a sandwich a good variety of meat the soups are very good the salads are ok though
i didnt really enjoy the coleslaw or pasta salads the beet and onion was good

you definitely want to come here for a good sandwich remember you need to come before 3pm otherwise sandwich bar is closed

Address: 203 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: great little neighbourhood deli lots of options both hot and cold with numerous different ways to get your sandwich made fresh to order lots of different side salads as well as plenty of hot options definitely going to be my new goto lunch spot whenever i have time also many baked desserts and other things to enjoy for dessert

Address: 203 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review:
amazing food super friendly staff
working in town and the sadest days are the weekend when i cant get lunch at the deli

specials are always amazing

sandwich counter is always delicious but quality takes time so its a bit slow even with the whole team working together

cannot recommend enough

Address: 203 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: great food we had a workmans lunch with local sausages and choice of salad followed by triple layer chocolate cake delicious

Address: 203 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: the sandwiches are so good here and will keep you full for a while i always come here at least once every time im in whitehorse for work i havent gotten their hot food items but they look delicious the place is booming with people over lunch hour but dont worry the line goes quickly

Address: 2074 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B1 Canada
Review:
started with the mango smoothie which was very refreshing especially in this summer season

for the main entree we ordered the spicy fish which hit the spot the salad and fish was fresh and the rice is full of flavor and heavenly

the beef curry was also good and very tender

we had the honor to meet the master chef andrea and she makes everything with so much affection which shines through the wonderful flavors she is bringing to everyone

they also have a fun table that showcases the visitors from all over the world so when you stop by make sure to bring currency from your hometown to continue this fun tradition

a must try when visiting whitehorse

Address: 2074 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B1 Canada
Review:
very tasty and the custom spicy sauce we got was on point

had the jerk chicken roti and it was quite tasty the jerk chicken salad might be a good option too

id go back to try the ox tail and goat for sure id bet it would be very tasty and made authentic

Address: 2074 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B1 Canada
Review: popped in for a quick dinner after work and was really surprised with how great the food was wasnt sure what to expect because i havent had a lot of jamaican food but the jerk chicken roti was fantastic and the rum balls i had for dessert were great too definitely gonna go back and try more of the menu

Address: 2074 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B1 Canada
Review: jerk chicken plate was the best meal id had in a long time while no expert on jamaican food i have been to the island pickapeppa is superb i wish i could hang around in this cool town to try some more dishes

Address: 2074 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1B1 Canada
Review: i had the fried plantain and oxtail both were delicious great caribbean food and flavours

Address: 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: smaller diner with great food and service pho and vermicelli bowl were excellent will definitely return

Address: 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review:
just had a fantastic pho and iced coffee the broth is delectable and the meat fresh fresh sprouts and lemon sriracha and hoisin at the table so you can make it as spicy as you want i had given up on this place but decided to give it another shot and im so glad i did

wish i could give 5 stars but sometimes the quality is world class other times ita like maybe the broth hasnt been prepared long enough and or the ingredients like bean sprouts arent all that fresh

Address: 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: sept 16 arrived early at 1128 the waitress saw us but didnt come say hi or open the door we wait till 1140 she finally opened the door picked a little corner for us we move the table a little bit but she stopped us right away with a condescending attitude towards us we decided to step away from this trash attitude me and my friends in whitehorse always come eat here from now on you will not see us ever again

Address: 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review:
ive had a lot of ph√µ in my time even had it from a cart in vietnam which i doubt was very clean or hygenic but i am addicted to this awesome soup and have to try it everywhere i can

well this place was a huge mistake staff were unfriendly couldnt get our orders right and then tried to serve me someone elses food when i told the guy thats not what i ordered he started yelling and slammed the food down i dont care if youre having a bad day or you work in a vietnamese restaurant where nobody is vietnamese in the yukon of all places learn to behave yourself be professional

and heres a tip anytime you mention tips or say something about not getting one youre getting nothing

as for the food the soup was bland and tasted like dollar store chicken stock watered down the vermicelli noodles looked like they came from a pack of mr noodles and tasted like soggy cardboard the meat was mostly fat and what looked like dog food scraps they got on sale from a refinery

i wouldnt feed this to prisoners and im pretty sure they eat better than that anyhow

Address: 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: great chicken skewers and classic pho lemon soda was delicious

Address: 206 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H2 Canada
Review: great but expensive for what it is would recommend the food is good and the service is awesome price is a little steep but still adequate

Address: 206 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H2 Canada
Review:
i dont often leave a bad review but
upon arriving to our reservation at 730 we were waiting in the lobby for 35 minutes before getting sat the table had been sitting empty otherwise when we were sat it took about 15 minutes for our server to come and drop off waters and plates she walked away before we could get a drink order in and one of the members of our party had to flag her down to order we ended up ordering everything all at once because by this time it was 830 and we had no drinks or food the appetizers came out quite quickly but by 945 we had still not eaten and we had at least 6 empty drinks piled to the end of the tablepictured below
a member of the table asked to speak to management about the wait for our food and they said yeah its ready its coming when they were setting down our food i had to ask them to actually clear the glasses so they could put the plate down the manager or supervisor came over and gave us some wine but no apology no reasoning nothing no water refills no drink refills super weird we were really disappointed a sorry goes a long way with bad service and as a server myself i just dont think this is justified the only reason im leaving two stars instead of one is because the food tasted good i wont be going back

Address: 206 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H2 Canada
Review: nice restaurant look classy great food friendly staff but quite a while to get our food for the price i think still reasonable this is better than earl in whitehorse we ordered calamari  steamed muscle and fettuccine for dinner

Address: 206 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H2 Canada
Review:
after a long day of cancelled flights and frustrations i decided to check out giorgios cuccina it was a great pick
besides a small set back of waiting for someone to take my order waiter came and apologized for a miscommunication between staff on who would be attending to my table the food and drinks were delivered promptly the food was delicious and well prepared large serving of pasta and great dessert i had the penne asparagus and berry new york cheesecake overall great service and food and next time i am in whitehorse i would eat there again

Address: 206 Jarvis Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2H2 Canada
Review:
place was about 13 full  i was seated and got a glass of water and menus immediately  10min later a table of about 12 shows up beside me  i left 15min later when the waitress started taking their order  a few different waitresses walked by my table over a dozen times with hardly a glance in the 25min i sat there

thanks for the bad experience on thursday may 11th 2023 at 6pm

i went to tonys pasta and grill and got prompt service and great food

Address: Best Western Gold Rush Inn 411 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B6 Canada
Review: one of the only places open on a sunday for breakfast the gold pan saloon has a decent selection of breakfast fare the service and food were quick the place was clean and the food was tasty the portions were gargantuan the omelette could have easily fed two people

Address: Best Western Gold Rush Inn 411 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B6 Canada
Review:
this is one of the rare places that open for lunch as the rather famous places for bison burger or food is only open for dinner till late this place is located at the first level of the best western inn and there are 2 ways to enter it via the main entrance of best western inn and then the side door which is the main entrance of gold pan saloon or you can go by the back door which gets you to the restrooms which was how i entered but it doesnt matter as they still checked your vaccination status and id

do note that this place has a lot of regulars given that whitehorse downtown is a very small downtown and everyone kind of knows each other dont be upset if they dont service you immediately i found that the regulars there know the menu better than the servers my server actually didnt know the price of the special of the day and how much the beers cost so she had to return to the bar to ask and get a menu to show us the price instead all in all service is not strong here for new customers but regulars know the service staff by name

the bison burger is pretty nice first time for me gamey lean tasty well marinated and burger well made the fries were pretty good as well as for the special of the day it was butter chicken ended up being an indian style of butter chicken which was fine

beer was really cold and nice in a retro looking plastic cup probably because many customers broke them after too many a glass

given they are one of the few lunch joints im pretty happy with what i got and service was never my emphasis anyway so this place is worth my time and stomach

Address: Best Western Gold Rush Inn 411 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B6 Canada
Review: had a bison burger and some wings for takeout one night while staying at the gold rush inn the waitressesbartenders did not seem very welcoming but the food itself was quite good the next morning they had some issues with us borrowing a plate to use in our room to reheat the leftoversbut it worked out in the end

Address: Best Western Gold Rush Inn 411 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B6 Canada
Review: service was excellent very accommodating although the place looks very dated and in need of a renovation the food and drinks were very good we returned twice in the same trip we tried a few beers and tried a variety of food and starters from breakfast to dinner the only dish we didnt care for was the gold nuggets from the dessert menu was hoping for more of a donut hole and instead was more like fried pizza crust dipped in brown sugarcinnamon but everything else was great would gladly return of in the area  if my review helped please give me a  cheers

Address: Best Western Gold Rush Inn 411 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2B6 Canada
Review: i was here in yukon for business the food itself was decent but literally the worst service i have ever witnessed table was not clean when we were asked to sit down our server never really checked in on us after food was brought out when confronted about this she complained that we ordered late and shes handling 3 tables at once you cannot just wave down any server you have to wait for your own waiter who would disappear once they take your order our whole morning was ruined by her nonchalant attitude we asked for takeout box and she almost threw the box on our table very disrespectful staff and entitled servers when we asked for a manager to explain our situation better she came back to our table and said im the manager and if we have any complains we could let her know we asked if the owner is at the restraunt and her reply was and i quote this is a big establishment and the owner never comes at big restaurants like these which almost made us choke on our food lmao we did not tip and told her that shes the problem im from vancouver and sit at restaurants mostly for business meeting and never once had a complain from service not sure what was she trying to point out by bringing big establishment  would never recommend any visitors not a worthwhile service for the money theyre charging

Address: 211 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: food was good not the best ever but certainly decent for being in the yukon our party had the barilla tacos special a burrito  nachos everything was satisfying but the nachos skip those  opt for the nightly special perhaps 5 stars for the friendly staff presentation and colorful mexican dishes

Address: 211 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review:
the mexican food was fantastic and tasted truly authentic as if it was home made i cant remember what i paid but it seemed reasonable given the quality of the food we ordered

the atmosphere was nice they have a pleasant outdoor eating area and everybody around me seemed to be enjoying themselves

the only downside was how long it took for a server to take our order 20 minutes estimated especially since we had a toddler with us

i hope to come back at some point this summer

Address: 211 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review:
if you are craving for some authentic mexican cuisine this is the place

the staffs were friendly and helpful

food was more enjoyable out in the patio a sparrow was trying to snatch our nachos

their portions werent generous but just enough to feel stuffed

they have specials written on the whiteboard so make sure you check it out

they do not take amex

Address: 211 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: the best mexican restaurant in yukon authentic mexican food no texmex nice place and great atmosphere thanks

Address: 211 Hanson Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1Y3 Canada
Review: the best mexican food north of british columbia this authentic mexican spot stands out for their traditional dishes and daily house specials quite hard to find in this latitude what i admired the most is the attention to detail for the best experience beautiful decor and atmosphere maximum sanitary measures cleanest washroom in whitehorse and top notch customer service thank you for an excellent evening

Address: 404 Wood Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E8 Canada
Review:
came here for dinner earlier this month during my first night in whitehorse the atmosphere was cozy and the service friendly but the corners were a bit dark the way to the washroom was not very well maintained

we ordered a ramen the firecracker roll and the bc salmon skin roll the rolls tasted good and were reasonably priced but they were poorly made the rice was not rolled all the way around most of the rolls causing many of them to be wackily shaped and they disintegrated easily when picked up by my chopstick i was honestly quite shocked at how easily they fell apartthey need to hold together as you dip them in soy sauce and then send them into your mouthhope the restaurant improves the rollmaking

Address: 404 Wood Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E8 Canada
Review: a japanese friend recommended me this place for friendly price and good sushi i think they accustomize the taste for japanese food more flavor we able to get a seat once we enter the restaurant but took a while to get our foods

Address: 404 Wood Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E8 Canada
Review:
i used to eat here regularly and enjoyed it very much its been a while so i decided to takeout for the family wow has it gone down hill box a zero teriyaki flavour on greesy chicken rice was undercooked dry and rubbery and the california rolls fell apart and were stale as if they were made days ago the wanton soup was just brown salt broth zero tofu and one tiny morsal of seaweed

beef udon noodle were good beef and broth were super fatty and salty

im left feeling ill and like i should have ordered pizza

i used to love sekura but wont be back again now that it has become quite terrible and not at all worth the 65 i just paid

sorry for the bad review as the staff were very friendly i feel bad but i also feel slightly sick

Address: 404 Wood Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E8 Canada
Review: i ordered beef tataki and it came totally different from the picture the meat is so thin and small 1895 really the ramen tasted like instant noodles  but salmon sashimi is good

Address: 404 Wood Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E8 Canada
Review:
if you like sushi youll definitely like this place it is one of the best sushi in whitehorse
food here is reasonably priced compared to its competitors also the quantity is more for same or lesser price

in the picture is firecracker sushi roll and boat 1 firecracker was seriously good and i highly recommend it

Address: 102 Wood St Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E3 Canada
Review: best chinese food in whitehorse  clean environment and very friendly and inviting staff

Address: 102 Wood St Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E3 Canada
Review:
wor wonton is a meal better be hungry lots of flavour you can taste every different meat pork beef and chicken crunchy veggies prawns and lots of wonton
good service friendly and engaging staff

Address: 102 Wood St Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E3 Canada
Review: absolutely the best chinese food takeout in whitehorse no matter what day of the week we place an takeout order always fresh ingredients amazing flavours fast friendly service thank you to the staff  chefs

Address: 102 Wood St Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E3 Canada
Review: terrible experience  no wonder the place was empty and looked closed when i arrived  although it was fresh the food was very plain tasting  i dont think the waitress understood my english because it was very difficult to communicate with her and i never received the pork fried rice i ordered  i received plain steamed rice instead and it was just easier to keep it  there was another person in my party but our meals werent served at the same time  they only offered canned soda to drink so even refills werent free unless you just had water  at the register which was being run by the same person that was our waitress i told her we didnt get fried rice only steamed rice  she seemed to insist that we received fried rice and refused to adjust the total  i just paid the check and will never go back again do yourself a favor and spend your funds elsewhere

Address: 102 Wood St Whitehorse, YT Y1A 2E3 Canada
Review: best chinese food ever seriously this place has been open for over two years and this is the first time that ive been in there omg my poor hips stop what youre doing and get in there for dinner yum

Address: 2241 2nd Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5W1 Canada
Review: yesterday was my first time to visit boston pizza in whitehorse and i had an amazing experience with this restaurant the customer service was outstanding especially to the staff named jose he was so welcoming and very friendly he is very knowledgeable about the products and helped me choose the perfect food and the product was exactly what i was looking for he went above and beyond to help me find the perfect food and the service was very quick it made me feel at home and i left the restaurant with a smile in my face and satisfied tummy thank you jose i will keep coming back to talk to you and ofcourse to try out  the other food you will recommend jose deserves a pat on the back for a great service boston pizza is lucky to have you

Address: 2241 2nd Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5W1 Canada
Review: it was a great experience to have the robot delivering my meal at the table to view the robot subscribe to my youtube channel sandys shimmerz n elegance bridal gifts and more thank you

Address: 2241 2nd Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5W1 Canada
Review: food was good had nachos with some special requests everything came as ordered had to ask for refills on our drinks looks like this store is due for an update and some window washing the nearest tv was washed out otherwise  everything was fine

Address: 2241 2nd Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5W1 Canada
Review:
was in whitehorse visiting from out of town went to boston pizza for supper because its familiar worst experience ever
took forever to before anyone came to take our order then my familys food came a good 10 min before mine did in fact we had to ask waiter where my order was it finally came out 5 min later and was soggy and ice cold
not once did waiter ask if we wanted any drink refills or about dessert but was very prompt to arrive with the bill and machine in hand
next time we visit we will not eat at boston pizza

Address: 2241 2nd Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5W1 Canada
Review: not great the servers are inconsistent some are great some seat their friends when youre trying to pay the bill and delay your departure up to 10 minutes and i find i need to check the bill to make sure things have been rung in properly ive been to others and had far better experiences but this is the only bps this far north so i guess it is what it is

Address: 2210 Second Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: came here early morning on feb 19 for breakfast the staff member on duty at the time was quite sweet which really made a difference compared with other tims i should have asked for her name efficient service and consistent quality nice to have a place opened early in the morning

Address: 2210 Second Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: staff has no smile and greetings and no parting comments no thank you after the transaction forgot to give my pastry but did not even apologize for the delay food is great as always

Address: 2210 Second Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: service is so slow people are walking out busy morning and they have two staff working they are trying their best but need more help

Address: 2210 Second Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: my car broke down in the middle and i went there to fix it they said it need oil change i said ok go ahead after waiting for 30 minutes i didnt got my phone fix even i am paying 39 for the phone plus taxes even i gave him every document he asked for he still not able to file my taxes he just saying t4 is empty they refused to retured my couch even they said return policy is 15 days i just bought it yesterday

Address: 2210 Second Ave Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review:
my to go places for snack and hot beverage i like their fast services and the price way better than other coffee shop this place open 6am to 7pm have free wifi and located in down town next to bmo bank across the starbucks

the just serve brunch and light meal for breakfast so far i dont complaints its quick frozen food but it fresh the serve sweet and savory snack i personally like timbits the smaller size of donuts just to making sure that i dont fee guilty to much eat a dozen of it if if you fill in survey you get 10 for dollar i recommend  honey dip  regular flavor always best

they need to have certain pic to make sure toilet clean

Address: 101 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0G5 Canada
Review: excellent breakfast huge portions great service everyone is very friendly

Address: 101 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0G5 Canada
Review: service was fast but ingredients quality average

Address: 101 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0G5 Canada
Review: this place is hit and miss depending on when you go and depending what you get it might be ok or it might not be i have enjoyed good cheap food here in the past last time we went we had to wait almost an hour for our food so we were all quite upset and ended up leaving before our food came our server understood though

Address: 101 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0G5 Canada
Review: perfection best breakfast place in whitehorse the warm decor the very mellow background music excellent omelettes and great panfried grated potatoes did not leave any on the plate and the warm friendly service from reimi she is a plus factor for tonimoes strongly recommended marco and leslie

Address: 101 Main Street Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0G5 Canada
Review: the food was terrible nachos were burnt so badly they couldnt be eaten fish was totally undercooked after informaing the wait staff the cut piece of fish was just thrown back into the fryer my vegatables were barely warm most of the food was uneaten ive eaten there a few times now this will be the last it was always ok this was awful to put it mildly

Address: Yukon Centre Mall 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: great canadian club with onions olives green peppers and sriracha sauce and yellow mustard tasty

Address: Yukon Centre Mall 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: my husband bought 2 foot longs to bring home to atlin he continued to ask for more veges on both but he was ignoredif i spend damn near 40 bucks for 2 sandwiches they better be loaded not happy about having to reuild the sandwichs when he got home not happy not ever again cheapcheap cheap

Address: Yukon Centre Mall 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: love their sweet onion chicken teriyaki sub  the veggies are always fresh  the sweet onion sauce adds a nice element to the sub  the chocolate mm cookies are soft like they just came out of the oven  it makes for a delicious lunch

Address: Yukon Centre Mall 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: food is great but customer service is really bad funny story i ordered online for pick up for 120pm and set up the wrong address surely my mistake i still bought another sandwich at the closer location from my work i told them what happened but i still have to pay my food understandable after i got my food i made sure to call the other location no answer after 3 calls i didnt even receive a call that my food is still sitting there after 5 hours after my work around 6pm i went to the right location to see if possible to get a refund the girl said no as the sandwich was built already i said okay and left ive been a manager to a fast food chain and if i know my customers online order been sitting for more than 5 hours i would offer a new sandwich if refund cant be done so probably the first and last ordering here good customer service helps if you want customers to come back

Address: Yukon Centre Mall 2190 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 5N6 Canada
Review: never again will i pay almost 40 dollars for two sandwiches and 2 apple juices psychotic

Address: 200 Hamilton Boulevard Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0A6 Canada
Review:
subway has gotten very very expensive i was shocked and amazed to see a tip option on the payment terminal was this some kind of joke

i think ill go to boston pizza next time i can get a nice lunch item with a side for about the same price as footlong sub from subway

Address: 200 Hamilton Boulevard Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0A6 Canada
Review: theyre never open on sundays even during busy tournaments but their website always says they are its wildly frustrating when youre counting on them for food and need to leave the complex to feed your family between games with no parking

Address: 200 Hamilton Boulevard Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0A6 Canada
Review: its a convenient location and the employees are usually friendly and do a great job the fella behind the counter on todays visit seemed annoyed that i was there the plexiglass causes an issue for hearing especially if you have hearing issues like me so i couldnt hear what he was saying maybe the annoyance nonetheless i was the only customer at the time no line up behind me and plenty of time until closing i know its hard to find skilled committed workers doesnt make it okay to be rude to customers who pay your wages tho

Address: 200 Hamilton Boulevard Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0A6 Canada
Review:
asked for a melt unbeknownst to me that no longer exists in the system but there was no comment about it from the attendant

when she rang it up over 20 dollars for a sandwich that ive never paid more than 14 for because the melt isnt a thing each ingredient was added as an add on

never coming back what a sshow

Address: 200 Hamilton Boulevard Whitehorse, YT Y1A 0A6 Canada
Review: i love their subs

Address: 2222 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: pleasant experience great people working kim even told us that root beer is free refill which we are not aware keep the good vibes and smiles on your face aw crew

Address: 2222 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review:
i was charged 15 for a teen burger combo thats a lot of money for a burger combo i wont be back anytime soon as its too expensive for me despite whatever rationale aw has for the increased prices

service was great staff were friendly

Address: 2222 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: restaurant was very clean food was good but did not serve the entire aw menu even though there was signage present my son wanted a root beer shake but not served at this location

Address: 2222 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: waited 15 minutes for 2 breakfast sandwiches and 3 scrambled eggs when i asked whats taking so long you have served 10 people that ordered after me they said it would be 4 more minutes i asked for my money back by the time they got to that my food was up i still asked for my money back to expensive for the amount of food you get the english muffins are not toasted enuff and taste like sandpaper

Address: 2222 2nd Avenue Whitehorse, YT Y1A 1C8 Canada
Review: first timer going to an aw but i have to say the restaurant and bathroom is super clean the food is delicious but the only reason i have to dock a star is because the price is a little higher than its rivals aka mcdonalds

Address: 2077 Pembina Hwy Winnipeg, MB R3T 5J9 Canada
Review:
after a few days of running around getting stuff and organizing the new place i finally got a chance to check out the new neighbourhoods restaurants

1st stop was the sun fortune restaurant

this restaurant has been around for many years now and was packed when we went there without a reservation however  the nice lady at the reception was nice enough to accommodate us

the place was your typical nondescript chinese restaurant  no fuss simply decorated joint  prices were a little high for the small servings smaller than im used to back in calgary but the real attractions were the amazing quality of food

we ordered
 cantonese chow mein  910
 crispy pork chop topped with dried garlic  910
 deluxe fried rice  910
 deluxe chop suey  710
 steamed fish fillet with tofu  1010
 beef brisket noodle soup  810

this place is highly recommended and will definitely be one of my gotoplaces if i decided to move in the city permanently

Address: 2077 Pembina Hwy Winnipeg, MB R3T 5J9 Canada
Review: highly recommend the peking duck hk milk tea tea spicy pork eggplant and spicy beef tendon hot pot some days the food is too salty so it is not always consistent service is good except from two visits one of the servers demanded tip before we even got a chance to put tip on the table it was quite rude

Address: 2077 Pembina Hwy Winnipeg, MB R3T 5J9 Canada
Review: ordered for the first time and everything was exceptional pictured  pearl beef lemon chicken szechuan seafood hot pot mixed vegetables cantonese chow mein white rice mushroom fried rice chop suey spare ribs with honey spring rolls and sweet and sour shrimp

Address: 2077 Pembina Hwy Winnipeg, MB R3T 5J9 Canada
Review: good food at good price  not so ample to accommodate more than 50 people at a time  opening time for dine in only from 49pm the beijing duck is popular so usually out of stock

Address: 2077 Pembina Hwy Winnipeg, MB R3T 5J9 Canada
Review:
updated review

protip order the fried rice i havent been so excited about fried rice in awhile

they are one of the few places that do a peking duck dinner you need 24 hours advance notice to order it however

its a favorite of a lot of people
serving hong kong cafe style food
it was popular to go there for ying yang mix of hong kong style tea and coffee
they have afternoon tea specials as well 595 we did the fried rice with tomato sauce it didnt really have much tomato but that was fine as it tasted delicious with a smoke flavor cantonese people call it wok hay
we also did the lunch special which was breaded pork cutlet 895
we upgraded and got spaghetti for 150 additional charge

for this price its great if i come back soon i would upgrade to 5 stars if it stays consistent

parking is available in a large lot shared with other businesses

Address: 1822 Grant Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0N3 Canada
Review: very average food both lunch box and the roll pretty pricey given the quality of the food however the ratings for their ramen seem better than their lunch box so i might come back to try their ramen and give an updated review but for now 3 is pretty generous tbh service was fast tho

Address: 1822 Grant Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0N3 Canada
Review:
this place has gotten a lot busier over the years majority the time its tough to get setting for lunch today was my birthday one of my best friends made reservations in advance

me and the company i was with dine out frequently so heres the feedback  raman and its main ingredients egg pork belly noddle texture and soup flavour all great

seafood tampera was lacking some crisp and oil didnt taste right

just had uni recently from vancouver even though it was supposed to be super fresh here it is pretty hard to beat

Address: 1822 Grant Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0N3 Canada
Review:
lovely ambience the restaurant is a cozy size with about room to seat around maybe 10 groups of four plus a bar that sits about 6 or so its usually very busy so if you want to get a seat you should reserve ahead

presentation is very aesthetic food is tasty and light on the stomach it does not feel like it weighs you down sushi rice on the rolls is a good texture and not too sticky

if you are able to go for ramen its one of the better bowls you can find in the city they only offer these at lunch though and they are limited so be prepared

price point relative to other sushi restaurants is pretty average quality is definitely above average but be prepared that i think the rolls are smaller than average and you may need to order more to be full

otherwise a good experience

Address: 1822 Grant Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0N3 Canada
Review: went to winnipeg on my birthday for the weekend   we did not plan ahead where to eat just want to be spontaneous  we decided to have sushi we checked online to see which one had the best reviews  saw yujiro we took chances because we did not have reservation but it was early so we had better chance we got in small restaurant outside downtown but it was clean friendly staff everything we order in the menu was super good very very fresh i think the best sushi  japanese restaurant in winnipeg we would go back for sure

Address: 1822 Grant Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0N3 Canada
Review: the best sushi in town every visit there is topnotch great selection and perfect for any occasion highly recommend

Address: 100 - 330 Main Street Winnipeg, MB R3C 0Y7 Canada
Review:
we went on a sunday and its busy so make sure to make a reservation you can park in winnipeg square and oeb will validate your parking on the weekend
this was one of the best breakfasts ive ever had i got the lobster scramble and my husband got the get shorty rib food was fresh and extremely flavourful we also shared a mimosa flight which was just average while the coffee was very good this isnt a budget saver breakfast it was 8900 after tip but you get what you pay for here chelsea was a great sever and was able to give some great recommendations  will be back soon

Address: 100 - 330 Main Street Winnipeg, MB R3C 0Y7 Canada
Review:
they cover your parking fee if you go on weekends and park in the buildings underground parking make sure to add your name to the reservation list before you come
i love their food and their menu honestly you probably need more than 1 visit because all the items on their menu sound really good the food is in a higher price range but i think its worth it the service is fast and professional the seating and restaurant interior design is really nice we only had their coffee and it was tasty will come back and try other drinks and update their short ribs on the poutine were so juicy and tender definitely recommended

Address: 100 - 330 Main Street Winnipeg, MB R3C 0Y7 Canada
Review:
went here for sunday breakfast still early so the place wasnt so busy

i enjoyed the eggs benedict service was good too our server was very attentive and checked on us regularly

you can park on the street like pioneer or in the parkade oeb validates parking on weekends

Address: 100 - 330 Main Street Winnipeg, MB R3C 0Y7 Canada
Review:
one of my favorite brunch spots in winnipeg although it is a bit on the pricier side i believe it is worth the treat as they use quality ingredients and techniques in their dishes

the duck confit french toast trifle  duck and pierogies are my favorite dishes highly recommend adding yourself waitlist on yelp

Address: 100 - 330 Main Street Winnipeg, MB R3C 0Y7 Canada
Review:
we heard a lot about this place and finally decided to check it out the ambience and decor is great the service is excellent and the staff is so friendly

they also have underground parking which they validate on weekends which is great especially for downtown

the only miss is the portion size which is definitely on the smaller side taking into account it is definitely on the pricier spectrum for brunch style food

Address: 85 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K4 Canada
Review:
for a dining experience that surpasses all expectations look no further than deer  almond my most recent visit to this charming restaurant with a very special lady was nothing short of exceptional thanks to the personalized menu and remarkable service that elevated our night to a whole new level

from the moment we were greeted at the door we were treated like royalty our server was attentive knowledgeable and keen to create a meal that would delight our palates and cater to our dietary restrictions we could tell that they truly cared about curating a unique experience just for us

we were blown away by every dish that came out and even though they looked too pretty to eat it was like heaven on a fork pair that with some wonderfully curated wines and we felt lifted to a higher level of dining experience

what really sets deer  almond apart is their commitment to catering to each and every guests unique needs every detail from the thoughtfully sourced ingredients to the stunning presentation of each dish was taken care of to ensure our experience was nothing short of perfect the cozy ambiance and dim lighting also added to the romantic atmosphere of the evening making it a truly unforgettable evening

in summary deer  almond is a mustvisit for anyone looking for exceptional food and a personalized dining experience

Address: 85 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K4 Canada
Review:
we went there for a date night
its a 4 course meal
77 per person with no drinks and additional charge for specific dishes
the food the best in winnipeg
every dish was perfect
the service was superb
the place looks nice but to fancy and it was noisy
overall great experience highly recommend

Address: 85 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K4 Canada
Review: every detail was simply fantastic the servers were so friendly and knowledgeable sat down with us to chat with our kids and talk about the menu every dish so memorable and creative this restaurant is top in canada and a must visit on a trip to winnipeg my son ordered steak frites and the server said best fries on the planet and omg

Address: 85 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K4 Canada
Review: really an outstanding restaurant the service is awesome because they give you a wine tasting and also intricately explain the items you are ordering from the dining experience menu valpolicella superiore and deer carpaccio are match made in heaven it was my first time having a deer dish that too in carpaccio form  loved it and it was my favourite  from the menu green pappardelle was soft and tasty with a flavour bomb in that fiery chilli oil wow  pork schnitzel and honey custard had nice presentation but tastes ok compared to the first two dishes the restaurant is extremely hygienic and tip top with a casual ambience  palette cleanser served at the end and complimentary starter received were also good

Address: 85 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K4 Canada
Review: the best meal ive had in winnipeg hands down loved the vibes the server was fabulous and so knowledgeable really so great at her job had a cocktail wine and the set 4 course meal which has more selection than the a la carte meal deer carpaccio was fabulous the peanut semifreddo was also so wonderful would go back over and over

Address: 800 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3M 2M7 Canada
Review: we had an amazing time at brazen hall with our fur baby the petfriendly patio made it the perfect place for us to relax the server was super nice and made sure our pups had fresh water too not to mention the food and drinks were absolutely fantastic well definitely be returning for more good times highly recommended

Address: 800 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3M 2M7 Canada
Review: the place has a very nice atmosphere a nice place for hang out with friends for dining and drinking the fresh tap beer is really tasty we got the special poutine brazen baconbang bang shrimp chicken wingskiki burger and the mogu ramen and we werent disappointed specially the bacon i also ordered for another one because its so good the service was amazing friendly and quickwe really enjoyed our time here

Address: 800 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3M 2M7 Canada
Review: thrilled the patio is dog friendly the dinning was excellent really great hospitality and our waitress even found us birthday candles truly dinomite

Address: 800 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3M 2M7 Canada
Review: had dinner here for my brothers birthday and we had an amazing time the atmosphere was warm and welcoming the service was prompt and friendly we ordered the burnt ends and a soft pretzel for our appetizers and i cant say enough good things about it the pretzel was perfect the hot mustard wasnt too spicy but still had a kick the burnt ends were tender and flavorful my friend ordered a whiskey sour which was delightful all the flavors worked together very well the krakow burger came with a spicy beet sauce that was quite hot but still very tasty which is hard to get and my brother loved it our server was very friendly and knowledgeable it really made the night special 1010 wonderful experience

Address: 800 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3M 2M7 Canada
Review:
had a pint of raspy the red beard which was really enjoyable paired with the trio of brisket tacos which were also delicious

great service

Address: 123 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K8 Canada
Review: still my favorite brunch place of all time in winnipeg amazing service good vibes and they topped up my coffee  nice and warm everything tastes fresh and delicious always fresh to order my favorite no 1 dish always the bacon benedict this time my friend picked all the dishes so i didnt get the benedict my friend ordered the matcha latte  it looks so pretty the side dish potato always steal the show so crispymake sure u complete your meal with their waffle or other dessert they have amazing creative dessert  its a full package date at clementine ps we saw the wall decor has little duck and pup hidden in the crack how cute  we had a great time

Address: 123 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K8 Canada
Review:
tried this place after seeing all the positive reviews

i had the fried chicken on toast which intrigued me as i typically love the waffle combination but also love sourdough the toast was not soggy which i was concerned about and the chicken crispy i prefer a thicker piece of chicken than when it is flattened down but good nonetheless the thom bargen drip coffee was good

my wife had the brussels style waffle which had lemon curd whipped cream berries and hisbiscus syrup there was waaaay too much whip cream which took away from the lemon curd and she didnt really notice the syrup

its a cute little restaurant down a flight of stairs that was nice and bright had to get the attention of a server to order and get refills

Address: 123 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K8 Canada
Review:
one of the best places to go for brunch the food is amazing its flavourful fresh and very filling i also love the vibe of the restaurant its very cozy

one small thing i noticed is that some of the chairs are tiny so it may not be accessible to some people

Address: 123 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K8 Canada
Review:
i decided to visit clementine on my visit to winnipeg manitoba it was an amazing breakfast and brunch restaurant one of the most famous items they have here is fried chicken on toast in fact not only are they generally known for it but there were people waiting in line to get into the restaurant talking about this menu item fried chicken on toast came with buttermilk fried chicken dill ranch maple calypso pickles and sourdough toast the chicken was fresh crispy on the outside soft on the inside and very nicely cooked the flavour of the fried chicken was very unique and absolutely delicious it had a hint of spice and a decent amount of sweetness in the buttermilk batter which made it quite flavourful the sourdough toast with maple calypso and dill ranch added a hint of sourness and some creaminess the toast with maple calypso and dill ranch and the buttermilk chicken with sweetness and a hint of spice was just a fantastic combination of ingredients and flavours that made this dish absolutely outstanding this is one of the best fried chicken dishes ive ever had

i also had a side of fried potatoes which came with chickpea mayo bravas sauce and green onion the potatoes were fresh and crispy and the sauces combined with the potatoes were absolutely delicious i also enjoyed the cappuccino

the staff were very friendly and the service was perfect i am very happy i came to this restaurant in winnipeg

Address: 123 Princess Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 1K8 Canada
Review:
wonderful brunch place tucked away in the downtown area

ive been to clementine multiple times and have never been disappointed food always tastes fresh is thoughtfully prepared and filling enough for brunch

my favourite dish there is the fried chicken on toast the batter is very crunchy and contrasted with a hot honey for a sweet and savory combo that does not disappoint menu size is small and focused many of their other dishes are also very good and i cannot think of any weaknesses in the menu

service is always professional and friendly

this place is very busy they do not take reservations so if you arrive at a busier time for brunch you will be waiting for about an hour or more so prepare accordingly

would strongly recommend this restaurant and will be back

Address: 550 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: edit the achievements this place has also for the food and being local should speak for its self well after a lovely evening with lovely people and service the bison was amazing and the people where great as well will be going again in the near future as the price was also good first time having mussles and wow superb

Address: 550 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review:
our server was fantastic friendly and very knowledgeable

the food amazing not often i find a place where i can and want to try literally everything on it

duck confit was super good fell off the bone

will definitely have to come back for the perogies and the char and lol

Address: 550 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: one of the best meals my wife and i have had in a long time  everything we had from the menu was consistently delicious  we started with the northern manitoba bruschetta with wild foraged  cultured mushrooms fresh herbs grilled focaccia goats cheese truffle oil  white wine cream then caesar salad with romaine creamy roast garlic anchovy emulsion spiced croutons  asiago cheese  our entrees were the grilled manitoba bison saddled with a blue cheese compound butter balsamic plum gastrique popped wild rice potato gratin  seasonable vegetables and ice caught pickerel with ricotta stuffed ravioli  wild mushroom whisky cream  for dessert we had boreal forest cake with bernard callebaut dark chocolate freshly whipped saskatoon berry compote and baked cheesecake with chaeban mascarpone cheese topped with a changing variety of local organic preparations  both the food and service were incredible  we will definitely be back

Address: 550 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: if youve never eaten at the fusion grill youre depriving yourself of a glorious epicurean experience the food was beyond delicious i had the angus tenderloin from arborgcooked to perfection atmosphere was great and the service impeccable

Address: 550 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review:
unbelievably tasty boutique restaurant on academy so tasty i went twice last week i had the pickerel cheeks the bison steak and apple crumble for me to leave a restaurant full is rare but thats because a lot of food these days is filled with preservatives this is real food so it fills you up the tastes are unbelievably fresh

ive never had juniper slaw before and now that i have i wish it was this instead of franks that was on everything

cooked to perfection great ambience helpful and wonderful staff ill be back many times over

Address: 877 Waverley Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 5V3 Canada
Review: finally got around to dining here the food the ambience the service everything was amazing for the antipasto the baked brie was top notch and my personal favourite for the entr√©e has to be the agnello which was cooked to such perfection that the meat just fell off the bone definitely going back for more

Address: 877 Waverley Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 5V3 Canada
Review: a trendy italian style restaurant in the south side of winnipeg that offers great pasta dishes and deserts nice atmosphere with great serving and great food i wanted the lasagna but was told it would take fifty minutes so i went with the seafood pasta instead it was really good but i would have liked a lemon wedge and some pepper the rest of our group loved their food all around great experience add a lemon wedge and maybe some ambient music not enough to lose a star though highly recommend

Address: 877 Waverley Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 5V3 Canada
Review: very happy with this visits meal you can have a look at my picture to get a visual scalps cooked to perfection just the perfect amount of sauce rich and creamy its been over a decade since my last visit here but since my last visit my love for pasta has grown significantly if i like this meal you will also appreciate this meal

Address: 877 Waverley Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 5V3 Canada
Review: we had a great time at bellissimo everything was great from the appetizers entr√©e and desserts we enjoyed the aragosta the most i had a cappuccino after my meal though not gonna lie but i was expecting coffee art on my cup as it was a bit overpriced

Address: 877 Waverley Street Winnipeg, MB R3T 5V3 Canada
Review: the food was ok was a little disappointed with the sauce that accompanied my chicken or lack thereof the peacan crusted chicken was amazing my sister had the special which was a lobster carbonara had only a cpl pieces of lobster the noodles were very chewy and when you are paying  for a plate you expect the quality and quantity to come with it the place was beautiful the atmosphere was simple and elegant the staff were outstanding very attentive and humorous everyone was having a good time i would give this place another chance

Address: 222 Osborne Street Unit 22 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z3 Canada
Review: we loved where we were seated a cozy nook and it was such a romantic date spot the food was very good our favourite dish was the potatoes dauphinoise our food was a little slow to come out that evening and they apologized and brought us some free drinks we hadnt even noticed it was slow as we were just enjoying the relaxed pace will definitely return

Address: 222 Osborne Street Unit 22 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z3 Canada
Review: the atmosphere and just the whole experience of this place is a must our server was very nice and very attentive with us thru out our whole time there food was plated really nicely and everything tasted real good the potatoes are a must definitely coming back here in summer with our pupper

Address: 222 Osborne Street Unit 22 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z3 Canada
Review: sous sol has a really unique vibe ie candles on the tables decorations furniture the servers were friendly but nothing exceptional about the services they will not check on you or your food after the food came or explainmake suggestions on the menu we ordered quite a bit of different dishes but the highlight turned out to be the bread and butter all the appetizers were decent and the dessert was good however we were pretty disappointed with the main since they were too salty the tenderloin was really juicytenderhigh quality but it was just too salty however given this amount of fooddrink and the quality of their ingredients the price is pretty good especially compared to other steakhouses in town main reasons i gave 4 stars i dont think we will come back but its good to try it out at least once our bill was about 2002person

Address: 222 Osborne Street Unit 22 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z3 Canada
Review: love coming here every time great feels and vibe for romantic night out or just casual drink night  service is amazing and food is great keep in mind thursday is oyster night and every cocktails are all great

Address: 222 Osborne Street Unit 22 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z3 Canada
Review:
i just visited this place for the first time and i want to move in
its perfectly weird but in a way that makes you feel comfortable not uncool
everything was incredible the food and drinks were amazeballs but the biggest highlight was the service the main person that took care of us was incredibly knowledgeable and attentive but other staff members seamless stepped in to run food refill drinks and run payments i love a good restaurant but i dont know if ive ever had a better dining experience
i cant wait to come back

Address: 740 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W6 Canada
Review:
their soup based tastes really flavourful and delicious we had fun mixing in different sauces to come up with flavours that our tastebuds would love prices were a bit much paid 90 for two people not worth the price we paid

service 35     food 45      atmosphere 35

Address: 740 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W6 Canada
Review: we went there on sunday night and its pretty busy decided to try this place simply because of the individual hot pot you can mix you own sauces which was really fun and everyone was meant to get their own brothso thats an additional cost on top of the ayce pricealso the price not included any drinks and the broths didnt have that much taste the choices not as wide as some other hot pot places i have been to

Address: 740 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W6 Canada
Review: hidden spot in winnipeg definitely give it a try if youre interested in asian cuisine on another note go for lunch itll be half the price 80 for two people wasnt expected and was hidden on the menu service was 355 price was 35 but keep an open mind because 55 food make sure not to over boil but meats boil for about 15 seconds and vegetables 30 it was absolutely delicious and i loved being able to cook it myself it was cozy inside but another table made my stay less enjoyable as they were very noisy and provocative overall definitely worth trying and i will be going back for the lunch specials

Address: 740 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W6 Canada
Review: nice idea poorly executed food is decent  service bad  watch what youre ordering and check your receipt  very misleading  not a place i would return for a meal

Address: 740 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W6 Canada
Review: absolutely fabulous place if you like soup good selection of broths from mild to spicy everything we tried was delicious the veggies were fresh the meat was good quality and the selection of sauces was great  everything was very clean and the service was pleasant the all you can eat is a great value if you come hungry

Address: 314 Donald Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B9 Canada
Review:
scallops are delicious i highly recommend them
but the noodles were hard and a little raw
the lemongrass tart has lavender flowers on it which is very unique cocktails are refreshing

Address: 314 Donald Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B9 Canada
Review:
the food was good we had wings which were delicious we also tried the fried rice the noodles and the tacos everything was good the tacos are a bit expensive for the quantity but it was good we also tried chocolat tart and lime tart both were delicious the wine is super expensive  good cocktails a bit expensive too overall a good experience
but the place is very noisy which makes it hard to have a discussion with everyone at the table
100 bucks for 1 cocktail 1 beer 1 glass 6oz wine noodles tacos and 1 dessert is a bir pricey  price for 2 
id still recommand not sure i would go back because of the noise

Address: 314 Donald Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B9 Canada
Review: we had a great time in the restaurant there are different dishes and drinks on the menu that are inspired by latin american countries the chaj√° dessert was amazing great service and quick

Address: 314 Donald Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B9 Canada
Review: very clean environment friendly staff wide variety of drinks very delicious food  will definitely visit again

Address: 314 Donald Street Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B9 Canada
Review: heard great things about this restaurant but found it to be somewhat average corn with nachos tasted like canned corn with some cheese on top korean chicken was basic fried chicken and nothing more dandan noodles were good again but nothing special except sauce was tasty after hearing good reviews i was disappointed and found it pricey for what you received pleasant service

Address: 393 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H Canada
Review:
not knowing anything about this place was hesitant at first going to this eatery inside a hotelcasino but so glad we did

this restaurant is nicely decorated and spacious which is a contrast from the hotel lobby we came through the staff was very friendly and attentive to our kids there is a nice kids menu

all our dishes were excellent not a single complain they were well done and very flavorful we will definitely come back

Address: 393 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H Canada
Review: marion might be the most delicious breakfast brunch place in canada waiters are friendly and kind portions are more than fair and the food is just perfect every single time nowhere else you can get a wellserved tasty salad with pistachios sufficient for two with less than 20 sweet potato fries are always fresh and perfectly crunchy their iced latte has no competition dont forget to order their weekly dessert special every time i just wish they stayed forever in the menu

Address: 393 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H Canada
Review: overall decent i was so excited abt the mini pancake such a good idea the cream wasnt airy and a bit bland apple was crunchy like hard it wasnt caramelized or cooked biscuit was good with nice texture but also bland i think everything cooked well but missing flavor from herbs garlic shallots pesto hit a hot pan  oil that kind of flavor so overall cooked well but blandjust something missing good menu and has potential nice place and service was pretty quick

Address: 393 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H Canada
Review:
the food was excellent and i was happy to see that they use high quality ingredients from a local bakery tall grass prairie and dairy cheaban i had the overnight oats and the dish was an easy competitor for the best oatmeal i have ever had

the staff was friendly efficient and helpful  we sat at the counter and my coffee never made it to half empty before being topped up

ample parking out back

Address: 393 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H Canada
Review: amazing food had broccoli cheese soup  beet salad and my son had spicy chicken wrap big portions and super good

Address: 722 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L Canada
Review: i was extremely satisfied with these tacos the tacos were a bit on the small side but they were also quite inexpensive they are authentic mexican not texmex if that matters to you i would most definitely go here again and would recommend it to everyone i know the staff was friendly and service was quick the closest thing i have to a complaint is the tacos were drippy but i think thats better than them being too dry

Address: 722 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L Canada
Review: i have gone here throughout the years and the restaurant has maintained making their tacos with homemade tortillas great flavors and lowpricing i personally love the chorizo sausage and al pastor tacos service has always been fast and friendly

Address: 722 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L Canada
Review: i came here 3x and loved it wed order 5 kinds of tacos as well as hibiscus drinks recently they upped the prices of everything by a lot i understand a slight increasebut they still use paper plates sadly dont think i will go back unless i am desperate craving it

Address: 722 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L Canada
Review: great mexican restaurant  very authentic when you see grandma in the kitchen  you know the food will be

Address: 722 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L Canada
