Review: hot fresh and filled with flavour great spot if youre looking for tacos thats not taco bell authentic food including the tortillas made on the spot per order so good

Address: 794 Sargent Avenue Suite 5 Winnipeg, MB R3E 0B7 Canada
Review:
this place is amazing for pho and anything else on the menu really

portions are massive compared to a lot of places ive tried prior

amazing service theyre very quick with lots of staff and even with the restaurant full they dont neglect tables

at around 15 per bowl its really worth the price

restaurant is clean and besides the urinal
being out of service i had no complaints

would 100 eat here again

Address: 794 Sargent Avenue Suite 5 Winnipeg, MB R3E 0B7 Canada
Review: google pho places in winnipeg and a bunch came up i pick this one as its nearby good review   good parking and lots of reviews i must say for such a small town it had an excellent selection and the pho was pretty good the soup tasted like its been simmering all day i got the combination with extra meat plus a vietnamese coffee which was freshly made on the table definitely recommended and would go back for a quick bite the bowl was about 1100

Address: 794 Sargent Avenue Suite 5 Winnipeg, MB R3E 0B7 Canada
Review:
love this place they can definitely use better systems for ordering and seating but the food is excellent traditional pho without msg or so they tell me the lady at the front didnt know but the cook said no good size and priced right

the place is busy for lunch looks like everything is fresh and they are friendly id return for sure hopefully they can figure out how to organize the chaos by then thank you again

Address: 794 Sargent Avenue Suite 5 Winnipeg, MB R3E 0B7 Canada
Review:
our table got an assortment of things but i think everyone really enjoyed their meal ive been here a few years ago and they have since renovated which is very beautiful the service was good and the food was good

love the deluxe vermicelli

Address: 794 Sargent Avenue Suite 5 Winnipeg, MB R3E 0B7 Canada
Review: their sergeant location is my favorite place for lunch awesome meals with generous portions quick service decent prices and they make substitutions with no fuss  made fresh and not spicy  provide hot sauce on the side if ask very friendly staff and great atmosphere try the salad rolls with choice of filling i do grilled pork highly recommend

Address: 926 Grosvenor Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 2W9 Canada
Review:
amazing italian cuisine always our go to for great italian food and ambiance i had the special of the day of shrimp and veg with wine sauce and a side of fettuccine alfredo alfredo is always on point here husband ordered lamb shank so tender and succulent and kids got gnocchi so creamy and always their order when we are in for apps we had meatballs moist and tender calamari so tender and fresh and an order of focaccia which they make in house
for dessert we did gelato hazelnut lemon and strawberry all were delicious and i had tiramisu which was surprisingly light and airy yet creamy and decadent service was great and fast as always always love having family nights here

Address: 926 Grosvenor Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 2W9 Canada
Review: ive been to tre visi cafe a number of times and its always a delight they really make some incredible pasta dishes and i love how you can order half portions of so many things i had the tortellini on my last visit half portion and it was the perfect size and delicious the focaccia is also a

Address: 926 Grosvenor Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 2W9 Canada
Review: awesome italian eatery with a nice variety of authentic modern italian pastas pizzas and mains  i had the fettucine alla diva  it was delicious  take the spoon when they offer it to you so you can enjoy the delicious sauce to its fullest  serving staff were awesome  highly recommended

Address: 926 Grosvenor Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 2W9 Canada
Review: small restaurant on stafford with 67 tables we had olives for appetizer and pasta they were very flexible with changing the type of pasta from ribbon to spaghetti food was very good and lots of flavor and huge portions most of the pasta on the menu will come with half portion and full portion options half portion was still plenty of food for me  if you are indecisive and want to try out couple different pasta doing half portion would be a great idea most things on the menu can be done gluten free too

Address: 926 Grosvenor Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 2W9 Canada
Review: excellent as always ive been here 3 times and have enjoyed the food every time great sauces and although the pasta is made a little harder than id prefer its still great food my current go to for pasta the chicken is also quite good excellent service as well

Address: 670 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: delicious pizza the salad was also reaaaally good friendly service its a bit small and if all tables are occupied its extremely loud dough was a bit undercooked in the middle there is an upper level may be quieter

Address: 670 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review:
there is a lot of street parking all around this restaurant
this restaurant has a few tables and can be tricky getting a table it is so worth the effort to get a table
the pizzas are great the doughcrust is thin light and chewy the cheese was flavourful and tasty overall i found these pizzas pretty close to what i got in northern italy
the staff is wonderful they really made our visit great
definitely go and eat in

Address: 670 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: i heard that this place can have lines down the street so we had to give it a try luckily it wasnt too busy and we were even able to sit on the patio service was quick and we got the food quickly too im a believer that the crust makes the pizza and the crust is crispy on the outside and has a nice chewy texture as well the ingredients tasted fresh not a heavy pizza which is always good

Address: 670 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: i have been going to vera for several years now and it never fails to disappoint fantastic pizza lovely atmosphere and a cute small patio in the summer definitely one of my go to pizza places

Address: 670 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: the prices were really good the staff was really quick and friendly dessert was refreshing  the salad is huge such a good deal they dont take reservations

Address: 1433 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J2 Canada
Review: friendly atmosphere with a great neoitalian cuisine nicely portioned meals pleasing anyone with an appetite for the italian flare the specials are indeed special but dont shy away from the traditional pizza wood fired dining mate really enjoyed it as it looked great as well dont forget to have a dessert the tarts were packed with flavour

Address: 1433 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J2 Canada
Review: bonfire bistro has amazing pizza and pasta  i highly recommend  we needed a reservation on a monday to get in i am glad we did because the atmosphere is lovely  all in all i give this place a full star review and will recommend to everyone i meet only down side is the tables are a bit small but we managed three people at a table so it worked out

Address: 1433 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J2 Canada
Review: we had a family dinner my 4 yo son went home telling us that is the best pizza  the food is really delicious and the presentation is great desserts are well done and very tasty photos included the place looks very clean and quite staff are also friendly and very helpful

Address: 1433 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J2 Canada
Review: not a highend restaurant but the variety of food choices was very good and the wine selection limited but well chosen for any wine pallette we enjoyed the pizza as well as a couple of other entrees it was a nice environment and pleasant service  most importantly is that wed go back again

Address: 1433 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J2 Canada
Review: excellent pizza great service and a great atmosphere for dates

Address: 283 Bannatyne Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1M3 Canada
Review: had a great experience there first time having a cheese charcuterie board 1010 love the flavours and selection given to us we told them to surprise us fringe festival was going on on the other street the atmosphere was amazing

Address: 283 Bannatyne Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1M3 Canada
Review:
day 12 of my pre birthday celebrations and  in pursuit of discovering the new possible home citys food  today  has been the best meal weve had so far

this restaurant is in the historic exchange district of ywg and housed  in one of the many turnofthecentury beautifully preserved masonry structures in one of canadas designated historic sites

the mode was casual and the ambiance had this quirky old world charm

service was outstanding 1010

we ordered
starters
chicken livers 19
panfried with brandy peppercorn sauce baguette toast i hate liver but i loved the rich flavours of the sauce wowza and yumza the president said the livers had this amazing flavour profile and had beautiful texture he finished the entire dish 1010
 pork dry ribs 16
baby back ribs braised then fried until crisp with chili and lime the ribs was soft but not falloffthebone so they were just  perfect the caramelized crust added more flavours and texture to these delectable bites wowza and yumza 1010
mains
house sausage meatball pappardelle 28
smoked tomato and pepper cream sauce garlic onions arugula and ch√™vre cheese the pasta was cooked to perfection and the sauce was a real winner the meatballs were just ok 810
pork chop 36
roasted root vegetables green beans pickled apples and grainy mustard jus the chop was pure perfection so tender juicy and just packed with incredible flavours the mustard  jus elevated the sensational texture and flavours to another level wowza and yumza 2010 

a remarkable culinary experience for sure

Address: 283 Bannatyne Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1M3 Canada
Review:
we come here often for buck a shuck on wednesday night sometimes for dinner but usually late night after kids activities great spot to unwind and have a few drinks and snacks we had oysters a cheese plate which they always have an amazing selection desserts and drinks my husband always trys all the beer they have on selection and i always get a glass of red which is reasonably priced at 14 for a 9oz and heavy pour at times great friendly service and food comes out fast ambiance is dimmed and great spot for conversations and good times
make sure to make a reservation for wednesdays as its always packed

Address: 283 Bannatyne Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1M3 Canada
Review:
peasant cookery is a delightful spot for charcuterie oysters on the half shell and classic french favorites

the food is all presented beautifully but only giving 4 stats as the french onion soup and gravy on the steak frites was very sweet sweet beyond normal french onion soup level of sweet

on the other hand the chicken liver pat√© with pickles and grainy mustard was out of this world as was the escargot on puff pastry

and as it was wednesday it was buckashuck oysters  well worth the visit

the steak was cooked as requested but the volume of fries was overwhelming  almost couldnt see the steak

im sure if we go back it would be a 5 star experience service was great and interior is atmospheric

Address: 283 Bannatyne Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1M3 Canada
Review: just to happened to discover this restaurant and our experience here was amazing the service the presentation and the vibe was greatthe beef carpaccio absolutely was my favourite which was delicious and well presentationdont forget to reserve a table as it might get really busy

Address: 980 St Anne's Road Winnipeg, MB R2M 2X9 Canada
Review: one of the best restaurants in winnipeg every dish we tried was incredible the atmosphere is very welcoming and chic service was topnotch definitely not a cheap place to go out to eat at but well worth the price

Address: 980 St Anne's Road Winnipeg, MB R2M 2X9 Canada
Review:
harth is a gem were so fortunate to live so close its incredible every time

we got the family style for my wifes birthday last tuesday and loved every bite

there was a nice variety of items and they totally changed the menu since our last visit

one minor critique our break could have been a bit more hot and toasty

we will be back time and time again and continue to suggest and recommend harth to our friends and family

we hope you enjoy it as much as we do

Address: 980 St Anne's Road Winnipeg, MB R2M 2X9 Canada
Review: oh god i dont know where to start one of the first things the server said to us was if you dont know something on the menu dont google it ask me let me serve you that left us an extremely impeccable first impression everything we had here was incredibly delicious and of high quality ingredients the service the presentation the space the vibe the decoration top notch harth is easily one of the finest restaurants in the prairie region of canada and i have been to and eaten at a lot of restaurants in all of the big cities  regina saskatoon calgary edmonton winnipeg totally worth the drive all the way from regina 6 stars

Address: 980 St Anne's Road Winnipeg, MB R2M 2X9 Canada
Review: truly a romantic and amazing place the pizza bar is perfect for a date because you can impress your date by pretending to know what the chef is doing when explaining make up cooking techniques to her i also pretended to know my wine i ordered white by mistake when my date asked for a recommendation for red but this place is so nice with perfect ambience she forgave me and thought it was funny instead just make sure you book ahead cause that place is packed even on a tuesday night

Address: 980 St Anne's Road Winnipeg, MB R2M 2X9 Canada
Review: celebrated our anniversary and booked a table for dinner its our first time here and read a lot of food things on the reviews so we already know what we wanted to try out started out with a glass of chianti and prosecco and a margherita pizza which had wonderful crust and rich cheese lack a bit more of the basil flavor but still very good lamb shank was good succulent and flavorful our favorite was the tagliatelle which is a must have in my opinion the pasta is perfect and the sauce is well balanced both savory and creamy and the delicious duck  to end the meal we ordered the lemon curd but it took sometime before it was served so to apologize they just charged it on the house we are already planning when to come back to try out the other dishes highly recommend this place

Address: 10-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G6 Canada
Review:
we tried avocado rolls mushroom rolls and vegetable specials my friends also ordered barbecue fish and many other items

the server managed to understand our vegetarian needs and directed towards the best options

definitely worth exploring

Address: 10-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G6 Canada
Review: the food was delicious there is lots of variety sushi tempura rice  veggies lamb pork  beef  chicken seafood  the staff are very helpful and knowledgeable  it was a fun time and 2 hours flew by  we will be for the supper menu next time i think we also had the peach flavored soju  it was a great experience

Address: 10-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G6 Canada
Review: first time having korean bbq normally i do a pros and cons list but no real cons delicious food cool experience very nice staff more meat that i thought we could eat and it was all delicious i guess the only cons is for people that dont want to cook their meat themselves but theres a good list of sushi and other items anyway highly recommend make sure to visit in an empty stomach

Address: 10-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G6 Canada
Review:
short and sweet review
first time incredible experience and good way to try new food
staff is the best ive ever seen and very very friendly   expensive but worth it

best in a group but wow just wow

Address: 10-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G6 Canada
Review:
unfortunately i have to say all in all im disappointed with our experience  the restaurant right now at least is reservations only  i booked 2 weeks ahead of time and still didnt get the desired dining time i wanted
we got there and the place was packed and loud so if you want to have a conversation with someone good luck  not a romantic couples date spot in the least
we were seated and waited an awfully long time for someone to come to our table keep in mind theres a pretty strict 2 hour time limit in place here your times are even scribbled on your order sheet as reference  we finally had a server come and explain how the menu works after we explained its our first visit  we ordered and waited a long time again to get our food delivered  to the point that we were getting annoyed because several tables that arrived after us were getting heaps of food delivered and well into their meals  food finally came and honestly at the steep 4095 per person price tag it wasnt worth it  you can see from past reviews and my pictures that the price has literally skyrocketed
they offer no guidance on cooking you just toss things on your in table bbq and hope for the best  id suggest skipping the sushi because its sloppy and just mediocre  a lot of rice and seaweed and not much else  so the sushi was a big disappointment
the beer price tag was a bit of a shock too at 10 for a single pint
the bathrooms are pretty run down and gross  doors dont latch and the toilet didnt flush  our server was nice enough not outstanding service or anything just adequate
the parking lot is atrocious with huge severe bumps and holes  the parking spaces are a joke so tiny you can barely get in and out of your vehicle
overall im glad to have given this restaurant a shot but i was not wowed and am not in a rush to return

Address: 349 York Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 3S9 Canada
Review:
this restaurant has so much history that it could be a museum it was winnipegs first indian restaurant in 1967 and from the moment you enter to this beautiful place you can see a bunch of wooden sculptures which we were told were even 200 years old probably more the decoration alone is an amazing reason to come but as if that was not enough the food is just as good
we tried to try everything from the bufette and no single dish disappointed us there are many vegetarian and non vegetarian options for every taste we were particular fans of the shrimp curry but every dish is worth trying
the staff is amazingly friendly and attentive and take care of you really well
this is a must visit place in winnipeg

Address: 349 York Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 3S9 Canada
Review: first time back in 3 years came in for a sunday lunch its 2499 per person we missed the food and interior the food was basic use to be the best indian restaurant and now just the average stand outs were salad bat and the basic mayo pasta salad the samosa had good flavor tandoori chicken was better than other offerings and the eggplant dish things that werent great were butter chicken palak paneer no paneer and the shrimp with creamy curry

Address: 349 York Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 3S9 Canada
Review:
drive your car fly your plane sail your boat up the red river i dont care how you do itdrop everything and come eat here friendly staff brilliant atmosphere incredible food awaits order off the menu or sample a massive buffet option for under 30 and that buffet so many options that the average human being simply cannot taste every offering without causing massive gastrointestinal trauma its just that good

seriously this place is a hidden gem in winnipegs downtown get a kingfisher grab a plate and enjoy some of the best food youll ever taste then tip the serving staff very well because theyve done an incredible job taking care of you 5 all around

Address: 349 York Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 3S9 Canada
Review: had an amazing night at this restaurant there was a buffet with all kinds of starters main course and desserts everything was delicious and the staffs are friendly will definitely come back soon

Address: 349 York Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 3S9 Canada
Review:
went on a tuesday evening and it wasnt too busy theres a large selection of east indian food to try as it is a buffet style restaurant i wasnt familiar with east indian food so i just tried a bunch of different things it works out because you find out what you like and what you dont like

there are both vegan and meat options which are labeled accordingly which is helpful to end the meal there are yummy desert options there was ice cream jello and mousse among other things the orange swirl ice cream and mango mousse were really good

indoor decor is pretty unique and interesting water service is very fast staff is pretty nice other than the odd looks some of them were giving not too sure why despite the downtown location theres free convenient parking right across the street with dedicated spots

Address: 1390 Erin Street Winnipeg, MB R3E 2S8 Canada
Review: my boyfriend  and i were there for his birthday food was amazing well the portion for appetizer and dessert is so small but the main food was awesome i brought his birthday cake over there and asked them to bring it after dinner and they surprised me with sparkles and my boyfriend  was so happy their staff are friendly

Address: 1390 Erin Street Winnipeg, MB R3E 2S8 Canada
Review: a completely mellow atmosphere at lunch on a thursday in late may  be aware the outdoor patio can get warm but its a very nice space that continues the decor of the interior we had the good fortune to have had dario himself waiting today so the interactions were lively and very engaging  he is a master of the light hearted tease the food as always was a fusion of flavors that meld into a most enjoyable gastronomic experience  the spicy pork tenderloin with mango lives up to its spicy name but is well worth a try the presentation is whimsical as always without question a reliable place to find delicious fare

Address: 1390 Erin Street Winnipeg, MB R3E 2S8 Canada
Review:
good service and good food

my appetiser escargot diabolo was awesome the spring rolls were delicious the soup a five spice asian beef soup was just ok my bowl had very little beef while my friends had chunks of beef

the salad of mixed greens and berry vinegarete was delicious

i chose the rack of lamb for my entr√©e while it tasted fabulous the portion was extremely small friend ordered the chicken and she loved every bite the mashed potatoes were excellent

dessert was great however small

overall it was good experience may or may not be back will have to see what the menu has at the time

Address: 1390 Erin Street Winnipeg, MB R3E 2S8 Canada
Review:
i got the cheapest off the lunch menu thinking it might be subpar i couldnt be more wrong this stuffed chicken breast is absolutely fantastic might be too much to say this dish is life changing but it is fair to say this is the best chicken breast dish i ever tasted found this place because of my gluten intolerant friend and while it sounded wrong today i thank him for that
second picture entrees is a beef tenderloin so good

Address: 1390 Erin Street Winnipeg, MB R3E 2S8 Canada
Review:
what a great restaurant dishes are presented beautifully and are flavourful  the chef dario comes out of the kitchen and explains dishes or just has fun with his guests

i highly recommend this spot

Address: 1631 St. Mary's Road Unit F Winnipeg, MB R2N 1Z4 Canada
Review:
this restaurant is in a strip mall but dont let the ordinary facade trick into thinking this is an ordinary pizza joint

located in the strip mall there is eay more parking than ever could be used however there is a limited amount of seating inside so it would be prudent to reserve well ahead of the date you want

friendly staff sat us quickly  they have comfortable seats in a lovely atmosphere  they have decent sized menu  starters pasta pizzas and salads etc

they had 11 wood fired pizza and 15 stone baked pizza which we could have had thin crust or the regular we chose the regular

both pizzas were cooked right neither being doughyundercooked nor charredhard and dry  our loaded pizzas were just right

the regular crust on the 15 was awesome the crust wasnt greasy the crust light and airy it was cooked but neither doughy or tough even the edges didnt get hard or crusty just the right amount of chew

the wood fired 11 was very good the dough handled the toppings without getting soggy and the crust wasnt burned or dried out

the quality of the toppings were very tasty and the pizzas were very filling everything we saw that came out of the kitchen looked really tasty

dont let the exterior fool you this is one great restaurant
we will be back

Address: 1631 St. Mary's Road Unit F Winnipeg, MB R2N 1Z4 Canada
Review: amazing catering they catered for our place of work first impressions hair and skin team the owner was so nice and had an amazing personality not only was the food amazing but the staff was friendly and helpful too 55 we love santa ana

Address: 1631 St. Mary's Road Unit F Winnipeg, MB R2N 1Z4 Canada
Review: great restaurant for pizza in st vital  its a very small restaurant  so it fills up fast  best to call ahead by 13 weeks and make a reservation if you want a specific date for your outing  we had an 11 inch woodfired pizza called the roman  it had prosciutto roma tomatoes green olives and asiago  we also ordered a 15 inch stone baked pizza  designed our own with pancetta black olives pineapple and cheddar and mozzarella cheeses  both were excellent  lots of choices on the menu for pizza lovers  they also had starters pasta and salad on their menu  though we didnt try any this time  decent wine menu was available as well  the decor was quite nice  thought the table lights inside the bottles were interesting and worked well  our server was friendly and took care of us very well   takeout is available  saw that they offer vegan and gluten free crusts as well  we will certainly go to this restaurant again to try more of their menu  this was our first time there

Address: 1631 St. Mary's Road Unit F Winnipeg, MB R2N 1Z4 Canada
Review:
visiting my two cousins and they ordered from this place as they said its amazing asked that i pick looked at their menu online and decided on their philadelphia pizza wood fired steak mushroom onion garlic¬†cheddar  pesto pizza chicken breast roasted red pepper asiago basil pesto
we picked them up ourselves so as to make sure that the profit goes only to the restaurant and not to a delivery service
they looked amazing the crust was crisp and chewy they do not shy away on toppings each piece was a meal soo hearty flavorful and downright delicious
going to visit my cousins again before new years and hope order from them again while in town

Address: 1631 St. Mary's Road Unit F Winnipeg, MB R2N 1Z4 Canada
Review: was very put off by this place last time i picked up my order the pizza is fine but not worth the money in my opinion im mostly writing a critical review because the service i received was awful i wasnt greeted when i came in instead i was ignored and the couple that came in after me was helped when i finally was helped the lady was unfriendly and had no interest in helping me customer service goes a long way so i dont plan on returning

Address: 222 Broadway Winnipeg, MB R3C 0R3 Canada
Review: what can i say about the historic fort garry hotel the oval room has been refurbished to keep its integrity and it looks great the food was spot on and the delivery of appetizers and entrees was perfectly timed the price is on the high end but if you are looking for a special evening this could be the place i recommend reservations

Address: 222 Broadway Winnipeg, MB R3C 0R3 Canada
Review:
beautiful elevated cocktail and dinning experience at the oval room brasserie located in the hotel fort garry stopped in for impromptu cocktails yuk yuks comedy club in lowell level and small bites we didnt have a reservation but were easily and amusingly accommodated by the lovely hostess
ambiance is of fine french decor elegant and vey comfortable cocktail book was extensive youd be hard pressed to not find something of your liking this gin aficionado tried truffle gin and it was fantastic who knew thoughtfully curated cocktail menu and dinning menu service was excellent witty and entertaining
pickerel bites and mussels were well seasoned and delicious both prepared well i have not had a terrible meal at the fort garry ever should be on your dinning and cocktail list in winnipeg

Address: 222 Broadway Winnipeg, MB R3C 0R3 Canada
Review:
i have had take out here before and today i had a sit down the burger on take out a while back was great and the manager pauline helped me out tremendously although the dining room was full i was so thankful
however the meatloaf i had today was awesome actually the whole experience was elevated maybe not so much by the meatloaf great taste but more of the atmosphere and the people that worked there i was greeted by fran a very pleasant person and a great server she said she would look after me and boy did she not only did she put me in her favorite spot ask her why that is her recommendations were on point everything from the margarita to the dessert and who will ever forget the meatloaf wine combo everything was absolutely wonderful
would i recommend this place you bet and i will be back for sure

Address: 222 Broadway Winnipeg, MB R3C 0R3 Canada
Review: a special date i cant find the words to express how truly stunning the dining room is the architecture is like no other restaurant in winnipeg and there are no words to fully express my admiration of the atmosphere at oval room the prices of the dishes were on the high sideto be expected the mains are a la carte and sides were pricy too regardless the food was quite tasty and the gnocchi dish left me feeling full  service was kind and fast a little rushed but satisfactory this restaurant is definitely a special occasion spot and i would recommend it to anyone whos looking for a very special date night out

Address: 222 Broadway Winnipeg, MB R3C 0R3 Canada
Review:
the restaurant was beautiful  there was so much character  the food and drinks were also amazing  what stood out to us was the exceptional service by our server fran  she was very personable and helpful all around

later on in the evening we returned for cocktails  while on her break despite not being our server fran checked up on us  this level of service and personability is very rarely seen

yes the food and drinks were great but its hands down due to the service that i would recommend the oval room brasserie

Address: A-1670 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J7 Canada
Review:
a cozy and simple designed restaurant with a curated chef menu the options are few but it should satisfy most pallets

the plates are meant to be share so for a party of two we were recommended to get 4 dishes reservation at this place is pretty much a must for dinner as the place only hosts a handful of tables

the food was pretty great but you must be open to enjoying more interesting flavors

Address: A-1670 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J7 Canada
Review: i had the most amazing meal here i sampled one dish from each section and loved all of them the portion sizes were perfect and every bite was packed with flavour the service was wonderful as well the food is fairly priced for the quality all around a fantastic experience and would recommend to anyone

Address: A-1670 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J7 Canada
Review:
this restaurant uses actual magic to make their food the service is perfect the atmosphere is classy yet casual and the food is sorcery

eat here if you love yourself and appreciate food as more than just sustenance its always a great experience and everyone should take the time to appreciate it

Address: A-1670 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J7 Canada
Review: small and intimate delicious food wonderful and attentive staff fried chicken here is top class

Address: A-1670 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3N 0J7 Canada
Review: wow wow wow this place is a gem food was done exquisitely by an obviously highly trained and talented chef we got the beets pork bellly and beef cheek but i could have tried the whole menu my husband and i were surprised at first at the presentation but a few bites in and we were amazed dont be fooled you will leave happy content and full the foods flavours seriously blew us away brining me back to my moms cooking nostalgia is one thing a that not many people nail but this was an experience we will remember for years to come all this combined with a unique but incredible beer and wine list and last but not least our server was nothing but but high class efficient and awonderful conversationalist highly reccomend to anyone coming to winnipeg if i could give 6 stars i would come here get that pork belly and never look back

Address: 189 Carlton St Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H7 Canada
Review: fantastic restaurant and has been for a long time we had excellent service the entire evening its an experience our friends will not forget food is excellent and as fresh as one can get will be back again  great job

Address: 189 Carlton St Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H7 Canada
Review: we had a fabulous time good food great entertainment and just all around good experience  will definitely return

Address: 189 Carlton St Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H7 Canada
Review: amazing food and service roger the chef gave a splendid show only wish they had more of the drink mugs in stock but that simply means we will have to return

Address: 189 Carlton St Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H7 Canada
Review:
i havent gone out since december so this was pretty scary of an experience but the atmosphere was so amazing that i felt entirely at ease the prices are worth it for the quality of service and interactive experience alone but the deal is sweetened by the large amount of food you get and the fact that its seafood cooked literally perfectly i dont think ive ever had scallops that were cooked to a perfect texture before i came here
the hosts are super friendly and attentive and the cooks are all equally friendly and a whole lot of fun the cook at our table was able to fit right into our groups sense of humor and it was like just adding another friend to the table
i also absolutely love the geisha drink i got not only was it super tasty but the glass was beautiful and i got to take it home i want to come back to collect them all especially the lucky cat
thank you for the lovely food service and experience

Address: 189 Carlton St Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H7 Canada
Review: fun experience and yummy food a little expensive but you do get a ton of food only a few different meal options great place if you enjoy meat as you get chicken steak and then your choice of shrimp and giant scallops or lobster warning the comedy doesnt change much as the jokes were all pretty much the same as my previous visit 12 years ago

Address: 164 Stafford St Winnipeg, MB R3M 2V8 Canada
Review: one of my fave local spots they have a fantastic bar craft beer attentive and friendly staff and the food always workstheres a little something for any mood

Address: 164 Stafford St Winnipeg, MB R3M 2V8 Canada
Review: was recommended the poutine it was amazing some of the best gravy ive ever tasted fries are excellent and nice portion or curds will be back as im already craving that gravy friendly staff clean an all around nice spot

Address: 164 Stafford St Winnipeg, MB R3M 2V8 Canada
Review: the food and service were excellent i had the burger w half ceasar salad half fries both sides were excellent and the burger was delicious generous servings excellent quality great prices we arrived for lunch early at 1130 and this seems like a good idea as it really filled up at lunch time even when it was very busy the wait staff were very present and friendly

Address: 164 Stafford St Winnipeg, MB R3M 2V8 Canada
Review:
came in on sunday afternoon with a large party and we were quickly seated to a table and we received waters drinks and menus right away the server we had was all smiles and she was welcoming to us without being in your face like earls or similar chainstyle banter

we had a variety of food off of the menu and aside from there being almost only spicy dishes on the menu we were accommodated by the cook for getting less spices

the food came to us quickly from the kitchen and our server was attentive to us always checking in throughout our stay she gave us a lot of choices and she seemed to know a little something about each of our dishes drinks and the deserts

food was wonderful all the way around and the service was above par we really enjoyed our  afternoon we stayed quite long and never felt rushed or pushed to leave the restaurant

thank you i think i speak for everyone in saying that we will definitely return to the grove

Address: 164 Stafford St Winnipeg, MB R3M 2V8 Canada
Review:
the food was delicious the atmosphere relaxed an overall delightful experience

we had the three weekend specials see photos and shared we decided the pizza was the best of the three the salmon and the lamb sandwich were really good but were surpassed by the pizza

we ate on the patio and it wasnt too noisy  as it was on a side street not too crowded

a little pricey but i would definitely recommend for a special night out

Address: 635 Saint James St Winnipeg, MB R3G 3R4 Canada
Review: initially was a little bit of a wait to get our order taken but the staff were so kind and accommodating once the issue was brought to light we enjoyed every single dish we ordered and the food came out almost immediately our server noah b stepped in when we were left waiting and was absolutely amazing he was very efficient in taking our orders and bringing us our food and was a joy to be around and talk to he also went the extra mile in getting us free drinks and dessert because of the original wait plus he went the extra mile in putting a sweet little message with our dessert when he found out it was our anniversary pictured

Address: 635 Saint James St Winnipeg, MB R3G 3R4 Canada
Review: came here today for a date and celebration with my girlfriend this evening and was immediately greeted and shown to a table our server emily t was amazing and kind helped a bunch with my shellfish allergy great conversations made our date feel complete and perfect we will definitely be coming back soon thank you again

Address: 635 Saint James St Winnipeg, MB R3G 3R4 Canada
Review:
good restaurant

loved the presentation taste of the food is ok had a good experience

i just didnt like how they didnt have blinds to remove some bright outside light

food is a hit or miss sometimes so go at times when not so busy

also sushi cone sucks 90 rice 10 fish

Address: 635 Saint James St Winnipeg, MB R3G 3R4 Canada
Review:
always a great place to meet went for a friends birthday packed over st patricks day but still great service i ordered the herb salmon salmon was small but with recession i get the portion control mashed was awesome and veggies were still crunchy food came fast
always can count on some good food ambiance and service

Address: 635 Saint James St Winnipeg, MB R3G 3R4 Canada
Review: good food and great service  this chain is never a disappointment we enjoyed our dinner

Address: 285 Portage Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B4 Canada
Review: we had a great experience in this restaurant we came late to our hotel and were looking for something to eat the man at the restaurant was very friendly gave us advice about the portions and we had a great meal there was a good atmosphere i would certainly recommend to go here

Address: 285 Portage Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B4 Canada
Review: great service from adam  excellent beer  i wish my burger was a little more homemade  it was better than fast food but not the burger joint style burger i was hoping for  fries were excellent

Address: 285 Portage Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B4 Canada
Review: i had the burger and beer tuesdays its a nice burger

Address: 285 Portage Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B4 Canada
Review: really loved the burgers and poutine here hit this place up before two concerts now as its across from canada life centre and will definitely be doing this before every concert in the future

Address: 285 Portage Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 2B4 Canada
Review: we didnt eat this time menu looked awesome though we should have bartender was great beverages were wonderful we will go back for food tomorrow

Address: 3116 Roblin Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3R 0C1 Canada
Review:
absolutely oneof the best restaurants ive ever been to   was lucky enough to roll the dice on a chance at supper and ended up putting this place into our google maps   ended up coming to capital grill and bar and all i can say is what an incredible experience

from the wait staff hosts and chef we were amazingly surprised
the service was incredible and the food was that much better

winnipeg is lucky to have an incredibleresturant like this with so many unique flavours

thank you to the crew at capital  can not wait to come back

Address: 3116 Roblin Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3R 0C1 Canada
Review: the burger was great and the fries were amazing crisp and well seasoned with flakey salt finishing the service was exceptional one of the servers saw i had a cut finger and offered me a bandaid we live in the area and yet we kept procrastinating to come here we look forward to coming back

Address: 3116 Roblin Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3R 0C1 Canada
Review: always fabulous wonderful food  good times

Address: 3116 Roblin Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3R 0C1 Canada
Review: i came here with a group of 7 for a bachelor party dinner it was a busy day and they could not fit us inside so the owner greg asked us if we would be comfortable on the patio the service he provided us was the best service i have ever received we all were blown away the food and drinks were excellent and came relatively quickly and he checked on us frequently he even pulled out a heater so we wouldnt get cold not one of us had any complaints and we all will be back highly recommend this place

Address: 3116 Roblin Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3R 0C1 Canada
Review: pleasant experience rechargeable quaint restaurant id recommend to couples for a romantic dinner lit by candles enjoy a relaxing evening here with outstanding food that hits all the right spots

Address: 339 Waterfront Drive Winnipeg, MB R3B 0G8 Canada
Review: food is always good atmosphere is great service is a bit slow but i kind of like that in the way that your not rushed

Address: 339 Waterfront Drive Winnipeg, MB R3B 0G8 Canada
Review: the cafe is very cozy and romantic decorated with great taste it has a warm atmosphere suitable for romantic and for business meetings as well food is quite tasty especially i enjoyed a chocolate cheesecake with salted caramel

Address: 339 Waterfront Drive Winnipeg, MB R3B 0G8 Canada
Review:
great time the place has a fascinating atmosphere what makes you feel harmony and peace it will take you away from daily routine and your problems
our todays server  alex was deeply knowledgeable and helpful it was a prominent example  of professional service
the food was delicious and drinks were tasty
i truly recommend this place

Address: 339 Waterfront Drive Winnipeg, MB R3B 0G8 Canada
Review:
this was my first time coming to this restaurant and it was great
i came with a group of six including myself and i absolutely loved the table we were sat at it was a triangle shape which allowed us all to see each other and hold great conversations unlike a rectangular table would
staff were very friendly and attentive as well
the restaurant had a beautiful indoor atmosphere which created a calm and relaxing environment
my entree the scampi was delicious the tiger prawns are great quality the pasta sauce was full of flavour with a little kick
i was eager to try the raspberry cheesecake but they unfortunately ran out and i resorted to a mocha cheesecake which was delicious very rich and creamy

side note the restroom is in the hotel across from the cibos front entrance staff have to walk you to the hotel door to let you in

Address: 339 Waterfront Drive Winnipeg, MB R3B 0G8 Canada
Review:
their carbonara didnt taste like it used to so we asked the manager if they have changed their food we were told it depends on how long the pasta is cooked with tomatoes but carbonara doesnt have tomatoes other tables had their water refilled multiple times but we only got a refill when we stopped the waiter and asked we were happy to share our food with flies maybe they liked it
they also need to have a more detailed menu as they have some ingredients that are in their food but not listed on their menu

Address: 63 Sherbrook St Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B2 Canada
Review:
excellent schnitzel   we had one plate of pork schnitzel and one plate of chicken schnitzel  the obrine potatoes were delicious  the bread basket was fantastic but could have used a bit more butter  the service was shockingly fast  the only thing i didnt care for was the hazelnut pie i felt like it was missing something like a gooey filling  the eclair was very good  we will definitely be back

tip bathrooms are in the basement

Address: 63 Sherbrook St Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B2 Canada
Review:
an underwhelming experience overall

the chicken schnitzel with obrien potatoes and sweet and sour cabbage was definitely the highlight all the flavors were excellent and the portions were generous very crisp and tasty schnitzel on the other hand the paprika chicken was disappointing the portion size was generous again however the flavours were nothing special and the dish was overpriced in our opinion

the server was curt throughout the meal and we felt like we were inconveniencing them not friendly and made no attempt at making it a personal experience besides this it is a cozy little restaurant for a winter evening the food also arrived quickly and drinks were refilled as needed

i wouldnt call it a terrible experience by any means but i doubt we will be back we have wanted to try bistro dansk for a few years after hearing many recommendations but our experience fell flat 3 out of 5 stars

Address: 63 Sherbrook St Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B2 Canada
Review:
absolutely yes
hype is real  get the pork schnitzel

they were kind enough to allow us to dine in for lunch at 130p even though they closed between 25p crispiest schnitzel ive ever had and the cabbage on the side is so tasty lunch plate is an excellent portion size  you get two schnitzels lunch is also better priced than dinner

i can see during busy services having one server might increase your wait time but staff is extremely kind and humble and i love that its a family business charming restaurant its not very big and was featured on you gotta eat here

Address: 63 Sherbrook St Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B2 Canada
Review: i went here on a date a few weeks ago the decor and ambiance is incredible i really liked the homey feel of the restaurant the staff were super friendly and personable you can really tell the food is home style with good simple ingredients for this reason some dishes might take longer to come out which they give proper notice of and is expected when items are prepared for you and not in mass the chicken soup was pretty delicious and i liked the walnut stuffing in the chicken i thought the schnitzel was impressively crispy and the sour kraut was good the desserts are interesting for example the hazel nut pie is made with a lot of actual hazel nuts as opposed to nutella or extract is what it seemed like flavorwise it tasted like my mom was in the kitchen which is good but flavors i can accomplish at home overall im glad we tried it

Address: 63 Sherbrook St Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B2 Canada
Review: its been years since i was last here why did it take so long to return delicious meal friendly staff cozy environment and enormous portions  reasonably priced for the amount of food you get  the cabbage side dish is phenomenal as are the obrian potatoes  be sure to try the schnitzel i wont wait this long for my next visit

Address: 529 Wellington Cresent Winnipeg, MB R3M 0A1 Canada
Review:
one of the best steaks you will have hands down this is a classic fine dining experience so be ready to pay for it and pay well but its worth every penny and i fell in love with their rib eye steak the service is top notch and the decor is super classy it has the old school english vibe and it was great

the steak was delicious it was nicely pink in the middle and juicy you have a ton of options for side dishes and we loved the spinach however the mushroom wasnt all that and it felt a little oily the star is the steak and you have to try it

its not just the food but an experience

Address: 529 Wellington Cresent Winnipeg, MB R3M 0A1 Canada
Review:
my husband and i came for a date night after work as construction season is here and traffic is bad everywhere we decided to come to dinner straight from work im not sure if it was because we werent dress up and came in work clothing we felt our server wasnt interested in serving us though we were willing to pay for the food

he didnt introduce their feature for the night when he first came over we even asked for recommendation he briefly mentioned a few appetizers and still did not mention their feature items we overheard the feature items from the tables beside us my husband wanted to order beef wellington and didnt see it in the menu so he thought they no longer carry this item imagine his surprise when he overheard the conversation in the next table overall we felt judged our food was great just disappointed at the service

we were looking forward to dinner experience and left disappointed we havent been to 529 wellington since covid it was different a very different experience in comparison to when we last came here

Address: 529 Wellington Cresent Winnipeg, MB R3M 0A1 Canada
Review:
529 is great we love the food and the ambiance whether we are stopping in for a quick lunch or dinner the service has always been wonderful

the food isnt groundbreaking but they do serve classics and they serve them well

if you intend to come for dinner i would recommend making a reservation esp on the weekends as they do tend to be busy

we personally prefer the lunch ambiance because its not busy and super laid back

Address: 529 Wellington Cresent Winnipeg, MB R3M 0A1 Canada
Review:
i recently had the pleasure of dining at 529 wellington and i have to say it was an absolutely amazing experience from the moment we walked in we were  greeted by the friendly and welcoming staff the decor was beautiful and inviting with a cozy and rustic feel

the menu was extensive and had something for everyone but i decided to try one of the their canadian prime steaks they are know for and i was not disappointed the flavors were expertly balanced and the presentation was stunning each bite was a taste sensation and i couldnt help but savor every mouthful  the side dishes are also wonderful for sharing with the table and are portioned large enough for many to enjoy

the service was topnotch with the waitstaff being attentive and knowledgeable about the menu they were happy to make recommendations and helped me pair my meal with the perfect wine i also appreciated that they checked in on us multiple times throughout the meal to ensure everything was to our satisfaction

the restaurant also had a great atmosphere with a lively but not overwhelming buzz it was the perfect spot for a date night or a special occasion i also loved that they had a great selection of desserts and i couldnt resist trying their homemade lemon cheesecake it was the perfect ending to a perfect meal

in conclusion if youre looking for a fantastic fine dining experience i highly recommend checking out 529 wellington the food service and atmosphere are all topnotch and i cant wait to go back and try more of their delicious dishes

Address: 529 Wellington Cresent Winnipeg, MB R3M 0A1 Canada
Review: amazing experience the food were delicious and the plating were amazing service exceptional worth the price

Address: 1031 Autumnwood Dr Winnipeg, MB R2J 1C6 Canada
Review:
this was the first time we had order was recommended to us absolutely delicious and super friendly
our new place for chinese
they truly are a hidden gem
yum yum  
staff made us feel very welcomed my husband is hard to empress and he sure was happy with the food and staff

Address: 1031 Autumnwood Dr Winnipeg, MB R2J 1C6 Canada
Review:
we had our food delivered it was 15 minutes earlier than anticipated the price is super good excellent value portion sizes are very good on the bigger side spent about 80 and got a few things free stuff they just threw in which is perfectly fine with me very appreciated
the food is super delicious best ive had in a long time it is now my favourite restaurant

Address: 1031 Autumnwood Dr Winnipeg, MB R2J 1C6 Canada
Review: this was the first time we ordered take out cantonese food from this restaurant and it was fantastic they made sweet and sour fish especially for my wife that was not on their menu so hospitable and accommodating the chow mein was a revellation it was not greasy at all my daughter loved the wonton soup which was divine they gave us free rice and soda too

Address: 1031 Autumnwood Dr Winnipeg, MB R2J 1C6 Canada
Review: i rarely give 5 stars but this place deserves it the customer service is adorable and the food is shockingly delicious and consistent my 2 favorite dishes are the shanghai noodles wish there was a bit more veggies but still yummy and the saut√© mixed veggie dish

Address: 1031 Autumnwood Dr Winnipeg, MB R2J 1C6 Canada
Review: this is our go to for chinese pick up family owned price is just right and portion and taste of the food is decent you will have to try this little place

Address: 112 Marion St Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T1 Canada
Review:
dined here with a couple girlfriends the other evening the restaurant is located in the norwood hotel the restaurant itself is renovated and it looks great the server alice was very attentive and friendly i got the tacos and they were delicious my girlfriends got the lettuce wraps and both added the protein to it the portions for the lettuce wraps were tiny everything came in separate dishes and you had to construct it your own definitely recommend adding the protein because it is a very small portion
all in all it was really good and i would be back

Address: 112 Marion St Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T1 Canada
Review: really great burgers salads and soups i would avoid the fish and chips the fish was burned and over cooked however the server was an absolute delight and was funny and caring and had great suggestions on food and drink options would definitely recommend it

Address: 112 Marion St Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T1 Canada
Review:
first time trying the wood taverns food wanted a big juicy burger so i got the wood burger well it wasnt juicy at all very dense skimpy on the lettuce tiny tomato and i couldnt even taste the hickory bacon ranch at all and to me my burger patty was burnt not worth 22 thats all i tasted was burnt fries were crispy and the wings were alright the sauces i got were good honey dill and some honey mustard i think the taste just fell flat and charred

thewoodtavern thanks for the response i did make an issue on skip and it wasnt full filled thanks
thewoodtavern thank you but you didnt have to do that nothing yet i appreciate the gesture

Address: 112 Marion St Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T1 Canada
Review: my husband and i came in for lunch yesterday based on a sm video recommendation and we fully enjoyed the experience the atmosphere is fabulous i definitely value my surroundings almost as high as the food it is all part of the experience in my opinion and i was not disappointed the server was wonderful attentive without too many interruptions and the food was very good my husband said the fries were some of the best he has ever had and the steak sandwich hit the spot  thanks for a great lunch

Address: 112 Marion St Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T1 Canada
Review:
an awesome place to celebrate any occasions here the place has a warm ambience that youll feel delighted while youre enjoying their eccentric and delectable dishes my buddy and i had an amazing and enjoyable night in this place while catching up looking forward to try more interesting dishes next time

food 45 service 55 atmosphere 45

Address: 1393A Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2B8 Canada
Review:
i enjoyed my quick stop here the place has a big variety of noodle dishes and they are good but what really stood out was their dumplings

with a butterie and zesty flavour dumplings were melting in my mouth the place seems to be owned and managed by a family grandma was in the front folding dumplings

wee bit of a suggestion the dining area need a bit of care making a few small improvements will make dinein enjoyable

Address: 1393A Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2B8 Canada
Review: i am obsessed with dancing noodle the curry dan dan hits every single time the meat dumplings get them spicy are also fantastic each dish goes for approximately 10 consistency has never been an issue here and everythings packed really well for takeout

Address: 1393A Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2B8 Canada
Review:
we ordered off skip the dishes and we were not disappointed all our dishes were really tasty
we ordered curry dandan handmade dumplings steamed pork dim sum hot spicy noodle and the cucumber salad none of the dumplingsdim sum came with sauce but we improvised and made our own
we definitely recommend all the above dishes

Address: 1393A Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2B8 Canada
Review: the chili oil wontons and dan dan is very good here also get the curry dan dan if you like curry flavour the service is very kind here

Address: 1393A Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2B8 Canada
Review: had a delicious bowl of beef noodle soup very generous portions

Address: 1979 Wellington Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3H 1H5 Canada
Review: consistently great food and service every time we have gone here for dinner i think this was our fourth time the food has been prepared beautifully the flavours paired nicely the service polite and attentive and the portions and prices impressive i can honestly say that some of my favorite dishes i have ever had in winnipeg have been at the blue marble the atmosphere is very nice and calm and i enjoyed the choice of music playing over the speaker while we dined so thats a bonus i will be thinking of that dessert for a long time banana bread french toast with apple cinnamon ice creammmmm we will definitely be back

Address: 1979 Wellington Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3H 1H5 Canada
Review:
my first visit at this restaurant and even though the food was pretty good i doubt i will be back the airport location is a bit out of the way but the main deterrent for me was the complete lack of ambiance the restaurant is right next to a fairly busy walkway and has windows all around i felt pretty uncomfortable with people walking by and literally staring into my plate maybe tinting the windows might solve this problem the restaurant had more of a cafeteria vibe rather than a higher scale restaurant
the foodnice presentation pretty good but nothing that made me say wow the serving staff were very nice even when they were dealing with a extremely drunk and belligerent customer who was disturbing everyone

Address: 1979 Wellington Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3H 1H5 Canada
Review: i stopped in to have a bite during an overnight layover while staying at a nearby hotel it was a bit confusing whether or not i could seat myself but the bartender came up and greeted me within a couple mins the burger was spectacular and the fries were just right i have another layover and will be coming back for it again i had to ask for the bill but it was clear they were very busy so i didnt mind they only had two people for a whole bar and 20 tables

Address: 1979 Wellington Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3H 1H5 Canada
Review: small plate of stuffed chicken was the perfect amount for us and delish and the burger was tasty blue marble always has a fantastic wine list which is appreciated and its usually quiet but dont let that fool you its a great place to stop even if not travelling

Address: 1979 Wellington Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3H 1H5 Canada
Review: well this was an unexpected surprise  for those who want good food with exceptional flavor pairings and a vast  wellstocked wine room  this is the place for you  will be coming back many more times i would recommend you do the same pricey but worth every cent thanks brett for taking the time to talk wine with me and chris for the fast service

Address: 709 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W4 Canada
Review:
this is another instance that if i could give more stars i would especially for the service our server did an excellent job helping us navigate the menu and suggest dishes we might enjoy we were those people that asked to be moved after we had been sat and the server was very accommodating
we ordered the meal for four and it was a lot of food but if we hadnt done that we would have missed out on some excellent dishes like the bread we would never have ordered the bread and most of the table voted it their favorite part of the meal
it was not an inexpensive meal but definitely worth it

Address: 709 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W4 Canada
Review:
we had a great  time at this place it was our first visit there so we decided to order the most popular dishes khachapuri adjaruli and khinkali we were really impressed because those meals were so delicious and fulfilling and their price was quite reasonable so we highly recommend them

however it should be mentioned that we also had veal shashlik which was really tasty but portion is so small we had a large one for 28 and it was only 6 small pieces so consider your wishes before ordering shashlik

also we want to admit the professional and knowledgeable service of their waitress  olya she helped us with all inquiries and did the great job

overall we do recommend this place it is tasty and cosy

Address: 709 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W4 Canada
Review:
if youve never tried georgian food do yourself a favour imagine meats marinated in the most flavourful mix of spices cooked over wood coals side dishes and dips prepared from scratch with fresh veggies and herbs the food here is of the best quality possible for the price and truly traditional and authentic

not only that but the hospitality and consideration is incredible chris  the floor manager personally delivered an order for my moms birthday when the delivery apps were down  thank you so much my parents  who never eat out and prefer to cook at home really enjoyed the meals

cant say enough great things about this place

ps if you are into wine tasting they have a great selection of imported georgian wines

Address: 709 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W4 Canada
Review: the food was great i think it was a very good quality and well made food however the portions were very small compared to prices apart from the portion sizes i think it is a good place to go

Address: 709 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W4 Canada
Review:
recently went for dinner here and had a wonderful experience

the food was simply amazing so much flavour but it all worked very well together no one thing overpowering another the portions were a good size as well

the service was great they timed things very well so when we were almost done with an appetizer they bring the next item out no need to sit and wait with empty plates

the atmosphere was lovely for an evening meal  close and comfortable without feeling cramped

Address: 684 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review:
i will definitely be coming back it took a second to find it but i also was distracted for a second while looking but we arrived
the food was spectacular great portion sizes for price and it tasted delicious
i went with my partner and he had the stromboli and he had plenty leftover after he and i shared garlic knots and greek salad and i had the chicken parmigiana
our server was super kind she came by and kept note of our waters and helped us a lot
the tables and chairs were amazing the place felt cozy and personal and it felt like i could genuinely enjoy my time with my partner

i will certainly be going back and i cant wait til then

Address: 684 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: i ordered the chicken parm the alfredo sauce was grainy and not outstanding the chicken was great we attended as a large group we had multiple servers and sometimes requests were overlooked as the message didnt make it from one to the other the atmosphere was great for a staff gathering

Address: 684 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: amazing food the focaccia was incredible the best i have ever had the calzone was humongous and just as tasty as it was huge it could easily feed 2 adults get ready to wait a bit longer than usual for food but it is soooo worth it the staff are competent and friendly what more can you ask for in restaurant service  the reason atmosphere loses points is because the event room near the front of the restaurant got really warm  as the sun filtered in and the people crowded in but it was a very hot day and what can you do also the bathroom was kinda dingy but it was at least clean

Address: 684 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: loved the food service was great too one nitpick the garlic breadknots we ordered were decisively less fresh than the complementary plain breadknots that said i feel like its still a candidate for the best italian food in winnipeg

Address: 684 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 2B9 Canada
Review: very good italian food highly recommend the fettuccini alfredo

Address: 8-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G7 Canada
Review:
this place is great tehran cafe is the kind of place that youll want to come back several times
they have a bunch of traditional dishes from iran and they are all amazing
we enjoyed the fesenjan and the ghormeh sabzi both were really flavourful and unique and we could tell that the ingredients used were top notch and the portions were really generous for the fesenjan they use a lot of walnuts and for the ghormeh the beef is really tasty
the place is also cozy and has a really nice decoration the owner was really kind and explained us the menu and answered all of our questions he also recommended us the persian baklava for dessert and we had to orden twice because it was delicious you should also not miss the pistacho milkshake which i totally recommend
tehran cafe is sure to give you a good experience i totally recommend it

Address: 8-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G7 Canada
Review: great food clean and delicious friendly people i recommend to try this place

Address: 8-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G7 Canada
Review: food quality quantity and taste was really good however would have been better if there were more options in an affordable rate

Address: 8-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G7 Canada
Review: without any doubts best kebab dishes ive ever had in canada

Address: 8-1875 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2G7 Canada
Review: loved the food the portions were great and they were equally tasty

Restaurant_name: Fergies Fish N Chips & Seafood Market
Address: 1 Forks Market Road Suite 142 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4L9 Canada
Review:
probably the best place in the forks for food

three types of fish to choose from cod pickerel and halibut everything is prepared on a regular basis so everything is fresh and crispy

we opted for cod and it was probably the best choice the fish is juicy and delicious we didnt find a single bone in any of the pieces the dishes are served with tartar sauce and a piece of lemon additionally you can choose ketchup or hp sauce in the amount you need

i highly recommend it at these prices for a complete dish it is really good choice in the forks

Restaurant_name: Fergies Fish N Chips & Seafood Market
Address: 1 Forks Market Road Suite 142 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4L9 Canada
Review: the deep fried battered fish is okay the fries for me needs to get replaced maybe use wedges they have seasonings so better use them because the fish and fries are pretty tasteless so its up to you how you make it tasty

Restaurant_name: Fergies Fish N Chips & Seafood Market
Address: 1 Forks Market Road Suite 142 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4L9 Canada
Review: i chose the cod fish was perfectly cooked lightly battered and seasoned incredibly well the fries while a little a little soggy when i started eating them were still close to perfection one of the best fish n chips ive had

Restaurant_name: Fergies Fish N Chips & Seafood Market
Address: 1 Forks Market Road Suite 142 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4L9 Canada
Review: when i saw the long line up i knew i had to try it the cod was really good the batter is not thick unlike other places they put so much batter to make it look bigger it was cook to perfection so crispy and very tasty my hubby had pickerel  stewchowder  it was also very good  the fish chowder was loaded with fish  and it taste fresh season with like salt and pepper simple and tasty the fries looks good but it was not really crispy even we eat it right away something that they can improve the lady that help us was very energetic happy and friendly the best fish and chips place that i have been

Restaurant_name: Fergies Fish N Chips & Seafood Market
Address: 1 Forks Market Road Suite 142 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4L9 Canada
Review:
this fish n chips is good but not great had the single meal with chowder and fries the chowder is a fish and shrimp stew the taste is good but its not a chowder
pickerel was small but good fries were good i would gladly trade 23 of the fries for a bigger piece of fish
fish not pictured

Address: 260 Saint Mary Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 0M6 Canada
Review: the pizza is absolutely deliciously the crust was perfectly cooked the service was superb they have drink special for most nights and they are good as well the bathrooms were clean and tidy if you are in the winnipeg you must stop here

Address: 260 Saint Mary Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 0M6 Canada
Review: we had a sweet 16 party here the staff went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect food was great they even stayed open an hour late for us highly recommend

Address: 260 Saint Mary Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 0M6 Canada
Review:
the restaurant is really nice inside very modern lots of tvs the staff are very friendly

lunch prices are very reasonable the beet salad is delicious

Address: 260 Saint Mary Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 0M6 Canada
Review: very nice server im from the states and she anna gave me a bunch of tips and places she likes to do the soup pictured was one of the best ive had and the cocktail red sky something was incredibly tasty  the bread was very fresh and the chicken was well seasoned will definitely be going back

Address: 260 Saint Mary Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3C 0M6 Canada
Review:
went for le burger week excellent burger looked just like the photo everything tasted fresh friendly and quick service
will definitely be back to try the pizza

Address: 2855 Pembina Highway Unit 40 Winnipeg, MB R3T 2H5 Canada
Review: a friend recommended this place i was initially skeptical since the place was inside a mall but i had a great experience friendly staff great food with very appealing presentation the portion was very sizable for the price

Address: 2855 Pembina Highway Unit 40 Winnipeg, MB R3T 2H5 Canada
Review: amazing authentic korean food food comes with spice bottle on the side so you can adjust it to your liking

Address: 2855 Pembina Highway Unit 40 Winnipeg, MB R3T 2H5 Canada
Review: fresh and delicious sushi their portions are very generous for the price i also love the cozy atmosphere highly recommended

Address: 2855 Pembina Highway Unit 40 Winnipeg, MB R3T 2H5 Canada
Review:
randomly headed here for a quick lunch while shopping at richmond west i was pleasantly surprised by the restaurants amazing food and friendly service i ordered edamame for starter and a salmon donburi
 food 
 edamame not overcooked nice freshness and satisfyingly crunchy 
 salmon donburi rice was cooked evenly came out warm and had a tender texture with a slight chew the salmon was decent quality with a very clean taste its coldness and rich buttery flavor paired perfectly with the hot and fluffy rice  the baran was a little off putting but overall very nice dish
 atmosphere 
loved it very quiet and cozy staff were all very friendly
highly recommended

Address: 2855 Pembina Highway Unit 40 Winnipeg, MB R3T 2H5 Canada
Review:
sudden plans are the best got out to have something light and ended up having the best japanese and korean food 
they got this cute menu where you can see how the food will look like which is literally the same
service was amazing and people were very friendly we had the deep fried chicken dumplings creamy tempura and mt fuji
overall experience 910
so far the best sushi place ever

Address: 103 Sherbrook Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B5 Canada
Review: if youre craving fried chicken this is the place to go i had the chicken and waffles and let me tell you it was the best fried chicken ive ever had so crispy and yet so flavourful my mouth just drooling and who would have guess itd go so well on a fluffy belgian waffle with blueberry syrup the tallest poppy knew now add little hot sauce and youve got yourself a delectable orgasm for your tastebuds

Address: 103 Sherbrook Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B5 Canada
Review: this place is great  hands down the chicken and waffles with two eggs on the side was the best meal ive had at a restaurant in a long time  im not great with names so i cant remember our servers name but she was great  she offered drink suggestions since they were out of what we wanted and they were really good  i feel that she was perfectly attentive sometimes you get servers that come by too often or not enough  but that wasnt the case  both her and the girl who cleaned our table and seated us were very friendly  to say the least our experience here was deserving of a good tip  this is one of those restaurants im going to have to keep note of id like to come back and try some more of the menu very soon

Address: 103 Sherbrook Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B5 Canada
Review: im surprised that i havent tried this place yet as i always passed by this area its a nice place to have brunch with friends though the service might be a little slow as most of the time they are busy but thumbs up for the servers

Address: 103 Sherbrook Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B5 Canada
Review: get the fried chicken i had the fried chicken sandwich with coleslawdang delicious the fresh cheese bread and super crispy chicken make it next level a creamy peppery coleslaw cut it perfectly my wife enjoyed the motza soup with mashed potatoes which she reported was really good but she kept picking off my meal  atmosphere is very funky and a bit bohemian with great wall art around friendly casual servers limited beer selection but full bar eclectic music playing great spot

Address: 103 Sherbrook Winnipeg, MB R3C 2B5 Canada
Review: the environment is pretty nice i like the paintings and other decorations staff are friendly and helpful i ordered the fried chicken and waffles and i was a little disappointed with how crispy the chicken was but all in all it was still good the mac and cheese though that was one of the best ive tasted from a restaurant

Address: 180 King Street Unit 107 Winnipeg, MB R3B 3G8 Canada
Review:
tried out noodle express for the first time today and i can see why they are one of the top 50 restaurants on door dash in all of canada

the food is absolutely incredible and the portions are huge  extremely reasonably priced  i promise that you will not be disappointed

the egg tarts are ridiculously amazing  i could eat a dozen  we also had taro root cake spring rolls sesame balls steamed pork buns and a bunch of other delicious dishes

the owners are very hard working and run a wonderful establishment  we will definitely be back

Address: 180 King Street Unit 107 Winnipeg, MB R3B 3G8 Canada
Review:
one of the best chinese restaurants in the city great prices and huge portions they have the best bbq duck soup ive had so far and their dim sum selection is good friendly and very nice staff will always come back for amazing chinese food

their mango pudding is the best

Address: 180 King Street Unit 107 Winnipeg, MB R3B 3G8 Canada
Review:
this review is for their dimsum as thats what we had and did not order from the other menu
i did include pictures of both menus

after 2pm this place is a great price as its dim sum happy hour

it has been around for a very long time i came here as a child and they are still running a long standing establishment that i enjoy going to its very much a hole in the wall place

they do not push the food on carts you order directly off the menu but that ensures fresh food our meal was 6283 for 4 people including tea and tax

Address: 180 King Street Unit 107 Winnipeg, MB R3B 3G8 Canada
Review: one of those wonderful holeinthewall restaurants that seems understated in decor but has exquisite food the bean curd rolls were perfection and i highly recommended the eggplant in garlic and black bean sauce

Address: 180 King Street Unit 107 Winnipeg, MB R3B 3G8 Canada
Review: my 1st time and wont be my last  very authentic chinese right in chinatown  very casual eating nothing fancy  today was deluxe shrmp dumplings and pork dumplings  both were fresh and delicious

Address: 258 Kennedy St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1T2 Canada
Review: i went here based on the reviews and it was amazing  then the next day i also happened to be downtown and i knew where i was taking my company  this place is amazing if you havent tried it yet you need to and wont be disappointed

Address: 258 Kennedy St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1T2 Canada
Review:
if only this place could be a little bit bigger with more seating options this would get the full five stars from me their food embodies how all diner food should be its obvious how much care and effort goes into making these delicious meals the seating area left a lot to be desired since it was only a handful of tables booths and counter seating my husband needed to borrow a chair to sit comfortably but the server was definitely friendly and helpful with us throughout the experience the parking is just ok but i can definitely see how people can get frustrated trying to find a parking spot nearby
they have amazing shakes and their poutine definitely lives up to the high ratings we had heard about definitely worth a stop

Address: 258 Kennedy St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1T2 Canada
Review: if your looking for an old fashioned diner and your coming from out of town this is the best place to come had the bacon mushrooms cheese burger you wont leave hungry thats for sure thank you for staying open and bring back memories of old fashioned burgers

Address: 258 Kennedy St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1T2 Canada
Review:
wonderful diner  i had poutine with pulled pork  the pulled pork was as good as any bbq place in america tender and smoky  raegan had a great blt  we also had an amazing vanilla bean milk shake

the owner was super friendly and the diner itself was decorated with white star themed ocean liners

we would go back anytime

Address: 258 Kennedy St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1T2 Canada
Review: good food milkshakes were great service was excellent

Address: 1425 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C2 Canada
