what a disappointing experience 40 minutes to get an omelette and corned beef hash and when breakfast comes its unsalted bland and with a genuine slice of kraft cheese on the egg cold toast boiled tasteless potato and dry eggs

the service is also brutal we waited 20 minutes for our server to even acknowledge we were sitting at the table and then another 40 for our food to arrive barely interested staff providing a truly disengaged and uninspired experience ill never be back and i recommend the place to nobody

Address: 120 Donald Street Suite 2 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4G2 Canada
Review: we twelve people visited here i ordered the farmers sausage omelette wonderful choice very delicious the staff were very kind and clean restaurant i love here and will come back again

Address: 120 Donald Street Suite 2 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4G2 Canada
Review: tasty quick place for breakfast was in and out in less than 45 mins and the breakfast was really good

Address: 120 Donald Street Suite 2 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4G2 Canada
Review: slow  inattentive service however the staff were very friendly when they did come by  the benedict felt incomplete like it was missing some fruits or vegetables on the side but it was a pretty decent meal  id imagine you could probably order something like that on the side if you wanted

Address: 120 Donald Street Suite 2 Winnipeg, MB R3C 4G2 Canada
Review: excellent breakfast service and prices recommended

Address: 630 Des Meurons Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P9 Canada
Review:
we had a work event here recently 30 people and the food was fantastic quality ingredients and everything was cooked perfectly

drink and food orders took quite a while as they only scheduled one server for the event  but he remained in good spirits and helped out the best he could

Address: 630 Des Meurons Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P9 Canada
Review: really good food and reasonably cheap for what you get ate in the train car which was a cool atmosphere but can get quite loud tip for management should have kronesberg 1664 on the beer list if you are a french restaurant

Address: 630 Des Meurons Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P9 Canada
Review: perfect date night with the option of dining in an amazing old train car outside patio or in a gorgeous dining room food was spectacular we had the special prime rib with yorkshire pudding parking is tight but they worked with the area that they got

Address: 630 Des Meurons Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P9 Canada
Review:
we popped in on a whim looking to kill some time before our next appointmentand we were not disappointed  we were delighted with the decor and atmosphere its a train
we ordered an entr√©e and glass of wine to share and they were gracious enough to give us two glasses
the food was delicious and after reading other reviews im sad i didnt get to try the brul√©next time

Address: 630 Des Meurons Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P9 Canada
Review: this place was a great experience for a small group i feel as though 24 people would be the ideal amount especially if youre looking for seating in the train it would get a little cramped for space otherwise great food well worth the price the only criticism would be the servers and staff they could have been more hospitable but we came in on a very busy evening so its justified i wish they had live jazz on more nights throughout the week i feel as though thatd be a great addition got the beef bourguignon and escargot would highly recommend would gladly come back and try out different items on their menu

Address: 1360 Taylor Ave Winnipeg, MB R3M 3Z1 Canada
Review: met some people here for a dinner event and though the food came out quickly it was a little hard to get drinks or the bills or any service after the meal   the food that was got was okay but not as good as i remember and extremely expensive now compared to a few years ago did enjoy the crazy 88 roll and tempura prawns but some of the others missed the mark

Address: 1360 Taylor Ave Winnipeg, MB R3M 3Z1 Canada
Review: still a good place to go for sushi although their prices are quite high theyve reduced their menu compared to prior years so i wasnt as impressed on this last visit spicy mango prawns is still one of my fave dishes

Address: 1360 Taylor Ave Winnipeg, MB R3M 3Z1 Canada
Review:
been coming to this place on and off as we now live out of town for 15 years now i cant say many bad things about it  still probably the best sushi in winnipeg  but the quality does seem to have gone generally down over the years

theyve also removed some of the best items from the menu like the sushi pizza and the prairie fire roll

its also very expensive if it wasnt for the nostalgia factor id probably rate lower  but yeah still a great place worth visiting

Address: 1360 Taylor Ave Winnipeg, MB R3M 3Z1 Canada
Review: very good food lots of drink options too service is a bit slow although very accommodating enjoyed

Address: 1360 Taylor Ave Winnipeg, MB R3M 3Z1 Canada
Review: we came in with out a reservation we had to wait even tho the restaurant was nearly empty during the no covid no mask no sitting restrictions month the place was freezing cold service was a bit slow and the server wasnt friendly the food was really good we were able to see the chef and cooks are pros and enjoyed our appetizers and sushi rolls very much

Address: 875 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W7 Canada
Review:
the maki lover deal is pretty good 5 rolls 22 decent list to chose from
the rolls themselves had way too much rice they were so big hardly taste anything else just dense rice the tempura flakes were hard and over cooked hurt to chew as they were kinda rock hard should be light and fluffy
asked for extra soy sauce see photo to see what they consider extra soy sauce two tiny cups 14 full might as well just filler one half full

Address: 875 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W7 Canada
Review: could be the best sushi in the world  trust me its not and i would still never come back here to the guy at the front your customer service and how you treat paying customers is absolutely pathetic end of story

Address: 875 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W7 Canada
Review: i have been a customer since they opened no more the guy at the front and answering the phone does no good for this business all 3 rolls were loaded with rice lacking the fish yokohama roll was deep fried shrimp with some avocado and cucumbers very little salmon or tuna called to let them know he said they have a machine to roll pretty sure the machine doesnt add the fish dont waste your money

Address: 875 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W7 Canada
Review:
was trying to place my order over the phone employee who i was only on the phone with for a min as i want back to check asked me to hurry us as there were people in the store like i was about to place a platter order for pick up
if you cant use the numbers to place the orders then remove the numbers maybe 
used to come here all the time ultimately told him ill maybe call back but after that interaction im now going to place an order with a different sushi place in osborne ill also not be recommending this place to me staff anymore either

Address: 875 Corydon Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3M 0W7 Canada
Review: they are not open for dine in weve had them delivered and its usually good but if you want dine in try sushi ya further down corydon

Address: 191 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z2 Canada
Review: we enjoyed the food and the pleasant friendly service from our waitress and from the owner this was our 2nd visit to this excellent restaurant i particularly liked the tom kha soup massam curry and the pad thai we ordered a lot of different dishes and enjoyed them all

Address: 191 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z2 Canada
Review: always our thai food go to in the city everything we order is great always restaurant is clean and great ambiance for small groups or larger quick and super friendly service doesnt not disappoint

Address: 191 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z2 Canada
Review: the service was good but the food was kind of slow  super busy at weekend  the coconut rice was super sweet and aroma we love this

Address: 191 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z2 Canada
Review:
edit change your google hours

one of my favorite spots for food
delicious assortment of stir fry curries abs soups also good selection of appetizers rice rolls spring rolls lettuce wraps etc prices range from 1217 for main dishes soups around around 1115 friendly good service

Address: 191 Osborne Street Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Z2 Canada
Review: i love the food here its so savory theyll ask you on a scale of 110 on how spicy you want your dishes to be and i recommend going for 9 or 10 if you like spicy dishes the service is also very nice

Address: 1 Portage Avenue E 3rd Floor Winnipeg, MB R3B 3N3 Canada
Review: the clay oven has got many franchises in the city of winnipeg i visited the one downtown at shaw park the place is well connected by public transport and has ample parking space outside its located at shaw park a day of a baseball match you can enjoy the match and have lunch with family and friends you can take the elevator to reach the 3rd floor where its located but yeah you need to wait for a while to get into the elevator during rush hours the ambiance inside the restaurant is extraordinary the staff is very approachable and friendly the price in the restaurant is decent among all other contemporaries i tasted the non veg thali the portion was enough for a single person the mango lassi was absolutely delicious would highly recommend this place for authentic indian food

Address: 1 Portage Avenue E 3rd Floor Winnipeg, MB R3B 3N3 Canada
Review: great dining experience and delicious flavorful food has halal meat options along with vegetarian options also many glutenfree options available the portion size for entrees is large and easily can be shared service was great with wait staff frequently checking in clean and spacious dining restaurant with a nice view from 3rd floor

Address: 1 Portage Avenue E 3rd Floor Winnipeg, MB R3B 3N3 Canada
Review: i ordered the goat biryani with indian iced coffee i asked for extra spicy and was pleased it was not mild coffee was very flavourful paper straw was the only issue

Address: 1 Portage Avenue E 3rd Floor Winnipeg, MB R3B 3N3 Canada
Review: recently visited this place for my hubbys birthday we ordered tandori chicken hakka chicken dumplings chicken biryani  drinks chicken was very dry biryani was also ok but i loved the hakka chicken dumplings ambience is good staff is very polite i would visit again for the dumplings  will try more things

Address: 1 Portage Avenue E 3rd Floor Winnipeg, MB R3B 3N3 Canada
Review:
the menu was well put together easy to understand and detailed various choices love indian restaurants for their vegan options and this one didnt disappoint the food was divine even after i reheated my leftovers at home
the servers were friendly and quick the food didnt take long at all the place is a bit loud inside and outside outside you get to watch a game if one is on inside the staff may have been a bit overwhelmed at the time there was a food spill that wasnt cleaned for an extended period and the smoke from the kitchen irritated my throat when i passed too close
all in all a good restaurant experience

Address: 472 Stradbrook Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3L 0J9 Canada
Review: had the mac also have good vegetarian options great food great service and a dog friendly patio

Address: 472 Stradbrook Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3L 0J9 Canada
Review:
my wife and i recently had the pleasure of dining at nuburger and we were thoroughly impressed by the exceptional experience it offered especially for vegetarian options as a vegetarian my wife often faces challenges finding restaurants that provide both delectable flavors and affordability but nuburger exceeded her expectations on both fronts

nuburgers commitment to catering to vegetarians is commendable their diverse range of veggie burgers truly stood out my wife had previously visited nuburger and loved it so we decided to give it a try together i ordered a traditional burger which was nothing short of fantastic the patty was perfectly cooked juicy and packed with flavor the accompanying toppings and condiments were thoughtfully selected adding a delightful harmony to the overall experience

Address: 472 Stradbrook Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3L 0J9 Canada
Review: we ordered through door dash and were very satisfied with our order the fries were amazing the burger could use a little bit more sauce overall good food we will need to come into the resturant at some point they also provided good delivery with cute stickers and a cute little insert recommend getting something to eat from here

Address: 472 Stradbrook Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3L 0J9 Canada
Review: great spot in osborne village for highquality burgers and quick service everything tasted fresh and the staff were very friendly highly recommend checking out nuburger

Address: 472 Stradbrook Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3L 0J9 Canada
Review: i love the veggie burgers here they do a great falafel patty i have ordered here often its always worthwhile

Address: 100 Osborne Street Suite 208,Floor 2 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Y5 Canada
Review: had some pad peanut sauce for lunch and it was amazing definitely recommending to my friends

Address: 100 Osborne Street Suite 208,Floor 2 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Y5 Canada
Review:
little gem of a place located with a wonderful view of the city  food was fresh unique and satisfying every mouth watering dish bursting with subtle yet somehow bold and distinctive tastes true to the thai flavor one would expect
portions were generous prices very reasonable and the service outstanding
our server ava was expertly attentive efficient and well mannered
kudos to the management for a great hire in this young lady would return 10 out of 10x
davmar  texas

Address: 100 Osborne Street Suite 208,Floor 2 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Y5 Canada
Review: food here is really good had an incredible green curry mango salad and stir fry were average but perfectly good seems like a lovely family business dining room is dated but has a character to it

Address: 100 Osborne Street Suite 208,Floor 2 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Y5 Canada
Review:
this is probably the best thai food i have ever tasted i highly recommend this restaurant absolutely delicious food wonderful service clean and all around amazing dining experience
100 recommend so delicious you wont regret it

Address: 100 Osborne Street Suite 208,Floor 2 Winnipeg, MB R3L 1Y5 Canada
Review:
delightful server awesome food had spiced eggplant and panang curry

highly recommend

Address: 12-208 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T6 Canada
Review: you can customize the level of heatspice in your meals at this restaurant ranging from 110  we ordered 2 dishes both 510 heat  turned out it was good for my husband but a little too high for me  would go with level 3 or 4 next time  our friends had a level 7 for one of theirs  beef basil and deep fried fish were our 2 orders  we had a calamari appetizer which was very good  great service and friendly staff  good place for laotian and thai food

Address: 12-208 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T6 Canada
Review:
this restaurant has parking in front there was ample parking when we went the restaurant was pretty empty
the staff was fast and friendly
the food was quick and tasty
they offered a spice scale of 1 to 10  we had a 5 and it was spicy my friends had a very spicy 8 and enjoyed the heat that it was
we had the beef and basil a fish dish and calamari
prices and flavours were excellent
definitely worth going we will be back

Address: 12-208 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T6 Canada
Review: i came here for lunch and was not disappointed although the decor is in need of an update paint peeling off the walls old tables and chairs i was more interested in the food and that did not disappoint we had the coconut shrimp as an appetizer and the large green curry soup with a side of rice as well as the pad nut the shrimp was good in fact so good we ate it before i thought of taking a picture the soup was excellent a very generous portion full of vegetables and chicken we selected spice level 5 and it was fine for me however my lunch partner  fond it very spicy so be aware of that we had to pack up the pad nut but when i finally got to it it was delicious very good sauce lots of veggies another excellent choice the restaurant has some parking but with the other businesses around it can be tough to find a spot

Address: 12-208 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T6 Canada
Review:
have a new favourite place for coconut curry soup
was absolutely delicious spice was as requested and rice rolls were delicious as well
person who served us was very good very professional
very clean inside and well maintained
highly recommend

Address: 12-208 Marion Street Winnipeg, MB R2H 0T6 Canada
Review: the food is absolutely amazing best thai in the city however if you get take out be careful they package it so full of sauce that when i opened it it spilled all over my leg and burnt me and its scalding hot my suggestion put it all in a large mixing bowl and eat it safely lol other than that wow the food is fantastic try the meekrob

Address: 1467 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C5 Canada
Review:
the food is incredible portions are large and price is reasonable in the photo is deep fried mushrooms and peanut tofu so delicious staff are very friendly helpful and nice

make sure you bring a mask cash or a visa credit card to pay

Address: 1467 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C5 Canada
Review:
if you love chinese look no further absolutely scrumptious chinese food all 100 vegetarian and full of flavour delicious has been around for a long time and they have consistently delivered high quality and great tasting food that comes in good serving size and wont break the bank the customer service is very good and personalized just as it comes with small businesses i asked lots of questions before placing my order and they answered patiently and explained everything the items i tried pictured are item6 wonton in chillie garlic sauce 25 deep fried mushrooms with spicy salt 31 sweet and sour gluten balls 70 hong kong style chow mein and vegetable fried rice
i ordered the hk chowmein because the google pictures made it look like the cantonese soy sauce chowmein and i was not disappointed absolutely delicious the highlight of my order were the mounds of deep fried crispy mushrooms they come piled high and are addictive overall very happy with my order and will be back to try more the only regret i have is that i forgot to ask for a copy of takeout menu for next time

something to be aware of they are only offering takeout at the moment must be wearing mask when going to pickup and they only accept visa cc or cash  debit and mastercard are not accepted

Address: 1467 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C5 Canada
Review: been going to this place since i was very young can honestly say my favourite restaurant in winnipeg  with growing up vegetarian eating out normally wasnt easy but delicious was vegan since before its was wildly accepted and has always been consistently amazing food the folks that work here are lovely and kind their deep fried eel is what made me like mushrooms

Address: 1467 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C5 Canada
Review:
delicious is a great vegan option
they say vegetarian but all the dishes are vegan

deep fried mushrooms  5   wonderful flavor on them texture was a bit thicker and chewier than i would like but some might enjoy it

beef with ginger and green onions 4   when i brought the leftovers to my friend he questioned if it was actual beef this was my least favorite dish however out of what we tried

hot and sour soup 4   it was very good but i didnt prefer how sweet it was if the added sweetness wasnt there i would have done a 5

tofu with peanut sauce 5   i was but expecting to like this as much as i did

they had a decaf tea that was roasted rice and ginger which was very pleasant it is a hint of ginger flavoring

service was excellent 5  with the server on top of the leftovers and the bill

the interior is much slicker looking then what i remember it is modern and does not resemble your typical chinese restaurant
it is located right on pembina near the stellas parking is available on the street and side streets

if you liked this review please hit the 
thanks

Address: 1467 Pembina Highway Winnipeg, MB R3T 2C5 Canada
Review: lives up to its name my family ordered a large takeout order for a special occasion and we were not disappointed the food was so good and the service was wonderful i was especially a fan of the deep fried tofu with spicy salt and the wontons in chili garlic sauce but all of it was so good we will definitely be ordering from here again

Address: 628A St Anne's Rd Winnipeg, MB R2C 0A1 Canada
Review: i love your fish pakora and jalebi i took it during breaking my fasting both items were too good going to order next week for the iftaar

Address: 628A St Anne's Rd Winnipeg, MB R2C 0A1 Canada
Review:
i am so sorry to put this negative comment but you guys deserve it
come on guys this is not a chicken soup this looks like chicken curry cooked with just oil
dont you know what soup looks like
when i complained the lady was so arrogant and said this is our style wth

Address: 628A St Anne's Rd Winnipeg, MB R2C 0A1 Canada
Review: we ordered take out and were very disappointed by the taste and quality of the food we used to eat here all the time before covid but have not had their food for a couple of years not sure if ownership has changed or different staff is cooking the dishes but food was lacking flavour and creaminess that you usually get almost as if it was watered down we will have to seek out a new indian food restaurant

Address: 628A St Anne's Rd Winnipeg, MB R2C 0A1 Canada
Review:
i had ordered 24 samosas from this restaurant and they were uncooked when i tried to tell them they are uncooked they did not accept and started quarrelling with us this was very unprofessional i was talking to that lady there and all of a sudden a guy came and started arguing i had guests to attend and they refused to refund the money or deliver to my address at first they said they will deliver but the guy pitched in who was very rude and refused to deliver i would have given 0 rating if that was an option now i also doubt the hygen as the samosas were not cooked from inside and its very unhealthy with oil getting inside and the dough stretchy and uncooked and i doubt if it was fresh

i completely boycott the rude and arrogant behavior of the people working there that they dont know how to talk to the customers sadly this was my one of the worst experience in winnipeg

i highly request the people who read reviews not to go to the restaurant

Address: 628A St Anne's Rd Winnipeg, MB R2C 0A1 Canada
Review:
one of the best jalebi in town it was not there as i visited with my friend but quick chat with future owner  made my day we ended up having samosas and samosas plate samosas with chick pea curry  onions  tomatoes and secret sauce
samosas were great but very filling i like crunch more than the filling but its personal preference
i think restaurants shall introduce blank samosas  options too to just enjoy the crunch
it was sad experience to miss jalebi as master chef was on vacations and no one else dared to mess up with the recipe may be next time a small shop with good taste wonders

Address: 115 Garry St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1G5 Canada
Review: we visit the keg on garry for special occasions and we always have a great time excellent servers beautiful location inside and out  especially the patio in the evenings always great to see a seasonally changing menu with specialty drinks to match whatever you order you wont be disappointed

Address: 115 Garry St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1G5 Canada
Review: my family and i recently had the pleasure of celebrating a birthday at the keg restaurant and it was a truly wonderful experience the restaurant staff was friendly and accommodating and the kids menu was a hit with the little ones the baked brie was simply delicious and the rib steak was cooked to perfection and came with some delicious roasted beets and green beans unfortunately my wife wasnt happy with her sirloin but we were pleasantly surprised when the manager went above and beyond to make it right overall the keg restaurant is an excellent choice for special occasions and we will definitely be returning in the future

Address: 115 Garry St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1G5 Canada
Review: i would recommend gruyere mushroom dip holiday feature calamari ribs and the billy miner pie we did have to stand and wait for about 25 minutes in order to be seated despite having made a reservation  just something to keep in mind if youre going there on a weekend great service

Address: 115 Garry St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1G5 Canada
Review:
does not disappoint always go
to the keg for steak consistent cook service and ambiance i had the classic strip loin
scallops for appies and billy milner for dessert had a bottle of j lohr which is amazing they carry cause not many do food came out quickly steak is always cooked perfectly z few things missed hot sauce and steak knives which we had to ask for a second time but other than it was great
they have a parking lot not you can park at for cheap reservations done online is a must as it gets packed on the weekends

Address: 115 Garry St Winnipeg, MB R3C 1G5 Canada
Review: my girlfriend and i came in for a late anniversary dinner on thursday february 16th our server a young man named evan was fun professional attentive and timely our entire meal including 2 steaks and dessert was completed within 90 minutes of us sitting down and all of the food was excellent 5 stars couldnt recommend more evan was awesome

Address: 35 Lakewood Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R2J 2M8 Canada
Review: really enjoyed breakfast here a delicious omelette  the place was quite busy and the food took a while but the staff were very attentive and apologized for the delay would definitely keep supporting this establishment

Address: 35 Lakewood Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R2J 2M8 Canada
Review: while visiting winnipeg the canadian mint was one if our must see locations looking for a restaurant after our tour we discovered this little gem although it was very busy over lunch the staff appeared to be a well oiled machine from start to finish we were very impressed with this restaurant judging by their clientele they must have a lot of repeat customers another positive sign of a great place to eat

Address: 35 Lakewood Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R2J 2M8 Canada
Review: my wife and i love this place friendly service great food and a communitylike atmosphere  if you havent been here yet youre missing out

Address: 35 Lakewood Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R2J 2M8 Canada
Review: the service is very good the waitresses are very friendly and helpful the food is so very good i have the roast beef dinners for seniors and its so tasty and the presentation makes the food very yummy

Address: 35 Lakewood Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R2J 2M8 Canada
Review: 2 breakfast specials with coffee was 25 nothing fancy or special about it as the potatoes definitely need dome onions spice  pricey for what you get

Address: 587 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1Z7 Canada
Review: this was our first time at feast we went for lunch and the food pickerel sliders  bison chili was excellent  the portions were generous for the price paid and the bannock was some of the best ive had  the service was quick but friendly and we didnt feel rushed the ambiance is nicer than i expected and it feels more spacious than it actually is overall it was an excellent experience and we will definitely go back to try some of the other dishes

Address: 587 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1Z7 Canada
Review:
tried this place for the first time tonight for date night lovely little place cozy and intimate

had the bison ribs which were incredibly tender not a huge serving but well worth it enjoy every bite savour it

wife had the feast bannock pizza which was also delightful great bannock crust wonderful toppings

looking forward to making a return and trying some other menu items

oh also london fogs are just great

Address: 587 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1Z7 Canada
Review: what a lovely place ive never really been exposed to indigenous canadian food so i was really excited to try feast cafe i was not disappointedthe use of bannock for the delicious tipi taco to the amazing bannock pizza it is a gorgeous little spot with lovely service too recommend completely

Address: 587 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1Z7 Canada
Review: great food with amazing service i had the braised bison rib and it was one of the best meals i had in winnipeg sweet grass and blueberry ice cream is also great prices are also great

Address: 587 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3B 1Z7 Canada
Review:
while in winnipeg i visited feast cafe bistro this is a unique indigenous restaurant with amazing food

i started off with the butternut squash soup with coconut milk and a hint of ginger with corn chips this was one of the best soups ive ever had the combination was fantastic and it was very flavourful

i then had the slowroasted rosemary manitoba bison served with potato squash mash seasonal vegetables horseradish gravy jus  wild blueberry compote it was without a doubt an outstanding dish the bison was soft lean and very rich in flavour and the combination of the mashed potatoes and the wild blueberry compote skyrocketed the flavour of the dish because it added a bit of sourness and sweetness to activate all the flavours of the mouth

the service was outstanding and the establishment was clean i would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who visits or lives in winnipeg manitoba

Address: 241 St Mary's Road Winnipeg, MB R2H 1J4 Canada
Review:
i had to edit this review as a lot of things i had originally posted became outdated after a month i was here more than once in that month since i did enjoy it so this is an amalgamated review

i debated between 3 and 4 on this visit but ultimately went with a 4 the service was fine on this visit from our server she took direction but not initiative the food is generally good im still waiting to find that dish that i have fall in love with and crave all the time

it didnt start out well they had a water issue which was the same water issue that was there from a month before that i guess is still not resolved the water is yellow they could not serve tap water or make tea if tea hot water etc is important to you you are out of luck

on this visit i had brought a group of people from out of town to try helios originally they had platters which were priced well for their assortment of items to try we were told they no longer have them they were meant for customers to try everything and get a taste of the food but since they have been here long enough they felt it was no longer necessary we were disappointed to hear that as it made for great presentation and was nice to have a sampling

portion sizes are large for everything

when we went originally there seemed to be 3 sizes for salads half salad is not the same as a starter pictures below show the difference we used the pellegrino can to help show size however i am unsure if they changed that since

we went for lunch this time the other times it was dinner
if you order the fries with fish expect a lot of fries and only a little fish the full serving of calamari i felt was not as good as the side that you add to your meal its almost the same in value but half portions often cost more so if you do want all that calamari go ahead but half portions are equally fine
the slouvaki lunches seemed to be the best value and looked well balanced
the caviar dip this time was not as good as the first time we tried it
highlights was flaming cheese because flames the pan is larger where the cheese is a smaller piece in the center it comes served with pita bread
there was a lot of dressing on our half salad and a more moderate amount i preferred this one on our starter which makes me feel it can be inconsistent

service is standard some are better than others they usually did not go out of their way but they were friendly and did their job
i feel like the pricing is fair for what you get
i appreciated everything came out piping hot

Address: 241 St Mary's Road Winnipeg, MB R2H 1J4 Canada
Review:
first time eating here and i was very satisfied with the experience the two appetizers calamari and deep fried zucchini were served hot to our table and tasted freshly breaded the greek salad and garlic bread as starters were very tasty and good portion greek salad only had 2 black olives but i didnt mind because i dont like them myself the feta wasnt quite the best to me but still good

the entrees pork tenderloin skewers and stuffed pepper arrived at our table after a short wait and were hot the meals themselves were very tasty the lemon potatoes were very good and a nice bite the tenderloin was very tangy and super tender

overall its a premium meal at a premium price thats well earned we ordered 2 entrees 2 appetizers and a drink each and the total was 84 or 42 a person not bad considering the quality and quantity of food we recieved would definitely come again next time im looking for a premium dining experience

Address: 241 St Mary's Road Winnipeg, MB R2H 1J4 Canada
Review:
you wont be leaving hungry here amazing food generous portions friendly welcoming service and great daily specials all the appitizers are delicious the deepfried mushrooms and pickles are heavenly and the humas is very tasty and one of the better ive had while eating out
the greek salad pictured with garlic bread is only a side salad i cannot imagine a full sized one
two chicken breasts stone cooked with spinach and feta
stuffed pepper with spiced ground beef both come with lemon potatoes rice and grilled vegetables
crazy reasonable prices do not pass this up

Address: 241 St Mary's Road Winnipeg, MB R2H 1J4 Canada
Review: brings back our greece trip memories good food staff is very friendly the owner oversees the operation like an og greek

Address: 241 St Mary's Road Winnipeg, MB R2H 1J4 Canada
Review: got chicken souvlaki came with greek salad and toast and they were both great chicken was tender and nicely grilled the meal came with roasted veggies and lemony potatoes which my husband didnt like too much but i loved it their tzatziki sauce is not too garlicky which may be good or bad for you depending on your preference the inside is clean and warm especially since it was 1 outside

Address: 330 Assiniboine Park Drive Winnipeg, MB R3P 2N6 Canada
Review: the atmosphere was superb but food was soso had smoked salmon benedicts but the salmon was too salty the pancakes were good nonetheless and price was reasonable

Address: 330 Assiniboine Park Drive Winnipeg, MB R3P 2N6 Canada
Review: we dropped into the park cafe to escape a rather cold wind good service  good food the kids loved the fries but thought the grilled cheese was over cheesy i really enjoyed the smoked salmon salad the lighting is great with huge windows overlooking the duck pond

Address: 330 Assiniboine Park Drive Winnipeg, MB R3P 2N6 Canada
Review:
located within the assiniboine park the park cafe offers its visitors with plenty of options

i opted for a tasty house park burger i added cheese and bacon to compliment a well cooked burger it was topped with lettuce tomato and grilled onions as well as a spiced aioli mmm

the hand cut fries were golden and crispy and well portioned

while i didnt eat the banana bread pudding it looked wonderful and got a hearty thumbs up

Address: 330 Assiniboine Park Drive Winnipeg, MB R3P 2N6 Canada
Review: sat on the patio and it was very comfortable seating was thankful for umbrellas that provided ample shade the pork belly eggs benny was amazing and quite possibly my favourite eggs benny in the city the potatoes were amazing and perfectly crispy

Address: 330 Assiniboine Park Drive Winnipeg, MB R3P 2N6 Canada
Review: lovely patio breakfast to celebrate our grandsons 13th birthday great service and delicious food very pleased we choose outside the indoor dining area is very loud

Address: 570 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: the service was great  my salmon eggs benny was brought out quickly and was delicious  our server kept the mimosas flowing everything was great

Address: 570 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: the staff were friendly and personable and the food was really good  i have the veggie benedict and as someone who had never had a benedict before it was a great first

Address: 570 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review: my absolute favourite restaurant of all time the chicken adobo sandwich is to die for sooo good the deserts are pretty amazing too the staff are friendly too love the environment have been 3 times and plan to go again

Address: 570 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review:
amazing food great atmosphere great employees the broccoli and cheddar soup is second to none

cheers

Address: 570 Academy Road Winnipeg, MB R3N 0E3 Canada
Review:
i love coming to saucers staff are always super friendly and ive never been disappointed with the food or drinks always delicious

i dined in once prepandemic during a really busy lunch rush and remember the waitress still going above and beyond for my table the customer service really is fantastic

a great little cafe that i definitely recommend checking out

Address: 1340 Ellice Ave Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R3G 0E9 Canada
Review: second time we ordered and food substandard tonight it was delivered to another place as we did not get it so we dealt with that and reordered the corn chips that were in our meals and side bag were so salty i would consider it toxic and i like salt you can visibly see more salt than chips on them it ruined the meal entirely as they were in it too may be hard to see in photo but white crust of salt is there probably will never order from them again  too expensive for mush and salt

Address: 1340 Ellice Ave Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R3G 0E9 Canada
Review: our monday just got a whole lot better  impossible quesadillas are out of this world and the service here is top notch

Address: 1340 Ellice Ave Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R3G 0E9 Canada
Review:
they finally tried to address issue only because i left a 1 star review
i keep having the same issue since this employee has been hired
for 23 years anytime she is there i dont even get food i just leave way too stressful except on 52823 as i was way to hungry didnt wanna turn around and leave this time
i have emailed corporate and none of them including the owner have done nothing to address it

district manager didnt address any of the  issues blamed me and said i had a personal vendetta
i didnt even know her name till today
very biased and prejudice employees here
i can see why this place is very low quality even ryan morton whos suppose to be district manager has a vendetta against me
he blamed me for their mistakes said they offered a free burrito hows that gonna fox the ongoing issue
she can give away free food and cups and food containers but cant give me a 5 cent bag
place is a joke
no wonder the employees are always so sad
nobody wants to work under incompetence

Address: 1340 Ellice Ave Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R3G 0E9 Canada
Review: way too pricey for what it is  stale chips fatty chunks in the meat veggies not prepped well big pieces of bell pepper was offputting with every bite i will say the queso dip is pretty good however  will not be returning could not finish burrito rare for me

Address: 1340 Ellice Ave Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R3G 0E9 Canada
Review: sunny and all staff was excellent  really clean restaurant and friendly staff they were quick to help and really patient as i took forever ordering and asking what was what really appreciated how awesome the service was and how my borrito was soo goood thanks all see you again

Address: 1715 Kenaston Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3Y 1V5 Canada
Review:
we have passed by this place so many times and saw the patio packed so we finally decided to try it out

the patio is excellent they had caesars on special on saturday and the buffalo chicken we tried was great 

the only slight miss are the chairs on patio have marks on them and look kinda old but its a kinda minor as everything else is pretty great

Address: 1715 Kenaston Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3Y 1V5 Canada
Review: a real come as you are sports bar with great beverages and possibly the citys best nachos its a pretty big place so we got in right away stanley cup finals had the joint jumping my wife said it was the best cesar she ever had massive beer selection but i didnt see any local options overall really great

Address: 1715 Kenaston Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3Y 1V5 Canada
Review: i had booked a reservation for my birthday at this location and upon arrival we werent provided any menus i grabbed some off the bar and didnt think this was a huge deal as we started to order  the server began coming back and fourth to our table saying they were out of certain things a total of 3 times  no stir fry no alfredo sauce for the kid pasta no noodles for the kid pasta the server wanted to check on the noodles because they might have frozen ones no thanks we had ordered the kids each a pop total of 2 kid pops and 4 adult pops when we were unable to order meals that the children wanted i wanted or my dad wanted i kindly asked for the bill for the pops and advised the server this wasnt going to work she brought a bill for 4 pops 2 were completely untouched and not consumed in any way and 2 kid pops that are complimentary with kid meals and untouched the restaurant offers a great selection of food and kid menu items but no stock for items sucked the servers attitude changed drastically as she had to continue telling us they were out of items as if we had annoyed her my apologies girlie if i return in the future i would return with no children as this isnt the best place to take them but great atmosphere for adults if they could adequately staff the kitchen

Address: 1715 Kenaston Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3Y 1V5 Canada
Review:
nice space friendly service gets packed in there so best to make reservation the guys we were with did the burger challenge eat the whole burger 6 patties and poutine in an hour and its free
the quesadilla was not great  it had some weird tangy sauce in it didnt stay together was a mess the poutines are horrible crinkle fries out of a bag the gravy tastes like hospital or powdered gravy hardly any cheese hard pass  the nachoes were decent jalape√±os poppers decent
the food is basically edible here better if your two drinks in

Address: 1715 Kenaston Boulevard Winnipeg, MB R3Y 1V5 Canada
Review: came in on a busy night and sat on patio but service was still great my server was jade and she was very polite super nice made great conversation and food came in reasonable time i had the spinach dip but with mini bread instead of the chips and it was delicious recommended by jade drinks were also amazing and made quickly too highly recommend for a nice summer night especially on patio

Address: 570-C Sargent Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3E 0A2 Canada
Review: good authentic food  limited drink selection almost all high sugar pop only diet coke in non sugar dept  could use some light latin music atmosphere was quite  boring you can hear other patrons talking in detail from across room store is a little sad has very limited items

Address: 570-C Sargent Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3E 0A2 Canada
Review: ive never had salvadorian food before but when i asked on a forum for allergen friendly restaurants in winnipeg this place was suggested the yuca frita con chicharron was incredible and all recognizable ingredients i had it boiled just to be safe it was also aip compliant my spouse had the pupusas very happy restaurant was nice and quiet no loud music owner very friendly

Address: 570-C Sargent Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3E 0A2 Canada
Review: i love this place this is a cute little latino spot serving a wide variety of dishes from all over latin america with a salvadore√±o twist the environment is very nice and cozy and made me feel home there is also a small market within the restaurant selling a bunch of latino products i was impressed with the amount of vegan and vegetarian options available would 100 recommend and come back

Address: 570-C Sargent Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3E 0A2 Canada
Review: tried the pupusas from this restaurant i got one order of chicharron ground pork and another order of revuelta mix of beans and cheese they were delicious each order came with 3 pupusas salsa and curtido las pupusas eran deliciosas por seguro voy a regresar

Address: 570-C Sargent Avenue Winnipeg, MB R3E 0A2 Canada
Review:
this small restaurant has made te top of my list
people saying it takes long to get your food hello this isnt mcdonalds
price is high best joke i heard this year
this food is underpriced the service is great
the highest price for a meal is 1395 and theres only one everything else is 1195 and under
these meals were huge 1195 wait time was about 18 minutes just amazing

Address: 490 Des Meurons Street Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P5 Canada
Review:
such a lovely place  definitely a place for people to dwell in fellowshipjust like how the name of the restaurant symbolizes
 unique ambience well drafted menu with some amazing classics that you dont find  like the reuben sandwich 
love spinach then try the spinwich
special mention about their fresh fruit juices these are definitely a must try carrot juice papaya and mango 
amazing staff so humble and hospitable every table is curated with details to give you an amazing dining experience
the yellow deli in winnipeg is one many the many outlets thats found all around the world visiting this restaurant doesnt just satisfy a hungry tummy but a hungry soul and a hungry mind you have so much to learn from the its history

Address: 490 Des Meurons Street Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P5 Canada
Review: they were able to accommodate our group of 10 easy to customize sandwiches dont expect a normal soft drink as they only have their own brews the closest thing to a normal soft drink is their root beer they do have a couple of fresh fruit smoothies and various teas they heard it was a birthday and offered a free piece of carrot cake to the birthday people complete with candle the staff brought them out and sang happy birthday

Address: 490 Des Meurons Street Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P5 Canada
Review: literally the best restaurant i went there with a couple buddies and the service was amazing food came out fast and was absolutely delicious everything tasted fresh and amazing i would definitely recommend coming here for a delicious meal

Address: 490 Des Meurons Street Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P5 Canada
Review:
i would have never known about this place had i not tried it out today they serve everything fresh they bake their own bread they have gluten free and vegetarianvegan options
they have a large outdoor patio to host large groups15 people comfortably
the atmosphere is welcoming
the restaurant sells their bread and they have assorted goods for sale in their store area
very welcoming environment

Address: 490 Des Meurons Street Unit 1 Winnipeg, MB R2H 2P5 Canada
Review:
this man is one of a kind

ive been going around to places asking people for recommendations asking them to making fun chefs choice meals

so far this man is the only man that when i asked for recommendations told me straight up no hesitation the listed sandwiches were his recommendations

i chose the ruben

he was right

that is all

thanks sir youre awesome

Address: 1639 Kenaston Boulevard Building F Winnipeg, MB R3P Canada
Review: consistently delicious greek fast food great for if youre looking for a fresh option the platter makes a great dinner choice of greek or cesar salad rice lemon potato skewer pita and two tzatziki sauce highly recommend the spanakopita too if you have any space left get yourself a piece of baklava sometimes available in chocolate

Address: 1639 Kenaston Boulevard Building F Winnipeg, MB R3P Canada
Review: i have been to greek restaurants that serves lot better chicken skewers and salad  this is place is not value for money paid 15 for 1 chicken skewer for 4 small pieces and 1 big size potato i rather recommend visiting local greek restaurant rice is bland with no seasoning and flavor

Address: 1639 Kenaston Boulevard Building F Winnipeg, MB R3P Canada
Review:
the food lacks seasoning is very dry and not up to my expectations as i paid 26 for my meal and couldnt even finish this small plate to satisfy my hunger the staff was careless and rude not a word of thank you have a good day enjoy etc customer service here is awful they know the food is so dry so they charge an extra 50c for some walmart tzatziki sauce

overall id give it 05 if i could but i am only allowed to give lowest one star please go next door to freshii much better place cheater and much tastier

Address: 1639 Kenaston Boulevard Building F Winnipeg, MB R3P Canada
Review: extremely disappointed i havent been to opa in a little over a month noticed prices were a little higher nothing new with inflation but the portion and quantity was extremely disappointing i asked for the opa platter with no potatos so when she was making my salad i asked for extra salad because i kid you not i recieved 7 pieces of lettuce i asked for more lettuce and she said this is what you get then proceeds to remind me that i didnt get potato so i can get more salad she gives me two more pieces of lettuce she then burns my pita on the grill and half of it is black i get home only to see the chicken on the skewer is what i would feed my 4lb dog extremely shocked with this whole ex pierce i decided to write this dont recommend going here

Address: 1639 Kenaston Boulevard Building F Winnipeg, MB R3P Canada
Review:
i had a ceasar salad  skewer delivered and was quite disappointed the salad was predressed but also had a side of dressing  which made the lettuce and croutons extremely soggy by the time i received and ate it and of course the side dressing went to waste as it was already dressed

i had to force myself to eat it because i had no other food i honestly think the salad was oldsitting for a very long time as i dont understand why anyone would send a salad for delivery predressed and how it could be so soggy any restaurant you go to will send dry salad with dressing on the side it tasted old and not a single crunchy crouton could be found just gross mush

the chicken skewer was also burnt and tough i wont be trying this place again  if i had any other option besides starving myself i would have thrown it in the garbage

Address: 4910-49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P3 Canada
Review:
great fish taco special the young waitress is not very engaging with customers the food was great

the interior is tired still nice overall

Address: 4910-49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P3 Canada
Review: the bar tender girl is amazing at appearing busy while you wait 15 minutes for a tepid beer  great atmosphere and overpriced average food  short hair manager girl is just angry  off we go to the woodlot pub for some yellowknife ipa

Address: 4910-49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P3 Canada
Review: the beer was cold and the waitress was excellent plus very informative as it turned out the black knight seemed to be a very popular spot with the locals as the crowd increased in time compared with some other places in old town the prices were more reasonable for beer and food as a bonus we happened to be there at the same time that the band the sheepdogs were practicing upstairs they were in yellowknife for a show later that evening upstairs and the sound was great downstairs in the bar as for food the onion rings were good unfortunately the chicken wings tasted like they had freezer burn all in all a very pleasant experience

Address: 4910-49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P3 Canada
Review: after the initial shock wore off with the rude waitress we actually enjoyed ourselves she came around eventually and the food was excellent great burgers and awesome wings one complaint tho for sure an english strike pub that has only one type of canadian beer on tap pretty odd

Address: 4910-49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P3 Canada
Review: we sat at the bar really like the vibe our bartender was great delicious burgers onions rings and poutine the wings were also very good

Address: 5019 49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P5 Canada
Review:
their noodles were much better than their rice the pork chops that came with the rice were a little thin and dry if youre coming here their noodles would be a better choice

their shrimp stuffed chicken wings were pretty good

Address: 5019 49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P5 Canada
Review: this is a good spot for vietnamese in yellowknife it has a big menu with all the typical options food came fast and it was fresh service was great prices are decent would definitely recommend

Address: 5019 49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P5 Canada
Review:
best vietnamese pho in town
we ordered beef and chicken pho fried wonton and also a fresh salad roll the taste was very nice and very warm the staff is friendly and if you find yourself so cold in yk please pay a visit and enjoy a warm soup here

Address: 5019 49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P5 Canada
Review: tasty pho the salad rolls on the other hand not so much tasteless meat and a sliver of prawn inside the peanut sauce was the same no flavor and watered down i will have to return tho since the menu looked good for other dishes

Address: 5019 49 Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1P5 Canada
Review: this is always a solid choice for a meal food is consistently good and lots of choice on the menu to scratch whatever hungry itch you might have sometimes can be a little slow with service but thats usually beachside they are almost always pretty busy over lunch hour which tells you something in and of itself

Address: 4913 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 2P7 Canada
Review:
their noodles were much better than their rice the pork chops that came with the rice were a little thin and dry if youre coming here their noodles would be a better choice

their shrimp stuffed chicken wings were pretty good

Address: 4913 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 2P7 Canada
Review: this is a good spot for vietnamese in yellowknife it has a big menu with all the typical options food came fast and it was fresh service was great prices are decent would definitely recommend

Address: 4913 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 2P7 Canada
Review:
best vietnamese pho in town
we ordered beef and chicken pho fried wonton and also a fresh salad roll the taste was very nice and very warm the staff is friendly and if you find yourself so cold in yk please pay a visit and enjoy a warm soup here

Address: 4913 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 2P7 Canada
Review: tasty pho the salad rolls on the other hand not so much tasteless meat and a sliver of prawn inside the peanut sauce was the same no flavor and watered down i will have to return tho since the menu looked good for other dishes

Address: 4913 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 2P7 Canada
Review: this is always a solid choice for a meal food is consistently good and lots of choice on the menu to scratch whatever hungry itch you might have sometimes can be a little slow with service but thats usually beachside they are almost always pretty busy over lunch hour which tells you something in and of itself

Address: 4701 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N2 Canada
Review: the red apple restaurant has a wonderful variety of chinese and western cuisines its located in the core downtown yellowknife at franklin road the staff is extremely courteous warm and friendly the food platter is delicious and the portions are massive compared to any other restaurants would highly recommend it if youre craving for some chinese and western cuisine in yellowknife

Address: 4701 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N2 Canada
Review: place is a bit stuck in the past atmosphere wise the food makes up for it decent chinese food spring rolls very tasty filling if a tiny bit over fried dumplings were great duck very tasty some pieces were again slightly over done but the crispy skin was divine the star of the meal was the pork chow mein with noodles piping hot tasty and chock full of vegetables go for this dish if nothing else reasonable priced and good service

Address: 4701 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N2 Canada
Review: the red apple i was here when i was 2 years old and i just brought my 5 month old to the exact same place its reliable the staff are amazing the food is 100 what you always expect the red apple is awesome its a yellowknife institution and i hope it never changes

Address: 4701 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N2 Canada
Review: easily the best restaurant in yellowknife as a tourist the food is fresh and well seasoned not to mention great and quick service the restaurant is quite large and houses a lot of food options from traditional western to chinese cuisines the buffet was unfortunately closed due to covid restrictions but this is still a very good place to dine out with very good prices

Address: 4701 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N2 Canada
Review: very authentic chinese food excellent customer service and friendly staff will definitely come again

Address: 3904 Wiley Rd Yellowknife, NT X1A Canada
Review: excellent atmosphere historic building and a legend in yk well worth a visit some food was excellent dip wings some really not good poutine  but still visit its a fascinating place

Address: 3904 Wiley Rd Yellowknife, NT X1A Canada
Review: great historical place for one time visit when youre in yellowknife we were lucky enough to be there on their closing day theyre only open through summer and early fall so do visit when youre in town it has a nice cabinlike vibe overlooking the great slave lake and a very nice atmosphere

Address: 3904 Wiley Rd Yellowknife, NT X1A Canada
Review:
the deck at the wildcat may be the best in yellowknife on a nice day  service was really good  food is great
really the only negative is the portion to price ratio  its way off and not in a good way  wings are top notch but by far the most expensive in yellowknife

Address: 3904 Wiley Rd Yellowknife, NT X1A Canada
Review: dinner was delicious and the bread pudding was perfect

Address: 3904 Wiley Rd Yellowknife, NT X1A Canada
Review: lovely place i wish the menu had more options but you know when there are a few selections those meals are mastered down to a science staff were friendly and food was delicious and extremely filling

Address: 4905 50th Ave Yellowknife, NT X1A 3X8 Canada
Review: this is probably one of the best shawarma places in all nwt   really like the fact they have their own signature wrap comes with fries inside the wrap service is great but when it gets busy one man show is no longer becomes tolerable the food is super tasty and highly recommend this place specially their flafel and babaganoush

Address: 4905 50th Ave Yellowknife, NT X1A 3X8 Canada
Review: had the chicken and beef platter blew my expectations out of the water amazing food and great service

Address: 4905 50th Ave Yellowknife, NT X1A 3X8 Canada
Review: had an amazing dinner at this shawarma joint the food was delicious you should try their chicken shawarma platter it comes with hummus and falafel you can also substitute hummus for baba ganoush portion size was apt our server was very friendly and helpful would highly recommend

Address: 4905 50th Ave Yellowknife, NT X1A 3X8 Canada
Review: delicious falafel for lunch served promptly the host and service were welcoming and friendly

Address: 4905 50th Ave Yellowknife, NT X1A 3X8 Canada
Review: we are visiting yellowknife from toronto and we were quite surprised to find a middle eastern restaurant here but i have to say the food and customer service is excellent we loved it so much that we ate here two times within 3 days the food is very authentic and the owners are lovely we highly recommend this spot

Address: 5030 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R8 Canada
Review: delicious ethiopian food in the middle of yellowknife who would of guessed this place is absolutely worth a visit yes the prices are quite high but this is yellowknife we are talking about so its relative to the remote location excellent flavors friendly service and in the middle of town

Address: 5030 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R8 Canada
Review: im rating such because its very very expensive place was almost empty  food is unique and good service served in beautiful containers though i did not particularly enjoy the taste as much of some of the salad and coffee  it takes some adaptation but worth a visit for authentic try of ethiopian food

Address: 5030 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R8 Canada
Review: delicious food and good atmosphere to this place really enjoyed the goat curry and my fam enjoyed their food as well chicken curry beef special and a lentil dish would recommend it for a good meal portion size was large and none of us could finish before getting full

Address: 5030 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R8 Canada
Review: went for lunch even though were not very hungry but wanted to try the food wrong move  the food was amazing but the portion size is just too big i think the portion size works for two moderately hungry people i ordered the curry chicken and rice platter which comes with a vegetable salad the food is very flavoursome and irresistible warning if you feel the food is hot dont try the saucechutney served with the platter thinking itll make things cooler  its hot i also tried some stuff from the mahiberawi combination that my friend got and instantly regretted that i didnt get it id totally try that with rice

Address: 5030 50th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R8 Canada
Review:
good authentic ethiopian cuisine food is flavourful

i had the zehabesha tibs im not a fan of the bonein meat lamb pieces but otherwise its tasty

Address: 4825 49th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 2R3 Canada
Review:
the bison ribeye was perfect and the service was exemplary
my wife had the ming ling cod and thoroughly enjoyed it a japanese friendly flavour
a fantastic meal i highly recommend this restaurant

Address: 4825 49th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 2R3 Canada
Review: underwhelmed by this place for the price ordered a mushroom and prosciutto stuffed chicken thigh in an orange sauce the sauce was overly sweet and wasnt counterbalanced with a savoury enough filling i couldnt find any trace of prosciutto in the stuffing and if it was there i couldnt taste it i mentioned my thoughts to the waiter who said hes inform the chef but i never heard back others in our party also didnt feel they received value for their money

Address: 4825 49th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 2R3 Canada
Review: i love eating at the traders grill good food every time although expensive today i had the vindaloo chicken curry served with garlic infused rice and naan bread this is not the creamy curry you may be expecting its chicken and rice has a nice broth with fresh tomatoes a healthy choice that hits the curry craving perfectly loved it

Address: 4825 49th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 2R3 Canada
Review: food was okay tasting but they gave me six baby potatoes six an insulting amount of potatoes so much empty space on the plate i had to drink all the ketchup and cream to be full by the end of the meal i just think people should know how many potatoes they can expect so they arent let down like me thank you please

Address: 4825 49th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 2R3 Canada
Review: do not eat here very unimpressed with service waited over 5 minutes for a host to seat us when it was not busy after being seated for 5 min waiter asked what we would like to eat didnt start with drinks or apps over priced all mains 45 i had the boar tenderloin and rabbit casserole tenderloin its self was good however they give you pretty much hickory sticks and this corn cheese puree as sides which were very under seasoned no flavour the rabbit casserole had good flavour after spending 5 minutes picking out all the bones the entire time no one asked how everything was if we wanted more drinks even when paying didnt ask how meal was 2 people 107 very unhappy

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 1 Yellowknife, NT X0E 3W1 Canada
Review: really good burger big well cooked not dry fries were hot and fresh pop didnt have much taste but whatever its all about the burger

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 1 Yellowknife, NT X0E 3W1 Canada
Review: we came in from out of town and decided on fat burger for lunch we ordered from the app and arrived at the time specified the food was on the counter and it took a good few minutes for someone to acknowledge we were so we had to flag someone down from the kitchen to get our order we sat down and it seemed all the tables were dirty or had something on them the food was not very good considering what you pay for it and most of the normally amazing chicken strips were uneatable and the poutine was flavourless the food used to be really good but im sad to say we wont be going back

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 1 Yellowknife, NT X0E 3W1 Canada
Review: its one of the very few restaurants that you can find if you want to have sandwich for breakfast the food is pretty decent the buffalo chicken burger from here was my goto food during the days i visited yellowknife but please try to avoid the carbonated drinks as they all taste like sugar water and are not carbonated at all

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 1 Yellowknife, NT X0E 3W1 Canada
Review:
place is okay bit more greasy than the fatburger in vancouver i find good fries

advertised beer but when i ordered a corona i was told they didnt have any beer also fountain drink machine wasnt working

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 1 Yellowknife, NT X0E 3W1 Canada
Review: it was a lovely surprise to find a fatburger here in yellowknife as the first time trying their food i can say this is definitely of my top 5 burger joints

Address: 5309 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1E3 Canada
Review: such a fabulous spot the owners are amazing the food is so great the sushi is absolutely delicious the atmosphere to dine in is perfect definitely one of the best places to eat in yk

Address: 5309 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1E3 Canada
Review: forced to charge 15 tips without prior notice the food is very bad

Address: 5309 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1E3 Canada
Review: the food was served fresh and was pretty good we had ginger beef edamame mixed tempura chicken skewers gyoza and a few different maki rolls with sake to drink the food was prepared fresh and the ginger beef was great the only thing id change about it is a little less sauce so it didnt pool at the bottom of the dish when you were getting to the end the service was quite good they refilled our drinks promptly were pleasant to deal with and even advised us that we might have ordered too much food even though it meant a bigger bill i would recommend trying this place out

Address: 5309 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1E3 Canada
Review:
take out lunch for 2 people
 sushi rolls vegan
 just after lunch rush

symmary  great food and service  will return and recommend 45

Address: 5309 Franklin Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 1E3 Canada
Review: ive been there basically once a year and this is the first time that im giving it a bad review the quality has gone down dramatically over the last two years and the prices are outrageous my friend and i spent nearly 80 for two people and we still want to mcdonalds afterwards to fill up

Address: 200 4910 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3M3 Canada
Review: this restaurant was bit pricey but very kind and we could eat so tasty sushi

Address: 200 4910 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3M3 Canada
Review: made my order super fast when i was in a hurry  food was fresh and fantastic  sushi is traditional sushi so there were no surprises  prices were reasonable  service was fast

Address: 200 4910 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3M3 Canada
Review: the sushi is pretty good here very limited types of fish i did not enjoy the lettuce in the rolls i just have never had that before

Address: 200 4910 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3M3 Canada
Review: pleasantly surprised that there is sushi in yellowknife service was quick and friendly considering where we are i can only assume prices are reasonable i had an arctic char platter with 3 nigiris 3 pc roles and 6 maki pieces for 20 i wish they would be a little more generous with the portions but in the context of where we are its fair

Address: 200 4910 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3M3 Canada
Review: despite operated by japanese staffs the overall experience was disappointing pricy but what i got was tasteless and overcooked udon poorly made sushi

Address: 483 Range Lake Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R9 Canada
Review: dont let reviews by drama queens scare you away the staff are quite pleasant helpful and accommodating without being uppity we both had the friday prime rib special and it was good portions are large i had a rather unique drink and it was a refreshing one ive only been to this restaurant four times in the more than 25 that it has been here and it has always been fine yes prices definitely are higher than drivethrough

Address: 483 Range Lake Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R9 Canada
Review: the food here is delicious house made pasta they are great with kids and on friday and saturdays they have a pianist such a wonderful comfortable atmosphere

Address: 483 Range Lake Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R9 Canada
Review: wonderful service and great live music piano food was pretty good everything especially the sauces was a bit salty though

Address: 483 Range Lake Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R9 Canada
Review: went on a friday with a piano player great romantic atmosphere very cute and intimate venue

Address: 483 Range Lake Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3R9 Canada
Review: food was amazing nice staff seafood linguine is sooooo good

Address: 5102 48th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N6 Canada
Review:
successfully delivers on the boston pizza experience would come back again

also learned if you pet the robot that delivers food it will react lol

Address: 5102 48th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N6 Canada
Review: this is got to be the worst sports bar in the country  they might play the game but will not turn up the volume and the waiter is somewhat rude and very quick with you if you ask for a particular game for 10 a beer and not cheap food you would think they would be more willing to make your experience better if you want to watch the playoffs save you  and stay home

Address: 5102 48th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N6 Canada
Review: we had a bad experience with one waiter in the bar he treated us in a strange way but restaurant food was very good and have big portions too

Address: 5102 48th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N6 Canada
Review: bps is reliable to have good food and mediocre service not necessarily bad service but nothing extraordinary loved the cactus cuts and thai chili chicken bites the nachos were lacking

Address: 5102 48th Street Yellowknife, NT X1A 1N6 Canada
Review: today i visted here for just drinks around 10 and the place was bit busy on bar side the server checked our ids and never came back to take order he should have notified us that its gonna take a while as it was more than 20 mins already as we were trying to make some eye contact to order if someone cannot handle the work then they should not take the table we had to get up and move to the family side to get our drinks the server at the other side was really good and servered us nicely

Address: 5201 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3S9 Canada
Review: nestled in the heart of yellowknifes old town this charming sitout spot captures the hearts of tourists and locals alike its ideal location within walking distance of several tourist hotels adds to its convenience with prices comparable to starbucks it offers a sweet respite in the chilly yellowknife weather the hot beverages are truly refreshing and we particularly enjoyed their delectable sandwiches however we werent as fond of their soup despite this minor setback this spot remains a captivating haven for a cozy break in yellowknife

Address: 5201 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3S9 Canada
Review: nice place modern atmosphere feels a bit generic the latte is surprisingly good and i like the fact that this place opens late no complaints yet nothing really stands out this is a bit of a shame as i would not have given it a second look in passing this is a bit of a hidden gem to nit pick the coke fridge looks out of place

Address: 5201 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3S9 Canada
Review: this place is good  the staff were friendly i inly tried a latte  it was good will try something different  update if i go here again

Address: 5201 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3S9 Canada
Review: loved our lattes and the cranberry muffin       we tried two places on the day we went   and  the lattes here at  javoroma  were alot better then the other place we tried

Address: 5201 50th Avenue Yellowknife, NT X1A 3S9 Canada
Review: this is one of the nice cozy sit out place for the tourists and locals in yellowknife its located right in the centre of the old town and is at walkable distance from the tourist hotels we had been there twice during our stay in yk and had some refreshing hot brews

Address: 312 D Old Airport Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T3 Canada
Review: not even close to the standard expected from pizza hut elsewhere pan pizza crust was soggy and none of the specials offered elsewhere were honoured trying to order online in disabled as the website does not recognize addresses and tells you to call in

Address: 312 D Old Airport Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T3 Canada
Review: too expensive and most of the time poor service edit we called pizza hut to place an order for delivery this was our order one large half pepperoni half hawaiian pizza and one large bread sticks with cheese the total without tax was 7200 and when we tried to order the exact samething on the pizza hut app it was only 5700 something why such a price difference

Address: 312 D Old Airport Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T3 Canada
Review: we ordered from here twice only bcuz we gave it a 2nd chance and it was bad both times we normally prefer pizza hut but this location leaves the pan crust pizza extremely doughy the inside of the crust both times was almost raw dough and its not like theyre the cheapest either  unfortunate since it would only take a few more minutes in the oven to make it a great pizza

Address: 312 D Old Airport Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T3 Canada
Review: tried to order after having multiple errors using the app was instructed to call the store after waiting on hold for 15 minutes was told by the employee that they couldnt do anything and that a manager would help then promptly hung up on me had to deny the payment through my credit card company

Address: 312 D Old Airport Road Yellowknife, NT X1A 3T3 Canada
Review: pizza a bit tooooo greasy ive had some looking like it was dipped in oilbutter and prices are steeper than other spots in town guess it depends what type of taste your into toostaff also is quit unfriendly and always seem upset  and operating hours can be good to closed ive driven there a few times only to find it closed so had to head to dominos

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 21 Yellowknife, NT X1A 3W6 Canada
Review: worst sandwich ever given a 6 veggie with finger picked lettuce from the old tray redish strains discolored lettuce and a full load of jalape√±os the customer just before me gets a big bowl of fresh lettuce from a fresh tray i dont know why the difference  was my sandwich cheaper lol or they decide on whos who  i would have asked for more however gave up and decided wont come back wonder if anyone does any surprise checks on their quality

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 21 Yellowknife, NT X1A 3W6 Canada
Review: subway is another must stop for my family when we are in yk its quick and the service is great the food is always good imo if you like subs definitely check it out as an alternative to other fast food restaurants eat in or take out subway is great

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 21 Yellowknife, NT X1A 3W6 Canada
Review: the service here has been on the decline for some time three staff behind the counter loading the cooler with drinks stood there without acknowledgement in my opinion someone should at least let you know that they will be a minute waited a few minutes  not until i said really did someone say anything then the response was almost passive aggressive we will be there in a minute left promptly will not be returning

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 21 Yellowknife, NT X1A 3W6 Canada
Review:
this place has gone downhill and staff dont care 6 tuna sub for 9 and they gave less than a full one scoop of tuna let her know its supposed to be 2 full scoops and she gave attitude and added the rest of the 14 of the first scoop even though another staff told her its 2 she ignored it
continued to do a sloppy job of veggies sauce and wrapping and pretended she didnt know better when i called her out on it
nowhere to put a complaint forward to management so you get an online review instead do better

Address: 100 Borden Drive Unit 21 Yellowknife, NT X1A 3W6 Canada
Review: ive only been here twice both times ordered the same thing a mini bun sandwich and soup and it was so friggn good same guy made my food both times too dont drink from the fountain drink machine though we got sprite and a bunch of black debris  was floating around so we got a bottled beverage instead
